Summary Heading: If resort services matter, don’t stay here right now
Summary: We’ve stayed at this hotel once a year for the last several years and have always had a great time but unfortunately, it’s not what it used to be. When you arrive, there is no bell service so no one to help with your luggage. When we got to our room, there was dirt on  the floor (straw from Easter baskets and Cheerios) and there is no housekeeping unless you request it.  Our first day at the pool (Easter Sunday) the pool bar was open but no service - (self service only) and no food service. The following day, even the pool bar was closed and stayed closed until Thursday. To order drinks or food you had to go into the one bar in the hotel that was open. I waited in line for more than 15 mins to order two drinks.  When we did decide to sit down and eat inside service was painfully

I sort of don’t want to leave a good review because then more people will be attracted and it will be busier next time I stay. But this hotel is definitely worth it. Clean, excellent customer service, right by the beach, good amenities, everything you could ask for.

Will be back for sure. Wonderful resort in a great location. Great restaurants and beautiful rooms. Close to so many activities. Two pools for a different vibe, one more kid centered with water slides. The views from the room with the oven views were stunning. Great family resort with so much to do in the area.

The resort had Very friendly staff, clean resort and accommodating. Although, the resort was short staffed, the staff did everything to accommodate my family and make our stay pleasurable. I would definitely return with my family and invite friends.

We celebrated a girls getaway at the Spa at this hotel. We signed up for the mid-week massage special ($50 discount) which also allows access to the hotels pool that overlooks the ocean.  We all LOVED the massage but were not very happy to see that they added a $47 tip to our bill.  They did allow us to adjust this but I was very put off at the fact that they just added it.  A tip should be due to excellent service not just an "add on" to the bill.  It ended up being very awkward and we were made to feel cheap.  We were told that this large of a tip is "standard" at hotel spa's.

Thank you Hilton for awesome memories of our 29th.  The beachfront upgrade was unexpected and much appreciated.   Loyalty does payoff.  We did have trouble with the bill and continue stay, as our 1st night was a loyalty bonus.  However, Sean who pleasantly checked us in was there to fix things at checkout as well.  Hayley, Rodolfo and Travis went above and beyond to make us feel special at breakfast.   Best too eat breakfast between 7 and 9am as there was a 50 minute wait at busy time.  Lots of COVID spaced tables,  not enough staff.  That's why Hayley,  Rodolfo,  and Travis are so special,  they work hard. Huntington beach area is beautiful and clean.  We never used valet once we checked in our car.  We brought our bicycles to get around and walked.  Thank you Waterfront

My family and I enjoyed multiple aspects of our stay. Perfect location to the beach, great restaurants, Starbucks coffee and a great resort feel. The staff is very polite, helpful and quick to respond to needs. This resort is now our spot on the PCH!

Overall this hotel was amazing and beautiful. They had disinfectant station throughout the hotel, the staff were all very helpful and welcoming. We had a beautiful view and the location was great. You were at walking distance to restaurants, a mall and other stuff.

I can here to celebrate my friends daughters birthday and we had an amazing time. The property was amazing! Staff was so friendly and accommodating to us. Hero’s pizza on the property is very good pizza!

Was in the tower that was recently renovated. Is right across the street from the beach. Rooms were clean and modern. Pools very crowded with kids. Food options onsite were very good and close proximity to other restaurants. It is valet parking only and a hefty daily fee for valet.

We came here for a birthday celebration for the weekend. The partial ocean view rooms are the best. We booked a suite and it was perfect for 4 of us. Everything was great; the restaurants, pool and beach access. A+ treatment from the staff.

Kinda in the center of everything south of LA. New Port Beach just down the road. Long Beach to the north. Pier right across the street. Great views of everything. Ocean view patios and a great pool. Worth the money

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel, Wonderful Staff and Amazing Food!
Summary: Just did a last minute staycation at the Waterfront Beach Resort and our family had such a great time! The staff truly does make you feel like you are at your home away from home, from the entire front desk staff, to all the restaurants, the coffee shop and the amazing views and food at Offshore, this Hotel is just a great place to visit. They also have a new Pizza place "Hero Pizza" and the pizza and sandwiches are a great addition to the Hotel. Highly recommend this Hotel as it will not disappoint. Kids had a great time in the pool and waterslides and my wife and I were able to sit back and relax!

We decided the day of to take an impromptu trip and were excited to find availability on a Saturday night. My husband and I were married here in 2007 so we thought it would be fun to share with the kids.  From the moment we arrived we were not disappointed. The valet was prompt and literally every employee we came into contact with put a smile on my face. Ryan at the front desk made us feel incredibly welcome and made my daughter's day with an upgrade to the top floor. I have checked into quite a few hotels yet he was probably the best. It was such a great treat to visit here again, show our kids around and enjoy the MANY changes they have made through the years.

Checked in over Valentine's Day weekend. The hotel was very busy, but not too crazy. Every staff member I ran into was super nice and treated my girlfriend and I like kings and queens. We tried to upgrade our room at check in, but they were sold out. Other than that, we had a great time and look forward to coming back.

Summary Heading: 2-14-2021 Horrible Customer Service . Vanessa and Daniel both lied to me . Vanessa hung up on me while speaking .
Summary: Called to reserve Ocean front suite on the 8th floor for my mother but received a room on the second floor facing a trellis instead. I tried to make it special for my mother but again managers and customer service reps lied to me . I actually called more then 5 times to make sure that is what she was going to receive and they confirmed yet they lied. Do not trust when they state something beware of room and views . Do not believe unless on paper and confirmed. I was dealing Vanessa in customer service who has not a clue how to deal with people in a diffusing manner . She was argumentative self righteous snide and dismissing . She talked over me and would not let me get a word in. She then transferred me without letting me know and cut me off while I was trying to explain the

We stayed at the hotel in late January, 2021.  Overall, the staff was helpful and cordial.  Due to Covid, we did not dine at the hotel and did not have housekeeping service.  On our last day, we were going to relax in the hot tub which was directly beneath our balcony. We witnessed a naked, transient woman washing herself with soap as well as her clothes in the hot tub. We called the front desk and security was dispatched to remove her. She was escorted off property by security. We were told by the manager Joseph that the hot tub did not need to be closed and cleaned and that she was a hotel guest.  It was insulting to be lied to by the hotel management.  Interestingly, we have trouble with the key cards all around the resort.  The card worked about 60% of the time yet a

Summary Heading: The Best Hilton in the Entire Chain
Summary: We have visited TWR many times over the years.  I am a Hilton Diamond member so I've stayed at many Hilton properties.  Hands down this hotel is the finest Hilton property I have ever stayed in.  We felt very safe last weekend an everyone in the hotel wore masks and kept their distance.  Our room was terrific.  The restaurant staff was excellent and the food terrific for breakfast!  We watched as they thoroughly cleaned each table after a guest would leave.  We were celebrating my wife's birthday and we were presented with a terrific room upgrade.  The property is very well maintained and always clean.  Kim and Vanessa in Guest services helped with some birthday planning and were wonderful to meet and thank in person for their help. WE look forward to our next visit sometime in

My stay Friday at the Hilton was great. Even though the hotel has been across from the beach for a long time, everything in it looks brand new.  Every place you look you see beautiful seating areas with lots of sofas and chairs. The furniture and art are very impressive and everything is spotless. My room on the 8th floor had a large balcony overlooking one of the pool areas and the ocean. Best place to relax. They have every amenity. if you get out of bed in the dark a motion light under the bed turns on pointing your way, that is something I have never seen. The staff that I was in contact with was fantastic and couldn't be more helpful - Ms Fisher, Corwin, Kyle, and Kimmie.   On the rooftop they have a lounge bar with sofas and chairs and little fire pits for atmosphere and

I just loved this stay at the Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort. The staff was so friendly and helpful. They had all the proper cleaning protocols in place. We were upgraded to a nicer room. We had a fantastic ocean view. The larger pool was a little cold but the smaller pool was perfect. The poolside service was awesome!!! We also reserved a fire pit and they upgraded us to a cabana since it was windy that night so we just had an amazing time. We also had s'more around the fire pit and that was awesome!! Considering we live only 20 minutes from the beach I was not expecting to have such a great time but we just loved this hotel and the time we were there. The rooms were also amazing and exceeded what I was expecting.

Bravo! Food, service, rooms and special touches are all fabulous. We’ve stayed all over including Ritz Laguna, Surf and Sand, Balboa Bay Resort, Lido House etc... none compare to this hotel.   Really exceptional service and food is not “hotel food” it Is upscale and delicious.   Location is perfect to beach and walkable to many other restaurants and shops basically just next door. $30 breakfast credit each day with status and great upgrade. ❤️

This property is amazing.  Directly across from Huntington Beach, the location is perfect; less than a block walk to Pacific City (shops & restaurants) and about a block from the pier!  We ate breakfast onsite every morning and the food and service was excellent.  Got upgraded due to diamond status and view from room was awesome.  Main pool was busy due to the pool slides (I’m guessing) and family with kids, but if you are worried, there is a side pool that was empty almost the entire time of our stay.  I loved our stay here and front desk staff were friendly and helpful.  You do pay for valet/parking if you have a car.  The hotel has a rooftop that I highly recommend for drinks and appetizers.  Nice ambiance and view.

I have stayed at the Waterfront several times, and without a doubt it is my all time favorite hotel. Although my stay was actually several months ago, I just booked my next stay which prompted me to write a review.  The rooms... whether you are in the Huntington or the Twin Dolphin tower, the views just cannot be beat! I could sit on the balcony all day and watch the waves in the ocean.  The staff... simply the best in the business! Every single team member I have encountered at the Waterfront has been nothing less than outstanding! They are true professionals who show how much they enjoy taking care of their guests!  The amenities... all of the dining options, from the roof top bar to the pool deck offer great food and drinks. The gift shop offers coffee, grab and go food and

About a month ago my daughter decided instead of a birthday party that she wanted a staycation. After the weekend I can say we were definitely happy with our decision. Checking in was seamless with Sean And Representative over phone Ryan was top notch. He reassured me we would receive room that was requested and turned out great . Customer service from valet was also exceptional especially from Nick and Jake.  However the pool amenities could have been reviewed/cleaned a little more and seemed needed more attention to detail.  Overall stay would be recommended to family and friends.

Very nice and large hotel, set of the busy Pacific Coast Highway.  Must cross the road to get to the beach.  A little far to walk to downt0wn Huntington Beach, but easy crossing to get to the excellent beach.

First, let’s address COVID-19. If you are at all concerned and are uncomfortable around strangers who refuse to wear a mask, don’t bother going to Huntington Beach. It is a busy beach city, even during the pandemic, and few people wear masks. While waiting for the valet to bring our car, my husband and I witnessed a very hostile and angry confrontation between a gentleman attending a wedding at the hotel (wearing a mask) and two maskless surfers.  The maskless surfers were screaming really profane insults at the wedding goer. Even though it was right in the portico of the hotel and dozens of people were watching, the hotel staff did nothing to deescalate the situation.  The hotel was very well appointed, right on the PCH with spectacular views of the beach. Our room was very
Manager Response: We're very sorry for any disappointment and/or difficulties during your stay. I can assure you, this is not an ordinary review by any standard and we take these concerns very seriously. Thank you for your review and bringing this to our attention. Please contact our Director of Front Desk, Damian Garcia at 714-845-8000. Please have your reservation information (name on the reservation and dates of stay) when you call. Our sincere apologies.

Summary: Sorry to say our stay was horrible!   From our less then pleasant greeting at the front desk to the feeling of being fooled.   You join Hilton honor with all these promises, but it’s has to get any of the perks they describe.  My room was even described as a king with a “full Sleeper” sofa. To actually be a twin sleeper. We had to request everything, but by the time u realize u need a CUP  to rinse your mouth your already reaching down with your cupped had to rinse! Really, they don’t care.  Not sure who runs this place but it was a struggle to stay here.  They should be fired!!   Tv are not even smart, have to pay to play music.  Tried dinner at Henry, nice atmosphere but that’s about it!!  The food is hardly a full portion & quality wasn’t even good. When u go to a restaurant
Manager Response: We're very sorry for any disappointment and/or difficulties during your stay. I can assure you, this is not an ordinary review by any standard and we take these concerns very seriously. Thank you for your review and bringing this to our attention. Please contact our Director of Front Desk, Damian Garcia at 714-845-8000. Please have your reservation information (name on the reservation and dates of stay) when you call. Our sincere apologies.

Summary Heading: Great location, great service and staff
Summary: Nice hotel in an excellent location. With one exception described below, the Staff could not have been nicer and more helpful. The hotel is in good shape, and fairly busy on weekends,  in this Covid era. We had an Ocean Front King Suite...very nice, lots of room. Food in the Boardwalk Restaurant was very good, with the exception noted below. Have to give a shout out to Shea in Boardwalk, who was cheery, with great service and efforl with our large group,  and when just my wife and I ate.  Really enjoyed our stay. It should be noted if you have an ocean front room, Pacific Coast Highway can be pretty noisy during the day. No problem at night.  The only negative was the Wednesday breakfast during our stay. On Monday and Tuesday, the food was excellent,  and Shea's attentive

Summary Heading: Hotel Allowed 300+ People at Wedding Without Masks!
Summary: I was at the hotel early September and encountered a very uncomfortable situation. The hotel booked a wedding with over 300 people that lasted for at least 4 hours where masks were not required and people were clearly not social distancing. Yes the guests of the wedding didn't consider impact of their actions, but the hotel should of known better than to risk the well being of their other guests. At the very least, the hotel should of advised people when booking the reservations. Just unacceptable behavior by all parties.

Summary Heading: Ryan at the front desk is extremely rude
Summary: I've stayed here multiple times.  Usually, it's okay.  This experience was horrible.  We got a cabana and the servers rarely come around.  The fridge was supposed to be stocked with bottled water, it wasn't, and we never received any water once we asked for it. For dessert, we ordered cookies and ice cream from in-room dining.  The cookies were awful!  The 4 people in my group couldn't even eat one.  They tasted like sawdust.  There is no way they were made in-house.  Chips Ahoy would have been better.  And instead of ice cream, they just decided to serve us milk.  Didn't say anything about it.  Just showed up with milk.  Breakfast the next day came out lukewarm and not a single order was correct.  We asked for hot sauce and by the time it made its way to the table 15 minutes
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed in your stay. We have passed on your experience to our management staff for review. Please call the hotel directly at 714-845-8000 to further discuss how to make it right for you. Thank you.

Summary: I will be short stayed 7th-10th sep. worst ever no roof 9 no everything . Wouldn't change sheets til 3rd morning. 2 days charged me 42$ a day for parking didn't have a car.  Didn't adress my upgrade . Since im a hilton team member their harassing me how i got the team rate , 3 days of accusing emails while im there sleeping .  Everything was filthy . 4 stars price youth hostel property . RUDE GRAVEYARD DESK ASKED FOR MY GOLD UPGRADE ..... SURE I HAVE ONE , UR ROOM # ...OH TEAM MEMBER ..NO SORRY !       CONSTRUCTION 7.30 AM UNDER MY BALCONY ,SKILL SAW CUTTING .... WTF !   HANDS DOWN THE WORST HITON STAY EVER !
Manager Response: Dear randyj405,  Per the agreement of your HiltonGo terms and conditions, this review is in violation of those terms. We have forwarded this information on to the HiltonGo team to address with your directly.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel, LOVE the rooftop bar!
Summary: This hotel is a great place to go. Excellent views, walking distance to everything! The pools (both) are excellent! This is a great place for families as well. Big pool with water slide. I also enjoyed the adult pool.  Good service and views of the ocean. We especially LOVED the rooftop bar! Fantastic views, great service and delicious cocktails and food. I just wish they could open that place up earlier in the days while we were there. there were alot of weddings going on while we were there so it must be a great place for weddings as well......................

The hotel only have a few umbrella on the pool that around 300 person will attend, no towels on the pool this is should be one state hotel not 4 star, gust there should wake up early to save spot on the pool you get no service in this hotel  I been in Hyatt Regency and many hotels in the area any hotel will be much better than this one don’t waste your vacation and money in this hotel
Manager Response: Dear joe12333,  We are very sorry to hear that you were disappointed in any way with the service or accommodations you received while here at The Waterfront. We never want to see a guest leave our property dissatisfied with any aspect of our level of service. We appreciate your feedback. Safe travels.

Summary Heading: We had a great stay during COVID-19. I recommend it, but the critical reviews aren't wrong.
Summary: We booked this hotel for our family because: 1) it has 2 great pools, 1 that's very kid friendly and a 2nd smaller pool that was heated; 2) it's in a great location across from the beach and near shops and restaurants; and 3)it's nice and priced very well given the amenities. See the details below.  The negative reviews and criticism about COVID-19 policies aren't wrong. We chose to stay during the week so we could avoid large weekend crowds of people who probably won't wear masks or social distance. The hotel was not strict about enforcing their COVID-19 policies on guests. Lots of guests were walking the hotel without masks every day. No social distancing practices at the pool from what I could see. And most guests didn't seem to care. Thankfully, we weren't bothered by this

Although this hotel is in a good location for the beach, shops and restaurants - if you're interested in a really crowded beach town - I was very surprised at the lack of Covid-policies, especially at the pool.  Valet was still operating.  There were signs every were in the hotel about social distancing and wearing masks and round decals on the floor in places where people would be standing in line but the pool area was crazy!  Chairs were lined up and not spread out at all and there were no limits to the number of people in the pool.  Also, after we were served our drinks in the rooftop lounge the server informed us that since bars can't be officially open we would need to buy food - she suggested a $2 bag of chips as a "loophole."

Summary Heading: Not safe to stay during the Covid-19 situation
Summary: We stayed during the pandemic - face masks were “required” inside the hotel yet almost no one outside of the hotel staff were wearing them and they ordering weren’t asking or enforcing people to wear them. The pools were extremely busy, no cleaning of the seating in between people, not socially distanced at all, it all felt really unsafe and not up to par with experiences we’ve had at other resorts during this time. We stayed in a suite in the dolphin tower & the walls were paper thin. Valet was also open and enforced, I didn’t see any sort of gloves or cleaning between staff. Same thing with luggage carts. The whole place was just crowded and not safe.   Positives: good sized room, across from the beach, walking to distance to the pier and a lot of restaurants and shopping.

One of the best parts of our stay was the valet service. We were always treated with kindness and they were prompt on getting our vehicle. Jake Bryant and Peter Perez were outstanding and made our stay awesome!

Summary Heading: Great Property & Location - Very Poor Service
Summary: -Aside from the front desk agent who was very polite and professional, service was both poor and at times nonexistent.  -The three times we used the pool there were no towels available and we had to wait over 30 mins each time. We also heard several other guests complaining about this issue as well.  -There was no food & drink service at the pool with the slide.  We have to wait in a line in the sun for over 15 mins each time to get a drink and then again to close the tab?  -We were waiting to be seated in the outside area next to the pool to eat.  We had waited for 10 minutes and finally an employee that was walking by asked if we needed help.  We explained that we were waiting to be seated yet there seemed.  She went and tracked down a lady whose name I don't recall but her

I am currently staying at this hotel and am unimpressed. I expected a higher level of cleanliness due to Covid and it being a higher end Hilton resort, but unfortunately all I saw were reduced amenities. Based on reviews we upgraded to a room in the Dolphin Tower. The room itself was nicely furnished (but no refrigerator) and had a great view. But I wiped down the counter before we put anything on it and there was grime left on it from the previous guests. The patio itself hadn’t been cleaned and there was a significant stain on the already dark couch. Also, I don’t think they vacuum the carpet between guest as I didn’t see any vacuuming of the rooms next to me that were being cleaned. The hallway leading up to the room could have used a good vacuuming. I will say the bathroom

We were celebrating a special event for a family member and booked a suite in the Dolphin Tower in May.  As soon as we arrived, we could see that the hotel was unprepared for the number of rooms they booked. Staff was low and service was not great. Trying to call the front desk was impossible.  I understand that times are different but if you're going to book the hotel, then have enough staff to serve your guests. Otherwise, just don't accept that many guests.  We didn't get a bargain rate for our stay so we assumed that we would have somewhat normal service.  The room was wonderful but because it fronted to PCH, the traffic noise was quite loud.  Also, we watched numerous people entering the pool area from the back gate while people held the gate open for them.  It was

This place is absolutely beautiful!  I stayed in the remodeled Dolphin Tower.  The room was clean, well designed.  The pool was open and great as well.  There is a sand area facing PCH and the ocean.  Restaurants are open and had solid, albeit expensive, options.  You can walk to the beach, although it was closed by Newsome, and the shops, bars and restaurants are all nearby.  Location could not be better.  I will definitely be back!

ROOM SELECTION:  We had an ocean view suite in the Twin Dolphin Tower. The room was new and exactly as depicted in the pictures. Keurig coffee machine, lots of fluffy towels, spacious bathroom and decent living room. The views from room 974 were excellent! Sweeping views of the ocean, beach, and the pier.   COVID-19 CLEANLINESS:  The room was absolutely immaculate! I brought my own Clorox spray to wipe down the room (remote control, light switches, faucets, door handles, phone, etc). When I did, there was literally not a single spec of dust anywhere. I even wiped the AC vent and no dust. I was able to totally relax after that. Also, there were people constantly wiping down the elevators, doors, etc.  Even the restaurants were on it with single-use menus and a QR code to download

So the hotel advertises this digital key program which is for easy check-in, quick and smart.  In reality, it's not easy.  I did the digital key check-in the day before, arrive at 4pm today to find my room not ready and find out my room  changed.  Ugggghhh.  Not a good beginning to weekend getaway.  I sure hope this vacation gets better!

Summary Heading: Not the best week here! Post covid:(
Summary: Stayed at Hilton, had 3 rooms by pool for kiddos. In general the hotel isn’t clean, sand/dirt by pool, carpet not vacuumed in halls, rooms not cleaned unless requested, etc. seems like they don’t have the employees necessary to offer the services we are used to. As diamond Hilton Members we are usually very happy w the service and facility. This time, not so much.

We stayed at the Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort for a one night get away since we’ve been sheltering in place for months.  The location: is perfect and the views are amazing. We had a view of the pool, ocean, and the pier.  We stayed on the 9th floor of the Dolphin tower right next to their lounge.  We rented bikes at half price for guests right across the street. And we rode it to some shops and restaurants by the pier. Parking:  At the time, there was no valet parking. We had to self park. The garage was dark and the spaces too tight. I had to ask twice for help with parking. Service: No complaints Room: We stayed in a suite that had two beds and a separated living room with balcony. It was clean and nicely decorated. Restaurants: We had lunch and breakfast at the Boardwalk

Ocean view was great, room run down, very poor lighting. No hot water, called and was told because it was a high floor (3rd floor is high?).  Visited during Covid-19, so no valet parking but easy to park and garage entrance staff were always smiling.  Very limited mask use by staff - only bar and restaurant.  Although surprised, I was told room would be cleaned during stay, but they never showed up.

Caveat to this review - Due to Covid 19 we should allow SOME leeway during our stays since staffing has been reduced; however there is only so far a reduced level of service should go.  When you do receive service, please tip and tip well if you can, because employees are having to do more with less.  We checked into the hotel on May 21, 2020 for a 2 night stay to celebrate our daughter's 17th birthday.  Before arriving, on May 4, 2020, I phoned the hotel to inquire about renting a fire pit to celebrate her special day.  After letting the phone ring over 20 times, I gave up and sent an e-mail to which I never received a response.  When I checked in on May 21, I asked to speak with a manager to let them know about this disappointment.  The gentleman checking me in, Armando,

Summary Heading: Do not stay in the Huntington Tower
Summary: The property is beautiful, however, we stayed in the Huntington Tower and we were very disappointed. The rooms were outdated and dirty. The shower glass had hard water stains and the grout had soap scum buildup. We also had to take cold showers on both days. We called the front desk and were told someone would be up to check on it but after 45 minutes of waiting we were forced to take a cold shower. FYI... no one ever came to check on the water. Also, on our last day as we were doing a walk thru of the room to make sure we had all our belongings, my boyfriend found a pair of men underwear underneath the bed. So gross!  Not what I expected from a Hilton.  We’ll try the Hyatt next time we’re in town.

What a great stay. Stayed with the family over the weekend and the entire staff was just amazing, truly top notch. From the moment we made the reservation to the time we checked out, everyone what just amazing. We came to celebrate our sons birthday and the staff helped us out to make it a special day.   The guestrooms where clean, spacious and had amazing views of the ocean. Great balcony, great pool and hot tub, just all around a splendid dog friendly hotel. Food was great throughout especially the lobster mac n cheese and the breakfast sandwich, sooo good.   Thank you to the entire hotel staff, we look forward to coming back. HIGHLY recommend this hotel for anyone.

Me and my husband had a wonderful visit this March to the Hilton in Huntington Beach. The room was clean and the service was prompt. Especially loved our helpful valet Isabel, “with one L.” 10/10 would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Chrissiitaylor,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time at our property. We know you have many options when booking a hotel in Southern California. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This is my second time staying here and I will definitely be back a third time. The hotel is directly across the street from Huntington Beach, you can see the surf, Catalina Island and surfers from your room.   The Hotel is very nice, large pool, several restaurants and a very nice spa. Food in the resturants is excellent but the room service menu is somewhat limited.   The hotel is only a short walk from dozens of shops, restaurants and the classic downtown area of the origional surf city.  Rooms are a cut above what you expect from a Hilton hotel but not true luxury. Get a ocean facing room with a balcony and for the price you can't go wrong.   Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear jerryc810,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are so happy that you enjoyed our fantastic location and amenities. We know you have many options when choosing a property to stay at. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels to you and your loved ones.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I’ve been to this hotel multiple times with my family and I loved it, however I stopped going because of an issue I had with the valet manager not comping my parking because of my aunt who was handi-cap. Luckily front desk was very generous and accommodating to help us out and take care of our parking. I recently decided to go again for the rooftop bar and it was like a whole new valet experience. Josh the manager greeted us with the biggest smile and was very friendly with our arrival. Jazzy is probably one the nicest souls I’ve ever met and is the reason why I decided to give this place another shot. I’m glad they are more customer service driven because I really enjoy this hotel. Thanks again Josh and Jazzy! I will definitely be visiting again soon again this summer!
Manager Response: Dear  LaurenSearsTravels9,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay at The Waterfront. I am thrilled to hear that with your most recent experience we were able to make it right! Thank you for mentioning our associates by name. We will be sure to pass on your praises to Josh & Jasmine. We know you have many options when selecting a place to stay in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels to you and your loved ones.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location, Average Staff, Dated Rooms
Summary: Check-in staff not very helpful at all. As a Hilton Diamond Member, asking for an upgrade was first denied, but went back down to speak to another associate and found ample room type upgrades. Even then, was still hard to get one. Not a ton of value as a Diamond at this property. Rooms are EXTREMELY dated. Carpet tears and wallpaper badly peeling in the bathroom. Great location and ocean view rooms capture a great sunset. Amenities looked great, but did not use. I would look for other options on my next visit most based on my interaction with the front desk staff.
Manager Response: Dear dale0099,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. We are excited to have our hotel wide renovation in its final phase, which is remodeling each floor of the Huntington Tower. We are currently working on the 11th & 12th floor and working our way down. Safe travels and we hope to see you again.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: “ Beach view and easy access to downtown”
Summary: First, the location and hotel are a 5!  This is a lovely hotel with rooms that are spacious, comfortable and offer private Balcony ocean views.    We used points so some of the nickel and diming charges mentioned in a few reviews  did not have an overt impact on a us.  All said the $42 valet parking with no self parking option seems a little steep.    The hotel offers several eating and bar options .   We enjoyed an excellent dinner at Henry’s and it was very nice  not to leave the hotel after an exhausting drive.  We also had a delicious cheese plate in the lobby bar.    Overall service quality is attentive and friendly.   The hotel is an easy walk to nearby restaurants and the charming downtown.  Nice to start your day with a short walk to  breakfast at Tanners and another
Manager Response: Dear Buzzard100,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort. We appreciate your feedback and use it to better train our associates. I will pass on your comments to our IT department. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with our WiFi. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Went to lunch with friends this morning. Food was great! Was super busy but the valet came and got our car really quick, thanks josh for being so prompt and nice. We will definitely be coming back here soon!
Manager Response: Dear424frankg,  Thank you for your feedback! We are delighted that you selected to stay with us and we are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the near future! Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I am a local and went to the rooftop bar for the first time. The views and service were outstanding.   On the way out we asked if we can keep our car overnight and pick it up in the morning.  The manager, Joshua, noticed that we probably had more to drink then we should have and thanked us for making the right decision and let us leave our car.  Joshua even comped our parking for us.  Between the service from the bar and Joshua we will be coming back all the time.

We had such an amazing time though I was there recovering partially from post op. Loved it and the staff goes out of their way to make you feel like you’re at home! Truly amazing and it’s the view is something that takes your breath away! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear RealMrsUSMC,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us. Our goal is to be your home away from home through our perfect location, modern amenities and warm hospitality, provided by our wonderful staff. We hope to see you again in the near future. Thank you again for staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Great place, watch your card on file
Summary: Hotel is beautiful and service is okay. The hotel is located in a beautiful location and the room views highlight Huntington Beach! They will continuously charge your card on file. Ours was charged 4 times and another 5 with card used to make reservation.
Manager Response: Dear  DisneyMomandherboys,  We are so sorry to hear about your situation the erroneous charges to your credit card. I was able to find your folio and I see that there may have been a glitch with our in house system, charging your card the same about multiple times with in two minutes. We are so sorry for this inconvenience. Please call Antonio in our accounting department at your earliest conveniences if further action needs to be taken. We are here to assist in any way; 714-845-8000.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Love this place!  Have been here for several special events in the past and their staff is always amazing.  Everyone from the banquet servers, front desk staff even the valet team is great!  This sweet girl Jasmine at valet helped me pick up up all the contents of my make up bag when they went flying everywhere. And don’t get me started on the rooms such great views!  It’s a must stay location in HB.
Manager Response: Dear Thengehold,  Thank you for the kind review of you your recent stay! We are grateful you chose our property and hope to see you again. Safe travels to you and your loved ones!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We loved our stay, from check in to  check out, this was an outstanding experience.  Maria from housekeeping (I think that was her name) got us the extra pillows I asked for right away and Jasmin gave us great directions to Long Beach when we got our car at valet (no scratches either!). Service at the bar was top-notch as well. We will be back next year!!!

Stayed there this past weekend.   All their advertising pictures are of the newer Dolphin Twin Towers.  Their older and much more dated and dreary side is called the Huntington Towers.   Heavy surcharges.... Mandatory valet if you need to park $42/day.  Mandatory resort charge of $33/day.  Includes $5 credit from surf hero market, which I still get charged for, so now requesting hotel to take it off my bill and credit me.   Boardwalk breakfast buffet was OK... $27, but we used the upgrade from our continental breakfast voucher and paid an upcharge of $8  that I got since I am a Diamond member (more on that later).  Otherwise, totally not worth it.   Check in was easy.   Was not offered the breakfast until I asked the front desk guy about it.  He gave me the 4 vouchers for the
Manager Response: Dear MarriedIrish,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront and most importantly for your loyalty to the Hilton brand as a Diamond Member. We are disappointed to have not been able to Make it Right for you while you were still on property. When our guests use social media outlets, such as Instagram and TripAdvisor, to voice their frustrations under a screen name, there is no way for our team know the actual guest name or confirmation number and we are unable to reach out to you and further make it right.   During the maintenance of our Driftwood Beach Club water slides and pool, our Huntington Pool remains open as well as the availability for our registered guest to utilizes the slides at our neighboring hotel. The Huntington Tower guest rooms are a part of our final phase of our 3+ year long renovation project. We are currently renovating the 12th, 11th and 10th floors, working our way down.   Regarding your sentiment about the inclusions for our Hilton Honors Diamond members for the complimentary continental breakfast at The Boardwalk Restaurant and requesting additional vouchers, our front desk delivered upon the brand standard; 2 per room booked, per day.  We realize how you might perceive denying this request for more vouchers or not offering a full breakfast as a shortfall on our part.  The feasibility of granting these requests is unfortunately not a possibility, and for this we apologize for your disappointment. Nevertheless, as we do empathize with the voice of our guests, we currently offer alternatives to the continental buffet such as using the value of the breakfast voucher at our Surf Hero Market or Henry's Ocean View Dining.  Our sincere apologies for falling so short of your high expectations. Our Director of Front Office, Damian Garcia, is available to speak with you regarding your stay and to make it right. Please call  714-845-8000 at your earliest convenience.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: BEWARE OF ALL THE HEAVY CHARGES
Summary: This hotel was in a great location and good views of the ocean. The rooms were perfectly nice as I would expect. It wasn’t too busy since the holidays were over and it is winter at the beach. Service was as one would expect at a hotel at this level. The real thorn in the foot is that this hotel seems to make a virtue of using additional charges as a way to keep the displayed room rate low and look like they are good value .... this is a mirage as they are artificial. The adds ons that really whack you are 1) Only Valet parking charged at a crazy $42 a DAY with no self park alternative offered 2) a Resort charge of $ 33 with  taxes per day which is $38 which is not optional. These 2 charges add  $80 per day on top of your room rate so suddenly your room does not look such good
Manager Response: Dear groovyguitar,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. We are sorry to hear you were unsatisfied of any aspect of your time with us. All charges that will be incurred at our Resort on your final bill are listed on your confirmation email that is sent after you book your stay with us, prior to your arrival. Please be sure to read the confirmation email in its entirety. If at any time you need further clarification of these charges, please do not hesitate to call our in-house reservations department to review your options prior to your stay at 714-845-8000. Thank you.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I was greeted at the Hilton hotel but the valet staff and not only did they open my doors for me but they also offered me water. They also were able to help direct me to the hotel bar, but they went out of there way to provide Elite service to me! Thank you again Jasmine and Arman for your service i will definitely be coming back because of them!

Summary Heading: Gene and Odalys in Huntington Beach
Summary: My GF and I spent a long weekend at this property in late February 2020.  We had one of the oceanfront balcony rooms and the views were spectacular.  The pools were good but they weather was only warm enough to swim the first day.  We also loved the rooftop bar.  In fact that may have been our favorite part.  We will definitely be back.

The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel  was an awesome stay for me.  thus resort is a must stay at.  Great service, awesome location, amenities are excellent.  The management really make you feel appreciated and special.  I plan to always stay at this report when I visit California.  Awesome resort!!

My stay at the Hilton was amazing, just for a quick trip over the weekend and I simply have nothing to complain about. We were first greeted by the valet staff members and they have the most excellent service I have ever seen! Arman in particular was very helpful and sincere helping us with our luggage. As we were heading out and waiting for our car, Arman offered us water while we were waiting for our car to arrive as well as food recommendations that were nearby (this guy has good taste buds lol)  We were welcomed with a smile everywhere we went, wish we were able to stay longer here, it was like a dream! I most definitely will be back(:

Decided to try out Henry’s Restaurant inside the Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort. Upon arrival we were greeted by Brian S who was very helpful and directed us inside to Henry’s. Our experience  with Henry’s was great and the food was amazing and customer service was on point.  Overall I would give 10/10 and will definitely be coming back again.

The entire staff was so helpful and kind. The hotel is amazing, with fantastic views. The hotel only offers valet parking, which is kind of a bummer. With that being said, Peter Perez assisted us with valet. He was beyond helpful with our bags and made a point to ensure we had all we needed and enjoyed our stay. He also asked us for our names and shook our hands firmly. Thank you for being attentive.

I was helped by Nicolas Gelakoska and it was great service. Room service was very prompt and easy, the location of the hotel is great, it has a beautiful beach view, and the most perfect weather. I cant wait to visit again

My stay at the Hilton was awesome. The pool is amazing for young kids as it has a zero depth pool and great sand area for kids to play in. Additionally, the valet service was amazing, especially Sammy! All of the valet guys were so polite.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel 1 night was not enough
Summary: We were only there for the night wished it was longer. Hotel was lovely, staff was wonderful ......views to die for. Loved the towels in the room nice and big. Couple of things parking was a bit high at $42. I think diamond should get the free complete breakfast including the meats and not just the cold stuff, but everything was good. The walls were a bit thin we could hear the snorer and yawner next door thru the walls. But def would go back.

This is the third year in a row we have stayed at the waterfront for business meetings and it seems to get better each year.  I was with 6 of my colleagues and we wanted to go to a specific restaurant.   We walked out to valet and the valet said he has never heard of it and the shuttle only drops off at shore break hotel, but it was a quick walk from there.  Once the valet said that the manager, Joshua, stepped in and told us he knows exactly where that was and would personally grab the shuttle and take us over there.  He took us and another valet, named Peter, so Peter could pick us up as Joshua was about to leave shift.  We had the best conversation and Joshua saved us ordering 2 Uber’s each way and saved us probably 40 dollars.    Peter picked us up after and we had a great

It was a night to remember from the moment I arrived and valet parked my car to the engagement ring that was presented at sunset at the rooftop bar overlooking the gorgeous sunset. Brady in valet was so polite and opened my door so graciously upon my arrival. He was nice enough to direct us to the rooftop, as we were in a hurry to not miss sunset. We arrived to a very crowded rooftop, but were quickly served by the bartenders. We had our wine just in time for our private proposal, that we will never forget. The Hilton in Huntington Beach has an excellent property and superior service.
Manager Response: Dear Lisajack74,  Thank you for trusting us with such a cornerstone event for you and your fiancé! We couldn't be happier for the two of you and we are so pleased to hear everything went so well. Please let our wedding catering team know if they can assist with a having your nuptials and reception here at The Waterfront!! Best wishes to the both of you.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel with average customer service
Summary: Went for a short get away as we’ve stayed there before.  Hotel is very nice and we liked the renovations done since we were there a few years ago. Had some issues with the room view we thought we paid for and the hotel was short staffed (could be the time of year).  Just fell short a bit for us this time.

Really great hotel. I loved the location right by the beach. I brought my own car and thought that parking would be an issue, but the valet is quick and handled my Porsche beautifully. the valet attendant’s name was Jan - tell him I say hi if you are helped by him!  I highly recommend eating at Henry’s as well... the food was great and you can’t beat eating outside right by a pool on the beach!  Will be back!

On Friday morning, 2/21, I went to have breakfast with family and friends. Josh H. was very efficient and friendly. He got my car quickly and with a smile on his face. Highly recommend coming here. Thanks, Josh!

I met Adolfo, one of the valet members and he made my visit pleasant by striking a warm and welcome conversation right before offering me water before my long day. What great service that was continued by other employees!

My husband and I needed a quick, short break and found a perfect oasis at the Waterfront Hilton. The staff was very professional and friendly, the accommodations clean and comfortable and the location, outstanding. Will definitely do this again.

We love this hotels location, such beautiful views and it is close to everything!  The rooms are always clean and the service is always great from check in to valet. Not to mention fur babies are allowed!

The staff was great and the service was great. Clean hotel and rooms. Very attentive staff. Great location, across the street from the beach and a block away from restaurants. The appearance of the hotel is very beautiful, great beach theme.

Summary Heading: Amazing service from top to bottom!
Summary: My husband and I stayed for our anniversary for a few days, and was thrilled with the service our entire stay. Upon arrival we were greeted by the valet manager Josh, who made our stay amazing from the start! This was our first time in Huntington Beach, and after talking to him for a while we found out this is where he is from and his local knowledge of restaurants and what to do while we were here was outstanding! We went to him everyday with something else we wanted to try or do and he came up with the perfect recommendation each time. Each day he remembered us and asked us how the recommendation was. We will definitely be back with more of his recommendations to explore Orange County. Thank you, Josh and the entire Waterfront team for a memorable anniversary!!

this place is trash. We will never be coming back. We were treated horrible. I don’t care how many good reviews people put on here our experience was BAD, we were disrespected by the staff and deceived with our room. We never got the room we paid for! We paid for a ocean view and got a pool/courtyard room. The managers excuse was they were sold out of rooms that night and did nothing to make it better. The reason we stayed at this place was for the view since we never get to come To the ocean. Besides the room the Resturant Harry’s down graded the menu the food was expensive, nasty and cold. The beds are supper Hard and the Valet provides terrible service and takes way to long to get your vehicle. I am mostly upset and the amount of time spent speaking to a lying staff member
Manager Response: Dear leahanabelle,  We are very sorry that you were disappointed in any way with the service or accommodations you received while here at The Waterfront. We never want to see a guest leave our property dissatisfied with any aspect of our level of service and will do all we can to "Make It Right" before it may come to that. I understand that you were given a $100 credit for your disappointment in the room type you booked and received as well as complimentary full breakfast. We were fully committed for the Presidents Day Holiday weekend which coincided with Valentine's Day. Please understand that we were not able to move your room or quote you a price for rooms that are simply unavailable.   Unfortunately the solutions that were offered did not meet that goal and we apologize.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My wife and I have a new favorite hotel at Huntington Beach! We stayed 3 nights in a one bedroom suite in the Dolphin Tower, overlooking the pool with the water slide. We appreciate the beach themed decor in the room, lobby, and even the hallways. The room appears to be recently remodeled and is well designed. The double sinks are great, and so is the large shower.  But the people are great too! Outgoing and eager to please. There was one bump to start though, our room was not ready at checkin time, we had to wait just over an hour. Problems will  happen but we really appreciated how the staff responded. They apologized, offered to hold our luggage, and gave us a resort credit (without us asking). What more could they do?  I am already planning a return trip!
Manager Response: Dear tyek2015,   Thank you for your recent stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us and our beautiful rooms in the Twin Dolphin Tower, which opened in February of 2018. The Huntington Tower is currently undergoing a floor by floor renovation and refresh. We know you have many options when staying in Southern California. We are honored you selected to stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future! Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This hotel is stunning. The decorations in the lobby, the art, the pool... The beach view rooms are incredible. What better way to wake up than to see the ocean from your bed?  The staff are all super friendly and the on location restaurants are good. This was a great "staycation" for this Southern California native!!
Manager Response: Dear Elissa T,  Thank you for staying at The Waterfront! We are thrilled you enjoyed our location, amenities and views. There really is nothing better than finding the perfect staycation spot! We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: What a beautiful remodel and location.  From the moment you step inside you see why this is a Waldorf property.  Beautiful rooms, scenic vistas of the ocean and multiple restaurants and bar choices.   Within walking distance to multiple restaurants in the area (Dukes) and next door to a nice shopping area.   This location does not come cheap.  Expect to pay around $40 to park your car.  No self park.   Other than that, the staff are helpful, willing to accommodate and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear 869CM,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your recent stay! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at The Waterfront. We know there are many options to choose from when visiting Southern California. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Beautiful place! I hadn't been here for a couple years. It was nice then, but it is very, very nice now! Love all the improvements they've made! Beautifully decorated! This place is located right across from the beach and is walking distance to Pacific City (great shops/restaurants). You can also walk (a little further) to Main St and the HB pier. But, the resort is so cool, you could also just stay there! (It’s pricey, but at least you get a great experience)  Valet: Fast and attentive   Front desk: Friendly and helpful  Ocean-view, 2 queen Suite: We we're in the newer tower. Beautiful! Super comfy beds/pillows, great balcony & gorgeous views! We wished the bedroom windows opened so that we could hear the waves and have some fresh, ocean air.   The hotel manager actually
Manager Response: Dear vparize,  Thank you for leaving a review of your recent stay. We are happy to hear that your stay and A Night to Shine Prom were a success! We hope you can return in the near future for a staycation. Please note that both of our pools are now open. Driftwood Beach Club opened in May of 2018 and the Huntington Pool re-opened in May 2019. We hope to see you enjoying them soon! Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: When going to the US Open of Surfing there is no place I would rather stay. Great hotel, amazing amenities and the location is spot on. From our room we could see some of the action going on at the stands and hear the music at night.
Manager Response: Dear A_Limitless_Life,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a five bubble review of your stay at The Waterfront. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoy staying with us for The US Open of Surfing that takes place in Late July /  Early August. It is one of our favorite city events! We hope you are able to come for a visit again this year. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Huntington Beach's Oceanfront Hotel view was a Nice Holiday after leaving Disney. The Staff is well rehearsed and I will say it is it's best feature. The staff from GM to Valet was on Point. Well Done.Recommended.

I’m kinda late in my review, I was there right before Christmas, but I can’t keep it to myself. This property was by far the best property we stayed at, the rooms were spacious and modern design, we had partial sea view room/swimming pool view ( see pictures) , the hotel was very clean, they have water slides and big swimming pool, what makes this property even special is the staff, we were welcomed by Sherry at the front desk and she was amazing, great customer service and an asset to the company.  Thank you for this wonderful stay, I shall come back soon!

This is not a resort! It is a hotel across the PCH from the beach. It is touted as a resort. I feel this is misleading. We were told it has a water park. The water park consists of 2 small water slides into the pool. There is a sand area adjacent to one of the pools that they would call a beach, but the real beach is across a busy highway.  The Boardwalk restaurant has a limited menu for lunch as well as for breakfast. The room includes the continental breakfast but if you want the hot offerings it's an additional charge. The valet is $39.95 PER DAY! I saw no offerings for self parking. The weekend we were there was also the Surf City Marathon so there were bands playing late into the evening & early in the morning on race day.  Overall, it's a nice hotel but it's far from what
Manager Response: Dear sg4145,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. I must say I am a bit confused at your review. At no time do we tout our self as a water park. We have 2 watersides for guests 48 inches or taller to enjoy at our pool located at our Driftwood Beach Club, which also features a sand area for kids to play in. Guests are also able to rent one of our 7 ocean front fire pits. Photos of our property are readily available for you to peruse here on TripAdvisor as well as our website prior to your arrival.   If at any time you have questions regarding our location, amenities, offerings, information in regards to parking; please call our in house reservations team to review options; or 24 hours a day you are able to view our options on our websites. We are more than happy to answer your questions at length to ensure you are informed as best as possible prior to your stay.   We are thrilled to have been awarded the AAA 4 Diamond Award for the past 29 years since our grand opening in 1990. We are aligned with all aspects of resort classification stipulations. We strive to be anticipatory of our guests needs and to provide unparalleled service in our modern, oceanfront resort. Our sincere apologies that you were disappointed in any way during your time with us.   Thank you for your feedback and we wish you safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Hotel is hit or miss.  This was a miss. I definitely agree with review that indicated they really don’t care about Hilton Diamond members. I requested the new tower but checked in to find us in the old tower. It has a musty smell, the water is lukewarm for showers and walls and floors are paper thin and you can hear neighbors all night. Front desk didn’t seem to care. Breakfast cost $8 extra if you wanted eggs, which you get for free at a Garden Inn. Only thing that kept this from one star was amazing housekeeping that learned we used towels multiple times since we worked out and came by and did special clean and new towels in late afternoon. Overall, not worth what we paid. Likely look at Hyatt since Diamond status didn’t seem to mean much.
Manager Response: Dear tagreen60,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront and most importantly for your loyalty to the Hilton brand as a Diamond Member. We have celebrated the impact that the anticipatory service of the Room Attendant had on making you feel cared for, with the entire Housekeeping team as it reinforces our service training.  In contrast, we are sorry to hear that your stay was anything less than satisfactory and as a Resort Team, we have discussed the feedback you provided in order to improve.   While we always strive to delight our Diamond members with the very best room and at the very least, a one-tier upgrade based on availability, at times, the resort occupancy may not permit.  We do regret that we could not delight with an upgrade into the Twin Dolphin tower and that you were not satisfied with the Huntington Tower room.  Moreover, that we were not able to resolve the issues with the smell and water temperature as well, make an effort to minimize outside noise.  Given the opportunity, I am confident that these issues could have been resolved so, I am researching our Manager On Duty reports to understand if our team was aware and how we handled this situation.  As it is our service promise to “Make It Right”, please know that when a guest reports a problem, it is our intention to meet and exceed expectations when finding a solution so this feedback will also help with developing our team.    Regarding your sentiment about the inclusions in the complimentary continental breakfast at The Boardwalk Restaurant for our Hilton Honors Diamond members, although our resort delivered upon the brand standard, I recognize your displeasure that our offering did not include hot items and that you had to pay a fee to upgrade to the full hot breakfast.  We realize how you might perceive this as our shortfall especially when you are extended a full menu at other properties in the Hilton portfolio of brands.  Please know that we are aware of the voice of our guests and are assessing the feasibility of this option.  Nevertheless, as we do empathize with the voice of our guests, we currently offer alternatives to the continental buffet such as using the value of the breakfast voucher at our Surf Hero Market or Henry's Ocean View Dining.   Please know that we do value your loyalty to the Hilton Brand and greatly appreciate your feedback.  Again, please accept our sincere apologies for your disappointment. It is my hope that you would reconsider allowing our team to extend our hospitality to you again in the future.  Should you decide to do so, it would be my honor to prepare for your stay thus, please contact me directly.  Most sincerely yours,  Victoria McDowell Director of Rooms

Summary: I was in Huntington Beach Ca for business this past week. I stayed at the Huntington Hilton. I have stayed at the hotel before, and hope to have the opportunity to stay again in the future. The location of the Hilton is amazing, you are right on the beach, and a short walk from the shops and restaurants down town. The Hilton has very comfortable rooms and Awesome Staff! I would definitely recommend this hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear 878tinf,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property and our wonderful, Downtown Huntington Beach location. We know you have many different options when visiting Southern California. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Wonderful place overall. Will definitely be back. Location is just perfect, views are breathtaking, service is beyond fantastic, and price is very reasonable for what you get. Highly recommend. Will be back
Manager Response: Dear OmarElrahimy,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property and our wonderful, Downtown Huntington Beach location. We know you have many different options when visiting Southern California. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed here in midJanuary.  Hotel has a great location and nice views of the ocean.  It wasn’t very busy since the holidays were over and it is winter at the beach.  Without getting into too much detail, what I noticed was that they don’t treat their Hilton Diamond members very well here.  It has been a problem with most Hilton properties in the United States.  You used to get free full breakfast here, now it is just a continental breakfast.  Upgrades are minimal as well.  Surprising since they were not busy at all.  This property is joining the rest of the Hilton properties in doing bare minimum for their members.  Too bad, because it is such a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear cuaman,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront. We are so sorry to hear that your stay was anything less than satisfactory. We have passed on your feedback to our executive team for review. In order to correctly answer your denied request for an upgrade, (which Diamond members are eligible for a one tier upgrade based on availability), I would need the exact dates of your stay. During the middle of the January month, we were fully committed with a large conference. Our amenities such as our pools and spa may have had a low occupancy, due to the fact that the attendees were in meetings during the day. It is never our intent to ignore a request as Diamond and Gold members are flagged in our booking system when a Hilton honors number is attached to the reservation; requests are reviewed prior to arrival, and awarded on availability.  Hilton Honors brand standard is that Diamond and Gold members are entitled to two complimentary continental breakfast vouchers at Boardwalk Restaurant / or $15 for up to two people valid at our Surf Hero Market Coffee Shop or Henry's Ocean View Dining, per day of their stay. In regards to it being the bare minimum, please note that it is the standard allotted per Hilton Honor guidelines. We are so sorry to hear that this was disappointment in any way. Members are given the option to upgrade to the full hot breakfast for a cost of $8 per person.  We value your loyalty to the Hilton Brand and greatly appreciate your feedback. Again, our sincere apologies for your disappointment. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future. Please feel free to contact me directly 2 weeks prior to your stay so that I may apply a a complimentary 2 tier upgrade and welcome amenity upon arrival.  Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: The location has amazing beach views and the staff is awesome to work with. We have held a convention there for the past 3 years and they are always very accommodating and helpful. They make you feel very welcome!
Manager Response: Dear db2020522,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We are always grateful for our loyal, return guests. Thank you for trusting your yearly convention with our capable events and banquets team. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Fun vacation for everyone in the family
Summary: My family of 4, plus our pup, stayed in the Twin Dolphin Tower 1 BR suite, and there was plenty of room for the 5 of us. The room felt new, and the beachy decor was lovely. Check-in was a breeze (even though we checked in late at night) and we were pleasantly surprised with nice gift bag for the fur baby. Poolside service was great, and everyone had a blast on pool day.  When family came to visit, the adults went to the rooftop bar to see the sunset and the kids stayed in the room and ordered room service dinner. Something for everyone! We had breakfast at the Henry's everyday and the staff was so friendly. If we didn't have to go visit family in the area, we would have never left the hotel!  The only hitch during the stay was the housekeeping didn't clean our room one day, even
Manager Response: Dear Christine G,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 bubble review of your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. I am happy to hear you took advantage of all of our on property outlets and amenities. We know you have many options when staying in Southern California. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront Beach Resort. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: If you're going for the view that you will have in spades but....
Summary: Went for a relaxing post christmas/new years stay. The facility is as close to the beach as you can get and the views are amazing. The food is ok but overpriced, utilize the market option instead and take the food to go and picnic on the beach. The kids pool area is loud the adults pool area is very serene and nice, the valet staff are prompt and kind, the cleaning staff need to be replaced there is straight up green mold in like at least 2/3rd of the shower, stay in the new tower only make sure you don't get put in a room in the old tower they really need to renovate it ASAP.
Manager Response: Dear mabeck2020,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are sorry to hear that your your room and cleanliness was anything less than perfect for your stay. At any time during your stay please reach out to our front desk team for immediate assistance and to address any outstanding housekeeping needs. It is our pleasure to assist you and to ensure you have an enjoyable stay. Our Huntington Tower is currently under going a renovation project, floor by floor. We are excited to have a refreshed product for you to enjoy in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Loved it! My mother always dream of staying in an ocean view room and this was perfect. All restaurants and the rooftop lounge had the best views. The staff was amazing. Every person we encountered, including guests, were so nice. We will be back!  The only reason I didn’t give it a five was the fact that no ocean front are handicap accessible. Only ocean view.
Manager Response: Dear Odyssey10859614454,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay, our outstanding associates and wonderful service they provided. Please note that we do have ocean front handicap accessible rooms available. Please call our in-house reservations department to further inquire about the specifics of these rooms at 714-845-8000. Our Director of Reservations, Joseph Boyer, looks forward to assisting you. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Reserve a fire pit at night and have a party with bar service, food and moors for the kids. Great experience. Wonderful property with excellent service. Great location. Walking distance from Main Street.
Manager Response: Dear 808NickC,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are so pleased you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We spent 2 nights here and were so impressed.  Staff was amazing, room was clean, pool was amazing and food was delicious. Can’t ask for more! We had a 12 year old and a 15 year old.  We had a view of the ocean from our balcony and had a suite in the dolphin tower ( we got upgraded ).
Manager Response: Dear Jodie a,  Thank you for your recent stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and our spectacular views! We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent location, Superior Hotel, but NO parking anywhere.
Summary: For a superior hotel like this, it is a shame the only parking available is valet and cost $40/ day. It would have been much better to just add this to the room rate and make it free or discounted. Other than that the hotel and staff were a pleasant surprise.
Manager Response: Dear nartb2019,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We appreciate your feedback in regards to parking at our 4 Diamond property. Our $39 a night valet only paring fee allows for 24 hour access to your car that is safely stowed in our parking garage. All beach front hotels in Huntington Beach have valet only due to the limited space so close to the beach. Please note that we have packages that include parking, if that is your preference. For detailed information please visit our website or call our in-house reservation department at 714-845-8000.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We were very pleased with our entire stay at this resort. It has been the best stay we have experienced. From the greeting to the view to the service and experience, we are happy to recommend this hotel. We will definitely return.

Outstanding property - everything was convenient inside / outside of hotel!  Would definitely recommend this for either a family or a couple. Property was updated and amenities were top notch.   Food Services were great

I didn't feel the restaurants were kid/teen friendly with their menus. It was a bummer to have to leave for every meal because of choices and prices of food. Gorgeous resort though, perfect location to the ocean.

We wasted our new year vacation in this hotel. Someone would open the door and walk into our room without permission. Tv and safe not working. Giving us wrong room and giving us hard time to switch it. It is a disgrace, don’t trust them
Manager Response: Dear SamOfSanMateo,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are so sorry to hear that you were so disappointed in your stay. I understand that our Director of Front Office was in contact with you before you departed and addressed your concerns, such as a member of our housekeeping team entering your room to provide service. We have passed on your comments to our executive team to review, Please know your feedback also allows our managers opportunity to retrain our staff.  Thank you again and safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: The resort was beautiful and had an amazing breakfast buffet. The rooms were comfortable and good sized with nice decor. Aside from a billing issue I would totally recommend this property. We had a beautiful Christmas spent here.

Summary Heading: If you want to be near the ocean, this is the place
Summary: I have stayed at Pasea and Hyatt which are on either side of the Waterfront Hilton and have stayed at this property multiple times.  Hands down the Hilton is the place to be. The guest rooms are well-appointed, staff is friendly, and rooms all have some sort of ocean view. Now that the construction is complete both towers are lovely.

My wife and for the last 6+ years travel to the Hilton Waterfront each year from Scottdale, AZ.  We are Hilton Diamond members so we see a good amount of Hilton properties each year.  Hands down this is the best Hilton property we have ever stayed at & this includes some Ritz Carltons. Every time you come in contact with a hotel staff member you receive a smile and a greeting. Housekeeping does a terrific job each day. The breakfast buffet is excellent including custom omelets. There is a new tower recently opened which is gorgeous and well appointed. We are fussy and can find no fault with this property. Oh, did I mention it Is directly across the street from the Pacific Ocean on a very long stretch oh Huntington Beach. Forget the other hotels in the area and try this property

Summary Heading: great location and property but a few updates needed
Summary: omg, what a great location and property. but it still has toilets that flush 3-4 gallons per flush (i had one until recently in my home; these are vintage 1990).  the reason i mention it is the irony of the bathroom signs encouraging re-use of towels to conserve the scarce CA water supply.

Staff was not very friendly.  Check in host did not explain the entirety of the package and how to redeem credits.  Breakfast at the Boardwalk was food but the staff was horrible.   Rooftop bar and staff was literally the best part of our stay outside of location.  Rooms are antiquated.  Outlets don’t work and don’t have USB.  Had there not been the BEACH package I would have stayed elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear barbidraper,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay. We are sorry to hear that your time with us was anything less than enjoyable.
