As always, our goal is to provide you with outstanding customer service and make sure your guest experience is all it can be. If at any time there are inconsistencies, we welcome the opportunity to Make it Right. I understand that our Food and Beverage Manager Krisly Badilla has reached out to you a few times via email and phone calls while you were still on property. We are disappointed that we were not able speak with you and  remedy your experience.  If you would still like to discuss your experience, please do not hesitate to call at your earliest convenience at 714-845-8000. Thank you again for your feedback.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I have been staying at the hotel for over 25 years, and at one time, for 20 years straight. I have enjoyed many summer vacations here. I love the location, its restaurant foods, pool, fitness centre, and much more. On this visit, the weather was chilly and I missed going for my long walks on the beach.
Manager Response: Dear InnaYYZ,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We truly are grateful for the feedback. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our many amenities as well as our prime location in Downtown Huntington Beach. We know you have many options when booking a hotel in Southern California. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront and we hope to see you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Waterfront Adventure Shack Is THE BEST because...
Summary: Had a great time at a beach fire put on by Shaun from waterfront adventure shack. His customer service and keenness to make our experience great was a highlight. Can’t recommend this place or Shaun enough!
Manager Response: Dear 581brendanw,  Thank you for visiting us at our Beach Services outlet Waterfront Adventures! One of our favorite activities to recommend is a Beach Bonfire with butler service. An absolute must when visiting Huntington Beach. Nothing like s'mores and a sunset. We hope to see you again in the near future. Happy Holidays!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Thanksgiving visit to family in the area
Summary: Enjoyed the view from our room because it was clear with a beautiful sunset over the ocean. Same for the rooftop bar on the other tower that same day. Our daughter who lives in Huntington Beach joined us at the bar after work.  We did eat a wonderful dinner at Henry's on the patio by the pool. This was the start of our ThanksGiving holiday with family.
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces816990,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. It sounds like you had a wonderful time with your loved ones for Thanksgiving. We are thankful you chose to stay with us! We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We love this hotel because it has great views from every room.  The service there is always perfect.  The rooms are clean and the help staff is so helpful and kind.  We love to get rooms facing the pier during 4th of July so we can watch the fireworks.  The cabanas during the summer is where we like to be all day.  They have face painters, live music, fun stuff planned for the whole family.  The Henry restaurant has amazing food and service.  There are two amazing waiters there.  One is Jeff and one I forgot his name but he has a beard and glasses. Waitress on the roof top bar that worked the sat night before thankgiving was so kind and sweet.  We never have a bad experience here.  We have been coming here for 12 years.
Manager Response: Dear sherrysc0tt,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay. We are honored to have guests such as yourself return to our property time and time again. There truly is no greater compliment in the hospitality industry. Our sincere gratitude to you and your family. Thank you for mentioning our staff by name for their outstanding service. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to them. We hope you have a wonderful holiday season and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Everything was awesome! It was a rainy week and the resort made it bearable. Lot's of space to take a break from the weather. with breaks in the rain, downtown is close by along with an outdoor mall which both offered lots of dining and shopping. The beach is gorgeous! For a  family of 5 we wish the queen suite was just a tiny bit bigger but still great!
Manager Response: Dear SB-SJCA,  Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when staying in Southern California. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Great views, awesome staff, well manicured property. Resort staff are very attentive. Holiday decorations were on point. Henrys Restaurant is a must and a great night cap at the rooftop bar is a great way to end the day.

Summary Heading: Spectacular waterfront property in Huntington Beach!
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for two days on a whim for a weekend getaway.   Both of us can't say enough how fantastic we thought this property was all around.   From the moment you check in, to the various staff throughout the property, everyone that works at the property is extremely friendly and goes out of it's way to make you feel comfortable.   Frankly, it's the best service we have gotten in recent memory.  The property itself feels updated, clean and modern.   We were thinking it would be "tired" beach feel.  But we were pleasantly surprised that the hotel felt the exact opposite.  In fact, it feels like it was recently renovated.   The common areas are great with ample restaurant and bars.  The Offshore 9 rooftop bar is spectacular!  My wife and I ended up spending 5-6
Manager Response: Dear usingcommonsense,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and our updated amenities. Our central location is key for a great visit to Surf City USA! We also have a complimentary shuttle for our guests that leaves on the hour from 8am-10pm from our Valet booth that stops at Pacific City and Main Street! A comprehensive list of all our amenities can be found on our website.   Safe travels!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My wife and one of her lifelong friends stayed at the Hilton Waterfront in Huntington Beach 11/21-11/22/19, and had a wonderful stay.  They came home raving about the room; the view; the entire property; the service (literally everyone with whom they interacted, either by phone or in-person); the restaurant and room-service food; and the vibe.  My wife's bottom-line: she has never been treated as well at any other hotel (including Waldorfs), and she wants to return soon (with me!).
Manager Response: Draw Hank,  Thank you for your 5 bubble review of The Waterfront! We hope you and your wife are able to join us together in the near future. We hope to wow you as well with our outstanding service and amenities. We know you have many resorts to choose from in Southern California; thank you for choosing us! Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Okay hotel, with lots of fees
Summary: The view from the room was pretty good, but many of the rooms are built around a courtyard with a ridiculously noisy industrial air conditioning unit, so plan on keeping the door closed. Also, the fees here are out of control.  $40 per day parking, $25 daily resort fee, $100 pet fee, 24% mandatiry tip for room service plus $3 delivery fee added to the already expensive food and drinks. Good location across the street from the beach and near restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: Dear gavin h,   Thank you for your candid review of your recent stay. We strive to provide guest experiences that are anticipatory to the highest degree and personalized to the occasion, and we are always looking for ways to balance fair pricing with the top-of-the-line accommodations and services we offer. We appreciate your review as it provides feedback indicating a need to re-evaluate guest needs and make the necessary adjustments to our offerings. We hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to demonstrate our commitment to satisfaction in all areas of the guest experience.

Summary: I reserved a king bed full ocean view room a week before our arriving. When we check in I was told our room wasn't ready but they had a upgraded room even larger then the open we reserved and had a ocean view. When we got to our room we were given a handicap room,  tub/shower combo, next to elevator lobby very noisy, the view was only looking south, no sunset.  Not what I expect from Hilton. As far as the hotel itself, beautiful, two large pools, hotel staff was excellent, the roof top bar has a fabulous 360 degree view. Hotel is right across the street from the beach. $39 for valet, no other options for parking. I thought the food and drinks were over priced, $14 for the cheapest glass of red wine. We wound up eating most of our meals outside of the hotel, try Pacific City. I
Manager Response: Dear rgpollard,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are sorry to hear you were anything less than satisfied with your stay.  I see that the original booking was for a standard king ocean view room in our Huntington tower. The upgrade was to Vista Suite in our Twin Dolphin Tower, the ocean view was the same as the original booking, the room was a larger room than originally booked. We are so sorry that this was not to your liking for your special occasion. At anytime, if you are unhappy with your accommodations,our front desk team strives to Make it Right with you while you are still on property so that you can enjoy your time to the fullest. It is our pleasure to be at your service.  Thank you for your feedback. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Had a great trip, loved this Hilton
Summary: We had a short stay while in the area for a concert and I'm so glad we picked this hotel.  The rooms were a little small but more than sufficient.  Nice balcony with comfortable chairs, good water pressure in the shower, coffee and fridge, beds were comfortable and the room had cute accents.  Starbucks on site, room service was good as well as the Boardwalk restaurant.  Two pools, we visited both.  The pool without slides seems to be geared toward the adult crowd.  Food and drink service available at both.  Pools were both heated, still seemed a little cold to me but we just came out of warm weather so hard to honestly say.  Check in was amazing, the woman that checked us in was so friendly we all walked away "wowed".  Valet is expensive and the only option but I figure it is a

Very average Hilton. Surprised how dirty the rooms were.  Apparently all the mentioned here on the reviews are from updated tower.   Apparently only 1/2 the hotel is updated.  When I mentioned we found hairs in the toilet and the rooms were not that clean, the response was that we were in one of the older not updated towers.  When I checked in They said I was in one of the nicer rooms.  Beds were also not great.  If you want a coffee to go, then good luck.  Maybe cater to the heavy Hilton loyal members?  Hyatt next door seemed nicer and we also have stayed at the Kimpton downtown which is better.
Manager Response: Dear Bailey3305,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront. We appreciate your feedback and use it to better train our associates. We apologize for the condition of your room upon arrival; that it was not cleaned to our high standards. I will pass on your review to our Housekeeping team.  Our Huntington Tower will undergo room renovations floor by floor over the next year. All of our guest rooms feature coffee makers and we have an on property coffee shop called Surf Hero Market that serves Starbucks coffee. Our Gold & Diamond Hilton Honor members receive two full breakfast buffet vouchers for every day of their stay, a 20% off dinner voucher for Boardwalk restaurant, 1,000 bonus points as well as double the stay points for every dollar spent.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope you will give us another opportunity in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: One of the best Hilton Hotels I’ve stayed at as a Diamond member. Staff and facilities were excellent.  Wet cool rooftop bar and they have a great breakfast with choices like lox and a chia seed yogurt creation.

Summary Heading: Warning: Do not Valet on busy event weekends at hotel
Summary: Valet service terrible on Saturday evening. (3 weddings in hotel)  We parked with valet with no warning of how long it would to take to retrieve our car from valet. A quote of 20 min wait took 1 hour to get our car and that’s only because we complained. It would have been longer had we not.   Few suggestions:  - You need to let the guests I hotel have first dibs on getting their cars soon.  - You need to be given a warning on how early to retrieve your car from valet and you need to warn guests if the events in hotel may impact the valet service. Some event attendees may opt for Uber service instead.
Manager Response: Dear wanderlust,  Thank you for your candid review of your recent stay. We are sorry to hear of your expertise with our Valet team. Our sincere apologies for falling short of your high standards.  We strive to provide guest experiences that are anticipatory to the highest degree and personalized to the occasion, and we are always looking for ways to balance top-of-the-line accommodations and services we offer. We appreciate your review as it provides feedback indicating a need to re-evaluate guest needs and make the necessary adjustments to our offerings. We hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to demonstrate our commitment to satisfaction in all areas of the guest experience.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel with tons of amenities - close to everything
Summary: My girlfriends and I stayed here for 3 nights and had a blast.  We had the larger one bedroom suite in the twin dolphin room (highly recommended!).  Our room was great, ocean view, the beds were extremely comfortable and all the staff we interacted with were incredible.  If anything, you have to catch the sunset, with a glass of wine, at the roofttop bar... amazing!
Manager Response: Dear adwelch06,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review of your stay with us. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay. We also highly recommend sunset cocktails at Offshore 9 Rooftop Lounge. There is no better ocean view in all of Orange County! We know you have many options when selecting a hotel in Huntington Beach, thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Location was awesome.  It was newly updated so the hotel was great and rooms were very nice.  Pool facilities were amazing for my kids.  It was a great setup for families or friends.  Will definitely be coming back for more vacations in the future.

EEE! We’d been trying to get to Huntington Beach, and as a HH Member, this experience is Tops! SoCal weather balmy, HB surf completion in town, and hotel down town shuttle made this near perfect. Dinner at Dukes, well taken care of wherever we went. Will return.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, friendly staff, clean rooms
Summary: The hotel is located in such a manner that I was fortunate enough to enjoy the beauty of the pacific ocean from my private balcony. The hotel hosts a variety of food and drink options, in addition to several near by options. The staff easily returned a smile and provided assistance when needed. The room was clean and quiet

I can only speak for our renovated room in the Twin Dolphin Tower but it was sparkling clean, beachy and thoughtfully designed. The staff, particularly Sherry at the front desk, were cheery and efficient. Perhaps the bros at the valet station should focus more on their customers, but other than that the staff was terrific. Reading other reviews it's clearly essential to require a renovated room.   Breakfast was excellent with a made to order egg station.   All in all a pleasant, cheery experience.

Best luxury hotel in the Huntington Beach, beautiful view to the beach, excellent guest  services, Front Desk team exceeded expectations (Shirley, Jared, Shawn), and in the Boardwalk Restaurant Myle created great memories for my family.  Our room also had extraordinary views of the sunset. In all this was perfect stay - I’d like to compliment the entire hotel team.
Manager Response: Dear Betzabe M,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for mentioning so many of our outstanding associates by name. I will be sure to pass on your praises to them. We know you have many options when visiting Southern California, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely Property but They Haven’t Nailed it
Summary: Came here with my husband to enjoy a relaxing weekend away. Had a really relaxing time at the spa! Food was great and the room and view was spectacular. We stayed in a studio with ocean view. Highly recommend.  However I am giving a 3 star review because of the following: -Room temperature control was off and it was a sauna in my room when we first walked in. -Waited 30 minutes for valet to retrieve my car one time and 15 minutes the second time (and I called down ahead of time). These times are in addition to the the 15 minute warning I gave them when I called down. -Breakfast on Sunday ends at 10am for some odd reason. -Ordered room service instead and the food arrived like warm.  Overall, it was a nice stay, but likely won’t come back.
Manager Response: Dear 895gregoryw,  Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback of your recent stay at The Waterfront. We appreciate your review and will use it to better train our staff. We will pass on you information to our valet and in-room dining managers. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced.   Please note that California Energy Efficiency requirements state that a room that is not yet occupied can not have a cooling unit running. Upon arrival, guests can then activate the cooling unit and set it to their desired temperature.   On Sundays, our Boardwalk Restaurant breakfast buffet is served until 10:30am. The restaurant then prepares for our Sunday Brunch that opens at 11:30am. Henry's Ocean View Dining serves Ala Carte breakfast until 12:00pm on Sunday's, Surf Hero Market our coffee shop offers breakfast sandwiches, bagels, pastries, yogurts, fresh fruit and oatmeal.  Thank you again for your feedback. Safe travels!  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We just had our wedding at the property. The property and team make this location impossible to match. They made all of our wishes and dreams come true with the perfect wedding and flawless execution.
Manager Response: Dear Eddie C,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your amazing wedding at The Waterfront. Congratulations! We are thrilled that you choose to have your event here with us. We wish you all the best and hope to see you again for your one year anniversary!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful. Lunch menu should be extended.
Summary: We were asked if we wanted an upgrade to an ocean view corner room and we agreed. It was beautiful! Seeing the ocean from our room was stunning. Very spacious and comfortable room with shower and bathtub. The hallways were quite cold due to the A/C. Very friendly staff. The fascilities (2 pools, rooftop terrace, steak restaurant, takeaway coffee shop, lunch restaurant and spa) are excellent but we’d kindly ask for a wider selection on the lunch menu. We loved taking walks at the beach and just across the street, you can rent bikes.
Manager Response: Dear Bubblechoc,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us at The Waterfront. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our on property amenities and our beautiful ocean front location. We will be sure to pass on your feedback in regards to our Boardwalk Restaurant lunch menu. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us! Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We stayed here a year ago and had a ocean front view. Our stay was perfect. We needed another getaway and reserved and paid for an ocean view and received a "partial ocean view". We saw very little of the ocean and a lot of the restaurant on the second floor. When we addressed the obvious error on their part, they were not empathetic and simply explained that we must have read the description incorrectly. Nowhere on our reservation did it say "partial ocean view".   There was a huge conference in the hotel they were obviously more concerned about and losing our business this week and in the future was not their concern. Shame. They made a good first impression, but we have found another hotel in HB that has better accommodations and staff that is very attentive.  They have lost
Manager Response: Dear Jessica G  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about you recent stay. We are sorry to hear that your time with us was disappointing in any way. We also regret to hear that you in any way felt upstaged by any other group staying on property. We pride ourselves on extending outstanding, individualized service to each of our guests and apologize for not meeting your high expectations.  Please feel free to contact our Front Office Management staff directly at 714-845-8000, if there is anything we can do to Make it Right with you. Thank you and safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: The hotel location is prime on the beach in Huntington Beach. The facilities are very clean and well maintained. The hotel has everything you would need but it is a short walk from the mall and only a few blocks more to Main Street and the Huntington Beach Pier.
Manager Response: Dear Member_David_P_2019,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and our central location to all Huntington Beach has to offer. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Nice place to be when you want the beach in California. You are close to the pier and main street where there are many choices for food and fun.   Get up in the morning and walk or run the beach.  If you like, you can watch the surfers catch their wave Hotel services are superb and you will certainly enjoy your stay.
Manager Response: Dear Estoywilliam,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront! We are thrilled to hear you had a wonderful time. We know that there are many options when selecting a resort in Southern California. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: The view was spectacular the pool hot tubes was Ok I liked the place But was not worth what we paid Didn't have wash clothes in the room when we arrived, The guys that parked our car was not very friendly either, I would have rather of parked my own car rather than deal with unfriendly people. Also, I put up a deposit of $200 I called and was told I would get it back so far I have not I called again today and have not heard back from them, The rooms was clean Beds was comfy
Manager Response: Dear 502pennys,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay. I will pass on your comments to our Valet manager to address with their team. Our sincere apologies.   If there are items missing from your guest room upon arrival, please notify the front desk immediately and they will be happy to address those needs.  Please note that the $200 deposit is a hold on your credit card that is never charged to your card unless you use it for incidentals such as room charges, parking or resort fees. Upon departure, it is immediately released. At times it takes your financial institution up to 7 days to remove the wording of the hold on your statement. Rest assured it is no longer held by our property. Please contact your financial institution directly for confirmation of the funds hold being released. Please contact our accounting department at 714-845-8000 for an questions regarding your bill.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: There is something extraordinary about the Waterfront! Service is excellent. Stayed 3 nights in a 1 bedroom suite in twin towers. View was gorgeous. Suite was brand new and clean. Our room had coffee maker, fridge, large balcony, and gorgeous bathroom. Our daughter never wanted to leave the water slide and pool!  The coffee shop was a daily stop for us. Great coffee and gifts.  We wouldn’t stay anywhere else in Huntington Beach!
Manager Response: Dear 298jeannem,  Thank you for your 5 bubble review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are grateful to have loyal guests that call our property their home away from home. We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in Surf City USA
Summary: Loved the location, the service, the team- GREAT TRIP !!! I would stay there again and again. I live in the area and for me it is the perfect staycation. Love the new restaurants, bar and hotel rooms. Can't wait to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa M,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review of your recent stay. We are so glad you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect Spot for a family vacation
Summary: This hotel was kid friendly, but had all the features and comfort I expect in a 4/5 star resort. Having the beach right across the street was easy, but the pool area was my favorite spot to hang out and relax.
Manager Response: Dear JRo19761005,  Thank you for posting a 5 bubble reivew of your recent stay at The Waterfront! We are thrilled to read you enjoyed our location and amenities. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I booked a poolside suite months before for my daughter's party.  I got there early the day of my reservation to drop things off and make sure the room will be ready.  They said 4pm is check in time and it will be ready for sure.  Well, got there at check in time with her party members and the room wasn't ready.  They said it will be just a few more minutes.  Those few minutes turned into 1.5 hours later.  I was so angry and all they did was say sorry to me.  Never getting a room here again.  The next beach party will be next door at the Hyatt HB.  Little bit more pricey but their customer service is excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Escape781748,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about you recent stay at The Waterfront. We are so sorry to hear that your stay was disappointing in any way. Our sincere apologies that your room was not ready at our guaranteed check in time of 4:00pm.  I understand that our front desk team did offer other upgraded room types that were ready prior to check in such as our Presidential Suite as an option, a $100 resort credit, late check out and additional amenities for your bonfire. We are regretful that these were not satisfactory options to Make it Right with you. Please reach out to any one of our Front Desk managers at 714-845-8000 if you would like to discuss your experience further. Once again, our most sincere apologies.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Best location for Pacific Air Show
Summary: Can’t beat the location. Book ocean front. Ingress and egress are painless even with 2 million in attendance.  Pool chairs fill up fast so reserve early. You won’t be disappointed. Overall a fantastic stay for a perfect weekend staycation.
Manager Response: Dear djp336,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your Airshow weekend! We are so glad to gear you enjoyed the show and your stay with us. It is one of our favorite events of the year. The Great Pacific Airshow considers our towers center stage and the majority of aerial stunts are performed directly over us or in front of our location! We hope you can join us for next years show. Safe travels...  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: It is rare today to have the kind of customer service we received on our recent trip, everyone from check-in to check out was friendly and eager to please.  Restaurants were great, the pools beautiful and very nicely maintained, and our room was perfect.  Truly my only reservation we had was having to use the valet, with no access to your vehicle unless you have them bring it to the front of the hotel, and $38 a day to park at the place you are staying is pretty high.
Manager Response: Dear DPAZ9,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when choosing a resort in Southern California, thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Luis what a special smiley creature
Summary: Beware of false misrepresentation in room blurb. So a partial ocean view states pool and ocean view floors 1-12 , A ocean view states view of ocean with breezes of ocean or sunsets over Huntington pier. In reality what you get is exactly the same as a partial ocean view, a side on view of the ocean and a view of  pool, so exactly the same as a partial ocean view but dearer! The only way you get a full ocean view is by getting the ocean front rooms.   I am a diamond member with Hilton, so would expect to be accommodated being their most loyal customer, not when smarm ball Luis is on Duty! I went and raised my concerns with on duty manager Luis, what a waste of time, all he did was laugh in my face, smiling and saying I had the best room in the hotel because I was Diamond status!
Manager Response: Dear scubastrong,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are disappointed to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay.  Please note that you did receive the room type booked. Our Hilton Brand website does state that ocean view rooms have both ocean and coastline views. An ocean front room faces the beach directly. The description of our room views will not specifically list everything that is visible or not visible from the room. During an event such as the Great Pacific Airshow, ocean front rooms are sold via our in house reservations team. We do not have complimentary upgrades available during events such as the Airshow, as we are fully committed and upgrades are offered based on availability.  If you ever have a question about a room view or would like more photos emailed to you, please call our in-house reservation department directly at 714-845-8000.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This resort and the suite my wife and I stayed in was 5 star from the moment we arrived. Upon letting the concierge Kat know it was my birthday and it was special day to me she sent up a bottle of champagne which exceeded my expectations. The check in was easy and fast. The grounds were well kept up with beautiful views of the pacific from almost every angle. The Starbucks on site was clutch for our morning walk and the resort is within blocks from Main St and Huntington Pier. Hands down one of Hiltons best resorts I've stayed at.
Manager Response: Dear Bryan V,  Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay. We are so honored you choose to stay with us for a special occasion. Happy birthday! I will pass on your kind words to Kat. Thank you for mentioning her by name. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Outlets in the room did not work including restroom. Had to call front desk several times.Finally fixed it which gave me no time to be able to relax because somoene was always in the room fixing something.
Manager Response: Dear N7539WXeva,.  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are sorry to hear that you did not have an enjoyable time while you were with us. Our Huntington Tower is slated to undergo a renovation in the near future; which will include new outlets and charging ports. Thank you for your valuable feedback as we will pass it on to our Executive committee and managers for review and to better train or associates. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights in sept 2019. Stayed in Huntington tower. Rooms decent but showing a bit of age. Rest of hotel is high quality. Great location opposite beach and close to Pacific city but a bit of a walk to Main Street. Parking is ridiculous at $38 a day.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel With Couple Of Issues
Summary: Clearly the Hilton Waterfront has been undergoing extensive renovations including adding a new restaurant, Henry's.  You cannot help but be impressed as you enter the hotel lobby and walk to your room.  Our complementary breakfast at Boardwalk restaurant was an excellent buffet and Henry's is beautiful and new although the menu could be improved.  The spa is worth a look and we enjoyed our messages although the price was stratospheric.  Our suite upgrade was nice but the carpet was disgustingly dirty which they ried to correct with a dry shampoo but not successful.  We enjoyed the pools and bars including the bar at top of the hotel and at Henry's.  We recommend this hotel if you are considering staying in Huntington Beach as we watched the floors in similar suite to ours being

Enjoyed a tour of all the event spaces, and some yummy fish tacos!  The catering managers were incredibly informative and hospitable.  I was really impressed with Sean C. who delivered my car up to valet upon my departure.  Not only was he prompt in bringing my car up but when I apologetically explained I forgot to bring cash for a tip he said "No problem" with a smile, not making me feel bad or guilty one bit.  It was this professionalism and customer service that left me with a wonderful lasting impression of Waterfront, and I'm looking forward to my next visit.

Great location, pacific city is 8 minutes walking distance (all the shops and restaurant choices to pick from). Family pool and adults pool available to use. Staff was very helpful and friendly. We were in the twin dolphins tower, everything is very modern and clean. Lots of room for us 3, we had 2 queens option. They were able to accommodate all of our needs (bottle opener, microwave- since we have a 5 years old we asked for one to be able to heat up his leftovers, room service). Valet parking attendant is super efficient and friendly. We would definitely come back to stay for our next trip so our son can go to Disneyland!!!

Overall wonderful experience, the hotel is a great location across the street from Huntington Beach. Check in was easy and they gave my grandson a small bag of seashells and a shark toy.  The only con was that each day I was charged double for valet, I called after noticing my folio charges and have yet to receive a call back it's been over 24 hrs, I will have to call again tomorrow.

Best Hotel in California.  Location, Location, Location.  Resort is great and staff is amazing.  Rooms overlooking the ocean.  Walking distance to everything you need.  It's great when you don't need a car or Uber.

Summary Heading: Hotel Awesome!! Food over priced and not quality!
Summary: Hotel Awesome!! Food over priced and not quality!   Henry’s restaurant is over priced even more than beach front Hawaiian hotels. Hotel and rooms very clean and worth the price. Great views and overall good hotel property! Would stay again but stay clean of property restaurants.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous location for adults only and families!
Summary: We stayed 2 nights at Waterfront Beach Resort for a business meeting.  Our experience was amazing with the staff as well as the gorgeous location.  We didn't bring our kids this trip so we enjoyed the adult pool.  When the kids are with us, there is a separate kids pool with a slide.  Both pool views are gorgeous!  We were able to watch the sun set while relaxing in the hot tub.  We enjoyed the walking distance to the pier too.  Highly recommend!

Summary Heading: Another Great Vacation at the Waterfront Beach Resort
Summary: This was our fourth year in a row vacationing at the Waterfront Resort. The stay was great again. The service throughout was excellent as it has been in the past. We ate breakfast at the Boardwalk restaurant every day of our stay. The food and service was great, especially great service from Haley and Rene. The new Huntington pool is great. Brand new, with nice lounge chairs. Pool service was once again excellent, especially from Jennifer and Adam. Thanks again to Joseph Boyer of Reservations for upgrading us to an Ocean Front room in the new Dolphin Tower. The room was wonderful. We are looking forward to another great stay next year.

I recently stayed at the Waterfront Beach Resort by Hilton. The hotel was in a great location and from the get go, the staff was friendly and helpful. We were on our way to celebrate my sisters wedding and was looking forward to being in Huntington Beach.   Upon our arrival, we met Mr. Damian Garcia, who checked us in and helped us get acquainted with the hotel. We got a room in the new tower, which was newly built and decorated within the past year. The decor in this room was awesome. Not a single detail was missed. The cottage style feeling with luxury and comfort was great.  We stayed on the premises the entire weekend and had all meals at the hotel. The food was good, and the food service staff were extremely friendly. Even the bartender remembered by drink the whole weekend

The location of this hotel is amazing!  And the views are great.  My average is because it was hot and humid...in the hotel.  I walked into my room and it was musty.  The AC was not on in my room, so I turned it on and way down.  That wasn't even enough to clear it up.  This isn't my typical experience with a Hilton hotel so I was very surprised.  I would opt for the Hyatt next door - had a much better experience there.
Manager Response: Dear rentzm1,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay with us at The Waterfront. We are so sorry to hear that your stay was not all it could be. We have been experience unusually high temperatures for our area along with uncharacteristically high humidity.  Due to California energy efficiency requirements, we are unable to run air conditioning units in guests rooms until the guest occupies the room. We apologize that the air conditioning unit in your guest room, once engaged, was unable to cool your room to your desired temperature.  Please know that our Front Desk staff is always available during your stay to Make it Right; such as having engineering repair the unit or move you to a different room with in the room type booked, when available.  Thank you for your valuable feedback. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Another pleasant stay with a few hiccups
Summary: This was my 2nd stay here once again staying here over Labor Day weekend.  Beautiful hotel with a nice friendly and helpful staff.  We wound up having a nice, clean and comfortable room in the Huntington Tower with a magnificent view. The new pool was great and was perfect to escape the noise of the kiddie pool.  Beach is right across the street and within a 5-10 minute walk, there are many different restaurants and pubs to choose from.  There were a few negative aspects to my stay:  We were initially given a room on the 12th floor next to a room that had active and noisy construction being conducted.  We were not advised this at check in and had our room switched fairly quickly. There were no beach chairs left to take to the beach by 8:15 on both Saturday and Sunday morning.
Manager Response: Dear biatty,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay at The Waterfront! We appreciate your feedback and I will pass on you experience to our executive committee. We thank you for letting us know about these areas of opportunity.  Please note that Hilton Honors is experience a backlog. At times, it may take up to 30 days for points appear in our guests accounts. We apologize for the inconvenience. Than you again for staying with us and safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We brought parents and kids here for a beach vacation. This hotel is one of the few choices right on the beach (still need to cross street though). Both rooms were upgraded to the new tower and rooms are really large and clean. Our partial ocean view rooms are far from the beach side but still happy to have an amazing view from balcony. All four adults received free breakfast buffet coupon even though only myself is diamond status. Breakfast is the best we had among all the 10 hotels we stayed this year. Dinner at the restaurant was not as tasty as the breakfast.   Parents were so happy for the stay. Worth everything!   The only issue is the front desk didn’t agree to extend a late check out time saying it was a busy weekend but the valet parking was faster than I imagined (so
Manager Response: Dear julian0616,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: amazing beach in front of the hotel
Summary: Huntington beach is amazing. You can walk from the hotel to the beach in 10 minutes.The hotel has two pools. One is resort style and has water slides for kids. Beside the pool is a big sand play area. The view is also amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Chi,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Just OK.  Valet Only Parking Not Ideal for Family Travels
Summary: Valet only parking is a hassle and is very limiting especially when traveling with kids.  This 200 char mimimum is a hassle too.  Why encourage me to be wordy when I can convey my thoughts with few words.  And now I’m just filling this textbox with nonsense.
Manager Response: Dear chepascual,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay wit The Waterfront. Our most sincere apologies for any inconveniences you experienced while staying with us. Please contact us at 714-845-8000 and our Director of Operations Ajit Acharya will be happy to speak with you about your stay.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent location so shops and beach
Summary: I stayed in room 519 and had a nice view of the pool and beach.  I used the exercise room and it had all the latest equipment.  The morning buffet had an omelet station and many choices for those on special diets.  The grounds are so beautiful and the flowers and trees are in bloom..  I wasn't able to use the pool due to my tight schedule but it was filled with kids and parents.  It's a perfect getaway to unwind.
Manager Response: Dear Diane,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a five star review of your stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful you choose to stay with us and hope to see you again in the near future!  Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: For the price a consistently excellent beach front SoCal choice. Clean spacious rooms, good service, Henry’s is best hotel steak house we have ever used. Front desk a bit spotty handling requests likely due to volume of activity
Manager Response: Dear G Lee,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My family visited the Hilton for the very first time this past Labor Day weekend. The resort is BEAUTIFUL, the rooms in the Twin Dolphin Tower are tastefully decorated and spacious. The oceanfront room was breathtaking. You could see the ocean for miles. The hotel is across PCH from beach so please note that you will get street noise.  We reserved an oceanfront cabana Saturday which was $100 more then the pool side cabanas and included a fire pit which the kids loved for smores. The only hang-up was the service was slow and forgetful, on a couple occasions we would have to go find our server to get our drink after waiting 45 minutes. When you are paying 3 times the normal rate you kind of expect 3 times the service. I think they fell short here.  Sunday the pool was packed as
Manager Response: Dear sarah,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay. I’m glad to hear you enjoyed your accommodations. There’s is nothing quite like waking up to that view!   I am so sorry to hear about your cabana and pool experience. I appreciate you sharing your observations and will pass on your review to our executive committee for immediate review and retraining. Our sincere apologies for falling so short of your expectations.   Have a safe rest of your summer and we do hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make this right with you if you’re ever back in Huntington Beach.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We love this spot and have stayed here several times. Seemed they were severely understaffed over Labor Day weekend.  40 minutes to park in valet parking. Sparse service at the pool. No sense of urgency in the restaurants (employees standing and talking while several tables were ready to place orders).
Manager Response: Dear Todd,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. I am so sorry to hear that your time with us did not meet your expectations. Please feel free to call our Director of Operations Ajit Acharya at 714.845.8000 to further discuss your experience and so we can make it right with you. Again, our sincere apologies and we hope to hear from you soon.  Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We stayed here twice on a recent month long trip round California.  1. The Rooms  The first visit of 4 days had significant issues with the rooms allocated. The first room was next to the gym to we had constant banging anytime anyone was on the running machine which was pretty much anytime between 5am and 8pm.   After that they moved us across the hall and that room was directly above the kitchens where the air conditioning vents are incredibly noisy - to the extent you literally cannot sit on the balcony and have a conversation. I’m a single parent travelling with a small child with disabilities so was too exhausted to ask to move again.   On our return a week later I was more specific with my room booking and although the Reception staff made it clear they didn’t particularly
Manager Response: Dear Millie,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We greatly value your feedback and use it as an opportunity to better train our staff property wide.  I will pass on your interaction with our front desk staff to our Rooms Division Directors. Our most sincere apologies to you in the areas we fell short of your expectations.  I will let Brianna know of your wonderful feedback. She is a gem. I understand that our concierge staff did leave a few voicemails for you in regards to confirmation of services. I will have the phone line in your room checked as well. Thank you.   We appreciate you choosing to stay with us again. Safe travels to you and your family.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My wife and I had not been to Huntington Beach in 5 years so we decided to beat the labor day crowds and go the week before labor day. We loved our stay at the Waterfront Beach Resort Hilton because it is so new and clean. They really know how to treat their guests with kindness and hospitality. We Loved watching the sunset from the 9th floor Lounge/Bar with their laid back vibe. The pool area had great service when we needed drinks and/or food. A quick walk across the street and we rented bikes to peddle along the walking/bike path of the beach. It was a great relaxing get away for us...
Manager Response: Dear West,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Loved everything about this hotel.  Friendly staff, nice rooms, spa, pool, location and room views!  They have two pools with one catering more to families with kids and plenty of food choices at the restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Gregory,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My fiancé decided to book our honeymoon at the Waterfront Beach Resort. He spoke with someone on the phone requesting an ocean view room and was confirmed that we would have an ocean view room. When we checked in at the front desk, Terry(supervisor in charge that night) was rude, unprofessional and condescending!! We explained to him that we spoke with someone upon making reservations and was told that we have an ocean view room, since we are coming for our honeymoon, but Terry said that we would have to pay an upgrade charge. We asked to speak to another manager on duty, Terry said he was the only one on duty. So we ended up with no ocean view room. To make matters worse, the bedsheets were DIRTY!!!. We had to ask the front desk during our stay (everyday) to change the
Manager Response: We're very sorry for any disappointment and/or difficulties during your stay. I can assure you, this is not an ordinary review by any standard and we take these concerns very seriously. Thank you for your review and bringing this to our attention. Please contact our Director of Front Desk, Damian Garcia at 714-845-8000. Please have your reservation information (name on the reservation and dates of stay) when you call. Our sincere apologies.

Summary Heading: We will always return to the Waterfront Hilton
Summary: This is the 5th year returning. The added pool makes for a quiterq alternative for the slide pool. The overalllhotel ambiance is soothing and pleasing including the lobby design. I can always count on cleanliness. They also provide chairs, umbrellas and towels for the beach and offer the hot sauna to relax in after. The only thing missing was a game room for the kids.
Manager Response: Dear csorensen,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We are especially grateful to our loyal, return guests. Thank you for returning year after year. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: A must stay in Huntington Beach!
Summary: 11 out of 10!  Staff is first class.  From the check in process, high end beer, wine and spirits, very knowledgeable waitstaff in all the restaurants and timing in-room dining.  I must stay while in Huntington Beach.  The view is stunning and plenty of walking business to frequent.
Manager Response: Dear lwd,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your stay at The Waterfront! What a wonderful review. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location and Amenities in Huntington Beach
Summary: Great place to relax after four days at Disneyland. Proximity to the beach and Pacific City was wonderful.We found, unexpectedly, that at the pool you can borrow anything you need to go to the beach (chairs, umbrellas, towels, beach toys, boogie boards). Very convenient! And being able to walk to Pacific City for coffee, to eat, or to shop was also a huge plus. The hotel itself is beautiful, and all interaction with staff was warm and friendly. We will absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Paradise,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your stay at The Waterfront! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Our location can not be beat! So happy to hear your took advantage of it.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Every year my BF and I do the Thelma and Louise celebrating our birthdays at the Hilton Waterfront in Huntington Beach. Great location.  Pool, hot tub, views, restaurants, beach, downtown farmers market and entertainment.  Great therapy!

With my husband and I both working, it was difficult to schedule time off together.   My Mom surprised us with a 3 day and 2 night stay at the hotel (mini vacation) to relax before the new school year began.

Summary Heading: Family friendly, great views, great service
Summary: This is the second time we’ve stayed here.  We got an ocean view 1 bedroom suite in the dolphin tower.  I recommend this newer tower.  It has an updated decor, huge shower and views from “living room” and bedroom.   All of the staff are super friendly and helpful.  Two pools to pick from, but we park ourselves by the water slides (which our son loves).  The famous pier is in walking distance, as well as plenty of shops and restaurants.  My only gripes are that there is no microwave (there is a mini fridge) and the wifi bounces out constantly.

Mostly the worst part was that the adult pool had awfully loud music blasting on the weekend.  During the week it's quiet so we were shocked when suddenly on Saturday there was a DJ blaring it out there.  We asked him to lower it as we did management and got the cold shoulder (also cold because the jacuzzi was broken for 3 days during our stay).  But also on Friday we were told to leave the pool at 4 PM for a wedding.  Excuse me?  We paid for this hotel, why should Hilton book a wedding while all the guest have paid and now need to leave?    The manager just called me and kept saying how sorry he was.  I kept asking if there were going to be any policy changes going forward.  He was extremely noncommittal to say the least.  Buyer Beware!!!!~!~!

Summary Heading: The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel
Summary: Beautiful resort. Well located, great accommodations, nice pools and slides and friendly staff. A walkway/pedestrian bridge would’ve been nice, but the pool area had a beach section as well. Our daughter loved the pool slides, but the rusty slide stairs and platform needs to be addressed; the rest of the resort is updated and in great shape!

We normally stay at the Hilton and this time was no different . I was out here for a conference and was able to enjoy the pool and breathtaking views. Definitely a great place to take the family or just get away for a few days . Staff was also welcoming and inviting. Great group of people from start to finish .  Highly recommend!

We just came from 8 days there. On the first 2 days the adult (smaller/quiet) pool was so nice. Jacuzzi so perfectly hot!  Day 3-6 the jacuzzi was cool and I was told each day that engineering was working on it. Mostly no one used it in the entire pool for 3 days. On Saturday was told to leave the pool at 4:00 pm for a wedding. All the guests who had paid so much money; twin dolphin rooms close to $600.00 a night, told to leave!!!!!!!  And finally began to realize that on weekends the adult pool has screamingly loud music. A DJ blasting music all day on the weekends.  And he had terrible taste in music.   I get it. Millennials don’t want quiet especially with their young children going on water slides, etc. but anyone over 50 should have a choice to be in a quieter space.  Then

We used our points and did an upgrade to get a waterfront room. Two Queen beds that were large enough for us and our 2 kids. Room was very nice, very comfortable and well appointed. The hotel is super nice, 2 large pools, bars, restaurants and every other amenity you may wish for.  My only issue is that even though it's a waterfront property, it's on the other side of PCH so you have to grab your things and cross the street and position yourself somewhere on the beach. Chairs and umbrellas can be rented for free but they won't set it up on the beach for you like many resorts do, probably because it's somewhat far away. The property is just over 0.5 miles from downtown with lots of options for dining in case you don't want to eat at one of their restaurants. You'll probably save

Needed a getaway for a few days and we went to the Waterfront Hilton.  The staff is awesome.  Front desk Jocelyn (sp?) was awesome and accommodated our request to change rooms with ease.  The Rooftop bar is awesome as their bartenders. We will be back

Service is over the top, everything you need is on property and much more is a walk down the street. Access to the beach is out your front door and where else can you have a fire pit on the beach without having to do anything.  Buy some wood and use the rings provided or just use one of the many that are left by other people. Only in California, we did not want to leave.  Trying to find a time to come back.

This hotel is across the street from an amazing beach and just a short walk to the pier and downtown area.  We rented a 1 bedroom suite in the dolphin tower.  It had two queen beds and a pullout couch in the living room.  Perfect for 2 adults and two teens.  One room is too crowded for us and this was more economical than two rooms.  I do recommend getting a package that includes breakfast.  The buffet was great and there are not a lot of options within a quick walk.  To buy it separately would be expensive.    The hotel is clean and beautifully decorated.  Each night there was a guitar player in the bar.  Outdoor seating with fire pits and the rooftop bar at sunset were wonderful.    Great location, so much to do.  Or relax by the pool (s)

We stayed at the Waterfront Beach Resort Hotel when our home was tented for termites. They were generous to give us a $199 a night special for Huntington Beach residents. We had a beautiful room with the ocean/per view and enjoyed dining at the Waterfront restaurant which became our favorite restaurants since. We love the bar and outside seating. The bread is to dye for and the food is always fresh and delicious. We also take advantage of their Happy Hour. We often walk outside afterwards to listen to the Friday//Saturday night free concerts. We are so fortunate to live nearby. Another terrific experience is their outside rooftop bar in the new section. The views are outstanding. Go for the sunset cocktail hour.
Manager Response: Dear Christina,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. We love our locals! Thank you for staying with us. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Last and Best Stop in California
Summary: The Hilton Beach Front Resort was the perfect ending to our time in CA. We only wish we’d spent more time here. The resort staff and experience was perfect from the moment we arrived with our family of 6. This is definitely a must on anyone’s list for a great beach town on the west coast.
Manager Response: Dear MaryJane,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. What a wonderful review! Thank you for staying with us. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: An incredible experience from check-in to check-out.  The staff at this property is what makes all the difference.  In addition to the excellent bellhop and valet service:  Jocelyn and Austin at the front desk. Hayley, our server at the Boardwalk restaurant for breakfast Savanna the hostess at the Boardwalk restaurant Even a staff member who only had 2 weeks on the job, was happy to help find answers my questions that he couldn't answer.    Kudos to the team at the Waterfront Beach Hotel.  They've truly created a culture where each team member goes above and beyond for their guests.  Thank you again for a great mental break from reality!  I wish it was longer, but we'll definitely be back again soon.
Manager Response: Dear rguiao1,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. We truly appreciate you mentioning so many of our wonderful associates by name. I will be sure to pass on this review to each of them and their managers. Thank you for staying with us. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I have been staying at the hotel for over 25 years, and atone time, for 20 years straight. I have enjoyed many summer vacations here. I love the location, its restaurant foods, pool, fitness centre, and much more.
Manager Response: Dear Inna,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. We are especially grateful for your loyalty to The Waterfront! Thank you for staying with us year after year. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I stayed with my family at this resort from Saturday, July 27th through Monday, July 29th 2019 and I wanted to share my experience. When we checked out on Monday, I forgot my Invisalign retainer on the bathroom sink. We left & about 45 minutes later I realized it and called the hotel. I spoke with Anne from Lost & Found and she personally went up to the room and found my retainer. She called me back and assured me that she had it. I came back around 2pm to get it and she personally came out and gave it to me. She had taken such care of them and even wrapped them in a tissue and put them in a plastic baggie for me. Anne was so thoughtful and helpful. She even walked me out to the curb where my ride was waiting for me and although the hotel is beautiful and great in many other
Manager Response: Dear Jessica,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. I will be sure to pass on your lovely review to Anne and her manager.  Thank you for staying with us. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Being Hilton Grand Vacation owners and Hilton Honor Members, we certainly didn't feel the love.  We had toured this hotel with a reservation manger back in 2018 and decided to book a poolside suite for 10 nights for July 2019.  Traveling with friends we made it clear to the hotel we wanted rooms NEXT TO EACH OTHER.  We followed up with this request at the 6mo., 3mo. and 2 week time frames.  Upon check-in the rooms were nowhere close and the reservation notes did not reflect the request.  I understand it is on an availability basis but thought a bit of extra maneuvering ahead of time could have been done.  Maid service was sporadic, i.e. daily cleaning on some days not until 6p.m.  turn down service only 4x during the 10 night stay. Stale grease from the kitchen in certain areas
Manager Response: Dear Michele M,  Thank you for your feedback of your recent visit to The Waterfront. We are so sorry to hear that we fell so short of your high standards. I have passed on your review to our management staff and we will further use it as training opportunities for our staff. Again, our most sincere apologies. If you would like to further discuss your stay, please call our Director of Operations Ajit Acharya at 714-845-8000. Safe travels to you and your family.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 5 days and had the most amazing time. The staff went above and beyond to accommodate us. We had 2 children ages 3 and 4 and they were so kind to them.  Hotel had beach and pool toys for kids to play with. Anything we needed they were able to accommodate. Highly recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Ambassador,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. Thank you for staying with us. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My experience in this hotel was great, I stayed here for three nights with my family of four. I grabbed this resort simply because my friends were camping out on RVs 1 mile away and this was the best resort that was available and offered in the area.   My kids really enjoyed pool areas, they also have slides for kids and a Jacuzzi where kids could actually enter. They were very considerable and doing all the planning and they do have all in a separate area for adults with the Jacuzzi and a separate area for kids.   My room was with partial Oceanview with two beds, nice balcony not as spacious but considerably good, tv, simple bathtub, safe in a closet, two robes were provided.   This resort is located literally across the street from the ocean, it is in the perfect spot for
Manager Response: Dear Vladikot,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. Thank you for staying with us. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We go to Huntington Beach several times a year. This was our first time staying at the Hilton and will be our last time.  From the minute we checked in, sorry no rooms available (sold out night before US Surf Open) understandably. Getting our bags stored, phone rings, your room is ready. Grateful but between housekeeping and front desk no communication.  Room had a great view but carpet had stains, bathroom felt and looked like motel.  Checking out we called down to get our car brought around, were told by hotel operator they are not pulling cars up, we need to come down and wait in line. Reached elevator, took 15 minutes to get an elevator to fit 2 people and child. Something we have never experienced at any resort especially so called 4 star.  Waited 30 minutes to get our car
Manager Response: Dear AZTravelerceilola,  We are very sorry that you were disappointed in any way with the service or accommodations you received while here at The Waterfront. We never want to see a guest leave our property dissatisfied with any aspect of our level of service and will do all we can to "Make It Right" before it may come to that. I have passed on your feedback to our Executive Committee for review. Please contact Ajit Acharya our Director of Operations at 714-845-8000, so we may further make this right for you. Thank you again for your feedback.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We had an amazing week at the Waterfront Beach Resort on our family vacation. The beds were amazing and the room got nice and cold at night, perfect sleeping conditions after a day of Disney or the beach. The staff were all very kind and professional. The roof top bar is gorgeous, the views are amazing and the food was great, the blankets and fire pits were an added much needed bonus. The room was clean and quiet, even with an ocean front room we never heard the street noise. The walk across the PCH to the beach was easy and convenient. Would have liked it if the hotel had umbrellas and chairs that their guest could use on the beach, but we made due. Had a fantastic trip and would definitely go back!
Manager Response: Dear christiehinton,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. Please note we do have complimentary beach chairs, umbrellas and sand toys available to our guests at our Driftwood Beach Club Towel Cabana. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Thank you for staying with us. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Great stay!  I had a business meeting nearby.  I brought my wife and daughter with me and chose this hotel for its location.  We had a great stay.  The amenities, service, food, and location were all perfect.
Manager Response: Dear rhoganva,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Best place to stay if you have a supercar
Summary: I was visiting from out of town attending a car show with my Lamborghini.  I called ahead and spoke with Trevor the vallet manager.  From the moment I showed up they treated me like royalty.  Not only did I get to keep my car up front and take the key with me, they put up cones and were very courteous.  They kept the car up front all night and allowed me to put my cover on the car as well.  I was able to come and go as I pleased without hassle.  The room was expensive at $740 for the suite but the view was worth it.  The pool area is new with cabanas and excellent service.  The only negative is they close the pool at 10pm and are very serious about it.  They kick you out.  Anyway it’s still an amazing property and I will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Mdubs,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Beach just across the street Inviting lobby.  Friendly, helpful staff.  We had a large, ocean view room with king bed and wet bar.  Notably missing was a microwave. Fast internet.  Reasonable lighting.  No outlets by bedside tables. Balcony is a bit odd with a wall dividing it.  Chairs and table only on one side.  Bed was comfortable and room was relatively quiet considering PCH is right outside. The hotel is kid friendly with a nice pool, water slide and hot tub.  Lifeguard on duty. Plenty of lounge chairs and towels.  Cabana’s and Fire Pits to rent if you’re inclined.  Note there is a mandatory “Resort Fee”.
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. Please note that we do provided complimentary microwaves upon request. Simply notify the front desk and we are more than happy to bring one up to your guest room. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful spot, excellent service, fun neighborhood
Summary: We enjoyed a great 2 night stay at this hotel. The staff from check in to waitstaff at restaurants and pools were exemplary. The cleaning crew did a beautiful job with twice daily service which was discreet and perfect. The only 4str part was the pillows, but we could have called for different pillows so that’s on us.  Fun for family’s or a romantic getaway.   THE WAVES AT HUNTINGTON ARE FIRE  Have fun!
Manager Response: Dear SGG14,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. Please know that at anytime during your stay we are more than happy to accommodate any housekeeping needs such as extra pillows and bathroom amenities. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: The service was great but the cost was very high due to resort fees, valet parking and city taxes. These fees were an additional $100+ for one night. The hotel is nice but not for the price. They need to get more competitive on price. Everything else was really nice.
Manager Response: Dear Craig9822,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful for the feedback. We hope you have a wonderful rest of your summer. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing service from Arrival to Departure
Summary: I went to visit my friends who were staying at the beautiful Hilton Waterfront in Huntington Beach. I have to say that the Valet team really blew me away. I had a big truck and this is normally an issue with Valet but they went above and beyond. I pulled up and the nice man gave me a ticket and passed me along to another valet. They quickly ran around to get my wife's door and used our name right out the gate.(maybe they radio to the team?) We had a wonderful day at the pool with amazing service. You have to try the 45 day dry aged cheeseburger WOW.  When we were leaving I texted for my car and to my surprise when we walked out to go my car was waiting for me with cold water in the cup holder. I have not had that level of service in a long time, very much worth the $. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Colin19880,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We truly value and appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I was charged $200 more than I was quoted booking online when I arrived. No one called me when my room was ready as they said they would. There were no available chairs at the pool except for in a cabana that you had to pay to rent. For $600 I should at less be able to relax at the pool. Room service was very overpriced for what you got. I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kelli M,  Thank you for your feedback. We are so sorry to hear that your time with us was not enjoyable. Our most sincere apologies. If you have any question in regards to your charges, please call us at 714-845-8000 and ask for our Asst Directors of the Front Desk. They will be happy to go over anything with you in detail.  We are happy to report we now have two available full service pools for your enjoyment! It is our recreation teams pleasure to be of service to you. They will help get you find seating and make sure you are comfortable while here on property.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I love the ocean and this resort is in the perfect spot. This resort has many wonderful amenities and the food was very good too. I would suggest if you have the time and money to invest in staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Julia W,  Thank you writing a 5 star review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. We are grateful you choose to stay with us and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We love the Waterfront Beach Resort and have been coming here over the 4’th of July for years. The one bedroom suite in the Twin Dolphin Tower has plenty of room for our family of four and gorgeous views of the ocean from the balcony. We can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear Andrea313131,  Thank you for staying with us for the 4th of July holiday. There really is no better place to be than in Huntington Beach for this festive holiday! It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope you are able to return in the very near future. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We had a lovely stay at this Hilton beachfront resort. Staff were fantastic! The hotel was beautiful. Rooms were clean.  My only constructive comment would be that I wish there were some less expensive food choices at the hotel for the kids. Great location!
Manager Response: Dear jt702019,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your recent stay with us. We are so pleased you enjoyed your time with us. We know there are many place to stay in Orange County and we are so grateful you selected The Waterfront. Safe travels and we hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: It was close to the Beach. I could see  the Ocean from my Balcony Room. Everything is within walking distance. Hotel is a little on the expensive side. You have everything you need. Walk down to Main Street their are a lot of restaurants. Relaxing weekend. Loved it.
Manager Response: Dear LOVE2TRAVEL2LAKES,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay with us. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us and our central location to all Huntington Beach has to offer. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Man
