Summary: Our first visit to this property.  Great local, next to Pacific City Mall, Main St, The Pier and Ocean Front.  Upon arrival pleasantly surprised that a second brand new pool was opening.  Would have been a tight fit with only one pool.  Our room was beautiful, overlooking the new pool, beach and pier.  Two restaurants, Henry's and The Boardwalk plus a Starbucks.  Extremely clean and well maintained.  The staff is Extremely friendly, helped us with beach chairs, umbrella and even a bag of beach toys for my son.  Security was AWESOME over the 4th.  All guests had to wear a wristband to be on property.  Very safe.  My only hiccup was the Assistant Front Desk Manager who checked me in didn't give me a basic overview of the property.  It was my first visit and he even asked me at
Manager Response: Dear lasvegasfamily777,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay over the 4th of July Holiday. We are thrilled you were able to join us for the grand opening of our new Huntington Pool.  I am sorry to hear that your check-in experience was not all it could have been. We have equipped all our key packets with a fold out map of the property outlining all our amenities and outlets. I understand the missed opportunity in our staff highlighting to you places of interest on our property. I will pass on your feedback to our Front Office Director.  Thank you for your helpful feedback and we hope to see you again next 4th of July!!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful pool, great views, and delicious breakfast!
Summary: Decided to turn a quick trip up from San Diego to visit family into a little staycation, and it was well worth it! We spent both days at the pool with our two kids (2 & 7), and they had a blast. The little one was bummed she couldn't join her big brother on the slides, but we were thankful, and she enjoyed swimming in the pool anyway. We dined in the bar area one night, and the selection was great. The breakfast buffet was one of our better experiences in the Hilton family. Pool-side service was excellent. All of the staff that we encountered were friendly and helpful.  Tip 1: Get to the pool early if you want to have a place to sit.  Tip 2: plan ahead for retrieving your car from valet. They can get busy!

Summary Heading: From the moment we pulled up to the moment we left I was extremely disappointed with this resort. I expected much more.
Summary: From the moment we pulled up to the moment we left. Horrible. We had 2 connecting rooms for our family and we had a cabana for 2 of those days the service was terrible. $450 and poor service. Never again.
Manager Response: Dear Curiosity64731834349,  We are so very sorry to hear that your time with us was so disappointing. Please reach out to our Director of Operations Ajit Acharya at 714-845-8000 so that we can Make it Right for you.  Again, our most sincere apologies.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We will be returning next year with more family members. Wonderful property! Friendly staff. Hilton gets 5 stars! First time at this resort and was very pleased with our overall experience. Next year will take advantage of more of the things included in this resort.

Surf City hotel and you feel it inside this ocean view property.  Designed to enjoy the beach and surf culture, the place is decorated with surfboards and other beach insprired decorations.  Rooms are not big, and not every room has an ocean view.  Good hotel, but I would not rate as great.  Not on the ocean, across the busy highway.

We stayed in an ocean front room for two nights.  It was a really nice room and we enjoyed it thoroughly.  You do have to cross the PCH to get to the beach, but there are two stop lights near by.  The "non kid" pool was still under construction, so we chose to not do any pool time since the kid friendly pool was packed!  Room service was awesome!!!  The burger that I ordered in the restaurant bar however was rare rather than medium well.  That's quite a difference!  The bartender was friendly, but obviously (from eavesdropping on his convo with a co-worker) not loving his job.  That was kind of off putting.  I'd recommend this place, but I feel it's a bit overpriced.

A long weekend stay with 3 yr old and 5 week old children was made perfect by way of the venue and its attentive staff. From parking staff, front desk and restaurant people, virtually everyone made our visit memorable. Could not be more pleased.

Your resort sounds amazing.. I was in Huntington beach last summer at the beach and noticed  your resort. So I been saving my pennies to bring my Granddaughters. We will be there in late July.. Can't wait!!! I'm giving a early review for your customer service. I received from your reservation dept at the resort. Kat and Joseph were outstanding in helping me.There personalized service could not have been any better. It's not fair to  rate this resort for the service,I received from the Hilton reservation line. My advise to your guests is to call the your resort for there reservations and speak to Kat or Joseph. Unfortunately the Hilton reservation line could not offer all your specials on my dates even though they were advertised on line. So I believe that Hilton needs to do a
Manager Response: Dear Pawmaw18,  Thank you for the wonderful comments! We are looking forward to your arrival in July. I will pass on your kind words to Joseph & Kat. Save travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We arrived later than expected on our first night. We found a pretty warm room but we had champagne and cake for our birthday/anniversary celebration. We spent the morning around town and then went to the beach. Towels and chairs are included in your resort fee (as are 2 bottles of water) Afterwards we headed to the pool. It was crowded and over run with kids. We would have preferred the Huntington pool (adults only) but it’s still under construction (late June 2019) It’s supposedly almost finished.  The pool was nice, but crowded. The fire pits are nice but the tons of cabanas seem like wasted space.  The room was ample space for 2. The carpet was a little grungy. The bed was low. None of these are deal breakers for ya but could be for others. We unplugged the fridge on night 1
Manager Response: Dear GApeach87,  Thank you kindly for your recent review of your stay at The Waterfront. We are grateful you choose to stay with us for your special occasion! We are excited to be nearing the opening of our refreshed Huntington Pool. We hope you can return for another visit in the near future. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I stayed here with family during a conference at a hotel next door.  The staff is very friendly, the food excellent, and the rooms clean and modern.  The beach is just across the street, and there are places to eat close by.  I would recommend this to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Mobile26920695356,  Thank you for your 5 star review of your recent stay! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We agree that our location can't be beat and our food is spectacular. We hope to see you again in the near future for a well deserved vacation. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: 1) I paid high premium for having "ocean view", which turned out to be what everywhere else would call partial view (1/3 of ocean, the rest was another hotel and residential houses). The view I got is only marginally better than what they would call a partial view.  Front desk and the complaints team refused to help saying it was ocean view according to their definition. I feel really cheated when I compare the views I had in other CA hotels. 2) Staff not very helpful as they responded to my complaint two days later (see above). 3) They did not allow me even 30min extension for the check out, which is never a problem in other hotels.  4) water sink seemed blocked  5) Final bill was higher than my booking.com final price due to some additional taxes, city tax or something.
Manager Response: Dear George,   Thank you for your feed back. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed in your stay with us.  To clear up any confusion with the room types available, we recommend booking with our hotel directly by calling 714-845-8000 and speaking to in house reservations; avoiding third party websites  I believe the view you are looking for is referred to as "Ocean Front." This view type would have a room front facing the ocean. The room you were provided was on a premium high floor with an ocean and coastal view and view of the Huntington Pier; which is the room typed booked.  Our sincere apologizes for any confusion with your stay.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My Girls Scout troop of 10 girls and I stayed at the Hilton last weekend.  Here are my thoughts:  1.  The facilities are gorgeous.  Really, really nice.  Beautiful common areas, nice rooms.    2.  Great location.  3.  While I appreciate that mattresses on pull out beds are notoriously bad, these were really the worst.  And we had four suites so I know it wasn't a one-off.  Our nine year old girls couldn't get comfortable, so I can't even imagine a grown person trying to sleep on one.  Some folks complained and were brought duvets as extra padding.  For the price, more investment should be made in the beds themselves.  3.  Service was so-so.  Everyone was very nice but there really didn't seem to be enough help.    We had dinner at one of the hotel restaurants.  Our group of 22

Summary Heading: Great Hotel in a Great Location
Summary: I chose this hotel as a Hilton Honors member. My conference was originally scheduled to be in Huntington Beach and was moved to Long Beach; I'm sure glad I didn't change my reservation! The hotel staff members were all attentive, kind and courteous as well as a on-the-spot valet service. I have no complaints and it was a delight to stay at this hotel. It's location was also convenient to the beach, pier, shopping and dining...GREAT LOCATION!

Attended a conference at this hotel. The rooms were disjointed and one of the session rooms was outside which was hard for attendees to find. Having spent years attending and hosting conferences, this hotel was much more difficult than others to work with from room set up to response time. The Dolphin room with ocean view was newer and clean. Suite is fairly small, although for 2 of us it was adequate. Bar food at the Dock Bar and the Boardwalk Restaurant were the only options for food, but we found local restaurants a short walk from the hotel. As a Diamond member, I will not be back as I scouted other venues nearby which I will try during my upcoming visits.

This hotel felt like I was at a resort! Friendly staff, great amenities for adults and kids, prime location and great food! The guest rooms were beautiful and the bed was super comfortable! This hotel is a great place to have a meeting in one of their conference rooms or even get married!

I left my complaint with Victoria Mcdowell. The hotel staff moved us the to the wrong Suite Number. Horrible service from the desk managment. Promises that were not kept from the staff at the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Trip45315182427,  Our most sincere apologies for falling so short of your high standards. I am glad to hear of your connection with our Director of Rooms Victoria McDowell. I understand she is working with you in regards to your service issues. We look forward to the opportunity of providing you with exceptional service as our guest during a future stay to make things right. Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This is a great location but the hotel is very, very overpriced. Parking is $40 a night. There is no breakfast, even Best Western gives you breakfast. Checking in and parking is an absolute nightmare. One of the pools is closed so the other pool looks like people soup. GROSS If you have the pleasure of staying in the tower that overlooks the closed pool be prepared for noise and a lot of it all day long. Grinding, cutting, yelling, it is so relaxing. I have lived in So, Cal. my entire life. If you want a beach vacation go somewhere else. This is not the best there is to offer. Think Hermosa Beach, Ventura, or La Jolla.
Manager Response: Dear LosAngelesALI,  We are so sorry to hear you did not enjoy your stay with us. Our most sincere apologies that we fell so short of your expectations. I have forwarded on your review to our Valet and Front Desk Managers.  Please note that when booking a hotel that includes complimentary breakfast you are looking for a limited service property. We are considered a full service property. We are thrilled to report that we are in our final stages of our expansion project that has been under way for three years and our new second pool will be opening in the very near future. The Waterfront Beach Resort is a family friendly resort with our peak season being from Memorial Day to Labor Day weekend. Thank you for your feed back and safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Stayed as a couple at the Huntington tower with partial ocean view for one night, the room was nice, I heard about the Dolphin tower being more modern and updated but the upgrade fee was not worth it for just a single night stay.  We had breakfast at the buffet, the food was good, I wish they had more choices of cheese and olives though:), but overall, it was good.  I would go back !

I cannot wait to return! We had a great time at the pool and loved our steaks from the boardwalk restaurant.  All staff was professional and welcoming. Thank you Sean at the front desk for making a wonderful first impression!

My husband and I stayed at The Waterfront Beach Resort for a long weekend in early June 2019. The entire property is amazing with large pool, beach across the street, nice dining options including a coffee shop/market and roof top bar, as well as shopping and restaurants just down the street! The room was modern with a cozy seating area and spacious bathroom that had a walk-in shower. All hotel staff were friendly and professional including the front desk, valet, house cleaning, room service and in restaurants. We live in Los Angeles and would most definitely stay there again for a weekend. We would  recommend this hotel to our family and friends visiting us if they wanted to stay in Huntington Beach for a few days!

Review of our stay. Overall it was a very nice view and clean hotel. We booked months in advance for this. We did have an issue in the beginning. We didn’t get the room we thought we reserved. I wish the hotel would have compensated something for the issue but they didn’t.

Stayed recently for a dual couples retreat for two nights.  We all had a blast!  Accommodations as usual were amazing, the staff as always friendly and amazing.  Look forward to coming back soon and know that the other couple we introduced the resort to will be coming back as well.  Note:  also family friendly but not family oppressive!

Easy access to the beach, complimentary towels and beach chairs to take to the beach. Close to the pier, and downtown. All within walking distance. Great pool area with a sand area for the kids. All the staff is awesome!

I was shocked by the size of the room. I was not given the room requested during booking. When trying to have this corrected, I was told no other rooms available other then the Presidential Suite at $2500 per night. Very disappointed. The room reminded me of a stay at a Hilton Garden Inn (standard room).
Manager Response: Dear Voyage38077811092,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are sorry to hear you were less than satisfied with your room and stay. I looked in to your reservation with our Assistant Front Office Director Austin Youngerman. Please note you were provided with the room type you booked. The details of our guest rooms, including the square footage, is listed on our booking website when you click on the "Quick Look" photo associate with the room type. Requested upgrades were not available due to a sell out. The one guest room that was available property wide as an upgrade, The Presidential Suite, would have been at an additional fee, which was quoted to you. The Presidential Suite is a five tier level upgrade above what was booked. Hilton standard upgrades are provided on a space available, one tier upgrade system. Upgrades are very limited at our property during our peak season. We recommend booking the room type you would like to receive. We are sorry to hear you were frustrated in the room type booked. That is not our intent. Please understand that in a sell out situation, there are simply limited offerings. We hope this information is useful for future stays.   Austin has reached to you via the phone number provided. He is awaiting your call to further discuss your stay at your convenience.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel right on the beach
Summary: Beautiful hotel they are currently working on remodeling.  You just have to cross the PCH and you are right on the beach.  Very friendly and accommodating staff. Ate in the hotel several times and never had anything bad. Rooms were very nice and well laid out.  Lots of places within walking distance as well.

One night stay. Have been before. Great location. Always consistant with the service and quality. Will be back again for sure on our annual trip to CA. Very very close to great restaurants and the Pier.

This is an awesome hotel. Excellent stafff, very clean, excellent location and very relaxing and fun. Pools are great. Area restaurants to waalk to are very good. Fun for the entire family. Buffet was great in the morning.

Summary Heading: Nice and new rooms at Dolphin Tower
Summary: Stayed for a long weekend. Great family friendly resort.  Pros  -Fairly new (about a year old) rooms in the dolphin tower with nice large bathrooms. No bath but did have double sink. -Rooms were large double queen bed with separate living area and balcony -Pool area also has water slide for older kids (there is a height restriction) and sandy area for kids to play out of the water. -On Saturday they had a DJ and spray paint tattoo artist which i thought was a nice addition for kids - Shuttle to take guests to main st every hour. We walked since it’s not too far. - Kids under 5 are free for the buffet breakfast  Cons - Our partial ocean view room was basically a no ocean view room as we had a huge palm tree in front of our balcony blocking any view we would have had of the ocean.

Summary Heading: Best Hilton Hotel on the West Coast
Summary: The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel is a perfect match for Huntington Beach. It has that top tier feel but has the ambiance of the laid-back surf culture. Best views of the ocean, surf, pier, beach, etc. people,

We have observed the gradual remodeling and overhaul of this property over the past few years. In our most recent visit, they had opened up the new fine dining restaurant, construction was still underway on the 2nd pool by the coffee shop.  Rooms: The Twin Dolphin tower is the newer tower. The rooms have a beachhouse styling. The feel is light, casual with bright bright colors in both the rooms and the ground level that just somehow make a person feel good. We had a 1 BR suite that had a large, L-shaped sectional. Bathroom was large with a separated toilet. Lots of closet and desk space. When we first started staying here years ago, they only had the Huntington tower which was nice in and of itself, but the new tower really takes things to a new level. Every room here offers

Our family had an excellent experience at the Waterfront Beach Resort. The hotel is right across the PCH from the Huntington Beach sand and walkable to restaurants and shopping. Our family of 5 stayed in a well appointed one bedroom suite and had plenty of room. Excellent pool and will be even better when the renovation of the 2nd pool is completed.  Definitely would return if vacation plan took us back to Southern California beaches!

Summary Heading: Add a great resort experience to your next beach vacation!
Summary: This hotel has a good variety of room types - ocean views are fabulous.  Besides an excellent buffet breakfast, the new restaurant is open with an open air bar overlooking the water.  The spa provides excellent service, although it is small and you have to walk through the lobby to get there.  The best part is the concierge service with bike rentals, cabana/beach chair set ups, and fire pit packages.  We always return to this hotel whenever we're in California!

Visited for 3 nights and stayed in the twin dolphin tower. It was amazing, modern and clean. The hotel has a turndown service which was a great surprise coming back to the sweet dream chocolate on your pillow. Would recommend to anyone.

We had a great visit and enjoyed a lovely stay at 1bd suite in the Twin Dolphin Tower. The only slight disappoinment was the quality of the food served during breakfast buffet at the Boardwalk restaurant. I get that many guests receive complimentary buffet due to being diamond members, as did we, but both my husband and I were given undercooked and runny omelettes from the omelette station. The selection of various breakfast buffet offerings did not compare favorably to the hyatt regency next door, for example. But in all fairness, all non-breakfast meals we ordered at the Boardwalk restarant were excellent. Would love to see a higher quality selection of options at the breakfast buffet in the future!
Manager Response: Dear 374olgag,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to hear that over all you had an enjoyable time with us. Thank you for your feedback in regards to your experience at Boardwalk Restaurant. Our sincere apologies that we fell short of your high standards. I have passed along your review to our F&B Managers. We use these opportunities to better train our staff. Thank you again and safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Great Location and many amenities for the family or anyone.  Great view of Beach, Large Pool with beach entry for those who have a problem with steps., with Hot Tub and the area even has a sand lot for the kids to play.
Manager Response: Dear Wander65493795696,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort. We are thrilled you enjoyed our amenities and it was fun for the whole family. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Refreshing stay after a long hard drive
Summary: We stopped after a long segment in a drive from San Diego to San Francisco, tired and with frayed nerves from the traffic. We had no reservations. We were received courteously and helpfully by desk staff and valets.  Although we stayed only one night, we were given a lovely oceanside corner room at a reasonable price. The hotel is a short distance from a mall and the Huntington Beach pier.
Manager Response: Dear Visitor_from_Athens,  Thank you for taking the time to write a five star review of your recent stay! We are happy to have been a part of your California road trip. We hope the memories last a lifetime. Safe travels and we hope you will return again in the future to The Waterfront.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: While I didn't stay at this hotel, I visited the hotel for the day for the AvidXChange conference REX, and the hotel staff was very friendly. The valet staff was exceptionally kind, and I look forward to hosting future events at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Redfox327,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write such a lovely review. We were honored to have your conference on property and hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Wonderful place to stay. Great location and the staff went over and above. They were remodeling, but you never knew it. I believe it to be one of the nicest places I have ever stayed. Everyone was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear OnAir12984092361,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful five star review of your stay at The Waterfront. We know you have many options when selecting a hotel in Orange County. We are thankful you choose to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I live in the Midwest and had the opportunity to visit Huntington Beach so I decided to stay at this property! And WOW, let me tell you, I am so glad I did! Not only is this a beautiful property, but the staff there is impeccable. I was checked in by Brian whose customer service was phenomenal and he told me everything I needed to know that would benefit me during my stay. At breakfast I was greeted by Zoey and served by Miles. The cook ( I unfortunately forgot her name) made an amazing omelet.They were all extremely nice and caring, and ultimately made my day wonderful.This is a great hotel with great staff. I will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear chunt001,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful five star review of your stay at The Waterfront. It is very kind of you to mention Brian, Zoey and Miles by name. We know you have many options when selecting a hotel in Orange County. We are thankful you choose to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My wife and I went here for Brunch on Mother's Day. Very well done, professionally run and service was excellent. Huge variety of food. Even had a singer/guitarist for entertainment and the sound level was perfect not so loud you could not talk and yet still enjoy the music.  Well Done!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for our Mother's Day brunch! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed the day and all the amenities. We also have a champagne Sunday Brunch offered in our Boardwalk Restaurant that also features live music and a strolling complimentary magician! Have a great weekend.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This hotel, specifically the Twin Tower, was beautiful and I truly enjoyed it. I returned to my room today between business sessions hoping to take a nap but noticed a stain on the bedding. I immediately called the front desk and they sent up Annie. She was nothing short of amazing and extremely apologetic. Not only did she change the sheets but she walked around the room to make sure nothing else required attention. Her customer service was truly impeccable. As an added bonus I ran out of paper to take notes and she left, went and found me some and brought it back. Annie deserves a bonus!!!
Manager Response: Dear Deegreen80,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. We are so happy that you enjoyed your time in our Twin Dolphin Tower. Our apologies that your room was not spotless for your arrival. Thank you for graciously mentioning the wonderful service you received from Annie. I will be sure to pass on your review to her and her managers. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Impeccable! From staff to service to rooms and valet, everything exceeded all expectations. The Boardwalk restaurant on site needs to be experienced. The best food, service, and staff hands down. Beautiful ocean views. The staff is genuinely friendly and quickly responds to any needs. You must experience this place at least once in your lifetime.
Manager Response: Dear Trip63725886526,  Thank you for such a wonderful 5 star review! We are thrilled that everything exceeded your expectations. We know you have many options when booking a stay in Orange County, we are humbled that out of all the properties, you choose to stay with us. Thank you from the entire Waterfront Team. We hope to see you again in the very near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We attended a charity function at the Hilton.  The hotel is in a great location and we were afforded a great from value with a balcony that overlooked the 82 degree heated swimming pool and the ocean.  This hotel was a great value with impeccable service.
Manager Response: Dear John P,  Thank you for writing a 5 star review of your recent visit to The Waterfront. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities and spectacular central location. We hope you will visit again in the near future, may be for cocktails at our rooftop bar Offshore 9, which is open to the public. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This is a beautiful resort and very friendly staff. The rooms are good bed was comfortable.    The location is right across for the ocean and my room has a nice view from the balcony.  Their are shops and good  restaurants in walking distance of the hotel.   The hotel bar and restaurants  were excellent. I would recommend this resort to anyone and look forward to returning for an extended stay.

This hotel is in a beautiful location. Beautiful hotel. Staff so welcoming. Has awesome amenities. Very prompt and so flexible. Made my transition from one room to another so seamless. I even received a courtesy call stating the room was ready.

Definitely a 10/10! Wonderful staff, cozy updated room, beautiful and relaxing amenities! The staff alone made this trip wonderful through their quality customer service! I definitely recommend staying at this resort when you come to visit Huntington Beach!

There are two towers, the Dolphin tower is the newest, which is where we chose to stay. We had a suite w separate living room and a balcony. Was supposed to get ocean view but that was not available when we checked in! We got partial view from the balcony due to palms blocking the view on the 4 th floor. The service was great and they have coffee, decaf & tea available in the room as well as a fridge. There’s a $30.00 a day resort fee & parking is $38.00 a day. The adult pool is under construction and there is another restaurant coming soon. There’s a rooftop bar that has breathtaking views in the Dolphin tower.

This was my first stay and I can’t wait to take my family back. I went there with another adult for a quick girls getaway. The location is fantastic, the view is beautiful but this is definitely more geared towards families with young children. If you’re looking for an adult getaway or girls weekend, you might not like the children running everywhere.  We had a room with a partial ocean view. I suppose a full oceanview is just nothing but ocean but our view was great especially considering the extra money for the full ocean view.  Food was good. We went to the rooftop bar to have a drink but it was super windy and chilly. I can imagine it’s a spectacular experience on a nice day.  One bit of advice: room service takes a while or at least it did the night we were there probably

Great location right on the beach.  Amazing staff!  Room quality is a solid 5.  You won’t be disappointed with your stay here.  Take advantage of the pool area and beach access.  The food was flavorful and well prepared.  Close to town so walk down and see the original Surf City.

Family & I had lunch here on Sunday 4/27/19.  It was the worst experience for a AAA 4-Diamond Waterfront Beach Resort's Offshore 9 rooftop lounge@the Waterfront Hotel.  Purchased a Travelzoo voucher to have lunch at this restaurant. Wow. Its a voucher for $56, & the waiter INSIST that I have to follow exactly what the voucher offers, not allowing me to change or use the voucher on the type of food that I have to purchase (EXTREMELY UN-FLEXIBLE). Also, everyone interested in purchasing this voucher--take caution - there is a 18% extra charge at the end of your bill because it's  for the hotel charge!! never heard of this.  I have purchase numerous lunch/dinner vouchers thru Travelzoo, and have not ever had this issue.  I had to spend an extra $14.02 for terrible service and food
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne W,  We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your visit to Offshore 9. I must say we are a bit confused at your feedback as all of the stipulations of the voucher from TravelZoo are clearly stated as so on the website from the page which the voucher was purchased from.  The food items offered as stated are: One "Off Shore Bite" to share, up to $18 It also states: Tax, if applicable, and gratuity are not included; an automatic 18% service charge, based on full value, will be added to the final bill (paid directly to the merchant; this is standard for all guests).  I spoke with the server that took care of you and your family on your visit. She believed you had left satisfied with your visit and was not aware of any issues. If at any time you are unhappy with your service, please alert a manager while still on property as it is our pleasure to Make it Right for you to assure you enjoy yourselves while you are with us.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: You really cannot ask for a better location to stay in So Cal. The hotel is located right across the street from the Pacific Ocean. Every night you get an incredible sunset with the Huntington Beach pier in the foreground. The shops and dinning are just a short walk away. It really has an AWESOME LOCATION!

This was our 2nd time at this property in a year and have been pleased on both occassions. Room sizes are good size and very clean. The location is outstanding, next to the beach and amazing restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Maps26439452464,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. We are grateful you choose to stay at The Waterfront. We hope to see you again in the near future! Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: For the amount you pay, you'd expect everything to be perfect but it wasn't. That said, beautiful rooms. Lots of amenities available for a price. Large hotel, so those with mobility issues be aware it's a long walk to the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Lauren B,  Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear you were disappointed with your stay. We will pass on your comments to our staff and managers to use as a training opportunity. Thank you for staying with us. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: The hotel fell far below expectations. Beside the location and maybe the pool there is nothing that special about this hotel. The front desk staff is unhelpful and not willing to solve problems. I would save money and stay elsewhere unless you really need to stay at the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Jim Y,  We are very sorry that you were disappointed in any way with the service or accommodations you received while here at The Waterfront. We never want to see a guest leave our property dissatisfied with any aspect of our level of service and will do all we can to "Make It Right" before it may come to that. Unfortunately the solutions we offered did not meet that goal and we apologize. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: First off let me say that my wife and I have lived in Huntington Beach since 1965. So we go WAY back with history for the area. We stayed at The Waterfront Hilton for our 25th. Anniversary and we just celebrated our 51st. I know this spot s for hotel reviews but could not find a spot for The Boardwalk. With all that being said we enjoyed a wonderful Sunday Brunch at The Boardwalk Restaurant. We had a 11:30a.m. reservation and were seated promptly on the outside patio and could hear the Steel Drum Music. Our server was a young lady name Haley I believe. She was very friendly and had a very nice smile whenever she came to our table. All of the servers seemed very nice.   The food served was fantastic. From the King Crab Legs to all of the deserts. Most excellent. We highly suggest

Summary Heading: Waterfront Paradise Top of the line! Spared no expense!
Summary: So close to the ocean and Huntington pier and good surf beaches.  We loved being able to have a great view of the ocean from our hotel room at the Waterfront Beach Resort, go down to the pool and hot tub to relax, then walk over and enjoy the ocean and catch waves.  There are other great stores and sites to see close by as well that the family can enjoy as well.  Staff very attentive and excellent service.  I have been here 3 times and will keep coming.

Summary Heading: Spectacular Space and Staff for Events
Summary: I hosted a Celebration of Life for my recently deceased spouse at the Waterfront Beach Resort.  The Catering Team did a magnificent job, from start to finish.  They were able to schedule an event within 10 days of my first contacting them. They were caring, empathetic, and incredibly competent.  The event was in an indoor/outdoor space overlooking the beach. The food and beverages were great.  The staff went out of their way to help us with our needs. I would highly recommend it!

Stayed at this for a conference. We were in the new Dolphin tower. The room was beautiful and so was the view. Hotel is across the street from the beach so it’s a few minute walk to get there. Lots of nice restaurants nearby. The hotel restaurant choice was limited as their high end dining option is currently being renovated.  However everything we had at Boardwalk restaurant was good. Just a limited menu.  The pool area looked good with a water slid and ample seating.  From a conference standpoint this is a good place for a small event. Ours was a little strained and needed bigger space. The conference food was very good.  I would definitely consider staying here again for business or leisure when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear wcmarkwalls,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. I am so pleased you enjoyed your time with us. We are grateful for your five star review. We hope you can come back soon for a vacation! Have a great day and safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: We love this hotel - just be aware of construction.
Summary: We have stayed here before, and the hotel is great. The hotel staff  is spectacular. Great food. Excellent rooms with great views. We will most definitely stay here again. However, if you are considering it, just be aware of the construction going on near the Huntington tower. Our only "complaint" about the entire 2 days we stayed was our short time in the spa. I paid for just a day pass to use the facilities (steam room, sauna, hot tub, relaxation room.) It was probably my shortest stay ever in a hotel spa. All I could hear in the sauna, and the steam room was non stop jackhammers. It was the exact opposite of relaxing. I don't think the spa is extremely close to the construction, but the sound was definitely coming in somehow. My wife went in a little after for a facial and
Manager Response: Dear BCreview,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We are so happy to hear that overall you had a wonderful stay. Thank you for choosing us. Please know were are so sorry to hear about your experience at Drift Spa. We look forward to the completion of our expansion project with in the next few months. No one is more excited to see it completed that us! Please call our Spa Manager Sarah directly at 714-845-8465 at your earliest convenience so that we may have the opportunity to Make it Right for you. Again, our most sincere apologies and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I recently stayed here for my 28th birthday on a girls trip with my mom, sister, and sister in law. We are from Seattle and wanted to escape the spring weather in WA and trade it in for sunshine and palm trees. Wow! This hotel did not disappoint. The hotel is absolutely beautiful. We had a room overlooking the pool and the ocean. The room was well appointed and didn’t feel too small for 4 people. We really enjoyed our stay. The location is perfect for walking to shops and restaurants. The hotel is beautiful with an upscale beachy vibe. I cannot wait to come back in the future! Thanks to Kat in reservations for setting up a nice birthday amenity that was placed in my room prior to arrival!!  Offshore 9 is fabulous, it was where I decided to have my birthday drinks and I loved it.
Manager Response: Dear alleahp2017,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your fabulous 28th birthday trip! We are honored you choose to stay with us. It sounds like you and your family enjoyed all of our new amenities. I am so sorry to hear about your experience at Riptide. I will pass on your review to our Food & Beverage Director. We will address this issue immediately. Thank you for your feedback.  We hope you are able to come for another visit sometime again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We had a great stay at the waterfront Hilton. Staff was friendly and the amenities were great. We had a junior suite and met all of our needs. Luis was a huge help and he made our stay special. You won’t be disappointed
Manager Response: Dear donannette,  Thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront! We are so grateful for your 5 star review. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Wonderful experience for the whole family, including our bulldogs. The kids really enjoyed the breakfast choices and the milkshakes from the coffee shop. Our room was nicely prepared for our arrival and kept very clean during our stay. The kids and the dogs enjoyed the hotel and the beach.

My vehicle was broken into because valet parking did not lock my vehicle. The hotel Manager, Mr. Ajit did nothing to resolve the issue. He did not compensate us anything even though a few thousand dollars were taken from our vehicle. Huntington police were called and reviewed the video. They saw two individuals going through our vehicle.
Manager Response: Dear OnAir320128,  We are so very sorry that you had such an upsetting stay with us. We are equally as upset that you and you property were violated during your stay. Our sincere apologies to you and your family.   I understand that Ajit Acharya, our Director of Operations, has been in contact with you. During your stay you did receive one complimentary night stay and full breakfast for your troubles. Ajit then communicated that once everything is settled with your insurance claim, he will be in touch with you to arrange for Making things Right. Please feel free to contact Ajit at 714-845-8000 if there is any need for clarification at this time.   Again, our sincere apologies for your experience.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Personally, extremely happy- glad I didn’t stay in Long beach
Summary: The hotel is located right next to the beach. Lots of shopping and eating places around. I lucked out, as I intended to stay in long beach- but could not get any rooms due to the Indy car race. Great experience for my family. It is ideal for a family vacation

Summary Heading: Nice oceanfront view from our room
Summary: The room had a great oceanfront view and nice size balcony.  Overall the experience was a pretty good one. Second year in a row they held our convention here so we did have a lot of fun.  It will be nice when all the construction is FINALLY done here - 2 years in a row one pool closed, only one restaurant on site etc.
Manager Response: Dear Rhonda B,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are looking forward to having all of our expansion projects finished with in the next few months. Henry's Fine Dining Restaurant will be opening soon, joining our other food and beverage options; Boardwalk Restaurant, Dock Bar, Surf Hero Market and Coffee Shop, Offshore 9 Rooftop Lounge, Riptide Bar and In Room Dining. We hope you can return for a visit soon!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: No reference during booking to the fact that the hotel grounds and the entire resort are under construction for several years.  Still charged a "Resort Fee" for a resort that does not really exist. nice location though.
Manager Response: Dear Odyssey,  Thank you taking the time to leave a review. We are sorry to hear that you were not made aware of our ongoing construction. It is notated on a banner at the top of our Hilton booking page as well as verbalized when booking the Huntington Tower.   The construction is contained to the north side of the Huntington Tower and property; not affecting the south side of the Huntington Tower and Twin Dolphin Tower or the ability to have access to amenities and the overall enjoyment of the property.   We hope you were able to mention your disappointment while on property as we do everything we can to Make it Right for you to enjoy your time with us. Thank you for your feedback.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: True resort feel with exceptional staff
Summary: Business trip that felt like vacation. Visited for a business conference at the end of the week. Staff was pleasant, accommodating, and more importantly, made us feel comfortable and special.  April 2019

Summary Heading: Fabulous remodel, can't wait to go back
Summary: The (as of April 2019 almost-done) hotel renovation is extremely nice, with really great beachy/relaxing interior design and lovely public spaces. We stayed one night in the Presidential Suite of the Twin Dolphin Tower for a milestone birthday and the room was AMAZING and brand new. I would totally recommend it for a bride, special occasion or treat-yourself-weekend. Really any room with an ocean view in the Dolphin Tower would be fabulous. The view from this hotel is unbelievable, and leaving the doors open at night with the ocean breeze and sounds of beach bonfires filtering in is so relaxing and fun.   On this one-night trip, we didn’t leave the hotel at all – they have everything you’d need, and excellent customer service throughout. Some of the features we used were  - Had

Summary Heading: Nice view but outdated room and poor customer service
Summary: We checked in around 10 p.m. and tired from a 5 hour drive. I didn't receive a welcoming vibe/experience from the front desk person. I didn't even heard the word "welcome" which is very disappointing as I am expecting to experience a good hospitality or customer service from this property. The rooms are just okay, I can say outdated. However the view, and the pool are very nice and I like that it is just across the beach.

Great location and wonderful view of the beach and ocean.  Beautiful rooms and decor.  Amazing pool for kids.  Only negatives...Pull out bed was very uncomfortable and forced to use and pay for valet parking as there was no self-park available.

I wanted to give this place a second chance. Well it didn’t pan out. I love the decor of the hotel, but the layout is funky.  Beds were comfortable, but walls are thin and was woken up by the room adjacent to us by them talking all night. In the morning I went to make a cup of coffee and we had a visitor. A COCKROACH(see picture). I called the front to tell them, and they gave us free breakfast. Oh geez thanks, because we had dinner at The Boardwalk restaurant night before and service was slow, food was not great. Seems as tho every table had a issue and manager was apologizing. Table next to us waited 1hr for food. I had no expectations for breakfast. Ugh. I’d say for $505 a night I would keep your money and look else where. They didn’t care the first time we stayed, they
Manager Response: Dear dawnsully77,  Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that your stay fell below your high expectations. Our sincere apologies.  It is my understanding that the front desk agent that assisted you offered to move you to a different room and send up our Director of Housekeeping to your room to inspect and assist; both of which you declined. Complimentary breakfast was then offered and accepted, as you notated in your review. I am sorry to hear that you had a disappointing experience at Boardwalk Restaurant. I have briefed our Food and Beverage management team of your review and they are addressing their staff. Thank you for your feedback.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Most uncomfortable hotel I’ve ever stayed at
Summary: This hotel was way over priced and gave charges for any little extra thing, the manager was for no good or use and didn’t take care of any of my concerns let alone speak English, Arabic sandman, the security was very rude and it’s dedinitely not worth the price meanwhile no breakfast and undergoing construction. Oh yeah and 38$ just to park each night and 30$ resort fees as well have fun it ain’t meant out to be what you really make it think, it’s a joke.

I purchased a Travelzoo mani/pedi package at the Drift Spa for Valentine's Day and my received a very poor quality manicure. The polish chipped off of her fingernails the next day! My wife has had many manicures and this has never happened in such a short period of time. Her cuticles also don't look as good as they have in the past from other manicures. Regardless of what you pay, what the customer walks out with is a reflection of the quality of work done in the spa. Based on my wife's experience, they do poor quality work at Drift Spa at the Waterfront Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear pjenison,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of of your recent visit to Drift Spa. We are so sorry to hear about your wife's gel manicure. Our sincerest apologies for the disappointment and inconvenience the entire situation caused. Please know we have since procured additional gel top coat products to ensure a more long lasting manicure. Thank you for your honest feedback as we use it to better enhance the over all spa experience. Please reach out to our Spa Manager, Sarah, at 714-845-8000, so that we can make this right for you. Thank you.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This resort was an excellent family vacation spot.  The decor was very updated, the hotel was clean and the staff were so friendly and accommodating.  Our room was on the 7th floor of the twin dolphin towers with an ocean view.  It was roomy, clean and very well accommodated.  We loved our stay and would return in a blink.
Manager Response: Dear karenride0ut,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We are so pleased to hear you had a wonderful time! We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: My first impression wasn't a good one...The check in person (Christopher) was not very pleasant. May be it was the end of his shift, may be he had a bad day, I don't know. Well he did his job, gave us the keys but did not explain well at all how to get to the room.So we were kind of walking around for a while on the floor we were supposed to be but could not find our room ! It was very frustrating especially after a long trip and I had my dog with me who is an older one and has a tough time walking around. Finally somebody told us that we were in the wrong tower, we had to go back to level one , walk for a while than take a second elevator.  Finally we in our room, a one bedroom suite , it was so beautiful and clean. Little on the small side , but still very charming. We all

This hotel was beautiful and right across from the ocean. Are room was big. They were very accommodating in helping us take advantage of the ocean across the street. We could easily walk to many hot spots in Huntington Beach!

I was definitely happy with our experience at this hotel.  We had just come from the Great Wolf Lodge, and the customer service here was TOP NOTCH.  All the staff were very helpful and friendly.  The grounds were clean.   I LOVED that they gave out complimentary beach rentals, which made the stay even better.  It was wonderful to grab towels, beach toys, umbrellas and chairs and head down to the beach.      The pool was clean.  The water slide hours could have been longer.  The only day we used it the guy running it left for 10-15 minutes and they closed it.  Not a huge issue though.   I think once they have the second pool up and running it will be even more amazing.    We will definitely be back! We loved our stay.  Beds were comfortable and we slept great.  Rooms had been

Overall I was very impressed with my stay here. The service was better than expected and we loved how welcoming the staff is. We had excellent valet parking service who were always very caring about our vehicle. They also have an excellent shuttle service that brought us downtown. Anthony Noto was our driver and I was very impressed with how friendly he was. He was one of the few staff members we had multiple conversations with during our rides and he was a great representative of the hotel. I will definitely be back to stay again.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort with Ocean View and Great Swimming Pool
Summary: We loved our visit here in the middle of March. Nights are till a bit cool, but the days are beautiful and warm! We ABSOLUTELY loved the heated swimming pool, one of the best in the area, and The Boardwalk Three Meal Restaurant. The food was amazing out there! We actually went there every morning and night :) so good it was. And prices are surprisingly nice.  We had a room with partial ocean view in Huntington tower. Clean nice room with a balcony, comfortable bad, coffeemaker and refrigerator in the room, what else could we ask for! Very very friendly Staff.  5 minute walk and we were at the beach looking at sunset over Huntington Pier, magestic view! We totally enjoyed our stay here and mist likely will be coming back!

This hotel is perfect for families! They provide everything that you need to go to the beach across the street.  The pool is wonderful! The kids loved the slides and the pool toys.  The resort is beautiful and I would love to stay again.

9th floor room with a view of the pier and Pacific ocean. Room is large and comfy, good amenities, cozy balcony, large bath. Food offerings at multiple cafes in the hotel complex. I can't address cost vs value as this was a gift for my honey's birthday. A little "high end" for our pallets but very nice and enjoyable stay. I would recommend this if you have ample disposable income.

Fantastic property, great place to stay.  Pool area, bar area and rooftop lounge are fun hangout spots.  Comfortable beds.  Restaurant food is very good, especially the breakfast buffet.  Conveniently located to Main St in Huntington Beach and Pacific City shopping and restaurant area.  I love this hotel.

Great Hotel will be even better once the second pool construction is complete rooms are great service great and in a great spot plenty of things to do in and around the hotel been there around 6 times now will be back.

Great location, dining, pool, beach and local shopping.  Hotel staff is courteous and accommodating.  Huntington Beach is a great family vacation destination and The Waterfront Beach Resort is a great place to stay.  $$$

I usually expect the star rating of any beach property to be inflated, just because of the beach. To my surprise, this was a beautiful property that would deserve its rating even if it were not on the beach.  The front desk staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. The room was clean, comfortable, and lovely. The location was great, with  huge beach across the street and the mall and town just a few blocks away.  When I return to the area this is where I will stay.

Summary Heading: Great family trio for a long weekend!
Summary: We stayed in a 1 bedroom suite in the dolphin tower. As other reviewers mentioned this was perfect for a family of 4.  In the dolphin tower we had no impact from the construction.   It was nice that the pool was heated as we had colder weather on 2 of the 3 days we were there. Kids -8 & 11 - both loved the water slide.   As a good member, we had access to 2 breakfast buffets which was excellent.   It’s an easy walk to the beach. We didn’t realize until the day we left that the bike shop across the street is affiliated with the hotel although bike rental is still an added fee.   Overall great trip - very family friendly and even our pup had fun!
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces802672,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit. We are so happy every member in your family, including the furry ones, enjoyed their stay! We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe Travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Could've been great if my room didn't STINK
Summary: I was attending the HOAG Oncology conference for the first time. Since it was held at the hotel, I decided to stay there also. My room was on the third floor in the Huntington Tower with our balcony right over the construction site at the hotel. Not only was there noise all day starting in the morning but the tar smell was strong. My husband came with me so while I was in class, he could not enjoy the ocean view or beautiful weather from our balcony as there was tar smell and construction noise just below our room. I am a Hilton rewards member and was told when I made the reservation I would get a nice room. The room would've been great if it weren't for all the smelly, noisy construction.  Rooms like this should not be used or at least disclose it to the guest and give a severe
Manager Response: Dear PamelaS3700,   Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent experience here at The Waterfront. There are just no words that adequately express our sincere apologies for your entire encounter. As our expansion reaches completion, we have had to endure the work and disruptions to our delivery service and hotel amenities and we share in your frustration. We are so very sorry this was your experience.  Please contact our Director of Operations, Ajit Acharya at 714.845.8000. We look forward to the opportunity of making this right for you. Thank you for your time.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We stayed here about a year ago, right after the dolphin tower was opened. It was a perfect stay and we were wowed by pretty much everything and everyone despite some on—going construction. We loved it so much we came back for Spring break. Same floor, same type of ocean view suite. It was much more crowded this time and there seemed to be extra charges in comparison to last time.  The concierge, Tammy, did go the extra mile to help us plan some activities, which we appreciated. You can’t beat the location with the beach across the street and great food and shopping 1-3 blocks away. We’ve stayed at both this Hilton and the Hyatt next door, they both have pros and cons, but the Hilton definitely feels “fresher” and slightly friendlier in my opinion.
Manager Response: Dear rockymtnboilerbabe,  Thank kindly for taking the time to write a review of your stay. Thank you for mentioning Tammy by name. She is one of our superstars and we are better for having her on our team.  To have loyal, return visitors is the most sincerest form of flattery. We are truly grateful to have you entrust us with your valuable vacation time. We hope to see you and your family again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: This hotel was nothing short of lovely.  The rooms were spacious, beautifully decorated, and clean.  While I was there for business, it would be a destination that I would bring my family to.  You can literally see the beach across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Elksmommy,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us! We are so grateful for the wonderful 5 star review! We hope you can return soon with your whole family in tow. Please call us directly at 714.845.8000 and ask for in-house reservations to book your next stay. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Stayed here for just 1 night, super close to the bars and restaurants. You do have to pay for parking but thats fine. I loved the view from my room, hotel was beautiful and literally across the street from the beach! I don't even live far from HB but i wanted to splurge for a day at least. I forgot to pack my swimsuit i wanted to go in the pool so badly! Will def be back, i have to go in the pool next time!
Manager Response: Dear  chavelly c,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. So happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Next visit be sure to have one of our amazing treatments in our new Drift Spa! We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing The Waterfront. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: You won't be disappointed staying here. The hotel is gorgeous, the rooms are very clean, the level of service is incredibly professional, and they are walking distance from everything.   For those traveling with dogs, they give you a nice welcome basket, allow you to keep your dogs in your room unattended (as long as they are quiet), and don't charge ridiculous pet fees and deposits.
Manager Response: Dear Connector750286,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. We are so grateful for your five star review. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing The Waterfront. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice

Summary: About a month ago, a friend and I enjoyed a spa day at the new Drift Spa at the Hilton.  The spa was absolutely gorgeous and we both loved our massages by Lita and Virgil.  You are able to order lunch on the patio after your treatment.    The only major disappointment was my gel manicure which lasted only 4 days!  For the extremely high price paid, it was crazy that they chipped so quickly.  I had to go to my regular nail salon to get my nails redone before a gala I attended a few days later.  When I called the spa to let them know, they offered to do my nails again, but their nail tech only works a few days a week, and she was not available on the days I needed them done. Although the nail tech was pleasant, I would never get my nails done at the spa again, but I would go back
Manager Response: Dear grlgrdgate,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent visit to Drift Spa. I am so pleased you had such a wonderful massage. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to our superstars, Lita & Virgil.   We are so sorry to hear about your gel manicure. Our sincerest apologies for the disappointment and inconvenience the entire situation caused. Please know we have since procured additional gel top coat products to ensure a more long lasting manicure. Thank you for your honest feedback as we use it to better enhance the over all spa experience. We hope to see you again in the near future and appreciate you choosing Drift Spa.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Overpriced and nothing spectacular. Don’t expect any upgrades even with Diamond status. The rooms in the Huntington tower are smaller and more dated than the other tower. All the rooms have a view of the ocean but the further towards the road you are, the closer and better your view. Unfortunately the room numbering is not consistent among floors, I was on floor 12 of the Huntington Tower and the lower the number, the closer you are to the ocean, but my colleague was on floor 3 and the higher the number the closer the room is to the water. Also, “oceanfront” is a bit of a stretch, you have a busy road in front of the hotel and then across the street is a beach parking lot with a bunch of RVs and then the beach, and then the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear keegster51,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay at The Waterfront. We are sorry to hear that your visit was less than enjoyable. We strive to provide 5 diamond service and are disappointed you did not feel we met this standard. Please note that when you visit any Hilton property as a guest of a conference with a room block; as part of a group rate we are unable to award room upgrades due to the nature of business and contractual agreement. We did however place you on a premium floor within the room type booked as a Diamond Member.   Your observation of the room number assignments is not the case. All of our floors in both the Huntington Tower and Twin Dolphin Tower are arranged in the same order per tower. It is floor number, followed by the room number, with the lowest room number beginning at the room closest to the elevators then proceeding down the hall to the rooms closest to the ocean.  The hospitality definition of ocean front is an ocean view from your windows and inside your room and, if available, balcony. Oceanfront refers to your room directly facing towards the ocean, offering certain room types gorgeous, sweeping views of the Pacific. The new addition of Offshore 9 Rooftop Lounge offers the best oceanfront view in Orange County!  Thank you for your candid feedback and we wish you safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Old, over-priced, dog food, dust bunnies
Summary: Great view of the ocean from a one-bedroom suite.  That's the positive.  Otherwise, the room was old, dusty, worn-out furniture.  We ordered room service and it was as bad as we had ever experienced, sooo bad.  So much promise, given the location, but really under-delivered.
Manager Response: Dear Martin B,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We are so sorry to hear that we fell short of your high expectations. We appreciate your feed back and use it to better train our associates. Please know that your concerns are being passed on to our Food & Beverage managers. Thank you again for your feedback. Please accept our sincere apologies.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Lovely hotel on the beachfront.   Walking distance to shops and restaurants.   Rooms are spacious and well appointed. Limited eating options in the hotel which is disappointing. Wine lust in restaurant is too small and too narrow... it’s also over priced.   Concierge is helpful and happy to make dinner reservations.
Manager Response: Dear GlobalAdventure67,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit. We are happy to hear that you overall enjoyed your visit. We are excited to have Henry's Restaurant open very soon. It will join our other food and beverage options; Boardwalk Three Meal Restaurant, Surf Hero Market & Coffee Shop, Offshore Rooftop Lounge, Riptide Poolside Bar and Dock Bar.  Thank you for staying with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Decided to do a staycation and ended up at The Waterfront Beach Resort. The hotel was beautiful and everything was extremely well kept and clean. We stayed in a king room with a nice small bar area, living room, double vanity king and hugeeeeeeee walk in shower with separate toilet area. The best part was the view of the pacific ocean. Though it was raining, it still felt cozy and then balcony/patio area was perfect to have coffee in the morning. All the staff was super friendly and attentive. I got a few drinks at the pool bar and some fries while i enjoyed and soaked in the hot tub. Would come here again during the summer, though there might be a chance it would be crowded. Great location
Manager Response: Dear lg80505,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you can come back for another visit once Henry's Restaurant is open. It will have a beautiful view of the ocean and our new Huntington Pool! Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Huntington tower, room was clean, no complain since we spent most of the times at the pool, beach and surrounding area.. but will try the newer dolphin tower next time. Breakfast was delicious.. Great location, love the beach, not crowded at all, feel like a private beach - thanks to the hefty parking charges from the city!
Manager Response: Dear 841ivyn,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We know you have many options when visiting Southern California. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Hunington Beach
Summary: Gorgeous hotel very nicely decorated.  The lobby/reception area was beautiful.  The room décor was even better.  Some construction going on but did not disrupt our stay.  Pool and hot tub were very nice.  Weather prevented poolside and roof top bar from being open.
Manager Response: Dear K6734QQjimm,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort. I am so glad you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you can come back soon during warmer weather! Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I am reviewing JUST the spa. We got a TravelZoo pass for the day and we had a FABULOUS experience. We were greeted by the spa concierge staff. Both Michael and Makenna were warm, welcoming, informative and friendly. Makenna helped us with lunch suggestions too. Our attendants were Laurel and Victoria.  We spent the entire day there so we enjoyed all the different experiences (jacuzzi, steam, sauna, etc...) Everything was GREAT! My massage therapist was Mayra and my friend's was Virgil and we both felt like they were the best massages we've ever had.  Truly spectacular! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Anna Beth G,  Thank you kindly for writing such an outstanding 5 star review for Drift Spa! We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for mentioning so many of our wonderful associates by name. They are the heart of everything we do here. We hope to see you and your friend again in the near future to relax, renew and refresh. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We stayed one night in a king room with partial ocean view. Totally worthy the extra money! The room and view were gorgeous, the inside of the hotel was beautiful and clean, and the staff was friendly. The only reason I’m not giving 4 stars is because parking is only valet ($38/night) and our backs were sore from the bed. We had breakfast at the boardwalk restaurant which was decent.
Manager Response: Dear Erika_Be,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Safe travels.  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: Had a great stay from February 28th - March 2nd.  This was the perfect spot for our family friends.  Unfortunately, the weather was not the best, so we must return again to enjoy the pool!  I loved sitting out on my balcony having a cocktail and seeing Catalina Island in the distance.  I would definitely recommend this resort!
Manager Response: Dear janeta248,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay. I am so happy you enjoyed your balcony and sunset views! I do hope you are able to come back when it warms up a bit. We know you have many options when visiting Southern California. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront Beach Resort.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: I alway enjoy coming to this hotel for the beach vibe.  It is right across from PCH to the beach.  The valet parking is high.  It is short walk from the pier and all the great restaurants.   It is a hop and skip from a food court with a big variety of food.

Had dinner with friends to celebrate two birthdays.  We started off with the lamb chops appetizer and fresh bread.  Then myself and two others had the wedge salad and the scallop appetizer as our meal, while others had three seabass and steak.  It was all excellent!  In addition, they brought us a sampler of desserts for our birthday guests and it was all terrific. Very good service.  Everyone from the valets to the hosts were very friendly, and attentive but not overly attentive where you felt rushed.  Very nice evening.

Go to the top of the new tower you will not be sorry. The restaurants and everything about the new areas in the hotel and beyond lovely. The boardwalk restaurant was fun and great food. I have also  been to  a few events. Don't miss this place. More construction on the old tower to come.

Summary Heading: Newly Opened wing of the Hilton Hunt. Beach Hotel
Summary: Very nice new wing that has all a family would want when visiting the beach are of Huntington Beach. Suites overlook the Pier and pool were very nice, and all brand new with two large flat screen TVs. the Usual amenities. Not a large two room area, but big enough for a family of two with small children Food was average and well priced, New bar overlooking the pier is quite nice.Staff was super friendly.  New gym and pool were well maintained and more than adequate and a nice big water slide in the pool.   Be prepared to pay an absorbent amount of money for parking, like $40 per night tho.

This hotel is super nice the service is top notch, they make contact with you before you arrive and that turned out to be a great thing. We would not have known about the beach cart rental with everything you need to have a fire on the beach, wood, chairs, blankets and even s’mores. This was a highlight of our trip, Check in was smooth our rooms were ready on time and they are super clean. The views from our room were very good too. The pool area is very nice, it seems like everyone is always cleaning something. There is a rooftop bar that is very nice too and my favorite a Starbucks in the building! Location of the hotel is really good, there is a food court about a block away that I would describe as an “Adult food court” craft beers and wines and higher end places. The valet

Hate that they only have valet & I had >30 minute wait for car! Love the new updates & that they are pet-friendly. Location is great! Can walk to many restaurants. Price is always a bit higher than what I want to pay.

I don't know why per se but my expectations were relatively low for this resort despite its premium price tag.   It was great. I was really impressed with the finishes.   Food: very good on resort food but there are a ton of options feet away.   Rooms: fairly large, we had a partial ocean view. I would say that this was actually a really good option. When we were there it was windy and rainy the entire time and with an oceanfront room, we would have not been able to use the patio. The partial view provided a bit of nice shelter while still getting the ocean and pool in.   Resort: there was construction ongoing but the resort was really clear on that fact so we booked a room away from it and it was a complete nonfactor.

The Waterfront Hilton is a wonderful place to experience Huntington Beach and surrounding areas with your family!  The staff is friendly and accommodating. The suites are beautiful and clean. We will definitely return soon!
Manager Response: Dear Road23488466060,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at The Waterfront! We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel located on the beach
Summary: Friendly staff, great location. It is situated a short walk from the Pier and near a small outdoor mall. The pool’s temperature was 86F. It also had a big sandbox with sand toys in it. I would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear n_scarlatescu,  Thank you for taking the time for letting us know about your recent stay with us. I am pleased you enjoyed our central location as well as our amenities at our Driftwood Beach Club. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront. Safe travels!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: We visited the Waterfront over Labor Day weekend and had a great family beach vacation.  PROS: - Dolphin wing had awesome 1 bedroom suites that are absolutely perfect for families. Bedroom accessible thru bathroom / front entry without disturbing sleeping kids in living area.  - Rooms looked newish and had updated beach decor. Very comfortable beds and living area.  - Great programming for kids. Our long weekend visit had complimentary hula dancing / fire dancer show in the evening. Huge hit. - Good location right across from beach and walking distance to a lot of shops and restaurants - Solid and fairly priced on-premise restaurants - Great pool with zero entry area, family jacuzzi and sand area  CONS: - Kids pool area was really really crowded over long weekend (partially
Manager Response: Dear SF_intrepidwanderer,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your visit to The Waterfront Beach Resort last year. We are so happy to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay. I am thrilled that you were able to see our fire knife and Polynesian dance review, MANKOTA!, that takes place Memorial Weekend through Labor Day weekend on Friday's and Saturday's. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager
