Summary: The hotel was nice in places but rundown in other spots. The AC in our room didn't work, our kids weren't allowed to use the slide (even though we had approved life vests), hotel doesn't offer adjoining rooms, we had to ask 3 times for a crib. Save your money and stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Explorer12324004160,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are so sorry to hear you stay was less than satisfactory. Our sincere apologies for falling short.  Please note our Driftwood Beach Club water slides splash down are at the end of the slide area leads directly into our pool which is 3 1/2 feet deep. It does not have a shallow slide run at the end of the slide. For our specific slides, it is CA State Law in conjunction with the manufacturer warranty that there are no life jackets / floaties allowed on the slides. Our concierge staff and on site reservations team is avaibale to answer any questions in regards to our amenities and physical requirements for all activities.  Please note that that in our Twin Dolphin Tower we do have Pacific Suites that connect; each with two queen beds and sofa sleepers. In our Huntington Tower we have connecting rooms that are king to queen.  I am so sorry to hear that your had to ask multiple times for a crib. That is not our standard and I will pass on this feedback to our Housekeeping Director.  We are currently in the last phase of our hotel wide renovations and look forward to being completed later this year.  Safe travels to you and your family.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Snowed out of Seattle was the last thing I expected from a business trip to Southern California. My stay at the Hilton Huntington Beach made the experience pleasant and comfortable. For a last minute choice, I was thrilled with the property and service. I would suggest more firm pillows, otherwise, loved the stay in its entirety.
Manager Response: Dear Nikchuli,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort. We are so happy you enjoyed your time with us. We hope the next time you need to escape the PNW cold, you will come and visit us again! Safe travels...  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary: A beautiful well  maintain property  conveniently located just across the street from the beach.  Super staff very friendly very helpful they obviously enjoyed working there .  Good food at breakfast lunch and dinner however we felt overpriced about 20% compared to other find restaurants in the area
Manager Response: Dear Griz80,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave a review. We are so glad you enjoyed your time with us. We know that there are many options for you and your family to stay at in Southern California. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront Beach Resort. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at  the Huntington Beach Hilton
Summary: This hotel was beautiful and the service was top notch.  We had a beach view and although it was a bit too cold to go to the beach...the sunset from our balcony made up for the chill!  I was a bit surprised because the hotel isn't ON the beach (Pacific Coast Highway is between the hotel and the beach).  Sadly, we were only there for one night, but we did get to swim in the heated pool and hot tub.  Breakfast was very tasty.  The hotel has a beach theme and was beautifully decorated.  We weren't thrilled to have to use valet parking (no other choice) but the attendants had the car quickly whenever we wanted to go out.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Benji0675,   What a wonderful 5 star review of your stay! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and those stunning Southern California sunsets. We hope you will be able to stay with us for a longer vacation the next time you are in town. Our new Drift Spa and soon to be open Henry's Restaurant would make great additions to your stay. Safe travels to you and your loved ones. Thank you for staying with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Engagement Manager

Summary Heading: Relax in luxury with a beach view
Summary: Staff is friendly and accommodatin. View is amazing with a short walk across the street to the Huntington Beach pier. Swim in the ocean or watch the surfers because both were relaxing and amazing. This hotel is also a short walk to the outdoor mall and the town. Lots of great restaurants and this hotel has a nice pool!

Wonderful hotel.   Right on the beach.  Lots of restaurants around. Beautiful comfortable rooms.  Warm, fun pool.  Water slide.  Sandy area with fire pits and shovels and buckets for kids.  Can't wait to stay here again.  I highly recommend it.  Also where I work employees travel to SoCal often and this is their favorite.

This hotel is located directly across from the beach, which makes it very comfortable if your plan to go there. The resort itself looks new and the staff was very friendly. We didn't get to enjoy most of the amenities (pools, jacuzzis, etc) because of the weather, but they looked like a lot of fun. The room itself was clean and had a very nice balcony and partial view of the beach and ocean, but it general very average.

This is a luxury hotel with all the amenities you would and should expect for the price you will pay. Location is directly across the street from the beach. Good food options away from the pricey hotel restaurants are a short walk.

You could just feel that this was going to be a great place to stay from the minute we walked in to reception, the staff were so welcoming and helpful. Although the hotel was quiet, probably not peak season which isn't a bad thing. Very relaxing, helpful friendly staff and beautiful rooftop bar, great place to see the sunset. Our room was lovely with a great view from the balcony

This beautiful property is located directly across PCH from the ocean. It is an easy 1/2 mile walk to main street and the pier with plenty of shopping and restaurants. The hotel will set up a bon fire on the beach for you and you can make S'mores.
Manager Response: Dear Narlene K,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your accommodations and our fun amenities such as beach bonfires and s'mores! We hope you will consider staying with us again if your travels bring you to Orange County in the future. Have a wonderful day!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: A rainy weekend in Huntington Beach
Summary: In hotel to provide support for daughter running marathon. Wind and rain. But the hotel was nice, we had a view of the beach and the marathon start/finish area. Just a short walk to the pier / downtown. Good location.
Manager Response: Dear WilliamH3201,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the Surf City Marathon! We are honored to be the host hotel for this wonderful event. We hope to see you and your daughter at next year's race. Safe travels.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed here for the Surf City Marathon.  It couldn't have been more convenient.  Right across from the expo and start line.  This is Well managed hotel.  The staff is friendly and professional.  We will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear BRIANJSINGER,  What a kind review! We are so happy you enjoyed your time with us. It is our honor to host the Surf City Marathon and to be the official start line of all the festivities. We hope you will stay with us again if your travels bring you back our way. Congratulations on your race!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel  and mostly great experience
Summary: Our daughter ran the surf city marathon last weekend and we booked this hotel for two nights to visit with her. It’s a beautiful building. We were in the twin dolphin tower and were assigned an ocean front balcony room. The view was spectacular (in spite of the rain storm). Staff was wonderful...very friendly and helpful from the valets and front desk to the bar and restaurant. The room was very clean and spacious.  The beds were comfy (not so much the pillows but that’s subjective) .   Now...what could possibly be a drawback about an ocean front balcony overlooking the beach?  Well...it was a good thing our daughter was running in the marathon because the announcers start their announcing over the loudspeakers at 6 AM.  Lol. The only thing to do was to find our way to the
Manager Response: Dear CALItraveler47,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the Surf City Marathon. It is our honor to be the host hotel for such a world class event. We are thrilled you and your daughter enjoyed your time with us. Our apologies for the volume of our steel drummer. He is normally positioned outside but with the impending rain he was moved inside. I will speak to our Food & Beverage team in regards to the volume when he plays indoors. Thank you for your feedback. We hope you will visit us again next year for the Marathon!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my 6 year old daughter for a long weekend break. I had reserved a beachfront room but the only one they had available was on a high floor so they rearranged it for a really lovely pool view room on the first floor.  On arrival I found we had been given a blue bucket and spade filled with goodies for her and I to enjoy.   We walked to the pier for dinner the first night and travelled about locally the next day. The hotel has great amenities and he breakfasts are very good with a great selection reasonably priced.   They are still undergoing some construction but you hardly notice it and when the new pool opens we will definitely be back. We swam on the other pool both days which my daughter loved - it was heated so she was able to stay on it for ages!   We ate
Manager Response: Dear S840KSlauram,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. I am so happy to hear that it was the perfect long weekend for you and your daughter. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to have a pool heated to 80*+ degrees year round even here in sunny Southern California! We hope you are able to return for another visit once our expansion is fully completed later this year. Henry's Restaurant will be the perfect spot for a delicious California farm to table breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again! Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed five nights in a ocean front suite in the Huntington Tower and had a great time.  The room was fresh and renovated with an excellent view of the beach.  The facilities of the resort were good and we used the hot tub and relaxed by the pool (too cold for us to swim in Jan).  We dined several times on site and the meals and service were great.  The beach, pier and many restaurants were only a short walk away.
Manager Response: Dear CDJ-AU,  What a wonderful five star review! Sounds like you took advantage of our wonderful location and amenities. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach. We are so grateful you chose to stay with us for your getaway. Safe travels and we hope to see you again in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My wife, daughter, and daughter in law spent a wonderful Sunday at the newly opened Drift Spa at the Waterfront Beach Resort in Huntington Beach. Spa was recently added during a renovation of the Hotel, and is amazing. Staff were wonderful, amenities were  second to none and they enjoyed massages, manicures, pedicures, facials, the sauna, steam room, and jacuzzi as well as a wonderful lunch at the Boardwalk inside the Hotel. the staff at the Boardwalk even delivered their lunch to the Spa Garden, an outside area, which made it extra special. A special thank you to Jennifer, the director of the Spa, as well as Malena, Paula, Cindy, Stefanie, Amanda and Marya.
Manager Response: Dear 26bobby,  Thank you for taking the time to write the very first TripAdvisor review for Drift a Waterfront Spa! What a wonderful recap to their day. We are thankful that you mentioned so many of our wonderful spa associates by name. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to all of them as well. Drift has been a labor of love and we are thrilled it is now open for everyone to enjoy! We hope to see all of you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: If all you want is to be close to the beach then this hotel is fine. If you don't want to hear everything from everyone in the surrounding rooms then you will want to pass. The hotel has paper thin walls.  The lighting in the bathroom was terrible. Hairdryer was useless.  Mold in the bathroom stall. The metal cover over the toilet paper made using more than a few squares at a time challenging.  The carpet tac stuck my foot. The only good thing was the AC which was great. No complimentary anything and the restaurant wasn't that great.
Manager Response: Dear elizabethanderson39,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. We are disappointed to hear that you were not satisfied with your accommodations. Our sincere apologies for not meeting your high standards.   I will be passing along your feed back to our operations and housekeeping managers to attend to these room discrepancies immediately. Please know it is our pleasure to Make it Right with you at any time during your stay with us. Our front desk staff is available 24 hours a day during your time with us and we are more than happy to place you in an alternative room.  We do hope you will give us another opportunity if your travels should bring you to our area in the future. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The hotel is within a short walking distance of the Huntington Beach Pier and a beach-sensitive mall with trendy shops. The beach includes an amazing surfing and sport culture. There is nothing just like this I've ever seem. Enjoy the process! Only valet parking is available, but the staff bring the car and handle it on return very professionally.
Manager Response: Dear David M,  Thank you kindly for such a wonderful review of your recent stay! We know you have many options when visiting Southern California. We are so grateful you chose to stay with us. Safe travels and we hope to see you again!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Stayed one night at the Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort, wished it was longer.  Quiet and classy lobby.  Room was spacious, well furnished and had a great view of the ocean.  Second floor had a very nice bar an restaurant.  There is a mall nearby for additional dining and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear Scott E,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us! We are thrilled you enjoyed your vacation and our spectacular location We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: A Great Stay in Huntington Beach, CA
Summary: A great beachfront property.  The amenities (pool, spa, restaurant) were as expected from a Hilton property.  We were upgraded to a guest room with an ocean view.  The room was very comfortable temperature-wise and quiet.  There as generous drawer-space and very good  lighting.  The WIFI was good quality and easy to use.  We will happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne L,  Thank you for your recent review of our property! I am so happy you enjoyed your stay. We know you have many options when visiting Southern California. On behalf of myself and our wonderful staff, thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We had the pleasure of staying for a week and would definitely return. Great location, very friendly and helpful team. Room was clean and tidy, although it could do with an update - guess the rooms in the new Twin Dolphin Tower are more contemporary. There was some construction work in progress, however, we were on the 10th for so it wasn't too intrusive.
Manager Response: Dear nigel1457,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review of your stay! We are thrilled you had such a nice time. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for staying at The Waterfront Beach Resort. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Hilton honors diamond member stayed 4 nights with spouse for a kid free getaway.  Property and location:  The property is outstanding, it rivals any other resort style Hilton anywhere. All common areas have been recently renovated and the finishes are outstanding. Located on a busy stretch of PCH walking distance to ultra nice outdoor mall and fun laid back downtown Huntington beach.   Rooms:  I booked a king with points in the huntington tower and that was the room selected. NO UPGRADES will be given at this hotel and many have referenced in other reviews. Depending on availability you may be able to upgrade within the tower you have booked for $30-50 a night, we did not. Huntington tower rooms are actually just fine, they are your standard hilton brand room at any Hilton USA,
Manager Response: Dear ATXryan81,  Thank you for your review of your stay! We are happy to hear you had a wonderful time and enjoyed our amenities and our hospitable staff. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Extremely friendly, personable and helpful staff (especially front desk, valets, pool and restaurant staff).  Top notch service with no pretension.    It's in a great location with great amenities (pool, water slide, hot tub).  I especially appreciate that the front desk helped us out after I accidentally made the reservation for the weekend prior.  A great weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Jen D,  Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review of your stay! We are so happy to hear your enjoyed your time with us. We are thankful that you chose to stay at The Waterfront. We hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Waterfront for business, pleased with all services in this hotel. Staff was very nice and the restaurant was amazing. Definitely recommend staying here, also had a great view from my room.
Manager Response: Dear Jet49779045718,  Thank you for the 5 star review of your stay. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. No better place to have a business meeting than by the ocean! We hope to see you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Ok hotel that did everything well but nothing spectacular Typical Hilton fodder Staff were superb however and a real credit to the hotel management Food in the bar was good too. Check in and check out very swift.
Manager Response: Dear andrewjO410SQ,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear you experienced our warm hospitality first hand from our wonderful associates. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for staying with us. Safe travels and we hope to see you again in the near future.   At our Service,  Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Waterfront room and I upgraded to an oceanfront suite. The room was large and comfortable. I enjoyed sitting on the balcony and listening to the waves! The staff at this hotel were some of the friendliest I have had in a Resort. Very accommodating!

First time at this property and we loved it. We had an ocean front suite with a unique floor plan that was only a negative to us because we are in the awful habit of going to sleep watching TV. The master bed was around the corner off of the dining room and living room and the foot of the bed faced the beach/ocean. However, the easy fix for us was to let out the sofa bed and watch TV until we were sleepy enough to go over the "big" bed. LOL.The bellman was extraordinary and upon delivering our luggage, reviewed the function of the room and it's features, as well as local flavor hotspots and resort activity.This is a great place and we plan on visiting again.

Great property overall. Pool is fantastic and perfect for families.Our son had a blast on the water slide. Amenities are impressive, as is the spacious design of the remodeled interior. Room was clean and acceptable for a hotel of this level - bathroom as well, although a bit dated.
Manager Response: Dear bellezza1081,m  Thank you of the wonderful review of your recent stay! We are so pleased to read you enjoyed our new amenities and slides. We know you have many options when staying in Southern California, thank you for choosing The Waterfront. Safe travels and we hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Great property with access to the beach, short walk to Huntington Pier. Great pool, Starbucks, restaurants and lounge.    Rooms were very well appointed.  Great shopping area a short walk from the hotel, with lots of variety and food options.
Manager Response: Dear lsrssll,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear everything was to your liking and you were able to take advantage of our central location. We know you have many options when visiting Southern California. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront! Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed here during Christmas while visiting family. The staff was great and very friendly. The place was pretty empty so we checked in fast and got a great room with an ocean view.  The hotel was very nice and clean. They have been doing lots of renovations but it didn’t take away from the ambience. The pool was heated well and very enjoyable.  The greatest disappointment is the $38 daily parking for guests and visitors alike. For what it costs to stay, it was quite a ripoff. Otherwise a 5 star review.

Stayed in the king waterfront suite. Fantastic view from the bed! Check in and check out was smooth. Room was clean and breakfast great. I would definitely stay in this hotel if I am in the area again.

It’s all about how you leave a lasting impression and unfortunately the one left with us was rude and condescending. Apparently sweatshirts and jeans are not worthy of respect by their staff. I won’t go into all the details, but I will share that a deliberate effort left us feeling uncomfortable. As a long time Hilton reward member, I can say this was not the norm but rather an exception definitely worth mentioning to those that may consider this resort while in Long Beach. All other amenities were very good - even with loud construction noises starting early morning each day (putting in a new pool on the north side). Hopefully management reads this to improve. I’d be happy to talk with the hotel general manager about this.
Manager Response: Dear MrClean614,m  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are sorry to hear you had a negative experience while on property. We look forward to speaking to you further in regards to your stay and finding out the details of what took place. Our Director of Operations, Ajit Acharya, looks forward to your call. You can reach him at 714-845-8000. Thank you.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed at the property as part of our Rose Bowl package trip. The property did not disappoint. Our room was spacious, well equipped and clean. We had a nice view of the beach and the pier. The property is separated from the beach by a RV parking lot, and PCH with heavy traffic, so it wasn't especially tranquil. Every staff person we encountered was friendly and able to answer questions we had. The concierge desk helped us with attraction tickets on our free day and she was terrific. We were part of a large group and although our numbers overwhelmed their bar and restaurant occasionally, the staff remained friendly and helpful. On check out day, they opened an adjacent ballroom to accommodate everyone  needing breakfast at the same time. And the breakfast buffet was great!

Summary Heading: All was well with our stay!
Summary: Room was spotless and view was fantastic. We really enjoyed the decor around the resort and breakfast was great. We walked outside (after getting our starbucks) and crossed the street and were on the beach! Loved our stay and as Diamond member, this met all expectations.
Manager Response: Dear travelworlds321,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. We are thrilled to read you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate your loyalty. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront. Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights while visiting family for the Christmas holiday. It was my husband and I and our two well-behaved shih-tzus. In the past, we have stayed with family, or at a VRBO, and for a few years we stayed at the nearby Shorebreak. We should have stayed here all along. This is a gorgeous resort, and it was beautifully decorated for the holidays.   We are Hilton Honors members, and the rates for this time of year (off season) were so reasonable that we got an ocean front room. We got the king suite, which is probably the most ideal layout for us. It included a large wet bar with fridge, which was super convenient. Bathroom was large, fairly updated, and there was separation between the sink area and shower/toilet, which helps for two getting ready. The room
Manager Response: Dear Dreamer1999.  Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review. We truly appreciate your feedback. Thank you for mentioning Nolan by name. We know you have many options when staying on Orange County; thank you for choosing The Waterfront. Have a safe and Happy New Year! We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I am a Diamond Member, here to spend hundreds of thousands of points earned in business travel through the year.  Show up with my family and the room we reserved was not available.  They upgraded us to a Presidential Suite.  Great, right?  Well not if you have two kids and you don’t want those kids in the same room as you at night.  So they fixed that by rolling in a temp bed for them.  Super.  Until about 10PM when the thumping night club above us started up, keeping us and kids up.  I wanted to hand the kids to management the next morning to deal with.  Zero common sense.  Did I mention the beach in front of the hotel is a garbage dump, including used needles?  I spent an hour cleaning the beach myself a couple days just to try and make a difference...but the hotel itself
Manager Response: Dear jamescgordon,   Thank you very much for your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every stay. Our staff did place an upgrade on your reservation prior to arrival to the Presidential Suite. This was based on the original information in your booking of one adult. Our sincerest apologies that this room was not an optimum set up for the additional guests joining you. I understand that our Front Office Manager offered different room options to you and your guest upon arrival. I am so sorry these alternatives did not meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies.  I will say I am puzzled by your statement in regards to the cleanliness of our beach areas. Huntington Beach is known for its pristine beach areas that are cleaned daily. The beaches are tractor combed a few times a week. Our staff participates in multiple beach clean up programs through out the year. You will be happy to hear we have recently limited the use of plastic straws and we no longer use plastic shopping bags on property to help eliminate plastic waste that may end up on our beaches.  Thank you for helping to keep our beaches clean as we believe it is a collaboration of all to protect and take care of our coastlines, waves and beaches. We will alert Huntington City Beach authorities in regards to your finding of used needles. Safe travels to you and your family in the coming year.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed 4 nights for the price of 3. Overpriced .  Room fine, clean,etc. but so is Motel 6. Paid $38/day for valet parking which was never disclosed. No free breakfast. $200/night and they charge for inroom internet.give me a break!  All in all the only way I'd stay here again is if my heirs booked it for my memorial. But they're smarter than that.
Manager Response: Dear Travel63751201622,  Thank you for you recent review of your stay. We are sorry to hear your stay was not to your liking. It is a Hilton Brand standard that Hotel Information is noted on the left column of our website. Parking is something frequently discussed on this forum, as is mentioned in many reviews.  Please note that when a 3rd party booking site, not affiliated with the Hilton brand, is utilized to secure a reservation, they at times do not disclose all possible charges, such as parking fees. For the best rates and service, please call The Waterfront Beach Resort in-house reservations team directly at 714-845-8000. They are happy to go over any information that you may need. We also have a package that includes parking and breakfast.   We are a full service hotel that has staff on hand with a full service food & beverage team in our restaurants. A limited service hotel will include a complimentary breakfasts for the budget conscious traveler because of limited staff on hand and no outlets. This may be the style of hotel you are accustomed to or looking for.   Internet is offered at no cost with a complimentary Hilton Honors account which can be added at anytime during your stay. You will be pleased to know that as you use your account and accrue points; a perk of the Gold & Diamond tiers is complimentary breakfast!  Safe travels.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We had a great five night stay at the resort. The three of us had a suite in the Twin Dolphin towers overlooking the beautiful pool area and the ocean. The hotel staff is very welcoming and they are always keeping the grounds in sparkling shape. The hotel has great access to the beach as well as shopping and restaurants. Although the hotel is under construction, the noise is really not noticeable and it didn’t interfere with our comfort. It’s a family friendly hotel and although we were traveling with our millennial son we enjoyed seeing the families with young children enjoy themselves! The restaurant and bar was fine with many options on the menu. If there is a negative it would be the small size of the fitness center and $38 a day for valet parking with no other options.
Manager Response: Dear valentme,   Thank you for your wonderful review of your recent stay. We are so happy you enjoyed our amenities and hospitable staff. We know you have many options when staying in Southern California. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront Beach Resort. Safe travels in 2019!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel with fantastic pool for children and lovely ocean views. The newly remodeled tower has been beautifully updated. The rooms are spacious and modern. Looking forward to returning here again and again.

Summary Heading: It doesnt pay to be a Diamond Member at this resort!!
Summary: Upon check-in,we had no knowledge that we were paying so much money to stay in old tower plus on top of that we used 107,000 points. When  I asked repeatedly that diamond members were given the convenience of getting upgrades amongst non members, we were snubbed by front desk and told there was nothing they could do for us. WE used 107,000 of our reward points plus were paying well over 600$ for the nights combined? I shouldve known this was going to be a disastrous costly weekend. We thought we were staying at new tower and were not. So we went with it and tried to make the best out of our vacay that we could. 1st of all.the.old tower should not be even an option for Diamond members, it is so run down and smells horrible. So we decided to head to the pool and not be crammed in
Manager Response: Dear skbieret,   Thank you for your review. I understand that our Director of Operations, Ajit Acharya had been in contact with you during and since your stay in July. If you need to speak with him further; he is available at 714-845-8000. Thank you.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Perfect stay.  Upgraded to a suite and well worth it.  Had a drink at the rooftop bar overlooking the ocean and then dinner at the hotel restaurant.  Next morning the breakfast and it was a great stay.  Ate, drank, slept.
Manager Response: Dear Dave R,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at The Waterfront. I am so happy to read you enjoyed our property and all we have to offer. We know you have many options when staying in Huntington Beach. We are grateful you choose to stay with us. Safe travels this next new year!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Service is like a Ramada Inn. Fake smile and lacks in customer focused service. In hospitality industry, they should be able to anticipate the needs of customers at some level. Disappointed a waterfront view room was not offered. Valet is $38/day.

Summary: Very nice hotel very clean the maids were a little slow but overall a great place to stay great food people were friendly and helpful. Close to the beach and downtown area also within walking distance to places.

Summary Heading: Made our Southern California Vacation the Best!
Summary: Thank you for the great welcome on our Anniversary Trip to Southern California. I love this Hotel for business and I now love it for fun. My husband and i had a great time exploring Pacific City, Laguna and the Hilton at Huntington Beach is a great hotel. Wonderful service and great leisure activities. Highly recommended!  Also thank you for the upgraded view at CheckIn - Nice touch!
Manager Response: Dear Todd M,  Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing The Waterfront Beach Resort. Warm holiday wishes from Huntington Beach!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Like an Oasis on the waterfront
Summary: Freshly renovated hotel with a stylish decoration turned on the ocean. There’s a rooftop bar with good lounge music. The staff is very welcoming, particularly the Concierge who truly made her best to make my stay more comfortable and funny than what I expected. There is also a mall with various shops and restaurants a few steps away. And the most important, the beach is just in front of the hotel.

Summary Heading: Great hotel with a great view of Huntington beach
Summary: Rooms are cosy , spacious and comfortable with all modern amenities..lunch , dinner options are good..went for a business trip..customer service is excellent..swimming pool with hot pool is really good..you can definitely opt this hotel for a pleasant and comfortable stay..situated in a good location..

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a Business Meeting and Relaxing Stay
Summary: Our business meeting went really well. The food and service were delicious. We found several places to gather and eat within walking distance. The Boardwalk restaurant's food was also delicious, especially the corned beef sandwich and mermaid's kiss cocktail. If I travel to this region again, I will definitely stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 465carylc,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay. I am thrilled you enjoyed your business meeting and our central location. We look forward to see you again in the near future. Warm holiday wishes from The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Traffic noise, old mattress and boxspring, dated room.
Summary: I was assigned room #428 in the older Huntington Tower section of the hotel.  Room is classified as "oceanfront", but a 24/7 busy 4 lane highway and a wide beachfront parking lot exist between your "oceanfront" room, the sand, and the water.  The ocean is a small blue strip in the distance.  Sleeping with the patio door open to hear the waves will instead allow you to hear the soothing doppler sounds of automobiles and motorcycles racing by nonstop all night long at high speeds.  Closing the sliding balcony doors does little to decrease the noise from the road.  The balcony doors should be replaced with high quality noise reducing sliding doors.  Light sleepers beware!    The premium "oceanfront" room was dated, dark and dingy, in desperate need of a complete remodel.  The bed
Manager Response: Dear 88LFM,  We are very sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services and amenities you deserved during your recent stay. Please know that the problems encountered are not typical of our hotel and staff and will be addressed accordingly to avoid recurrence for future guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience, as your satisfaction is very important to us. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.

Summary: Great ocean view, super clean hotel, convenient location, excellent customer service from front desk, valet and housekeeping! The room was super comfortable! This is a Must visit and stay! I wish I had more time to stay at this hotel!

Summary Heading: Giving the property 5 stars, not accounting department
Summary: We had two waterfront rooms which were absolutely lovely.  We were in the Twin Dolphin Tower, as there was construction in the Huntington Tower.  The rooms were large and very clean.  The view was great (we were on the 4th floor).  There is a small refrigerator, and upon request they gave us a small microwave.  The hotel is pet friendly, but I did not see any dog or cat hair in the room. The bed was extremely comfortable.   The shower was great and the bathroom was large.  Loved the decor!   All staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  The pool water was perfect, the hot tub too!  The buffet breakfast was worth $22!  The poolside lunch (wrap) was good ~ enough to split with two people for sure!  Hotel is within walking distance to shops, restaurant and, of course, beach.  I
Manager Response: Dear SuePhoenix,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I am so pleased to read that you enjoyed your time at The Waterfront and our central location. I am so sorry to hear you had been in erroneously charged for Smart water and that we took longer that 24 hours to return your call. I do show that the front desk posted a refund to your account for the waters on November 28th. At times, it can take up to 7 working days for the refund to appear on your account. Thank you kindly for your patience. Again, our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience.   We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. Happy holidays.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Decent hotel on amazing location. Does have a few flaws.
Summary: *The hotel itself is very pretty and is on a prime location.  Being only a short walk from the Pier and a shopping area was a great added bonus.   *The check-in process was a breeze and the staff was extremely respectful and polite.   *The rooms were extremely clean, the one I got had a gorgeous view of the pool from the balcony. They could use more advanced TV systems that allow you to login to your Netflix account like most modern hotels are offering.   The Bad:   * Valet / Parking is EXTREMELY overpriced. We were going to rent a car but after factoring in the daily cost to park there we decided to just Uber instead.  Not only is it extremely expensive to park overnight (Around $40/day), it's expensive even for guests that are visiting, which I find extremely silly.   *The

Summary Heading: Staff has attitude and Do Not Care for Guest Satisfaction !
Summary: Extremely disappointed. Save yourself the experience and stay somewhere else. This hotel charged me $38 for parking – No Self-Parking option only Valet. This hotel charged $22 + Tax for the Breakfast. Even for Diamond members, this hotel charge for breakfast!I (Hilton Diamond) checked in late at night after mid-night and despite hotel had plenty of rooms inventory left for sale – Hotel staff didn’t upgraded the room saying “They get in trouble with their boss for upgrading my room”. I have been Hilton Diamond straight 10 Years and have stayed at multiple Hilton hotels – This is the first one I found where staff instead of smiling – gives attitude towards their guest! Shame that this Hotel is spoiling the HILTON experience and brand name !No late check-out provided by this hotel
Manager Response: Dear Charlie B,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate feedback of any kind, good or bad. However, your experience does not reflect the overall reviews we have received from other guests who have nothing but the best things to say about their stay and helpfulness of our staff. I am concerned with the information you are stating in your review as our records indicate a much different scenario.  Diamond members are provided with a complimentary $15 Continental breakfast voucher which can also be applied towards the $22 hot breakfast buffet. This is a Hilton Honor Diamond standard at all properties. I do see that you received and used the Hilton Honors Diamond breakfast vouchers, as it was applied to your final breakfast bill. For complete details of your Hilton Honors Diamond benefits please visit the following link: https://hiltonhonors3.hilton.com/rs/even-more/intl/   At check-in, a three tier upgrade to a Ocean Front Studio Suite was provided, as well as your second room being upgraded to a high floor. As stated on our website, we provide complimentary upgrades upon availability within the tower booked and this was also communicated upon arrival. You were provided a complimentary one hour late check out.   Our front desk staff worked together to accommodate your many requests. Stating that you did not receive an upgrade, complimentary Continental breakfast or late check out is simply not true. Sometimes we just have to accept the fact that there is nothing we do can make everyone happy in spite of our best efforts. It sounds as if we're just not a property for you, and we regret that. We hope you find what you're looking for during your travels and wish you all the best.   At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Waterfront Beach Resort -Best place to stay in Huntington
Summary: Reservations were messed up.  Manager stepped in and was great and gave us suite including wrap around deck, kitchen suite, hot tub, complimentary bucket of beer and cookies and free breakfast. Top notch.Treated like kings. Beautiful resort. Thanks!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel in a superb location.
Summary: Friendly staff, great food choices in the restaurants, lots of pool chairs   and overall an excellent place to stay. Walking distance to all of the great shops and restaurants in Huntington Beach. They also recommended a top notch surf school that you can bike to - Banzai Surf. It was our second year here and we'll be back for more.
Manager Response: Dear Go58404199170,  Thank you for the wonderful five star review! I am so pleased to read you enjoyed our central location and amenities. There's nothing quite like hanging ten in Surf City USA...glad you took advantage of Banzai Surf. We hope to see you again in the near future. Warmest holiday wishes from The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Loved this trip and hotel, everything was perfect! The staff was amazing, the room was pristine and had a gorgeous view. We came for my friends 21st and had a lovely time. Could not have asked for a better vacation!
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine57741143095,  Wow! Sounds like you all had a fantastic time making #waterfrontmemories! Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in a perfect setting
Summary: The hotel was amazing, the view was outstanding and the rooftop bar a must.  Whether there for business or leisure, you cannot go wrong at this Hilton property.  There is something for everyone, shopping, eating, sitting on the beach or poolside.  I highly recommend to anyone considering this area.
Manager Response: Dear Kim K,  Thank you for your five star review! We truly appreciate you taking the time to write about your experience. We hope to see you again in the near future. Warmest holiday wishes from The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

We were celebrating our daughter's 17th birthday for the weekend, and unfortunately she had broken her foot the week before our stay.  David from Guest Services made sure that our rooms were close to the elevator so she wouldn't have to crutch as far... it was a HUGE help! Hannah from Concierge helped me set up a beach bonfire with s'mores and that was a highlight of our weekend. As a special treat, Hannah even arranged to have apple cider and a birthday cake in my daughter's room at our arrival!  My daughter was so surprised and felt so pampered!  It was such a nice touch and helped offset the disappointment of traveling with a broken foot! The rooms were spacious and
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer W,  Thank you for writing such a wonderful review of your time with us. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and our amenities. Thank you for selecting to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. We trust that your daughter's foot is healing nicely! Warmest holiday wishes from The Waterfront... Summary: It’s hard to imagine a better location or a better hotel for pleasure or business. I came here to attend a conference, but I would absolutely bring my family on a vacation given the option.  The hotel had only two days to put together the conference for 200 people, but managed it very smoothly and provided delicious food and beverages. Well done guys and what a lovely location.

At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

No it was like this when we got here! The service at the rooftop and pool bar was amazing in June, but wasn’t great this time. The blond waitress at the rooftop was rude and didn’t even acknowledge us with a hello-it made us so uncomfortable we left. The pool restaurant and bar had no severs on Saturday so you had to fight the bar crowd to order food and drinks- it was a hassle. The rest of the tine

Summary: Was very relaxing and refreshing. Will come again. Great location. The pool is awesome Staff is great. Food is great Everything is great! And a kite more reasonable of a price than surrounding hotels.

There were not a lot of people waiting for cars and people who didn't call ahead and came down after us, got their cars first.  Granted, every other time was great.Second, I'm glad the hotel recognized my birthday, very nice, but they gave me alcohol.  When I explained that, for religious reasons, I do not drink alcohol, the person who came to bring it said, "Are you not 21?" I said no, I just turned -- today, but I don't drink.  They left it on the desk and left.  I just put it outside after they left.  It made me laugh, but I wish they would have just taken it and perhaps offered something else.Other than that, the

Summary: This hotel was beautiful.  Right on the coast with great views of the ocean. You can walk to the beach and downtown.  The rooms were very nice and clean.  Everyone I met was very friendly.  I would stay again.  The only issue I had was that I thought the beach chairs were too crowded together.  There was no space between them to get on them.  You had to get on at the end and slide up.  Fewer chairs more spread out would be more comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Don M,  Thank you for the kind review of your recent stay. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us. My apologies for the overcrowding of lounge chairs at Driftwood Beach Club. We look forward to having our refreshed Huntington pool reopened soon to remedy the situation. The new 2nd pool and Henry's Corner Fine Dining Restaurant should be open early next year. We hope you can come again for another visit after their completion. Thank you again and safe travels!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: No better location in Huntington Beach!
Summary: If you want to enjoy the Great Pacific Airshow in 2019, book your room here, sooner than later!  It's the happening place to be!  If you need to visit HB for any other reason, this is also the place to be.  It's welcoming, family friendly and close enough to all the fun HB has to offer.  If you're looking for a quiet and peaceful experience this will fit the bill also.  You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Dianne T,  Thank you for writing a 5 star review of your recent stay with us! We love being center stage for The Great Pacific Airshow. We truly appreciate you choosing to stay with us and hope to see you again for next years airshow. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my 5 bridesmaids for my bachelorette trip weekend!  We were lucky enough to be upgraded complimentary to two connecting suites in the Twin Dolphin Tower and our third room was nearby so we could all be close to one another.  The balconies were awesome, and the view facing towards PCH and the beach was great.  The pool area was pretty busy each day (understandably so given we were there on the weekend in August), but we were able to find chairs without any problems.  It's also a relatively short walk to get to the beach area across PCH from the hotel.  All of the staff members that we encountered were friendly and helpful, minus the Front Desk member who checked us in failed to tell us we were in the Twin Dolphin Tower, so we were left to figure that out on our
Manager Response: Dear Sarahy701,  Thank you for the lovely five star review of your stay! We are so happy to hear you and your guests had a wonderful time for your bachelorette trip. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront. Happy "married" travels to you and your groom!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We had a perfect room for the air show ..corner room facing the ocean but it was not good because the king bed was horrible and I didn't get any sleep on the pull out sofa !! Not even comfortable to sit on !! So I had roll away bed brought in after the 1st night but roll away was bad too..my son kindly slept on it for me !! For paying what my son paid for this premium room it wasn't even up to average standards !!

Summary: Fantastic hotel with great pool and facilities.  Location perfect pier and shops all within walking distance.  Noticed guests were allowed to take dogs into the hotel too. Great pool also building another pool as well. Definitely would stop here again.
Manager Response: Dear Alison S,  Thank you kindly for letting us know about your recent stay with us. I am so pleased you enjoyed your time at The Waterfront and the nearby amenities. We look forward to having you stay with us again once our refreshed original pool and new fine dining restaurant are completed early next year. Thank you for staying with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice

Summary: I had a room with the beach view and that was fantastic. The waves was a little rough and I did not venture into the waters but looking at the surfs when I am in the room was very relaxing. Property is well kept and maintained.
Manager Response: Dear William_Ng_SG,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review of your recent stay! Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. Safe travels!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel with nice pool and beach location!  Hotel was beautiful inside and had a great pool and amenities! Better than expected and would definitely stay here again!  Close to shopping and lots of food options.
Manager Response: Dear raven v,  Thank you kindly for your 5 star review of your recent stay at The Waterfront! We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My husband and I wanted a weekend to ourselves for our 5 year wedding anniversary. We decided that The Waterfront Beach Resort was far enough to have a relaxing weekend but close enough to come home if needed (we have a 2 and 4 year old staying with with my parents nearby).   I was a little leery when we checked in, the young woman at the front desk seemed to be having a bad day. However, as soon as we got to our room, all was forgotten. We were upgraded to the Governor Suite which had the most amazing ocean view. The suite itself was absolutely gorgeous. If you have the chance to stay there, I would highly recommend it. We were also greeted with a bottle of champagne and snacks. The concierge also left a cute hand written note for us too. The little details really made our
Manager Response: Dear laney_SL,  Thank you for the kind review of your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and amenity! I will pass on your review to the rest of our staff. We know you have many options when booking a stay here in Huntington Beach; thank you for choosing to say at The Waterfront. Safe travels! Summary: Got a room with a nice view of the beach and ocean. Spent 3 days at the resort and enjoyed the food at the restaurant and drinks at the rooftop bar. Everything was excellent.    I got some help from concierge and they were extremely helpful in finding what I needed. The staff overall were really friendly. Even though I was there on business it felt like a vacation. I’ll be bringing the family back here to relax.
Manager Response: Dear daymeeyan,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. It is so nice to hear you had a great stay and interaction with our warm staff. We do hope you will be able to join us again in the near future for a true vacation! Have a great week.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Absolutely the Best!  1st time staying here.
Summary: We were impressed with the professional, courteous and  friendly staff that work at the Waterfront Beach Resort.  Trevor, the valet manager made sure that we were taken care of as we rolled in with not just a truck!  Jessica at the front desk was amazing, felt like we had know her for along time and she took good care of us.  Entire staff at the hotel that we encountered was perfect!  Thanks for making our trip so enjoyable, not only for us but all of our friends.  We will definately be back.  Highly recommend.

We recently stayed here and I couldn’t recommend it more. We have stayed here on several occasions for the past 10 years and our last stay was the best. We had a queen suite with ocean view in the twin dolphin towers and the room was more than I could have hoped for. From the moment we arrived we were treated like royalty. The staff was very attentive and helpful with any questions we had. The room was quiet at night and even offered in room movies that are still in theaters, making for a nice way to share some quiet time together before bed. We enjoyed how beautiful the property was and the boardwalk restaurant had a fantastic breakfast buffet with omelet station. We will definitely be back in the future for a longer stay.

The views from atop the new tower at the Hilton are amazing. I did, however, like the oldrestaurant, Shades, much better than the new set up in the new side. To me or feels more like a coffee shop now
Manager Response: Dear The_HB_Local,  Thank you for your feed back! We are happy to let you know that the old Shades restaurant is currently under renovations and will soon reopen as Henry's Corner a fine dining restaurant with a more intimate ambiance. Summary: Great Place To Stay; My husband and I were down there for a concert  and we choose the hotel due to it's location to the venue.  We had a Great time the hotel  and staff are top notch, the rooms were very nice and the view from our room of the Pacific Ocean was beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear Escape551239,  Thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront. It was a pleasure to have you as our guests. We hope you will join us again for next years concert!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Stayed at this well located Hilton and was really disappointed.  There is substantial ongoing construction, and it is annoying.  At best, an average room, with poor service.  They had the guts to charge over $400 per night for a basic room.  Overrated!

We were in town for Sammy Hagar High Tide Beach Party, and found the hotel decor in the resort and in the rooms extremely appealing, fresh and beach/contemporary. Nice color schemes, layout and very friendly staff. It had everything we needed for the weekend a great location to the beach and nearby restaurants and pier. I didn't personally care for so much of their art choices on the wall but that's just me personally. We would definitely return here again and had a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Monte M,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay with us. We are so happy you enjoyed your time at The Waterfront. We hope you will join us again for next years concert. Safe travels!  At your Service, Guest Experience Manager Kim-Erin Justice

Summary: I was exhausted when I arrived, it was late for me since I came from a central time zone. I got ready for bed, I could hear people talking and laughing and at the time I assumed it was coming from the hallway. Not a good sign, but hallway noise goes by quickly typically. I could hear people outside at the pool and bar but it was muffled. Fell quickly asleep. At 1:45am I was jolted awake by the people next door. They were out on their deck, patio door opening and closing. Slamming. Talking and yelling very loud at each other oblivious to the time of night. Sounded like a teenager male, a mom and a dad. This went on for about 30 minutes. I contemplated being that jerk that pounded on the door or yells across the balcony to be quiet, but I didn’t. The walls are paper thin here. You

A nice hotel with a great family pool. Excellent location in Huntington Beach - a short walk to the ocean and to the pier with plenty of food options near by.  Once the additional pool and courtyard are complete this would be a 5 star location.

I recently stayed for a work conference and it could not of gone better. The staff was amazing, they made sure all our needs were meet and exceeded. The rooms are clean and spacious, I would absolutely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Ask questions about fees breakfast is never free unless you want cold breakfast pay attention on the room booked
Summary: I was unable to charge my phone there was only three outlets one which i had to move the night stand but both outlets kept sparking, electrical haZard, so i couldn’t use it, the next one was by the lamp across the room wouldn’t charge my phone at all, next one in the bathroom my base kept falling out both of them. Very frustrating. There should be a usb or charger on the lamp by the bed there was not. For the price of the room it seemed it would be larger. I had the amount of the room but they increased it which the lady who checked me in sais it was taxes she argued with me and I told her the website for Marriott gave me the taxes. Another person who worked there had to explain it to me as being an additional cost a 50.00 deposit. Something that was not Planned. Parking was

This hotel is located in a beautiful setting right across from the beach. With that said, I would NEVER stay here again. I took my two children and paid a higher price than normal so they could have a luxury experience on the last night of our vacation. It was anything but luxury. The walls are paper thin. We could hear EVERYTHING, ALL NIGHT LONG. Zero sound-proofing and they had us in an adjoining room... that may have been part of the issue. The hotel room we stayed in the days leading up to this last night,  were at a hotel that was 1/3 of the cost. Hands down the other hotel blew away this Hilton in every regard. We had an early flight and the noise at 3-4 AM was unbearable. I would expect this in a Super 8. It was miserable.
Manager Response: Dear Climber528542,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. We are so sorry to hear we fell short of your high expectations. Please know that our staff strives to Make it Right with you during your stay. If you are unhappy with any aspect of your room, we welcome your feedback so we can make you and your guests as comfortable as possible. I do hope you reached out to the front desk to make note of your displeasure. We wish you safe travels and hope you will give us another opportunity to Make it Right with you in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Checked into a beautiful room next to the pool area with great views of the ocean! While all staff at the Resort were very friendly and professional, Jack from the pool area really gave to notch service!! Thank you Jack for making my stay more enjoyable!!
Manager Response: Dear cleve M,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! We are grateful you choose to stay with us and hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: On PCH across from the Beach
Summary: Wonderful location on PCH across from the beach and 10 minutes walk to Main Street.  The pool area with slide was inviting as well as the fire pits on the deck.  I stayed in the new Twin Towers wing with a lovely view of the ocean. Beautiful bathroom area.  The conference rooms were cozy.  Food was ok, but a few of us came down with some food borne illness.  Parking is pricey.
Manager Response: Dear Trekduet,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and our central location. I am so sorry to hear about your experience in regards to our food. If at all possible, please reach out to our Director of Operations, Ajit Acharya at 714-845-8000 to further discuss. Thank you again for letting us know about your experience.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort is easily the best place to stay in HB.  The hotel is located right in the middle of all the action--right on the beach and next to shops and restaurants.  They are undergoing renovations, so that would be my only complaint (one of the pools and exterior areas is completely under construction, but they still have another pool that you can use).
Manager Response: Dear Lauren W,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and we are grateful you choose to be our guest. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Great pool with waterslide looking at ocean.  Has sand and beach toys for kids to play without even needing to go to the beach.  Can take toys and chairs to beach.  Great location near a new shopping food complex

This was by far one of the best Hilton prperties I have stayed at due to both the location and courteous and friendly hotel staff. A bit pricey but worth it with the exception of the $38 per day required valet parking if you have a car.

This is a beautiful resort. My friends and I stayed here after a work conference and it was delightful!  From the minute you arrive at the Valet, you are welcomed by friendly and accommodating employees everywhere you go.   We would call the front desk for something for our room and within minutes someone was at our door.   Tammy, the Concierge, was wonderful!whenever we’d run into her, we’d ask her for more info. Every suggestion was terrific!   The rooms are beautiful, very spacious. We got adjoining rooms and the living room space and balcony was great. The views are gorgeous.   Pool area is wonderful and many lounge chairs! Wish we had time to do the bonfire. We will do that when we return in February!  This hotel will now be one of our ‘regulars’ on our next trip to Cali.

I stayed here recently for a conference and it was spectacular. The views were amazing. Can't beat breakfast overlooking the Pacific Ocean. The hotel staff were friendly, the room was comfortable, and the meeting rooms were some of the best I have experienced. I want to come back with my family to try out the pool facilities.

I enjoyed my stay at the Waterfront Beach Resort in HB. The grounds were immaculate, the staff extremely helpful and friendly. What cemented the vote for me was the view of the ocean from my room. This was truly a remarkable place to stay.

This hotel has it all. Amenities, friendly and helpful staff, wonderful food, clean large rooms and much much more. Oh also, can walk to the pier and Main Street. We will definitely be staying there again upon our next trip

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with convenient access to the beach!
Summary: My friends and I enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Waterfront Hotel. Friendly staff, comfy beds and pillows, great outdoor pool, and an awesome breakfast buffet. Walked the beach path just across the PCH - loved being so close to the ocean. We will definitely be back!

Truly a dog friendly hotel! We were greeted with a special doggie welcome gift, very unexpected but greatly appreciated. The exterior and interior of the hotel are beautiful and welcoming. They even have their own fire pit rings and a s’mores basket available from the Consigner desk.  Absolutely loved our room with an ocean view. Minimal noise from the traffic below, didn’t lose a wink of sleep. The beds and pillows are soft and comfortable. I definitely recommend staying here. They are very close to Pacific City and only 1/2 a mile away from Main St where all the crowds tends to hang out.

We stayed with our eight-year-old daughter for a couple of nights post-Labor Day before a trip to Disney. I was delighted by the location -- the drive from Long Beach airport couldn't have been easier, the gorgeous beach is right there, and tons of shops and restaurants are within 5 - 15 minutes walk from the resort. Pretty much everything you need, from fancy coffee to wine and fresh fish, can be found at the Pacific City outdoor mall/food court just down the block. All of this made for a really comfortable home base for our quick HB visit, and, passing by the other resorts nearby, I felt we had made the best decision in picking the Waterfront.   The property itself is mostly bright, cheerful and clean. We stayed in a 2-queen Twin Dolphin suite with a view of the ocean at an

Our room wasn’t ready so we sat at pool. It was okay, music playing was kind of obnoxious and chairs we so close together that it was difficult to move to face beach and sun. Young kids in pool were screaming. The room was nice but obviously person before us smoked in room. Lobby and hotel nicely decorated and great vicinity to beach and shopping, restaurants near by are expensive. We tried to enjoy ourselves at fire pits at pool at night but some corporate group rented all the area out despite almost all the pits were free, very disappointing that they cater solely to large groups , they could of easily kept one fire pit open to other guests. If not for a reward coupon I probably wouldn’t stay here, very expensive especially when amenities aren’t available to all guests.

Unexpectedly a real enjoyable stay, we even ate dinner & breakfast, in room good food & service. We were there for 3 days and one of the nicest amenities was the valet service for the car one fee and parked and retrieved the car when you needed it. I must mentioned one of the valet person by the name of Dave his mom & I are about the same age she's taking surfing up in her sixties 60+ that was impressive and Dave was encouraging to me as well to realize it's not to late until you say so. Plenty to say but the best was the bed linen was very comfy and found out the pad they used for the the top of mattress I'm getting one.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for the wonderful review of your recent stay. I am thrilled you were able to enjoy our amenities and valet parking. I will pass on your accolades to Dave and his supervisor. Thank you for mentioning him by name. We are grateful you choose to stay with us and hope you will stay with us again if your travels bring you back to Orange County.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The Waterford Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel is absolutely extraordinary in so many ways.  The location is perfect as it's steps away from the beach and local highlights.  The property itself is magical with a huge pool, outside bar and several restaurants and cafes.  The rooms were the best I've ever in terms of luxury, space and style.  The people that work there were friendly beyond belief.    Bottom line:  I'm so glad I had the opportunity to stay there.  We'll go back again.  It was a dream come true for me.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear KarenAGonzales,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay! WOW. What a wonderful recap. We are truly grateful to have you as our guest and hope that you will return in the near future. We know you have many options when staying in Huntington Beach...thank you for choosing The Waterfront Beach Resort!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel in a perfect location. Despite turning up late the staff at the check in desk was extremely friendly and welcoming. And when they found out that we were on our honeymoon they upgraded us to a very nice room with excellent sunset views. And the next day we found a nice bottle of sparkling wine waiting on us in the room after lunch. We really appreciated all the small gestures. The room itself was very spacious and had all the amenities needed. The hotel is within easy walking distance from the old town.
Manager Response: Dear Runoldm,  Congratulations again on your recent marriage! We are thrilled you choose to stay with us on such a momentous occasion. I am happy to hear it was such an enjoyable time. We hope next year for your 1st anniversary and for many anniversaries to come, you two will return to The Waterfront to celebrate! Have a wonderful weekend.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed here just one night after a family trip to Disney.  We had an oceanfront room on the 11th floor-which was beautiful.  We sat out at the pool for awhile which was large, had a couple water slides, a big jacuzzi, lots of loungers and a nice pool bar with great service. They have a little sandy beach area with fire pits that had glass walls facing ocean which was nice to sit out at without being windy.  We went up to the 9th floor lounge for a cocktail which had a great view, but they were going to close early so just had a quick drink.  Breakfast outside by the pool was good.  Lots of restaurants and shopping in the surrounding area.  If we get the chance will be back another time for more then a night. All the employees we encountered were pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear LVAmy,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review of your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities and close proximity to nearby shopping and restaurants. It sounds like you had the perfect vacation filed with everything Orange County has to offer! We hope if your travels ever bring you to Huntington Beach once again; you will stay with us. Have a wonderful weekend!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Hotel is in a great location, close to beach and Main Street.  Walking distance to amenities and local highlights.  Staff was friendly and accommodating.  The new tower is absolutely great and a lovely upgrade.
Manager Response: Dear 526peters,  Thank you for leaving a review of your stay. We are grateful to have had you as our guest. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront Beach Resort. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff, pool, views, but a loud room
Summary: The staff is extremely polite and personable.  It’s a great location near the beach with a pretty darn good pool.  The gym is also pretty darn good.  I was frustrated that I could hear the TV of the room next to me while I was in bed.  That shouldn’t happen in a hotel at this price point.  Would I stay here again, yes, but I’d ask for no one on the rooms next to me.

We stayed in a room on a high floor in the older Huntington tower.  The room was very comfortable, very clean and the view was spectacular.   Not ocean front, but still spectacular. And a really quiet nice room for sleeping.  This tower is older, but still excellently maintained.  The balcony is smaller in this tower but that wasn't a hindrance to us.  Every single employee we met was supremely warm and welcoming.  We ate breakfast there and were quite pleased with the selection of food.  This hotel has a really relaxed, warm, friendly atmosphere.  Lots of families here and every room was full on the weekend.  The pool area is super nice and was quite busy.  I believe there will be a second new pool once construction is completed.   Part of our stay in Huntington Beach was spent

My husband and I stayed here prior to a conference at another venue. The location was perfect and the views were exactly what we wanted, we booked the oceanfront 2 queen deluxe in the Twin Dolphin Tower which was lovely. Well it was lovely until there were blood stain on the leather base portion of the bed, which were not from us as we showed the front desk manager our legs were injury free. She apologized but was rather aloof with it in my opinion, I mean it was a blood stain! Yes, it was cleaned by the time we returned back to the room after our bike ride, but my husband is a firefighter and was surprised there was no further action taken. Then we checked out and my husband realized he forgot his Cubs polo hanging on the towel hook in the bathroom, so I called immediately,

Summary Heading: Amazing welcome by a guy named Evan
Summary: Not sure what this guy does, but he was out front and greater and helped us as soon as we got to the property and made us feel very welcomed! The property is beautiful and half is still in construction but the pool is beautiful and the slide is great!

Stayed here for 5 nights over Labor Day Weekend.  Beautiful resort which is right across the street from the beach.  Had a nice, clean comfortable room on a high floor in the Huntington Tower which had a view of the beach and the pool.   At the present time, there is only one pool open and this makes for a chaotic situation.  The pool was unbelievably packed on Labor Day Weekend to the point that it was uncomfortable to be there.  The hot tub was packed with little kids and some of them had diapers on.  This was a big negative to me.  Had breakfast each morning at the Boardwalk Restaurant.  Had a pleasant breakfast each day except for Saturday when there was a 30 minute wait to be seated even though there were multiple open tables.  For some reason, the restaurant was

Excellent doesn't describe the awesome experience we had @ Waterfront Beach Resort!  The property is gorgeous and well-maintained.  Our room was fabulous!  And Vanessa at the concierge desk is AMAZING!!!!!!! She went above and beyond to make this a trip of a lifetime for two TN girls!!  I can only hope that I can visit again someday!

Summary Heading: Another Outstanding Stay at the Waterfront Resort
Summary: This was our third stay at the resort. As with the previous two, this stay was outstanding. All staff were excellent - pool service, restaurant, front desk, and housekeeping. Special thanks to Joseph Boyer - Director Reservations & VIP services for thoughtfully acknowledging our 41st anniversary and my recent retirement. Mr. Boyer is an absolute pleasure to deal with and provided us welcome gifts and an upgraded room. Have read other reviews about the current construction, but it did not affect us much. The resort will be even more beautiful when the construction is complete, but it is the service that sets this resort apart from others that I have stayed.

Was here for a wedding so my review is based on that experience. Hotel is across the street from the beach so the sunset views are really nice. The wedding was outdoors and unfortunately because hotel is on a main drag there was traffic noise making it hard to hear the vows at times. Hotel did an amazing job with the wedding reception decorations, bar and food. Service was also great and the staff are very friendly. Hotel also charges $15 for parking which is expected for the area. If  you are getting married this could be a great location for a reception.

I stayed here for 4 nights and paid up for the new tower (dolphin tower) ocean view on the 7th floor. The room itself was great. I have to start off saying, I’m comparing this to U.S. 5-star hotels and not higher standard international hotels. In the US., amenities such as slippers are cheaper quality, “ocean view” usually means your view is not completely on the ocean, rather, obstructed by a road and/or parking lot; and finally, the cleanliness isn’t as immaculate as you find internationally.That’s the case with this hotel and all the hotels in the area so I can’t hold it against the hotel. The pool looked nice but I never used it as it was full of little kids. They have 3 nice fire pits but sadly they close them up by 10 pm— way too early in my opinion. Same with the hot tub.

The hotel was great! Omar the bartender at the pool bar was helpful and great. I would reccomend the hotel getting some better pool food, because I spent my whole 2 days relaxing there.
