We were really looking forward to spending a relaxing week at this hotel with my family and dog, but I was left feeling disappointed with our stay. We stayed in the twin dolphin tower.  Pros: Beautiful, well decorated, nice new construction, room was nice and having two tvs was awesome. Ate dinner at Waterfront restaurant each night - staff was friendly and attentive. Food was good. Pool was nicely laid out. Waterslides were great. Cons: Waterfront restaurant menu choices were somewhat limited, especially if you are looking for something light and healthy - basically one soup and a salad. Would have preferred to see something basic like a healthy chicken breast etc (not a salty, braised 1/2 chicken). Room was supposed to be oceanfront, but basically just looked out onto the
Manager Response: Dear ocmom340,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for the challenges and inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We understand the fine balance between owner and pet-as-family member and will relate your experience to our housekeeping staff for further clarification on our "knock and announce" policy. You are able to refuse service during your stay but we are required to perform a welfare check every 24 hours. At no time do we allow pets to remain in the room unattended (as was signed on the "pet policy" form at check-in).    Best wishes on your continued travels together.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Nice resort in great location. Friendly staff, great bell and valet service. Did not get a higher rating because of construction. Our original room overlooked a dirt hole. We were eventually moved, but just be aware before booking if construction noise would bother your vacation
Manager Response: Dear mbhaack,  Thank you for your review. we do our utmost to inform our guests of rooms and room types that may be impacted in any way (noise, view, etc.) by the construction of our second pool, restaurant, and spa. are proceeding ahead of schedule and rooms near those locations are discounted for that reason. If view and the utmost silence is important to you, always contact the hotel to discuss the exact room-type you desire.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Hotel is great, front desk service is really, really bad
Summary: First the good - the hotel is amazing! Love the location by Huntington Beach with great proximity to lots of restaurants, shopping etc. The amenities were first class and the rooms were well decorated with everything we needed. We had an ocean view suite in the Twin Dolphin tower and LOVED IT! Housekeeping was the best, very nice and accommodating. There is no self park, valet only - which is expensive but the valet service (although busy) was great. The guys were very friendly and went out of their way to help us even when they were overwhelmed with a heavy influx of cars/guests.  Now for the negative - the front desk team was extremely rude. At check in, I was double checking our reservation (since it was done through a different service) and she made it known that it was
Manager Response: Dear LMBDOS,  Thank you for your review. it was disappointing to see that we led in so many ways and how a single department could then take that incredible sense of our property and color it differently for you. On behalf of our operations management team, we apologize. We will be distribution this review to all of our Front Desk associates with a request for feedback and explanation. This is not acceptable and we hope that you will give us another go in the future.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We originally planned to stay 4 nights, but left after the first day. Our fault, we should have never even considered the Huntington Tower. It’s deep in construction. 8am bulldozers, jack hammers. You can’t sit outside or even open the door. They were unable to move us, so we moved to a different resort in the area. Dolphin tower is new, Huntington is old. They didn’t make them seamless. It’s a 20 year time warp between the two. Our room a King suite was odd shaped and wasted square footage on hallways and the bathroom. I have a hard time believe they were remodeled. They just put new tile on the floor, and shower. Kept the counters from the last remodel. Old clock, fridge and  only 3 outlets in the whole place.  The resort grounds are nice. Fire pits are lame that you have to
Manager Response: Dear TigardMama,  We're sorry your experience was less than stellar during your stay at The Waterfront. While we are working on our newest (second) pool, we try to keep the noise to a minimum and only work from 8am-5pm, all of which is noted on our confirmation letters. Additionally, we discount those rooms heavily and forewarn anyone staying on that side of the resort as to what is going on. It is why the rate is so heavily discounted. We're sorry for the disturbance and, due to occupancy, were unable to accommodate a room move. Our best wishes and yes, please return in the fall when all is said and done. We'd be thrilled to give it another go and show you what we're all about!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I don’t know, I search high and low for what looked like a cool waterfront resort that wouldn’t break the bank & I decided on this one. My husband and I both found it a little too pretentious for our tastes (we have a 2 yr old and a 5 yr old, so the jig is up). I don’t mind paying for parking, but I really wish self-parking were an option. When you have kids, it seems like you need to access your car all the time & it’s annoying to have to mess with valets left and right for that. We didn’t explore much of the resort because my youngest and I both were sick at the time, so perhaps we would have enjoyed it more if we had taken full advantage of its amenities. I just remember feeling stressed out that the kids were going to break something. So...while it’s a lovely resort and not
Manager Response: Dear Leguizamo,  Thank you for your review. We're sorry you were unhappy with your stay. As we are a beach resort, our parking is very limited and therefore we only offer valet services in order to accommodate all of our guests. The waterslide rules are actually safety regulations enforced by The State of California as well as City Ordinances enacted here in Huntington Beach where we take water safety very seriously. The waterslides run at very high pressure which can be both overwhelming and dangerous for the littles (or an inexperienced swimmer). For this reason, we also have posted lifeguards on duty as well.  We do hope you return soon. We pride ourselves on being the "family-friendliest" in Huntington Beach and look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I loved this hotel, comfortable beds and a new pool that doesn't have a deep area and two small water slides. Also has a sand area for play or bonfires. Beautiful view of Huntington beach. They supply beach towels and small beach toys for kids to play in sand.
Manager Response: Dear Braed,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I am so pleased you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My issues with this hotel began prior to my arrival; so unfortunately, I think it tainted my view of our entire stay. I will start with some positive aspects of the hotel. Our room was clean, comfortable, and spacious. The pool area was nice although pool service was inconsistent. The hotel is in a great location across from main beach and walking distance to restaurants and local shopping. The problem? My reservation. I was traveling with 3 teenage boys and requested a very specific room to accommodate our party of 6. Central reservations confirmed my room, quoted me a price, and sent me a confirmation. A few days prior to departing on our trip, I realized the room on my email confirmation didn't look like the one I requested. I called the front desk and they confirmed it
Manager Response: Dear 471Patricia,  Thank you for your review. Your comments will help to further train and refine our processes throughout the resort. We greatly appreciate your staying with us in light of the issues you expresses and we apologize for not meeting your expectations. We do hope that you stay with us again in the future and allow us the opportunity "Make It Right".  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great pool, great views, large rooms, great service
Summary: We had a corner ocean front king suite in Huntington Tower and loved it. Construction still underway but was not disturbing.  Very spacious with large wet bar counter, cabinets and mini frig. Bath includes bath tub with shower plus stand alone shower. Very spacious bathrooms with storage. View is amazing. Wrap around patio was great for morning coffe and late night caps.  Pool service is attentive and reasonable priced sandwiches, salads, snacks. Boardwalk restaurant very family friendly. Roof top bar is nice but pricey for drinks. With our patio, we had the same views and our privacy. Bell staff very friendly & efficient. Love the kids sand beach at pool area. Lobby is gorgeous. We like the remodel. Room sitting area (suite) was roomy and well appointed. Love the beach vibe.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your stay. We appreciate you trusting us with your family vacation! Sounds like all of you have a fantastic time. Huntington Beach is such a great walk-able beach city...glad you took advantage of it. We understand that you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront! Have a great summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Daughter graduated from college and a bunch of us came in Feom out of town. The waterfront doesn’t disappoint. This is our second d year staying here and we can’t wait to book next years trip. Do the bonfire!
Manager Response: Dear scoobydoo6,  Thank you for leaving a wonderful review of your stay. Happy to hear you enjoyed a Southern California Beach Bonfire! It is my favorite activity to do with my family. We understand you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This resort was top notch. We had an amazingly comfortable experience.  The conference room was comfortable and the food was wonderful. The view looking out at the beach from the patio where our conference meals were was exceptional.
Manager Response: Dear Kay C,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review! I hope you are able to come back soon for a leisure stay. Thank you again and have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The hotel was beautiful , the food was delicious , the views were amazing , and Tammy made my daughter’s birthday spectacular by going out of her way to ensure everything was absolutely perfect !  From the sunset bonfire upon our arrival to the birthday balloons , cake and sparkling cider beautifully displayed for our celebration it couldn’t have been more perfect ! We would definitely recommend this hotel and please see Tammy for any concierge requests .... she is THE BEST!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review! Tammy is THEE BEST! Thank you for mentioning her by name. I will make sure to pass on your kind words to her. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach, thank you for choosing to stay with us.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: So many 5 star reviews... all valid - Sean at the front desk was super kind and helpful. He anticipated my arrival and handed me a welcome letter with my name already typed in - very sweet personal touch. The room on the top floor was gorgeous with a balcony that overlooked the ocean. I couldn't figure out the ac, so I called the operator and minutes later, an engineer was cooling down my room. They've got an amazing setup for the pool / jacuzzi with different colored lights, and a water slide. Breakfast was tasty with a fully flavored eggs benedict, and tender potatoes. Then Andrew in Valet was kind enough to have my car ready to go as soon as I checked out. Very happy with the whole experience.

For Mother's Day & Father's Day this year, I booked my parents a multiple night stay at the Hilton Waterfront Huntington Beach Resort on me. Rates run about $289 per night. I was able to list my mom as the main traveler so her name was on the room as well as mine. I also put my card down for the $100 "incidentals" charge, which is refunded if you don't use it. Because they also parked at the resort, which is valet only, $36 was charged to the room per day as well. The $36 allows for in and out privileges from the parking lot. I called to confirm in advance. They were in an oceanfront room with complete views of the ocean. Not partial, but a full view. There was a snafu at check-in as we arrived a little after 2:30 pm but the room wasn't ready. We were told that check-in was
Manager Response: Dear Trina D,  Thank you for choosing The Waterfront. It was a pleasure to have your parents as our guests as we look forward to all of you returning soon. Final completion of construction on the newest (second) pool, restaurant, and spa are slated for the end of the year, if not sooner. Watch our social media pages and websites for further updates. Thank you, and safe journeys!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Loved our double queen suite in the twin dolphin tower, would stay there again in a heartbeat! The access to the beach was super convenient. The complimentary pool activities on Saturday were awesome!
Manager Response: Dear sgciota,  Thank you for the kind review of your stay at The Waterfront. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Have a fantastic summer!   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: First off, the customer service is amazing.  Friendliest staff I have ever encountered.  Our room was new, stylish, comfy - just perfect.  Loved that we had a balcony, too.  The turn-down service was an amazing touch.  Pool area was perfect for adults and for kids (mine loved the waterslides).  Food at the Dockside restaurant was awesome.  If I could come back next weekend to this same hotel, I would.  Easy access to the pool and so close to downtown.  We absolutely loved it.  A+ in my book!!
Manager Response: Dear MN322,  What a wonderful review of your stay. It sound like you and your family had a terrific vacation. It was a pleasure to have you as our guests. Our location does make for a stress free getaway. Happy to hear you took advantage of our complimentary beach accessories! We hope to see you back in the near future. Have a great summer!   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for the Purina Incredible Dog Challenge and loved how dog friendly they were. We received a dog welcome basket at check in and the grass right out front with poop bags was super convenient. The staff was always super friendly and happy from the valet to the front desk to the maids. The hotel and rooms were very clean and the room was nice.
Manager Response: Dear Kristie M,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay. We love the Dog Challenge and look forward to watching it on NBC later in July. We are honored you choose to stay with us and hope we will see you again in the near future. Safe journeys and best to you and your fur-family!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Excellent place to stay for a family or couple! Very clean, frienldly, and a great location! This is our families favorite vacation spot and we’ve been repeat customers for many years. They just opened a new tower and pool and it’s perfect!
Manager Response: Dear nancybX697OL,  Thank you for reviewing your stay! Sounds like you and your family had a wonderful time making Waterfront Memories. We know you have many options when staying in Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Have a great summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel 2 years ago for a conference and it was nice. However, the improvments they have made are amazing. The hotel has turned into a beautiful resort. There is still some construction taking place but you could not hear any noise.
Manager Response: Dear stacih775,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay! We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach, thank you for choosing to stay with us. Have a wonderful summer and we hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Disappointed due to the lack of pool view and construction noise- both of which made the ocean side room I paid more for completely pointless. Will not book a reservation to stay at this location in the future.
Manager Response: Dear caliranger173,  Thank you for sharing your experience. I am so sorry your time with us was less than enjoyable. Please know it is our pleasure to assist you in any way while you are our guest. Our front desk staff is always available to Make it Right if you are not satisfied with your stay. If you would like to talk to someone about your stay, please give us a call. Our Director of Operations, Mr. Ajit Acharya, would be pleased to take your call.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic resort with excellent customer service!
Summary: We chose this resort for its location. We knew it was close to the beach, but that was all we knew. We were so impressed with the beauty and cleanliness of the resort. The staff was friendly and provided excellent service. They offer complimentary beach chairs, umbrellas, sand toys, and towels to make the beach experience very easy. We didn't need to drive anywhere because the pier and downtown restaurants are about a 10 minute walk (with children). Everything is close to the resort. We enjoyed dining at the hotel as well. The food was served quickly and tasted great! We are so impressed with this property and the staff. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Aimee1968,  What a wonderful review of your stay. It sound like you and your family had a terrific vacation. It was a pleasure to have you as our guests. Our location does make for a stress free getaway. Happy to hear you took advantage of our complimentary beach accessories! We hope to see you back in the near future. Have a great summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Lovely hotel. Right across the street from the ocean. Ocean views from rooms and pools. Couldn't have asked for a better stay. Could use a few more restaurants and less priced items in the gift shop for things like sun screen and baby products. Also parking was kind of pricey. Other than that 5 star!
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany R,  Thank you for the kind review of your stay at The Waterfront. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Have a fantastic summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Loved my spacious room overlooking the beach. The staff couldn't have been nicer or more attentive. My only complaint: the lobby level bar and food options are pretty boring. Otherwise a great stay in a gorgeous place.
Manager Response: Dear Marfou275,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay. We are honored you choose to stay with us and hope we will see you again in the near future. Have a wonderful week.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Great Place for Couples or Families
Summary: Solid Hotel, staff did a great job of accommodating on a few small request. I would recommend this hotel as it is close to the beach. There is also plenty of food choices nearby. Lastly the hotel went through a renovation recently and I can say it was worth it. Very good place for a weekend as a couple or the family.
Manager Response: Dear Jeremy,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay! I am thrilled you and your family enjoyed our property. We are loving the new Pacific City; so close to us with amazing restaurants and shopping. I hope you are able to come visit us again in the near future!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This is in a great location for Huntington Beach, Newport Beach and Laguna beach. There are a lot of great restaurants and plenty of shopping in the near vicinity. We had two rooms in the newly built twin dolphin tower and the rooms were immaculate, spacey and clean with great views of the pool, beach and sea. Each room has a nice balcony to watching the beautiful sunsets. Valet parking is excellent but it is an additional cost as is the internet. It is very pet friendly and the dogs can go into most areas with a convenient piece of grass right in front of the hotel. Service was very good, in room dining service was timely and tasty. The restaurant is good for breakfast but like a lot of hotels don't expect dinner at the same highest standard. Menu is limited and the food

Love staying at Hilton hotel always nice people and great stay the price can go down alittle lol but overall it’s always nices and I’m always having a good time at the pool and the bars in the Hilton.

We absolutely love this property! We are local and enjoy staycations at this hotel. The location can't be beat. There is plenty to do nearby from dining, sight seeing, biking the boardwalk at the beach.

Staff was very nice and helpful. Kids loved the waterslides and oversized jacuzzi. Room was clean and comfortable but a little tight for 2 adults and 2 kids (7 & 10) but for a couple nights it totally works. Location is great. Easy walk to Main Street but without the noise and crowds.

Valet wasn’t cool.  As I pulled up to the hotel in my car, I was approached by valet staff and was immediately asked “Who are you here to pick up?”  I told him that I was checking in and he didn’t even apologize for assuming I was an Uber/Lyft driver.   I then took my own bags inside.
Manager Response: Dear Alfonso E,  Thank you for your recent review. At The Waterfront we strive to use comments such as yours as a "teachable moment". We'll address this rather interesting concern with our valet company, ACE Parking.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This was the second time we stayed at this beautiful hotel. Spent Memorial Day with my family and friends. Spacious and clean rooms, beautiful ocean views, exceptional customer service. Will go back again.

This is my daughter and I's second time visiting The Waterfront Hotel. The first time we came was a few weeks after Christmas 2017, an (overnight getaway) and it was awesome. They still had Christmas decor up, which was beautiful, it was quiet, due in part it being still around the holidays, and the staff was very warm and friendly. This time around, something was lost. I couldn't wait to visit the new Dolphin tower, (we stayed in the Huntington the first visit) reading so many reviews on how nice it is.   Pros:  1. LOVE the room! I had a double bed, 1 bedroom, ocean view suite in the new tower. Spacious, stylish, comfortable, and the view is nice. LOTS of bathroom space, which my daughter and I loved.  2. Maid service came later in the evening to offer extra water, towels, ice
Manager Response: Dear  jro483,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry that we missed the mark more than we seemed to hit it. Your stay fell immediately after Memorial Day weekend. If action is what you were craving, we were on fire! Many returned for the final week(s) of school and we welcomed the chance to catch our breath and get things in order for the summer madness about to ensue. Likewise, Marine Safety took the same time to give our lifeguards a final round of water rescue practice, which did involve a police helicopter dropping divers into the water. Our apologies for the disturbance.   Again, thank you for the great detail in your review. We use reviews like this as a learning opportunity and will most assuredly share it with our entire staff. We strive to be the utmost in hospitality and our many changes have brought a myriad of challenges along the way. We hope to welcome you back and would love the opportunity to "Make It Right". When making your reservation, please do it the old fashioned way... a voice phone call! Be sure to confirm you are speaking with the hotel and not central reservations. Ask for Joseph, our Director of Reservations and VIP Services. Reference this letter and he'll work his magic! Please have your previous reservation information handy. We look forward to serving you!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Lots of activities for kids, great location, wonderful service, rooms were well maintained. Pool and rooftop lounge are a must for first timers. Used concierge to have a memorable s’mores experience on the beach!

ROOM: The room was extremely spacious and comfortable. The decor was lovely -- beachy and relaxing -- and the bathroom had plenty of room. I enjoyed a quiet morning on the balcony which had comfortable and clean chairs to lounge on.  SERVICE: Service was friendly and pleasant. It was a busy weekend for them and they apologized for the wait caused by having so many guests on property.  LOCATION: Location was convenient and in walking distance to the beach.  We would stay here again if in the area.

Summary Heading: Construction and Lack of Elite Benefits
Summary: Disappointed in the loud jackhammering and construction outside my balcony. This construction is part of a renovation the hotel is doing and within their control. An ocean view is worthless if I can’t hear over the incessant noise in the afternoon or when trying to sleep in. I should have been advised of this at room selection time. I advised the hotel staff of the issue and they didn’t acknowledge the problem or seek to remedy it.  In addition, the lack of a late check out despite my elite status shows how the Marriott/Starwood brand provides a valuable distinction.    In sum, I’m not sure I’d choose this property again.
Manager Response: Dear Scott N,  We apologize for any disturbance during your stay. We have made every effort to inform our guests (from booking to confirmation to arrival) and then accommodate any changes we can. Your room was originally discounted as a result of the work going on nearby and was confirmed in an email that was sent to you (and opened). We know these details can get overlooked, and we're very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us. We are very near the end of the hardest part of the construction on our second (and thank goodness, FINAL) pool, restaurant and spa. We hope you return to enjoy the all-new Waterfront Beach Resort when we are complete later this year.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Terrible value for a place under construction during the overcast beach season. Would leave a very different review if the place was finished and it was beach season. The only restaurant open was a joke.
Manager Response: Dear  Aaron S,  Thank you for your review. We are very sorry that we did not meet your expectations. While weather is out of our control entirely, operating a hotel while under significant enhancement is. We are very sorry this impacted your stay and hope that we can make it up to you in the future. If you would like to talk to someone about your stay, please give us a call. Our Director of Operations, Mr. Ajit Acharya, would be pleased to take your call.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: My family just got back from a week at Huntington Beach staying at the Waterfront Beach resort.  The facility is absolutely outstanding, although under construction.  When this facility is done, it will be the best property in the area and might be the best property I have ever been to in the Hilton family (I only stay at Hiltons and travel 25% of the time).    The new pool is fantastic.  The kids loved the two water slides.  The service at the poool was great.  They are very well staffed in the pool area with a lifeguard, security, wait staff, and general pool support.  In general, the team was very attentive, polite, and responsive to any and all requests.  One team member even found a couple of toys in the lost and found to keep my son entertained while I relaxed in the hot
Manager Response: Dear Brendan V,   What an outstanding review of your stay! I am so happy you and your family enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Our new amenities are definitely the talk of the town. The renovation of our existing 28 year old pool is underway and it will also be a great addition to our refreshed property. I am so glad you took advantage of our wonderful location. The opening of Pacific City and their upscale food court LOT 579 has been a much need addition to the area. We hope that when your travels bring you back to Southern California, you would once again consider being a Waterfront guest. Have a great week!   At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We booked this resort for the 80’s festival. What a great time we had. Enjoyed riding our bikes along the beach and the resort had a great safe place to lock up the bikes. Easy walk to shopping and food. We are hoping to make this a yearly mini vacation.
Manager Response: Dear hatchet43,  Thank you for the very kind review...and come back soon! We hear the concert series on State Beach for June 23-24 will be AMAZING! Come back, enjoy another stay.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Best California Hotel by the Ocean in Huntington Beach, California
Summary: Most Friendly and Inviting Hotel in California near the Ocean.  My Dog "Buddy" and I absolutely love this Hotel.  We have visited this hotel for the past 3 years and always leave feeling welcomed and special.  Tammy, the Hotel Concierge remembers my Dog and I by name and always welcomes us when we arrive.  The Hotel also has the best Ocean Views and Guest Lobbies.
Manager Response: Dear carolynross84,   Thank you for the glowing review of your recent stay! It was a pleasure to have you and Buddy as our guests. Thank you for mentioning Tammy by name. She is one of our amazing all stars that makes our property shine! We hope to see you again in the near future. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed in the new twin dolphin tower. It is amazing. I love the layout of the room and our view of the ocean was fantastic. The room is spacious and very clean. The room even had 2 closets!! We came here for our sons birthday after Disneyland to relax and that’s exactly what we did! The new pool was spacious and very clean with a view of the ocean as well. The restaurant staff were exceptional. They gave our son a dessert and a birthday card with our dinner. The food was okay. They do charge $36 dollars to park a day. The other nice thing was each night they came around and asked if you would like any bottle water and ice. It is right across the highway from the beach and within walking distance of restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: Dear E H,  Thank you for your amazing review of your recent stay with us. I am so happy to read you had such a wonderful time. One of the amenities in our new premium Twin Dolphin Tower features turn down service for each room. It consists of refreshing the room, prepping your bed, bottled waters, and chocolates. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We have attended several holiday buffets here. Food is always good and staff attentive. We had 2pm Mother's Day outside seating reservations.  When I called in the morning to change the reservation (wanted to add another table or get larger table so that my cousin and his family could join us) I was told that the seating assignments were already made and the outside seating for 2pm was full.  My cousin did not join us (kept his Newport Hyatt reservations instead).  We were told there would be a jazz group playing from 2pm to 4pm, but instead it was a keyboard player with piped-in music and a female singer who we did enjoy...very briefly.  After about 45 minutes they took "a break" (as the staff informed us) and when they returned about 45 minutes later, only the keyboard player
Manager Response: Dear  Ron K,  Thank you for your review and bringing this to our attention. Our management was also concerned and aware of the "lack of performance" and promised entertainment by an outside talent agency. We would like to speak to you personally and "Make This Right". Please contact our Director of Food & Beverage, Mr. Mitch Queen, at your earliest convenience. 714.845.8000. Have your reservation details handy to confirm with him and he'll take the matter from there. It is important to us that you are satisfied with your experiences here at The Waterfront and there is no excuse for this, regardless of outside talent or fully booked event lawns.  Again, our sincere apologies and we look forward to your call.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Very nice place to stay. Staff is very friendly and helpful, the new pool is awesome my daughter loved the water slides.The rooms in the new tower are very nice and spacious and the Sunday brunch was very good, can’t wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear Becky G,  Thank you for your wonderful review. I am so happy to hear your daughter enjoyed our new Driftwood Beach Club! We hope to see you again in the near future. Thank you for staying with us.  At your Service, Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We had a fabulous weekend! The service was amazing. The staff was very helpful and friendly all the way down to the sweet lady that cleaned our room and the young men that handled our luggage! The Mothers Day brunch was delicious! The new pool is beautiful. The rooms are gorgeous!

Amazing renovation. Incredible staff. All the amenities for a romantic get-away or a family vacation. Close to tons of restaurants, shopping, downtown Huntington Beach and the world famous Surf City pier. You cannot possibly be dis-satisfied. This hotel has it all and the staff goes out of their way to spoil you. For a little more "room" go with the Pacific Suite in the new Twin Dolphin Tower. Incredible views of the Pacific Ocean.

We have stayed in the old towers several times, we did not think it could get any better. This weekend we experienced the new Twin Dolphin Tower with 17  family members, the rooms were exceptional, clean and had beautiful views ! The staff from valet, bellhop to check in were knowledgeable , friendly and courteous. We enjoyed all the properties amenities, especially all 17 around the fire pit.. Mother’s Day Brunch was above and beyond what we expected. Our Housekeeper , Bernicia was so efficient and helpful.  We look forward to returning soon!  When a new property is opened there are bound to be glitches, we did not experience any ! Ray & Belva

Beware - gorgeous remodel and very friendly staff, but if you have small children (under 48”) they will not be allowed to use the new waterslides and the rooms are not toddler-friendly. We were disappointed compared to the amenities for small children offered at the Hyatt next door.
Manager Response: Dear robbanderika,  Thank you for your review. We're sorry that you feel our resort is not as friendly as some, but as the waterslides (and rules we must adhere to in order to have them) are regulations set by the city and are very new to us, we are learning as we go as well. Our new Shortboards Kids Club will be opening soon and off more options to the younger set as well. Any suggestions for improvement in our offerings are always welcomed!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This trip was a mix of business and personal. My husband attended a conference while I was in town for the location itself. Check-in to the hotel was great and quick but we ran into a few hiccups during our stay. We resolved the hiccups prior to check-out but incurred the same hiccup again after we returned home. To say that the hiccup was a mistake isn’t one word I would use. The resolves hiccup was the same hiccup and the hotel staff didn’t put the two and two together to get to the bottom of it. So a few calls there and research on their end resolved the issue. But I will say, that there was a disconnect in how the hiccup occurred as the hotel had a checks and balance process they follow. If that is the case then obviously somewhere it’s broken. Otherwise the staff was very

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel! Ask for a room in the dolphin twin tower!
Summary: I love this hotel! I liked it so much that I rebooked it right after my first stay for another trip I had in the area the following week. The hotel just had some major renovations and they are superb. All of the staff are kind, professional, and helpful. The hotel’s location is just across the street from the beach (Huntington Beach’s township doesn’t allow hotels to be built directly on the beach so this is as close as you can get.) Ask for a room in the dolphin twin tower. And lastly, enjoy your holiday :)

Summary Heading: New Tower and resort wide updates are amazing.
Summary: We just stayed here this past weekend with several other families.  It was a perfect property for us.  Staff was great.  The rooms in the new tower were amazing.  The price for a property on the water can't be beat.

I am having a great stay at this fantastic resort. The service here is outstanding. Special shout out to Eddie Franco who went above and beyond call of service. He drove me to the CVS to get some socks, he waited for me and drove me back to the resort. Talk about keeping an eye on your customer who is new to the area and not sure where and what to do.  Great kid. Wish him all the best with his studies and job at the resort.  Thanks Eddie.

We booked one night here to celebrate my husband's birthday and we had a great relaxing time.  The service is over the top - all of the hotel employees we encountered were helpful, courteous and eager to please.  The room was fabulous, the food was excellent and the facility was so peaceful.  We hope to come back soon.
Manager Response: Dear BusyInTorrance,  Thank you for the kind review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy you and your husband had a wonderful time celebrating his birthday. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful views, great location, very clean
Summary: The property is right on the beach - hard to ask for better views than that! The room was very comfortable and clean. The new Pacific City mall is a short walk away with great shops and restaurants. It was hard to enjoy the pool and hot tub area because there were just so many young children running around and screaming. I get it at the pool, but even the hot tub? That's really on the parents than the hotel, but it still took away from the experience. They are doing some renovation work to the hotel, so we didn't get the full experience necessarily.
Manager Response: Dear  DaDaDa20,  Thank you for your review and kind words. If ever you are disturbed during your stay, for any reason, quietly let us know and we'll handle it. We don't mind dealing with any situation on your behalf (privately)... it's what we do! Thank you for staying with us and come back again soon.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing and PR The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: My wife and I stayed here while I was conducting business nearby in Newport Beach over a weekend.   The resort is very close to John Wayne Airport (SNA), and right along the Pacific Coast Hwy (1).  Maple beaches with great waves breaking are across the street, and the resort has almost everything you need, except a Spa- but we saw signs that one is coming.   The price was right -booked through a third-party site, though parking is valet-only and a bit pricey.   Great rooftop bar at the resort’s Dolphin Tower - great drinks, vibe and view.  Definitely a must-see.  Newport Beach, Laguna and Long Beach all not far away.
Manager Response: Dear DHER1,  Thank you for your review. Your observations of our destination were spot on ...and yes, come the end of the year we'll have an all new spa here at The Waterfront. In the meantime, enjoy your travels and come back and see us again!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon  Director of Marketing & PR  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I am currently staying at the Waterfront Beach Resort whilst attending a conference.  I arrived at 10pm on Sunday night, and after a transatlantic flight was looking forward to a good nights sleep.  To my horror, when I pulled back the duvet I realised that the bedding had not been changed since the previous guest checked out and they had clearly had been rather ill and hadn’t managed to make it to the toilet.  I spend astound 100 nights a year in hotels and have never had such a disgusting experience.
Manager Response: Dear  StephenSmith1971,  We are equally horrified. Our deepest and sincere apologies. Our Director of Operations will be in touch shortly. We cannot apologize enough for this incident and make no excuses.  We are investigating the matter internally and have notified our Executive Committee.  Regretfully,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great place to stay by the beach
Summary: I picked this hotel because it is close to home and I wanted to have a fun birthday overnighter for my daughter.  Pacific City is next door so the girls had fun hanging out and getting pizza.  They went to the pool a few times and had a blast.  They loved the room.  They slept good, watched the sunrise in the morning and went to the beach.  If you're visiting Huntington Beach this is a great hotel to stay at and experience.
Manager Response: Dear jlmantere,  Thank you for your kind review...we really appreciate it. Come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing & PR The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: It is incredibly nice and has fantastic decor, but food, coffee, drinks, etc. (essentially anything sundry) expect to pay nearly double.Consider visiting a grocery store before checking in. Otherwise, great views.
Manager Response: Dear drewmaurer,  Thank you for your honest review of your recent stay with us.  At our hotel, we like to provide a personalized experience for each of our guests, but also look for ways to keep costs low while providing comfort and convenience. We appreciate your feedback and we’ll keep it in mind as we work to make our services better.

Summary: Came here for one night. What an awesome property. Great pools, firepits, restaurants and common areas. Valet parking. Rooms were clean and comfortable. I would definitely use this property again if in town.
Manager Response: Dear PTycz,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay. I am so happy you enjoyed your time with us. We hope to see you again in the near future here at The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: So glad we chose the Hilton!!
Summary: We were so worried when we first heard of all the construction and the few people complaining with negative reviews. I am so glad I went with my gut instinct and went with the Hilton over the Hyatt. From the moment we pulled up to vallet, all the vallet gentlemen were friendly, helpful, and full of smiles, our bellman, Brooks, was the most friendly and helpful of anywhere I've ever been. Our room was wow factor, Clean, beautiful, exquisite, extraordinary view. A tiny bit of construction can be seen but does not interfere with the ambiance of the resort. It really is a beautiful property, and we can't wait to explore more! Thank you Scott O'Hanlan for your honestly and helpfulness, and Joseph for your professionalism and Hilton hospitality.   Molly Holmstrom
Manager Response: Dear Molly H,  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay...and thank you for the very kind review. While Joseph and I work very hard to see to your needs prior to arrival, we could not do it without the support and assistance of the other 450+ Waterfront Associates. On behalf of all, THANK YOU!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing & PR The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Stayed here recently for a work event and I was so happy with this hotel!  I had to make changes to my reservation last minute and the staff was super accommodating.  The hotel is right across from the beach, and the view makes you feel like you are on a tropical vacation.  I stayed in the Huntington Tower with an ocean view room.  Although the room wasn’t spectacular, I also had nothing to complain about.  My understanding is that the Dolphin Tower had rooms that were recently renovated.  And with the new water slide going in I am definitely going to consider bringing the kids back.  Overall, a really fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Dear  SBSunshine,  Thank you for this lovely review! we would love to welcome you and your family back. The Twin Dolphin Tower is actually brand new (part of our expansion efforts), so the rooms are also all new, not renovated. The tower you stayed in (The Huntington Tower) is newly renovated on every level except level 1 (where we're just waiting for the construction teams to leave and get out of our way). Again... thank you and come back soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Good experience.  Pool was still under construction, but it will be very nice.  Hyatt next door is also very nice
Summary: Very similar to Hyatt next door.  Once the construction is done in a few weeks, it will be nice!  Be sure to ask for one of the newer rooms that have been recently added/renovated as they are much nicer
Manager Response: Dear Elise B,   Thank you for your recent review. Our Twin Dolphin Tower rooms (made up almost exclusively of suites) does offer those staying with us more choice when staying here at The Waterfront. And, unlike our friends next door, the tower configurations makes the distance between room, event, restaurant or rooftop lounge much more pleasant! We hope to see you again very soon.   Sincerely,   Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We had a great 2 day stay at the Waterfront Hilton. All the staff was friendly, courteous, and had smiles on their faces. There was a good selection of food served at the Boardwalk Restaurant. The hotel was conveniently located across the street from the beach and close to shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear cinpara2018,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your stay. Happy to hear that you took advantage of our wonderful location. We know you have many options when choosing where to stay in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: A very pretty property, albeit still under some minor construction.  Stayed in a Twin Dolphin Tower suite - the room was spacious and well-decorated, with very comfortable beds and nice towels.  A special shout-out to the service, which elevated an already pleasant stay.  Every staff member we encountered was incredibly friendly and welcoming; requests were accommodated graciously and efficiently.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear TAMember484,  Thank you kindly for your recent review of your stay. I am so happy to hear your encountered our warm hospitality first hand from our wonderful associates. I am thrilled you were able to stay in our beautiful new Twin Dolphin Tower. We hope you are able to come for another visit some time in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: The Place To Stay in HB
Summary: My sister and I did a little Brother/Sister Sibling Getaway and had a great vacation. We stayed in a Oceanfront 2 Double Bed room and had a great view of the ocean which never gets old. The overall resort is so nice and clean. The resort is a easy 10 minute walk to downtown HB or you can take the shuttle which runs each hour. The pool and hot tub area is great. We spent most of the time hanging by the pool eating and drinking. The pool area waiters and waitresses were so helpful and accommodating to us and were really on top of everything. The location of this hotel is perfect. It overlooks the ocean which never gets old. Its close to downtown HB. Its 20 minutes from John Wayne airport. Disneyland is a easy 30 minute drive. Overall location is a huge advantage and big plus of
Manager Response: Dear Q3701CYjakeb,   Thank you for your kind review! We appreciate the detail and will share with every department you touched upon here. Come see us again soon.  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Awesome Anniversary escape to Huntington beach
Summary: This was our first visit to Huntington beach, from San Diego. We had an excellent stay at this hotel for our 29th wedding anniversary. I asked a couple of questions on this site about the construction going on and got personal attention from Joseph, who gave us a complimentary bottle of champagne for our anniversary. I also ordered chocolate covered strawberries and when those arrived without the chocolate, Joseph made sure those were complimentary too.  I see a lot of complaints here about the construction and pool access. It's not like you don't know up front and the rate was greatly reduced because of it. Frankly, it didn't affect us at all. The new pool area looks awesome and will be a real treat once completed. It's really close to being complete.  We had a great view of
Manager Response: Dear bkinsd_858,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your anniversary stay went. Congratulations on 29 years! Thank you for choosing to stay with us for such a milestone event. I am thrilled you were able to enjoy all Huntington Beach has to offer from bike riding to kayaking. I appreciate your understanding of our current state of renovations as we complete our expansion. I will let Joseph, our Dir. of Reservations know you spoke so highly of him. He is one of our shinning stars and truly embodies The Waterfront spirit. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; we are grateful to be your choice! We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: One of the Nicest Hilton Properties
Summary: This hotel is wonderful. Perfect location with unobstructed ocean view, nicely appointed suites and rooms and great bars and restaurants. But the absolute best thing about this property are the staff. I have stayed in more hotels than I can count and have never encountered a group of employees so well trained, friendly and helpful. From the time you arrive everyone from valets to front desk to wait staff , maintenance and housekeeping go out of their way to make your stay a pleasant experience. I will definitely return with friends.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen R,  Thank you for writing a review of your recent stay. We truly value your feedback and use it to better train our associates. It will be a joy to share you kind words with our staff! Thank you for choosing The Waterfront. We hope to see you again in the near future. Have a wonderful week.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Hotel is under construction but they've made efforts so that you can barely tell. Staff was very helpful, the ocean views were amazing. We love visiting Pacific City and this is walking distance. Will definitely be back again! Breakfast buffet was delicious.
Manager Response: Dear ChristinaCardenas,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. I am so glad you enjoyed our property. We are very fortunate to be located in such a walk-able, beautiful space. I am glad you took advantage of it! We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Overall great hotel...Few Considerations Before Booking
Summary: Overall, great hotel but still under construction. Staff are helpful and the suite we had in the new tower was beautiful. Definite pros and cons to this place.  Pros:  - Beautiful property and rooms (in new tower - not sure about the other) - Helpful staff - always willing to help in any way they can  - Restaurant has pretty limited menu, but solid. - Beautiful pool area, and 9th floor lounge offers great views. - Great location. Convenient to restaurants, shops and the beach. Also offers free umbrellas, towels and chairs for beach.   Cons: - Construction happening - pool outside our room (with water slide) wasn't ready which bummed us out as having two pool areas. I think rooms should be discounted for the inconvenience.  - Valet parking is the only option - $38 per day for
Manager Response: Dear mkhughes11,  Thank you for the kind words and the sharing of your thoughts. We encountered an great deal of disappointment with the pool not being completed on schedule (the least of which was our own), but we're at the mercy of the builders. When faced with keeping the expansion closed off until everything was ready or opening it so that people could actually see and use everything we've been doing for the last two years, we chose the latter. We're glad we did even tho it has been a test of patience as we get thru the last few details on this part of the build. We hope you can return and experience all we have to offer in its completed form. You'll thank us later!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Loved the hotel. We were in the older tower but the room was nice and clean, and the ocean view was wonderful from the 12th floor. It will be even more beautiful when the pool area is complete but had no problem at all with construction noise. The shuttle service is great and Tammy, the concierge, was wonderful. Good location, etc. huge hotel but didn't feel huge and the meeting area was separate so didn't feel as if I were in the middle of a convention. The restaurant choices were limited but other restaurants were nearby so that was not a problem. Hope to be back again soon.
Manager Response: Dear CindyD2000,  Thank you for your kind words positive vibes! We're very glad you enjoyed yourself while here and we look forward to your speedy return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: You can wake up to appreciate the blue horizon, the beach and pacific ocean.  The hotel is situated across from the Huntington Beach. You can walk to the beach, restaurants and shops. The sunset view from the balcony is awesome!
Manager Response: Dear midorin672,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay. Our location and views just cant be beat especially taking in those sunset from our towers! We hope you are able to visit us again in the near future. Thank you for staying with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Once construction is completed this will be an excellent property
Summary: Spent Easter weekend at the resort.We had a number of issues from the check-in/valet experience and an issue with our room in the new tower. Despite the large crowd checking-in Louis at the front desk took time immediately to meet with us and correct the room situation. Not an unremarkable task considering how busy they were at the time. Also Fathi, Taylor and Anthony at the valet service took an unfortunate situation with their service and quickly made the situation right as quickly as possible.  As I said we were at the resort for Easter. We attended the early seating of their Easter Brunch. It was EXCELLENT. The vast array of food was very good, the flow of the room worked well and the waitstaff's service in the ballroom was exemplary.  Next time we find ourselves in that
Manager Response: Dear Nick L,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay. I am so pleased to read that even though you may have run into some service issues our staff was able to make it right for you. Thank you for attending out first holiday brunch in our new Breakwater Ballroom. It certainly was a momentous occasion and turned out to be a beautiful and festive set up. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you and your family again.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed here a while back and had a pleasant stay with two small children. The hotel is positioned directly opposite the wonderful Huntington Beach. When we arrived we were given a room on a top floor, which wasn’t adequate for small children. We were then relocated to a room on the ground floor overlooking the beach which was great. Have fond memories of jazz bands playing by the pool side. The children had a great time with the kids’ entertainers too. Huntington Beach is a special place. Hope to return some day soon.
Manager Response: Dear AnnieMO2005,  Thank you for taking the time to write a TripAdvisor review. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. We truly appreciate you choosing The Waterfront for your vacation. We hope to see you and your family again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: If you get a chance to visit Huntington Beach, you must stay at this beautiful resort right across from the beach. Their attention to detail is incredible. The resort is so easy to get around. It has 2 pools and play areas for young children. Most relaxing stay. We enjoyed the architectural detail in every area. The rooms are wonderful. The staff is so helpful and really amazingly nice.
Manager Response: Dear schiffjma,  Thank you so much for your perfect review of our property! You are so kind. We truly appreciate it and thank you for choosing to stay with us. I do want to let our other guests know that may read this review that our second pool has not yet opened. We do still have our existing pool and sand box open for our guests! We hope you are able to come again for another vacation soon.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed in the new Dolphin Tower with a king suite and an adjoining double room for our family of 5.  It was the perfect set up and made our stay very comfortable.  The suite had a lovely living room where we had family movie night and we all slept very well in the most comfortable beds.  We enjoyed our ocean views and the easy walk to the beach and the Pacific City shopping area and downtown Huntington Beach.  The food at the Boardwalk restaurant was very good and made eating on site very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Dear Miss_Meowser,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a kind review of your stay with us. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and new amenities. It is fun and memorable to be able to walk around our fun beach town and enjoy all the sight and sounds. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Lovely hotel, very well appointed room with balcony and view of the ocean. Fab pillows.  Terrific rooftop bar overlooking the ocean. Very good service. Thoroughly recommend to solo, couples or families
Manager Response: Dear Janet R,   Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave a TripAdvisor review of your stay. We are truly grateful you chose The Waterfront as your vacation destination. The views from Offshore 9 just can't be beat! I am so glad you were able to take it all in. We hope to see you again in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Don’t stay here! Dirty rooms and terrible service
Summary: Several issues with this hotel and I’ll NEVER stay at another Hilton again.  1. This hotel is expensive and charges $40+ a day for fees PLUS $40+ a day for the use of the valet. It is mandatory to use the valet yet you wait 30-45 min for your car everytime you want to go somewhere. Even if you call downstairs ahead of time and ask for your car to be brought up then head down in 20 min your car is NEVER there. They look around for your keys and seem to always have them misplaced and then go get your car after waiting another 10 min for them to figure it all out.  2. We stayed here for a total of 8 days, on the first day of check in I mentioned to the front desk that there was hair, of all shades, lengths and styles spread around the ceiling and walls and bathtub in our bathroom.
Manager Response: Dear Marianne V,  Thank you for your review and, in reading what you have said here, we are quite shocked! This is not the Waterfront and staff and we know and warrants an immediate review with our operations staff. Please accept our humble apologies and know that each of these issues will be investigated and addressed with the appropriate manages and directors. We are very sorry this was your experience and will attempt to reach out to you directly.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The Good:  twin towers room is nice.  Staff very nice and accommodating. The Bad:  food selection is very limited in both restaurants and room service.  Ordered the "death by chocolate" cake in room service only to be brought a hazlenut torte.  When i called back to ask about it i was informed that it was no longer offered.  So why not say that upfront rather than making an unwanted substitution.   2nd time ordered a plate of cookies.  Told me it would be an hour ..i said ok.  I called after 90 minutes and said they never placed the order!  Valet.  $36/night.  No other parking alternative.  On 2 separate occasions i called down from my room to have the car pulled around, and when i got down there they said no one pulled the keys.  So waited 15 minutes or so.  The ugly:
Manager Response: Dear travelgoddess67,  Thank you for your review...and we are very sorry we have disappointed you. We are experiencing challenge after challenge with our builders efforts to complete what should have been done weeks ago. We cannot apologize enough that this happened during your stay. If you'd be so kind to give us another chance in the future, please contact our Director of Operations (Mr. Ajit Acharya) to personally handle the arrangements.   Again, no excuses with our sincerest apologies.   Regretfully,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is a wonderful hotel on the PCH undergoing a slight remodel (not guest intrusive).  Welcoming staff, large en-suite bedrooms.  Sea facing room is a must.  Pool area is under development with the addition of a new slide and kid focused pool.  Nice bar with food available (thanks Jennifer!).  "Boardwalk" restaurant (in- or outside) is great for breakfast but a little sterile for dinner.  We were sorry that the more intimate and acclaimed interior/patio poolside"Shades" dining space is now defunct. A sophisticated hotel of this caliber could use a romantic dining room especially as the local competition is fairly mediocre. Well stocked pool side shop with everything a busy or beachbum might need. Like the Terminator "I'll be back".
Manager Response: Dear podge747,  Thank you for your review. Your kind words are a bright spot in our day! You'll be pleased to know that very soon the former "Shades" restaurant and patio will be reconfigured and refurbished and opened under an all new name with a slightly more upscale menu (giving you another dining option above that of Boardwalk for fare and atmosphere). We think we'll have covered all the bases from fine dining to casual to deli to lite bites... The Waterfront will have it all!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Best hotel/resort on the California coast!!!
Summary: I stayed here with my family and ou small dog over spring break. As always the service was amazing, the views spectacular and I slept the best I have ever at a hotel. My only mistake was staying anywhere else during spring break. We should have spent all 8 nights here. No other place even came close to how well they do everything right here. I cannot wait to come back!!!
Manager Response: Dear christinarT7824PT,  Thank you for your very kind words! And yes, next time stay the whole time and let us take care of your every need or want... its The Waterfront way!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The views were beautiful. The rooms were large and very comfortable. It's a short walk to the Huntington boardwalk and Main street.  There is large outdoor mall in walking distance with shops and excellent Breakfast at the hotel was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear coberenson,  Thank you for your recent review. We're glad you had time enough to not only enjoy our resort, but to explore the surrounding area and Pacific City as well. We're very proud of our latest arrivals (shopping, dining, and of course our new expansion) and we're pleased you liked it too!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Was in town for a conference that used the hotel.  Have to say beautiful facilities,  even better once the renovations are completed.   Pretty much anything you need with beach across the road, food on site or just up the block with local shops along the PCH.
Manager Response: Dear Dave G,  Thank you for your review and kind words. While we know your company chose your accommodations for you this time around...now that you know what we're all about you can come back on your own and really let us take care of you. It is what we live for!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We were upgraded to suites so had the Best view over the Beach from the bed. However in two different Towers, making it annoying when preparing for a meeting.  Overalt Good service and clean rooms. Good breakfast and location. Didn’t have a minibar which meant I had to contact roomservice after a long day - and the wait was too long.  They had construction at the pool, which they didn’t mentioned when booking - so concentrating with the noise was not a hit as well as sleeping when they started at 7 am :( Nevertheless, it will probably be better for the coming season.
Manager Response: Dear didi1205,  Thank you for your review. We're very nearly done with our work in the expansion areas, so we're sorry for any disturbance whatsoever. Your kind words and four stars and very much appreciated by our hardworking staff. Come back and see us again soon...and we'll be ready for you!  All the best,

Summary: I was concerned about the hotel construction , but booked two nights via Hilton Honors/Gold after talking with the hotel.  It was made know the new pool was not complete, etc.  The actual construction projects were not an issue.  Staying there was like spending two nights in an elementary school playground at recess.  The only hot tub and pool was always full of kids.  The hot tub at times, looked like a pot boiling over with kids.  You couldn't cram another one in there. Screaming kids at every corner. The only adult area was a bar on the 9th floor of the new tower.  Also, we were placed in a room overlooking the new green space.  Sounds nice.  However the green space is were the hotel guests with dogs walk their dogs to take a dump, etc.  That was lovely to sit on the balcony
Manager Response: Dear Mark B,  Thank you for your review. We're sorry the sights and sounds of families en masse disturbed your ideal vacation and was detrimental to your stay. We are confident that with the opening of the new pool, waterslides and kids club the congestion and activity in a given space will subside. (We'd love to give you that exact "open" date, but as yet the builders have not provided one that we can rely upon). The Waterfront prides itself on generational travel from Great-great grandparents on down to the newest edition. Always welcome and with open arms, our Waterfront families have made this hotel and resort part of their vacation plans year after year, generation after generation! It is remarkable for many of us as we have watched a lot of these kids grow up over the years, some of whom have actually come back to be married here themselves.  As for the pet issue, we thank you for bringing this to our attention. We were made aware of guests violations of our curbing policies and ignoring posted signage. We have stepped up our security patrols and camera surveillance of this area in particular as pets are not allowed and owners will held responsible for any violations. We ask our guests to please respect the restrictions placed on "pet entry" to certain areas of the resort and violators are subject to the agreements they sign at the commencement of their stays.  We hope that you are able to return and give us another chance in the future when things have settled down and every new space is open and running. We think you'll be very happy with the all-new "Waterfront"!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The pool and grounds are under construction. Lots of construction noise all day. We booked it so that our family could hang out and spend time at the pool. The 2nd pool was open but very crowded and had a tiny hot tub with way to many people in it. They didn't even mention the renovations at check in. Book somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Jason W,  Thank you for your review and our sincere apologies. There are simply no words to convey our heartfelt empathy and we understand your frustration. Please speak to us in person (on the phone is fine) and allow us to try and "Make It Right".   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Our rave review is about Rebecca -Restaurant employee
Summary: Though we really liked the size, style, and location of this resort hotel, our compliments are directed mostly at the staff. We especially admire Rebecca for her incredible presence in the Boardwalk Café. Kudos to the staff who work together seamlessly. We enjoyed the personal interest that Rebecca showed in offering us  meal and beverage recommendations. She is great at her job and made our resort experience feel more like a small, intimate cruise experience  than that of a large hotel dining venue. With her savvy and professional demeanor, she delivered great food and with wonderful efficiency. Thanks for the warm and welcoming experience from Rebecca in your dining facility. We loved the cocktails, salmon and flat iron steak with chimichurri sauce. But more than that, we
Manager Response: Dear PatriciaX2,  Thank you for your very kind words and this review...you made our WEEK!  We have shared your comments with the restaurant managers and directors and made Rebecca's day. She is one of those gems that we count ourselves lucky to have...and for us, she represents the best-of-the-best The Waterfront has when it comes to associates. We're pretty lucky to have a hotel full of caring and compassionate "rock stars" who bring their "A-Game" everyday...and we're so glad you recognized that.  All the best and come back soon... Rebecca already misses you!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Pool is CLOSED and construction is extensive! Call the resort BEFORE BOOKING to check progress.
Summary: I hate to give this hotel a 1-star review, but unfortunately, the reason we booked this resort was because of the pool, waterslides, and outdoor amenities, which were completely unavailable. I'm hoping to steer other families away who might expect this resort to look like the marketing pictures.If you have children who are banking on waterslides, avoid this hotel. There is one smaller pool available and one TINY hot tub (was over-crowded every time we tried to use it) in which the water was kind of yellow and milky at the same time. The grounds are just torn up, from the front of the property to the back. It was at times even dangerous to navigate. I would not have stayed here if I knew the extent of the construction, and because I booked through Orbitz and not the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Mackenzie C,  Thank you for your review. We're very sorry your stay did not meet your expectations. We knew we were in for it when the builders informed us of their delays (yet to be explained to us in any way that makes sense) and the impact it would have over Spring Break. It is more than a miracle that our staff simply braced for what was to come instead of heading for the exits. We know you don't want to hear this, but we cannot be more sympathetic and apologetic for matters beyond our control.   As for information sharing with 3rd party websites like Orbitz and the like, they do not like communicating with us because the rates (and information) on the Hilton website is more accurate and we have the lowest rates posted there, not with them. Always go to Hilton's website (or any brand website) before or after looking at a non-branded site. From canellation policies to rates, you'll thank us later for sharing that tid bit.  Again, we're very sorry and we own it. We do not like disappointing our customers and we're doing all we can to correct the situation as quickly as possible.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: the  new pool, landscape,and parking structure is not done yet. the new bar is much smaller and have only 4 seats with 2 tv. the bar lounge music is horrible. most of the song that you never ,ever heard before .why can't hotels play  music that the average guest know.
Manager Response: Dear CHAUSTER B,  Thank you for your review. We apologize that there are still some outdoor and underground parking areas of the hotel that are still being completed. It was our sincere hope that the two teams of builders would have been on to the last phase of our build (new spa and restaurant), but alas that is not the case. They seem to have hit a snag out by the new waterslides. We feel like we're in a bad movie when it comes to the pool and waterslides.  The dock bar seating area actually extends from beyond the bar to the seating area directly in front. This was meant to create a more relaxing communal atmosphere amongst the couches and armchairs. Hopefully you discovered our rooftop lounge, The Offshore 9, with plenty of room to spread out while enjoying amazing and unrivaled sunset and ocean views! It really is something to behold.  Again, we profoundly apologize for the areas outdoors and around the pool not being completed during your stay. We too are very upset and share your disappointment. If there is anything the staff could do at this point, rest assured we'd be all over it.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Great hotel. Location was excellent. Staff was kind. My only complaint is that it will bankrupt you if you are an average Joe. It was the most I have ever paid for a room in my whole life, and I have traveled the world. The price of the Pina colada at the pool almost had me choking on the pineapple.
Manager Response: Dear autumnclk,  Thank you for your review. We're glad you chose The Waterfront for your vacation. Remember, there are several ways you can save substantially on your stay here. Be sure to book direct via the Hilton website thus ensure our "Best Price Guarantee" with all the advantages and privileges that brings, including "no hassle" cancellations on standard bookings. Secondly, join Hilton Honors and earn via points and miles free stays  and discounts all over the world. Lastly, you can always call our in-house reservations department. Better rates can sometimes be "engineered" with flexible dates or length of stay. They are here to help you maximize your time while saving you as much as possible. We know you have many choices out there, and we appreciate your choice of The Waterfront Beach Resort.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: The Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort in Huntington Beach is habit forming....in a good way!
Summary: We've stayed here many times over the last 10-12 years and have always enjoyed the stay! We try to come back on our anniversary to celebrate our years of marriage (39th this June). We come back because this hotel consistently provides top notch service, food, rooms and service. The employees will smile at you and send you a friendly greeting or "how can I help" day or night. It is refreshing to be treated like that year after year without fail. The Shades restaurant is very nice with live music at night and just really great food. It ALWAYS has great service! Although we've stayed in both the "ocean view" and the "ocean front" rooms being able to wake up to a full view of the ocean with the top of a palm tree just a few feet away is better (ocean front). Being right on PCH does
