Manager Response: Dear peck6427,  Thank you for your review. We think you'll be extra impressed with addition of the Twin Dolphin Tower and all she has brought with her... new restaurant, indoor bar, rooftop lounge and (eventually, soon) The Driftwood Beach Club and pool, Shortboards Kids Club, waterslides, fire pits, cabanas and MORE! You're gonna love it!   We'll be sure to give Daniel a ring and let him know you wrote this review. He and his new (and growing) family have moved to LA and he's doing very well. We miss him too... and he stops by to say "hi" every so often. Everyone else you knew is still here...and some new faces for you to get to know too. We look forward to your speedy return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: So far one of the best Hilton I’ve ever been. It’s miles away from a standard Hilton and it could be a higher brand. The Twin Dolphin Tower is awesome and it’s worth an upgrade. Thank you so much to Luis Campillo and to Austin for looking after me.
Manager Response: Dear edom90,  Thank you for your review. We've shared your kind words with Luis and Austin and we they both said to send sincere and humble thanks. They (and the rest of our team) look forward to serving you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is our all time  favorite beach hotel. We have stayed at several hotels up and down the coast, but this is our favorite. Extremely friendly, and always very clean. Everything is within walking distance !
Manager Response: Dear Kacey E,  Thank you, thank you, thank you! We just took a poll at the Front Desk, and we get guests from up and down the coast and hands down, YOU are one of our favorites! :-) See you again soon.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: First time at this Hilton property and enjoyed the hotel location, amenities and hotel staff minus the front desk and management team. Upon check in, we weren’t offered any room options but later considered moving to the new tower. While trying to make this decision, Austin (front desk manager) argued about available rooms and pricing. We did not expect a free upgrade but Austin’s smug and pretentious attitude was uncalled for. I left two messages for Scott O’Hanlon and left an email but he did not reply. I expect more from the Hilton Hotel group and won’t be recommending this property or going back. I feel my business isn’t appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear CanTravel12345,  Thank you for your review and we apologize that you were unable to arrive at a satisfactory resolution to your request for upgrades while on property. I was aware of your stay and your reasons for wanting to experience our new product so that you could have written about it, but unfortunately I am not able to accommodate writer/blogger requests upon arrival (and yes, I am the decision maker when it comes to PR writers/photographers/media platform deliverers). These are arrangements made in advance within my department and are rarely a last-minute option at our property. All of our travel writers and media partners are vetted and established stays and parameters of the visit arranged via my department. Your record indicates that you were offered an upgrade to the new tower at a highly discounted rate as a resolution and that you declined the offer and no further communication was noted. We apologize for any confusion and certainly wish you well on your continued travels and experiences.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Dolfin tower is new and my room was nice and big.  However Air Conditioning didn't work....never blew cool air.  Lights and AC would turn off because hotel has motion sensors on the wall and AC thermostat.  Even while sleep the a/c would shut off.  They even wanted you to put your room key into a switch by the front door to let you use electricity!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  We only ate at the breakfast buffet and it was marginal for a Hilton buffet.  Our waiter was not good, he couldn't handle more than one request let alone 3 tables. Unless you get 50% or better look around there's plenty out there.   Major new pool and deck not finished and didn't see anyone working on it!
Manager Response: Dear Bubba S,  Thank you for your review. We're never satisfied until you are while you're are a guest of The Waterfront. Many of our new rooms, amenities and spaces are functioning flawlessly and we could not be more proud of our expansion efforts. Yes, we still have a bit more to go, but with each passing day the "new and improved" Waterfront shines brighter and brighter. However, you never know the challenges you may encounter until you get underway with occupying everything you've been handed from the builders. We hope that you promptly communicated your concerns with our staff and that we were able to "Make It Right" on the spot. We're pretty good at that... we live to make you happy and satisfied!  As for the new energy efficiency systems in the new tower, from water to electricity to recyclables, Hilton world wide is firmly committed to being good stewards of the planet. As you will see across all of our brands, we are committed to limiting waste while reducing our overall resource footprints anywhere we can. We do this in ways that (we hope) that make it easier on and for you during your stay. Most of our guests and their children appreciate every effort we make to keep our environment more pristine and protected than when we arrived and opened our doors.   Whether it be the relationships we form within the communities we serve; the procurement of certified and sustainable consumables and supplies while operating our resort; or the use of precious and limited natural resources such as water, electricity, and fuels, The Waterfront is a proud holder of TripAdvisor's highest award (Platinum) for being a "Green Leader" and  we are fully committed to continuous improvement of best practices in every area of our hotel to stay on the path of responsible sustainability.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Despite this hotel being under construction, which we knew going in, we found everything here to be great, and it will only be that much better once the work is done.  Service everywhere was excellent; front desk, valet, restaurants, rooftop bar in the new dolphin tower.  Our room was not in the new tower, but don't think for one minute that this tower is "old."  Our room was updated and very clean.  There was no noise between the walls from next door neighbors.  The only time it seemed loud was if someone was in the hall talking - like the door to the room lets in noise - but that's better than hearing your neighbors!  The "new" pool is still under construction, but looks like it will be a great size, and meanwhile the "old" pool is still available.  Anything we needed for the
Manager Response: Dear lserpaaz,  What a kind and wonderful review! I am thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. Please note our beach amenities such as beach towels, beach bags, beach chairs, umbrellas and beach toys are available complimentary year round, on a first come, first serve basis and can be checked out for use on our pool deck or with our concierge. I hope you are able to visit again in the near future. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach, thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Room 811 Did a short 2 night 3 day trip to Huntington Beach with my kids for spring break.  This property is located it the heart of Huntingtom Beach.  3 min walk to Lot579 eatery, & 5 min walk to Main Street.  Hotel was very clean & Beautiful!  Room was well appointed & the "partial" Ocean View did not disappoint.  The hotel is currently under a bit of construction, however, I will certainly be back once its done because it is going to be even better.  Their valet, while priced waaaaaay to high ($36 a night) in my opinion, was by far one of the best I have ever experienced.  They always greeted with a smile, were always hustling as quickly as possible to get cars & offered help with EVERYTHING from bags, to doors, to suggestions on food & shopping.....exceptional service.
Manager Response: Dear Christina L,  Thank you so much for your review. We really appreciate your kind words and look forward to your return. We know that sometimes it may seem crazy when a hotel charges what it does for valet parking (the only option available here at the beach, at any of the hotels, due to space and safety considerations) but feel better about it as The Waterfront strives to always be less than anyone around us without compromising service or security. Thank you for staying with us and come back soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This hotel was great!  Loved the friendly staff. They got us anything we needed including more towels, more robes, and sand toys and pool toys. I loved that you could bring towels and boogie boards to the ocean. Valet was also an amazing staff especially Michael. He talked to all of the kids and was very helpful with directions and places to visit!  Gorgeous sunsets!  The only downsides were that the main pool was under construction which was a bummer and that hotel guests had to walk through business meetings/lunches to get to the pool area. The other downside was no microwave and extra small fridge space.
Manager Response: Dear GinaZurn,  Thank you for your recent review. We're glad you and the kids had such a good time. The next time you are coming to stay with us give us a ring in advance and let us know you'd like a microwave or additional fridge. Both can be arranged and in place before you set foot in the room. See ya soon!  Best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort. a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Will be nice when the construction is complete, but not so much in the meantime.
Summary: I knew there was some construction, but there is a LOT of construction going on.  In the entrance, in the hallways, in the parking/valet area, on the sidewalks, on the landscaping, on the pool with waterslides THAT ISN'T EVEN OPEN yet!  Their website advertises two pools with a beach club and shows a photo (that must be just a computer rendering...deceiving) of the new pool with waterslides.  That's why I chose this hotel, but this pool is still under construction.  Very disappointed.  Don't chose this hotel for the waterslides until construction is complete!  The new dolphin tower rooms are nice, but seems like they went cheap.  The thin sliding doors are kind of cheap looking/feeling and their "locks" are either installed poorly or are just junk.  The bathroom vanity isn't
Manager Response: Dear Bridget M,  Thank you for your review. We are in the final phases of our enhancements and finishing the last of the work on the expansion (and new pool). Our website fully discloses any work in progress, closures or any other changes to operations so that you may make the most informed decision possible prior to booking. We'll take a closer look and see if there is anything we can do better to fully communicate this information to you, our most valued guests.  We hope to see you again and show everything when all is said and done! In the meantime, thank you for staying with us and best wishes on your continued travels.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Perfect location but needs better restaurants
Summary: This hotel is currently being updated & luckily it did not impact our stay. We had a great room on the 12th floor overlooking the ocean & pier where we could watch the sunset.The roof top bar in the dolphin wing is amazing for a cocktail at sunset. The buffet breakfast was good with a lot of variety inc an omelette station. If you want to have dinner here be warned.The meal selections are very limited & the the kitchen can not amend anything for e.g. add chicken to a caesar salad.They don't even have bread. I suspect the meals are pre cooked then heated up prior to serving. My salad had moulded greens and generally I was not impressed with the overall quality of the ingredients. Its a great place to stay but my tip is to eat elsewhere  aside from breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Weeksy,  Thank you for your recent review. We are still in the process of opening and adding to our restaurant menus including the opening of yet another on-property dining option. This new outlet will be primarily for dinner and will be a more upscale offering. In the meantime, we'll drop a note over to the kitchen of Boardwalk, While we do tell our cooks and chefs not to deviate from our Executive Chef's recipes we meant (and its on the memo) "unless the guest requests it". All of our meals are made fresh to order (and should be to your liking as well). We look forward to your return and testing out all of our newest concepts!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Loved staying here. The location is a short walk away from the Pier and Main St.. We had a 12th floor room with a parital ocean view with the Pier, the sunsets amazing!! The staff was very friendly and accomidating. There is construction going on and it still was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear DeAnna B,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind review of your recent stay with us! I am so pleased you experienced our warm hospitality and new amenities first hand. We know you have many options when choosing a place to stay in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Pretty hotel across the Pacific coast highway from the ocean.  Renovating the hotel grounds and adding a large swimming pool.  Rooms are spacious and nice with small refrigerator and coffee machine.   Had Dinner and breakfast in hotel restaurant. Food and service was very good
Manager Response: Dear LeeMahwah,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review of your recent stay. I am so glad you enjoyed yourselves and all Huntington Beach has to offer. We hope to see you again in the very near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Beautifully designed, friendly staff, on the ocean, and marvelous
Summary: Beautiful and astonishingly clean and large rooms, absolutely great bars, top-notch restaurant, and wonderfully placed. What more could you ask for? Oh, yeah: there are these great ocean views.  I haven't enjoyed a business trip this much in at least two years. The staff here are unusually friendly and helpful, and on top of that they're smart and funny (and try to get Chris as your waiter). In spite of the fact that there's still work being done on this terrific new place, everything works well and I haven't slept this well in weeks.  This is quite simply a great place. It's unusual that I notice the hotels that I stay in, but this is an unusual hotel.
Manager Response: Dear tomphild1,  Thank you for your kind words and compliment...we'll take it! Our staff is always glad to hear how much you enjoyed your stay, but housekeeping (in particular) loves seeing that you slept well and felt right at home. This, above all else, is exactly what we're all about.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I have explained my issues with my service and reservations in the first explanation box for this review. Please improve reservation and billing process, it makes for a terrible experience and impression of hotel staff.
Manager Response: Dear kerrigankristina,  We sincerely apologize for any issues you encountered with our reservations process and guest services. We have your original alert from Hilton Guest Assistance in hand and are addressing these issues with our staff directly. We're very sorry to have let you down in any way. Our mission is to ensure an experience that exceeds your every expectation, and we obviously did not "hit the mark" here. Please accept our humble apologies.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: the place is almost done from construction.according to manager, this place will have adult pool and family pool with water slide.  the main bar lounge is small with 2 tv. it has 6  chairs at the bar. the dining room is huge. the roof top bar is small with 1 tv away from the bar. this was poor design. it has a beautiful ocean view.  drinks and food are not allowed on rooftop bar. that is a bad decision.it get very cold on rooftop especially when the wind is strong. the rooftop small food menu was not that good. we try 4 of them and was not that impress. mostly fried food. others hotels ,we can carry eat or drink  anywhere on the premise. that is how you relax or have a good time. valet parking only. they offer sunday brunch buffet but little amount of food selection.compares to
Manager Response: Dear ASHLEY C,  Thank you for your recent review. This is quite the mixed bag you've given us, which we find very helpful! We're always looking for improvements wherever we can make them, so your input is vital. We apologize not everything met all of your expectations. We'll see if we can fine tune things for your next visit. Unfortunately, because our rooftop lounge is open to the general public (not just hotel guests), our liquor license does not allow for outside food our drink. The same will hold true for our pool areas where you are not permitted to bring outside food, beverages, or coolers. It is the law and we must adhere to it. Our apologies for any inconvenience.  We look forward to your speedy return and your next review. We'll be ready!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The corner ocean front room with 2 queen beds was beautiful!  The beds are comfortable with plenty of pillows!  We were in the Dolphin Twin Tower which is the newer portion of the hotel.   The rooftop lounge is the best place in town to catch the sunset over the ocean with no obstructions.  While the weather was unseasonably colder than usual, they provided plenty of heaters and blankets to keep warm. The daily parking fee is high, but the guys were very quick retrieving our car whenever we needed it.   Overall, a wonderful 2-day stay.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie E,   Thank you for your kind review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased you enjoyed our warm hospitality and amenities first hand. Offshore 9 Rooftop Lounge views just can not be beat! We hope you will be able to visit us again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: When a New Hotel Opens Before it's Complete
Summary: Hilton Management opened the new Twin Dolphin Tower about a week before our three week stay. Read the "not recommended" reviews for the real story about this place! It's obvious the corporation rushed to open the hotel before it was really ready. Only one of the three elevators works with any regularity. If you stay on the 9th floor, your $330/night suite will be directly along the route to the new patio bar. Hallway is like the outside of a pub at 2 AM. The bathroom has dried caulk all over the floor, saw them scraping it off the floor of the room next door. Valets are rude. The hotel has tried to create a cool surf-vibe atmosphere, but the whole place is fake and pretentious ala Hilton, especially the soulless rooftop patio bar, where you can pay twice the going rate for lousy
Manager Response: Dear Snrklman,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate feedback of any kind, good or bad. However, your experience does not reflect the overall reviews we have received from other guests who have nothing but the best things to say about their stay, helpfulness of staff, offerings in the now available all new Twin Dolphin Tower, and more. it hasn't been a perfect rollout, but nothing ever really is...we just do our utmost to correct anything reported to us as quickly as possible (in addition to working with guests directly to "Make It Right", an opportunity we must have missed with you). Sometimes we just have to accept the fact that there is nothing we do can make everyone happy in spite of our best efforts. It sounds as if we're just not a property for you, and we regret that. We hope you find what you're looking for during your travels and wish you all the best.   Regretfully,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: First time to Huntington Beach, first time to The Waterfront Beach Resort. This place is awesome! We stayed in the new Twin Dolphin Tower. We got an ocean view suite on the 9th floor with a king bed. The room is one of the nicest I’ve ever stayed in, and I travel for business all the time. The beds and pillows are dreamy, the views are stunning, and the location is super convenient..   I must also say I am blown away with Huntington Beach in general. It is so clean and pristine. We stayed for three nights. We checked in around 4:30, dropped off our things in our room, then immediately went for a walk down on the beach. We walked over to the pier, which was awesome! Then we walked through the mall area which is between the pier and the hotel. Check out the food court in the mall.
Manager Response: Dear Brent E,  Thank you so much for your recent review... we could not agree more (about our hotel AND Huntington Beach). We've been saying for quite some time that we have finally "arrived"...with more dining, shopping and accommodation options than ever before. Add to that being the closest beach location to Disneyland and we think we've got quite the magical kingdom here on the sand!  Thank you again for sharing your kind words about is with the world. We look forward to you next visit with us.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We have stayed here 6 times in last 10 months.  Room service wonderful.  New Rooftop Bar is beautiful with amazing views.  Tonight we had a problem with the heat in our room.  We were moved to another room without any hesitation from the staff.  Thank you Austin for your patience & kindness.  My husband is life time diamond and this hotel is one of the many reasons why he chooses Hilton. Thank you for another wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Dear rkyates1,   Thank you for such a kind review of your recent stay with us. I am so glad you enjoyed our wonderful staff and their exemplary service. Austin is one of our best and he makes things happen! I am so thrilled you were able to visit Offshore 9 Rooftop Lounge. There is truly nothing else like it on the coast of California. We hope to see you again soon in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Its concept restaurant "The Boardwalk" had us questioning why we ate on property with so many other local options. When departments top staff are not on property service falls below average. When resort becomes busy telephone staff show frustration. $40 a night for parking.
Manager Response: Dear cornnutsbbq,  Thank you for your recent post. We always like to hear from our guests, good or bad, and see every review as an opportunity to improve our quality of service. I am very sorry you were disappointed with your experience. I will share your review with our entire management team and would hope that, in the future, you would be so kind as to give us another chance. I apologize if our valet only parking fee of $36 per night surprised you in any way. We do communicate this fee when booking with our in-house reservations, on our website and in our confirmation emails. We would love the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Went for the weekend to check out the new Tower that just open.  The room exceeded all expectations.  We were on the 6th floor and had an amazing sunset view of the beach. The room is brand new so it was spotless. I liked the two room design. We had the two queen one bedroom ocean view suite. The seating was comfortable and had great views. The balcony is much larger than the old tower. You can't beat the view this room has. The new pool is still not finished but it looks like it is going to be fantastic when completed.  The staff here at the Waterfront Hilton is best I have experienced at a Hilton in years. All of them were helpful and always greeted us and smiled. From check-in to check-out every employee here was friendly. The only negative thing to say is the noise from PCH
Manager Response: Dear gfourman,  Thank you for your review and kind words. We're so glad you enjoyed your suite in the Twin Dolphin Tower. We'll have even MORE for you to see from us in the coming months (another restaurant, spa, and pool all in the works). Come back soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon  Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the hotel for the main purpose of running to surf city half Marathon . This is their third year in a row so he brought some friends with us this time and stayed in two rooms. The location of the hotel the staff were unbelievable it gets better every year. I would highly recommend this location to any of my friends are traveling out to California
Manager Response: Dear  Paul G,  Thank you, and we look forward to having you back again next year where you'll enjoy even MORE new Waterfront than ever before!  Cheers,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Wonderful location. Friendly staff especially Eric, manager of restaurant. He arranged for my Philadelphia Eagle crazed family to have front row seats in lounge area to watch Super Bowl. If we couldn’t be home for game, next best thing.
Manager Response: Dear Linda L,  Thank you for your recent review of The Waterfront. Congratulations on that Super Bowl win! I am so pleased to read you and your family enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many places to stay in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: worth the wait for the new tower!
Summary: Another great trip back, but this time, my dog Jesse & I checked into the new tower (since we've watched it being built for over a year).  They did a super job. The rooftop bar is awesome...couches and heaters everywhere with a magnificent view of the beach. It's a rare opportunity to stay in a brand new hotel room (so perfectly clean and fresh).  Even the sofa bed hadn't been used yet and was still tied down from delivery (thanks to Bo in engineering who was so prompt and nice and figured that out!)  It was good to see Anthony at bell again who is super friendly and attentive and always remembers us and makes us feel special.  Vanessa in Concierge is always helpful and so nice too.  When the new pool  is complete, it will be a kids dream.  (My hope though, is that they will
Manager Response: Dear 1970skeeter,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit. I am so excited you were able to stay in out new Twin Dolphin Tower! We are thrilled to have a new tower and all the amenities it has to offer including Offshore 9, a Rooftop Lounge. Thank you for mentioning Bo, Vanessa and Anthony by name. They are such an integral part of our team and their attention to detail is what truly sets us apart from the rest. We look forward to welcoming you and Jesse back again next month!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel with impeccable view.  Well worth the money!  Would stay again and plan to.
Summary: What can I say:  In a word, Perfect.  Great Valet service.  Beautiful rooms.  Great pool.  View is amazing, great ocean view from every room.  Staff very attentive and helpful.  Top notch in every way!!!  I will definitely be back.  You can see all of Huntington Beach and the pier from your room.  Very good restaurant.  Only negs were lack of a microwave, the fridge did not have a small freezer in it, and I always enjoy an in-room safe.  There is a possibility there might have been but I missed it, as we were too busy enjoying the area.  Close to the beaches, about 20 mins or so to Disneyland.  They don't miss a thing.
Manager Response: Dear I3029IKshawnb,   What a wonderful review! Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. The views from our guest towers just can't be beat. Please note we have complimentary microwaves available upon request from the front desk and all of our guest rooms are equipped with an in-room safe. Thank you for choosing to vacation with us. We hope you are able to return in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Sometimes, Waking Up Isn't So Hard to Do
Summary: Booked this beautiful balcony room to get the best view of the blue, blood, supermoon-with the full lunar eclipse. Could not have been more perfect. Could see the ocean and sky while lying in bed. Eclipse did not disappoint and nether did the Waterfront Hilton Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear ILuvToGo59,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. What an amazing and memorable trip! We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and that you loved to view of the lunar eclipse. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Paulette Fischer, General Manager is a true professional that cares about guests and staff alike. Her happy staff aim to please and it is evident in in the tremendous job they perform on a daily basis. I have been going to the Hilton Waterfront for over 10 years and have never been disappointed! I will continue to stay there and I thank Paulette and her incredible staff!!
Manager Response: Dear  jasonmX2095TC,  thank you for your review and kind words about our General Manager and her staff. She leads by example every day... in fact, it is not unusual to find her (rag in-hand) bussing tables and pouring coffee for guests in our Boardwalk restaurant before heading out on her daily rounds to check in on all of the departments of the hotel, front of the house AND back of the house. We figure she clocks three to five miles a day just walking thru to make sure all is a perfect as can be for your stay!  Again, thank you and come back soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Shut the Front Desk! (Play on TV commercial saying)
Summary: (This is our first visit at this hotel and maybe our last.) We were 30 min late getting out of our room and charged $100 as if we stayed 2 hours after our checkout. Thanks to the Director of Front Desk who said, “I told you there was a charge if you stay later, so I’m charging you!” But we were only late 30 minutes with proof (from bell service and a time-stamped receipt from THEIR OWN restaurant). Without a smidge of consideration nor a look at the time-stamped receipt I brought, director’s response was: “No, we called and confirmed with housekeeping.”  But why $100 when hotel policy is $50/Hour after checkout. This is exorbitant!  HIS response (while straightening out his suite): That was yesterday . . . this is what I’m charging YOU! (I could’ve pulled a card here, but I know
Manager Response: Dear navybludolfin,  Thank you for your review and we are sorry that your experience with our late check out policy was less than satisfying. Unfortunately, being a beach resort hotel sometimes requires that we must hold the line on check-out times, bending as much as possible but also balancing our housekeeping department's need to service the room for a 4pm check-in. Periodically, and especially during a sell-out, we offer you the option to stay with a fee until you begin to run into another day's billing cycle. Which is, upon inspection and close review of your folio and our team's input, is what happened here. We simply could not extend your check-out beyond the time we stated to you on the phone.  We understood your desires, and would have hoped to have you understood our needs and the reason explained to you that we could not honor any more delays without a fee...and between the two we did not mesh. I'm sorry for any misunderstanding but on this one, and I rarely say this, I'm going to have say that we really did the best we could do. We wanted to please you and made every effort to do so but obviously it was not good enough.  We wish you the best in all of your travels (sounds fun!) and whether a Hilton or another brand... safe journeys to you and your family for many years to come.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great location, great room, great view
Summary: Some hotels call “a partial ocean view” a sliver of a view if you look around a concrete pillar... not hear. Take a look at photo to see my partial ocean view while sitting in a comfortable chair on my balcony. Location is fantastic, rooms spotless and staff goes out of their way to make you feel comfortable - super friendly. Here on business but looking forward to coming back with family for pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear MrHCooksForYou,  Thank you for your recent review of your experience here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay, as well as our jaw dropping views! Thank you for your kind words in regards to our wonderful staff. Everyone here truly enjoys where they work and it shows. We hope to have you as our guest again sometime in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing property with an amazing view
Summary: The hotel staff was friendly, happy and helpful.  The rooms have a great view of the Pacific Ocean and are lovely and clean.  The location is great right across the street from the beach.  I would go back!
Manager Response: Dear Suzane T,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you will be able to return for a visit sometime in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I spent a long weekend in HB and decided to book as close to the water as I could and decided on this Hilton property, being a Diamond Member. I cant really say enough about it. The location to the beach is amazing, food and entertainment is also only a short walk, but if you prefer not to walk, there are options right on site.   We opted for an Ocean View Room on the top floor. Don't let the many different types of rooms fool you, if you are north-facing you will be able to see ocean, even a little on the bottom floor. We were in 1218 and had an amazing view.   We visited the pool and the hot tub on several occasions - in January. The pool is heated and was very nice. The hot tub - even better. The gym was under construction so no review there, but we were able to use the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Raeftch,  Thank you for your very kind review! If we did not know better, we'd think you were a travel writer (you may have missed your calling!). We would love to have you back again very soon...and to allow you to experience our "now open" Twin Dolphin expansion, including our all new fitness center in the Twin Dolphin Tower. While we still have a bit more to go, you will not be disappointed once you wander thru and take it all in.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Rooms in need of renovation.  Poor HVAC system resulting in uncomfortable room temperatures.   Shower was a drizzle at best with no ability to mix temperature to comfortable level.  Reported but never resolved.
Manager Response: Dear Fly737MAX,  We're very sorry for any disappointment and/or difficulties during your stay. I can assure you, this is not an ordinary review by any standard and we take these concerns very seriously. Thank you for your review and bringing this to our attention. Please contact our Director of Operations, Mr. Ajit Acharya, and let us see if we can make this right for you. Please have your reservation information (name on the reservation and dates of stay) when you call. 714.845.8000. Our sincere apologies.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Wow, this resort is extremely nice. The new Dolphin section had just opened and I do believe I was one of the first to stay in the new rooms. Everyone at the location was very nice and polite. From the valet staff, front deck and house keeping, everyone on point. You can’t beat the location and the awesome views of the ocean. I’ll be back very soon!
Manager Response: Hello Aaron G,  On behalf of all of our Waterfront Ambassadors (you saw them everywhere in our expansion areas) and the entire Guest Services team, THANK YOU! In fact, yes, you were one of the first to stay in our Twin Dolphin Tower...and each day brings more and more exciting openings of spaces and amenities. We thank you for your review and look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Beautiful hotel and good location, close to shops and dining. BUT - DO NOT pay extra for an ocean front room because the traffic and construction noise is terrible.  Could not enjoy the ocean breeze or balcony due to the noise, waste of money.
Manager Response: Dear 106kellyy,  Thank you for your review. We're sorry you were not able to fully enjoy your time with us due to the noise from PCH, which does tend to quiet down in the evening. However, warm days bring out the motorcycles and convertibles as part of the "Endless Summer" SoCal vibe! Our construction is nearing an end and, unfortunately, there is no such thing as "silent" building. We do try! Please come back when all is said and done and allow us to find you just the right room...as quiet as possible and with an ocean view. It would be a pleasure to assist you!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I stayed for just one night while passing through & wished I'd had more time to stay longer. The rooms are very comfortable with thoughtful touches, such as a small wooden surfboard art piece on the wall & a room-service breakfast menu in the shape of swim trunks. Turndown service with chocolates & a robe laid out was welcome, especially since many hotels are moving away from this. We ate breakfast in the lushly landscaped terrace overlooking the main swimming pool. A fire pit & patio heaters made it comfortable to sit outside on a chilly morning. We saw them putting together a water slide in a 2nd pool area that will be great for family stays. I need to figure out a reason to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Aperi2018,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a thoughtful review. I appreciate you taking note of all our special touches. We know you have many place to stay when visiting Huntington Beach. I hope you are able to return for a visit once our expansion and renovations are completed. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I attended a week long training class at this hotel.  My room was comfortable, and the training space was well played out.  The food served for breakfasts and lunches was done well with variety throughout the week.  The staff was able to quickly accommodate dietary restrictions.  The low point of the trip was waiting over 90 minutes for a room service order of fries and apple juice.  The attendant who took my order did warn me of the wait time, which he also thought seemed overly long for such a simple order.    My advice--instead of ordering room service, dine in the hotel restaurant or check out one of several restaurants within walking distance.   I would also like to thank Ann in security who helped me recover a lost item.
Manager Response: Dear Katie B,  Thank you for your review and our apologies for the delay in room service. You are 100% correct in pointing out that the time period taken to deliver your In Room Dining order was far too long and we apologize. Our In Room Dining (IRD) team is learning how to streamline service and handle deliveries via our new kitchens and underground pathways. As we gain access to more and more of our expansion and the new Twin Dolphin Tower we are rehearsing every aspect of our service around the clock. Unfortunately you were here in the very first days (not an excuse, but what an experience!) and we are sorry to have let you down. When you return, everything will have been worked out to the "T"!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Hotel is conveniently located and beautifully decorated. It's a 10-minute walk to Huntington Beach pier and Pacific City, a shopping/food complex with cute boutiques. Staff is friendly and helpful. The hotel is currently under renovation, but there wasn't much noise.
Manager Response: Hello Diana H.,  Thank you for your review! Hopefully you had a chance to wander thru our new spaces. This is the week we open them up to the world, so you can tell everyone "I saw it first!". Thank you for your kind words and lovely review.   Best to you,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I've stayed here 4 times previously. A great location, great amenities, great staff. We can't wait for the second pool and water slide to be finished. We often meet friends here as its well located and a great experience. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear scottaG2830KD,  Right back 'atcha with the love...and thank you for your review. Look for everything in our Twin Dolphin expansion to be open and ready (including the waterslides) by early spring...and come back and play! Right now we are training our waterpark lifeguards and getting ready to test the new pool and fully reservable outdoor fire pits and cabanas. We're so close we can barely contain ourselves!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Lovely room overlooking the beach.  Valet parking only, which is disappointing, but I guess as they have got building work on, it's understandable.  We got vouchers for continental breakfast but could pay to upgrade, unless you're fixated on bacon, the continental is fine - choice of fruit, yogurt, porridge, pastries etc.  The staff were great and we were made to feel very welcome.
Manager Response: Dear Warrington_UKVicky,  Thank you for your review and kind words. The Waterfront offers valet parking both as a measure of safety and practicality. Our new construction and parking structures require very careful maneuvering in tight spaces in order to accommodate all of our guests while protecting and accepting responsibility for your vehicle. You'll find this true of our neighboring hotels as well. Unfortunately, space is the main consideration for us.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Great hotel with super friendly staff right on the beach.  Jesse is a great bartender and accommodations are very comfortable and relaxing.  The new remodel is fantastic and when completed will further elevate the Waterfront.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey A H,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay with us. I wholeheartedly agree that Jesse is great at what he does. He is one of our best! Thank you for mentioning him by name. I will make sure to pass on your kind words to him and his managers. We look forward to having you stay with us again once our expansion is completed. Have a great day.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel great staff. Some what pricey. But great spot close walk to the pier. Even closer walk to the beach. New shopes and resturants near by, very nice. Would stay again witout a doubt. New tower opens soon.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey F,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! I am so pleased you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you are able to return for a visit once the tower is open. Have a wonderful rest of your week.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Highly recommend!!! The stay was relaxing. The staff was the best. Can't wait for the new hotel to open. The remodel of the current hotel is going to make this one of the top places to stay in Huntington Beach CA.
Manager Response: Dear 518toddd,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay! I am so glad to read how much your enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to having you return for another visit when our expansion is completed. Have a wonderful new year!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We had a very enjoyable time. the room was lovely, the service was great. The view was spectatular. The dinner in the resturant was decicious. We enjoyed the walk around the grounds and to Main stree.  We will be hapy to stay again for our 60 Anniversary oon January 21st
Manager Response: Dear Fernie W,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to your return...especially for your anniversary! Congratulations in advance and have a wonderful time.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We only stayed here for one night on New Years Eve, but we will definitely be back. The staff was great from the valet staff thru to the restaurant staff. It was a really great experience. We had the Ocean View room up on the 12th floor facing the pier and it was an incredible view! The room was comfortable and roomy for 3 of us. The hardwood floors were nice, and the room was very clean. It is within walking distance to the mall, the pier, main street and a ton of food. However, the restaurant at the hotel was very, very good. The pool area was really nice with a nice tropical feel to it. we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear BCreview,  Thank you for your review and yes, please come back again soon! We appreciate you allowing us to be part of your holiday and are so pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Construction on the new tower and water park are near completion thus there is very little disruption remaining for hotel guests. Rooms are comfortable and provide decent views of the Pacific Ocean. Great shopping and restaurants are near by and of course the beach is directly across the street so there is no better location. Staff is friendly and helpful. A small front desk could be improved and I am sure that will occur once the new tower dramatically expands the number of guests checking in and out. My checkout was slow. Food within the hotel is reliable and quite good. Lots to like about this hotel. well worth a visit.
Manager Response: Dear Farrillr,  Thank you so much for your recent review. We're glad you enjoyed your time with us and yes, we're just about done (thank the stars!) with our expansion work. Come back again and enjoy all the new offerings... we'd love to have you as our guest!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon  Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Very friendly staff. Tons of amenities. Excellent location. Tons to do. Pacific City, HB Pier, Downtown HB and Strand. Kids swam in pool everyday...in the middle of December. Will definitely stay here again, and again, and again.
Manager Response: Dear andrewbR9620TQ,  Thank you for your recent review. I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay. How fun the kids were able to enjoy our amazing California weather and swim in our heated pool! Much better than shoveling snow in my opinion. We look forward to having you as our guest again if your travels find you in Orange County again. Have a wonderful New Year.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My recent stay here was short but good. The hotel is under renovation which caused some limitation but very minor. Staff was amazing especially Sam whom made our valet experience like no other. Hotel lobby was beautiful and rooms were very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Rudy S,  Thank you for your recent review. We'll be sure to let Sam know of your kind words (he's one of our superstars, without doubt!). We hope to have you back when all is said and done here and earn that FIVE STAR rating... please come back soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We were offered (without asking!) access to our room upon early arrival.  This was very much appreciated since you don't get this on a regular basis nowadays.  The hotel is beautiful and directly across the street from the beach.  Also, there is a very nice shopping center/restaurants within a short (maybe 3 block) walking distance.  I also should mention the bedding was very comfortable and made for a good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Dear MerryMaiden,  It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Thank you for your very kind words and review. Whenever possible, if we can accommodate an earlier check-in for our guests, we really try to do that. Airplanes land at all hours of the day and night, and we know that it is often beyond your control when you might arrive. If we can't accommodate you with your actual room, we often quickly store luggage and off you access to the resort so you can get comfortable while we rush things along. We appreciate the recognition!   On behalf of our housekeeping department, the front desk and all of us here at The Waterfront, "Happy New Year" and come see us again in 2018!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Worth every penny and then some
Summary: One of the best locations,staff, and excellent overall of the Hilton brand, that I will be returning again for vacation. You won't be disappointed in staying here at all. Highly recommend this beautiful ocean view Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear blesseddaily7,  Thank you for your kind review of your recent stay with us. We look forward to having you as a return guest. I hope you had a wonderful Christmas and here's to a great 2018. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This is our 5th or 6th visit to this property.  The staff is the finest I have encountered at any Hilton property and rivals Ritz Carlton in service.  They are building a new tower which should be open soon.  We were able to preview the new rooms and they are excellent!  Adam is the best server in the Shades Restaurant and Tammy is the finest concierge we have ever encountered at a hotel. We look forward to another visit in the Spring.
Manager Response: Dear Gary B,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to read you encountered our wonderful hospitality team at their best. We take your feedback to heart and use it to better train our staff. I will pass on your kind words to Tammy and Adam. Thank you for mentioning them by name. Have a wonderful New Year!  At your Service Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The employees are very friendly and accommodating.  The valet attendants were friendly, hardworking and fast.  Also, the housekeeping staff was awesome.  We had a wonderful unobstructed view of the ocean and the beach was just right in front of us.  I continental breakfast was adequate, but I would not recommend the breakfast buffet.  In my opinion, it is not worth the price.
Manager Response: Dear chickenlips97101,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay. We truly appreciate your feedback. We have a wonderful team that strives to provide excellent service. I am so happy to hear you encountered it through our valet and housekeeping staff. Have a Happy New Year!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The Hilton Waterfront Hotel is fantastic.  I have stayed here numerous times and will return in the future.  The staff is very attentive and helpful. The hotel and grounds are beautiful. The location is perfect.
Manager Response: Dear SBDisneyLovers,  Thank you for your loyalty to The Waterfront! We truly appreciate you trusting us with your vacations. We know there are may options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service,

Summary Heading: Always a Relaxing First Class Stay
Summary: This is our second year stay with our professional conference.  The hotel has been undergoing some major upgrades and construction, but the changes are stunning.  The location is beautiful, across the street from the beach.  The staff are all so helpful and friendly, especially the bell staff!  The conference facilities are top notch, as were the rooms.  Looking forward to next year!
Manager Response: Dear Alliesfamily,  Thank you so much for your review and kind words. We very much look forward to your speedy return!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I have stayed in this Hotel twice during the 4th of July weekend and it's a fun place to be with the glittering view of the Pacific Ocean and palm trees overlooking your balcony. Parade during the day and fireworks at night. It's a never ending bonanza of fun typical of a California seaside scene. I could have gave this place a 5 star except for the parking. It cost $35.00/day. So the solution is come here on a bicycle and they have ample parking for that.
Manager Response: Dear Wilfred N.,   Thank you for your kind and humorous review. We all had a nice chuckle here in the Social Media offices. We understand that the "valet only" option (and charges) can seem a bit much, but unfortunately it is necessary and we shoot to keep it as low as the market will bear (in fact, we beat everyone in the neighborhood with our pricing, SO PARK HERE!). We are limited on both parking space and all of the liability/security/safety issues that comes along with it, so to that end...we really have no choice.   However... In addition to the bicycles you suggested, we also recommend Uber/Lyft, SuperShuttle, Taxi, and skateboards. There is ALWAYS a way around a system in place ;-)  Cheers and best wishes,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Excellent service at the Waterfront Hilton
Summary: I travel here on business very frequently and the staff has always made me feel welcome! Great property with a great location. They are finalizing their expansion which will bring more rooms and giant family pool with water slides!
Manager Response: Dear  roberthI39KB,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay here at The Waterfront. We can't wait for you to see our new expansion. I hope you are able to come for another visit once its completed. Have a Happy New Year!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The location and staff here were far superior to any of my stays in recent memory. Could not recommend this place any more highly. Really like the outside fire pits, the recreational pool that was ~25 yards length for some early am lap swimming and the beauty of the landscaping and cleanliness of the grounds. Also like the pet friendly atmosphere.
Manager Response: Dear cookynell,  Thank you so much for your recent review Your kind words were read in a recent staff meeting and received a round of applause... kudos to you!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We stayed here in September after 4 nights at the Grand Californian in Disneyland.  The room and the view were breathtaking.  The service from the staff was above par.  I was expecting it to be a little less than the service received at the Grand, because, Disney Service, you know :)  I was not disappointed.  Our room looked out over the ocean from the bed with a wonderful balcony.  It was clean and had a good location across the street from the Beach.  a little bit of a walk to the shopping and dining and RUBY'S, but it was overall, stellar!
Manager Response: Dear Kelli D,   Thank you for your kind review of your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you encountered our five diamond service first hand! Our hospitality and location are two things that make us shine and we are so proud of our team. We know you have many options when staying in Huntington Beach; thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I loved the hotel, the rooms, the staff, the property, and the location. I HIGHLY recommend this hotel! We used the hot tub, the pool, the hotel bar, lunch, and breakfast. I will bring back my family to the hotel as well as stay there in the future!

I stay here about 4 times per year. Love this Hotel. Looking forward to the new wing being completed. The new pool is going to have cool water slides. I recommend the Hilton over the Hyatt next door which is large but the quality of the food there is only so so.
Manager Response: Dear lorenl35,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I also wanted to thank you for your years of loyalty to us! We are so grateful for guests such as yourself. We are anxiously awaiting the opening of our new expansion. You will absolutely love it. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. Have a wonderful holiday season.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice

Summary: This place is classy. And it should be for the price. You want a waterfront room. We were on floor 9 corner one bedroom room.  Wonderful. Full living room. Separate wet bar area.  Large room.  We had a holiday dinner there in pacific A room.  Nothing special and not decorated for Christmas.  The banquet food was wonderful. Service not the best but everyone was happy with the food and their rooms.  The resort is decorated beautifully in the common areas. The breakfast was good in the on,y open restaurant.  $55 for brunch not worth it. We ordered from the menu.  I would certainly go back again. Pool looked nice and there is a tiny sand area for very small kids to play in. Walking distance to the new outdoor mall and dining area.  You must cross a busy street to get to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer Z,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate your keen eye for detail. In the very near future we will have all new offerings, choices, spaces and restaurants for you to chose from. Our expansion will be fully online to take you and yours into a whole new experience with The Waterfront. We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel.

Summary: The Hilton was the perfect place to stay in Huntington Beach as it was close to the pier, close to Main Street with lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Friendly and very accommodating staff at the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 518timothyw,  Thank you for your kind review. We look forward to your next stay when even MORE of the "all new" Waterfront will be ready for you to explore and enjoy. Happiest of holidays from all of us here!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Amazing, restful, and incredibly satisfying. Thanksgiving buffet with family was so wonderful, no worries, something for every member of our family, no rush. The great thing next to the amazing food, was no planning, or clean up for us. We went back to the room and played cards, and listened to the waves.
Manager Response: Dear marouth57,   Thank you for your recent review. I am so pleased you and your family had a wonderful Waterfront Thanksgiving! The no clean up part is hard to beat...top it off with relaxing in a hotel room across from the beach? Heaven! Thank you for choosing to celebrate with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Highly recommend the Hilton Waterfront.  The location is close to the beach, restaurants, and shopping.  The room was large, had a view of the beach, was clean and was everything one should expect from a Hilton property.
Manager Response: Dear K990ETrobertc,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review about your recent stay with us. We truly appreciate your feed back. I hope you are able to come for another visit in the near future! Have a wonderful holiday season.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice

Summary: Convenient location for an excellent stay in Huntington Beach. Walking distance to beach, main street and restaurants. Beautiful ocean view from the guest room and valet service for car parking made it perfect
Manager Response: Dear 39amitr,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront. I am so please you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many properties to choose from in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a couple nights and it was fantastic! We had a room facing the ocean so we would watch the sun set each night on our balcony and then walk over tot he many restaurants and bars nearby. We loved how quiet it was, I mean I didn't hear a peep from any other person/room. We can't wait to come back. One recommendation for the hotel (if you read these reviews), you should have a bar outside with a bar area, there was only one person working the whole pool area and she couldn't get to us very quickly. This might be the only resort on the ocean that doesn't have a walk up bar.
Manager Response: Dear dmbclstj,  Thank you for your review and of course we read these....every single one! Its funny you mention an outside bar as we are rushing to complete our expansion tower and pool... and there you will find (drum roll, please!) our new poolside "Riptide" bar! Fully staffed and ready for all the fun you can possibly want.  Come back soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We stayed here after getting off a 4 day Catalina, Ensenada Cruise. Uber was $64 from the cruise terminal- cheaper than taxis and the super shuttle and they are waiting right there when you get off the boat.  Arrived at the hotel just after 10am. They had a room ready for us which was AWESOME.  We dropped our luggage and headed for breakfast.  Delicious!!   Enjoyed the pool with the kids. It was very warm. Truly heated!!   Most of the staff were very nice.  We has a view of the Beach 🏖  The room was a good size. The beds were comfortable!  We will be back. Oh and there is a place across the street that will set up. Bonfire with Adirondack chairs, hot dogs to cook, s’mores to melt and sodas and waters. The kids loved it. We had a butler who stoked the fire, brought blankets and
Manager Response: Dear dawnrK1875JT,  Thank you for your kind review of your stay with us! I am so glad to you were able to enjoy our beach bonfire with butler service. It is truly one of my favorite things to do here in Huntington Beach. It is so fun to make amazing Waterfront memories with friends and family. I hope you are able to come back year after year! Thank you again for the wonderful review.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This Hilton is so welcoming and warm, all of the staff are so happy it's not only evident that they are treated well by upper management, their happiness is contagious! I recommend any time of year, but this was a specifically tranquil stay and the Thanksgiving buffet was overwhelmingly good!
Manager Response: Dear Samantha D,  Thank you for kind and generous review. It is rare that someone recognizes that the approach and ethic of any team's leadership is the key to happy associates and success. Our owners are very fond of saying that we are their most valuable asset and often back those words up with actions that match. It truly is a wonderful place to work, grow and achieve.  Have a wonderful holiday season and come visit us again very soon! We be laying on the Christmas & New Year's buffets too ;-)  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I highly recommend staying at the Waterfront Hilton.  The staff is helpful, you can't beat the location and the rooms are wonderful.  I wish I could live there!  Thanks for a great experience, Waterfront Hilton.  I will return!
Manager Response: Dear Deanne M,  You ain't seen nuthin' yet! (Yes, we know...that was terrible English... BUT...). Our expansion is set to begin hosting parties and events in less than a week and our new Twin Dolphin Tower is not far behind that! We are on the move, settling into new offices and learning all about your BRAND NEW Waterfront Beach Resort. Come back and see us soon...and live here if you like too. We won't try to stop you.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Excellent location and excellent amenities.  Disappointingly no recognition for diamond status.  No upgrade, nothing waiting in the room, no full breakfast.  Staff poolside were great- both dining and also those who provide beach toys and chairs.  Apparently the wagons are for bonfires, so if you want one for your beach trip you have to inquire to reserve.    Great for those with kids particularly bc the pool is large, beach steps away, and both the restaurant and deli are great for all meals.    The staff was being slow about bringing our bags to our room so we just went down and grabbed ourselves.  They were hosting a gala both nights we were there, which limited our access to certain areas, plus a worker followed my 3 y o around the pool bathroom wiping up water drips (gala
Manager Response: Dear Fancyhousey,  Thank you for your review. We're so sorry you were not recognized as a Hilton Honors Diamond Member. Your loyalty to our brand and the time you spend with us is invaluable. We're so sorry to have stumbled here. Our computer change-over (as we move to new central offices in our expansion) did not go a smoothly as we desired, and therefore we missed some crucial guest information from our global link (like Hilton Honors status). We sincerely apologize and invite you back as soon as possible so that we can "Make It Right". Please contact our Director of Operations, Mr. Ajit Acharya, to discuss the situation at your earliest convenience. 714.845.8000.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This hotel is undergoing construction of an additional tower so daily noise was a constant presence. I was put on the opposite site of the noise so it wasn't too bad but still there. Most of the staff was very friendly, outgoing and helpful. My room had a balcony and I spent a lot of time on it, after a day of travel, to enjoy the ocean view and beautiful sunsets for which HB is famous. The restaurant food was very good altho the service wasn't always. It  is located right across the PCH from Huntington  State Beach and only 2.5 blocks from Main St. and tons of shopping and eateries. I was lucky enough to stay over Veterans Day weekend and there was a wonderful classic car show in the beach parking lot across the street. Beautiful sunny day and great old cars and trucks. They do
Manager Response: Dear 97ozhappy,  Thank you for your review and choosing to stay with us over a holiday weekend. We're sorry for any disturbances you experienced while here. We're almost done with our construction!!! (That which you'll see or hear, anyway). As for the live entertainment on our restaurant patio, we'll certainly check on that for you. We always want our background music (live or recorded) to be just that, "background"... but on occasion guests will get on a roll around the fire pit with special requests and singing. We understand your desire for peace and quiet (and open windows), so we'll alert our staff to be more aware.  We hope to see you again soon so that you may experience even more of the all new Waterfront Beach Resort.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I brought my family of four to the Waterfront Beach Resort in Huntington Beach, CA, because of the positive Hilton experience we had at the Durango Doubletree Hilton. It proved to be a major disappointment. I understand we're more work than a typical family as we have an autistic son. He is, however, high functional and very keen on his environment and doesn't require special needs. But some of the resort gaffes affected him more so. The location of the resort is wonderful - no qualms there, although you must experience a lot of highway noise if you have an ocean view. Let's start with booking. Even using a second-party like Expedia, I still went to the Waterfront web site to look at the amenities. There was no mention of a current major remodel. Using the weight room was very
Manager Response: Dear mikemG797VH,  There are just no words that adequately express our sincere apologies for your entire experience. These last few weeks have been, without doubt, the most challenging we have ever been through in our 27 years of operation. As our expansion prepares to open to the public, we have had to endure the (necessary) work and disruptions to our delivery service and hotel amenities and we share in your frustration. Again, I shall not attempt to make any excuses... there simply aren't any. We have tried to reach every guest via email, over the phone or (worst case) when they arrive to explain any situation we've encountered as a result of the finish work of construction, inspection, moving, and transition teams. We are doing all we can to wrap this up as quickly as possible and give you the experience you deserve and expect. I am so sorry we failed you.  Again, please accept our sincere apologies. Our Director of operations will be reaching out shortly to rectify the distress we caused you and your family and do all we can to "Make It Right".  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton hotel

Summary: I travel extensively for business and pleasure.  My hotel brand of choice is Hilton so I felt they deserve Kudo's for always performing above and beyond the rest.  Thank you Hilton for making my travels enjoyable when it means the most.
Manager Response: Dear ronaldjc2016,  Thank you so much for your kind words. We know you have many hotel choices when you travel so your loyalty is everything to us! We look forward to serving you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: So impressed that we were the number one priority of the staff thru our stay, whatever we needed they were on top of. So impressed!! Planned events for us, had our room perfect, car ready, everything was perfect!
Manager Response: Dear 33elvinw,  What a wonderful review, thank you! We do our best to make sure that every guest is treated with the utmost in dignity, respect, and importance. Without you, we're just a building with really nice sleeping rooms and ocean views. YOU are the reason we wake up and come to work each and every day.  Again, thank you! And please come back soon.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Beautiful hotel direct at the beach with a very good restaurant for diner and cocktails . It was the perfect last 3 days of our trip back from Moab Utah to stay some days at the beach and relax we will stay there again
Manager Response: Dear 862christian,  We always say the fall season in Huntington Beach is our secret weapon for relaxation. Wide open beaches, glorious sunshine, and plenty of room in all of the restaurants! You might have just let the cat out of the bag on this one, but we're okay with that! Come see us again very soon!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: stayed 6 nights while attending conference in anaheim; room spacious and immaculate; view of ocean unbeatable; valet personnel professional and helpful, would stay again in a heartbeat; I highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear Kjcski,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We're so pleased we could be your home away from home while you were working in Anaheim. Did you know that Huntington Beach is the closest beach to the Anaheim Resort area? Well done!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Great location. Left a pair of expensive shoes in closet and called hotel for assistance. Security checked room and shoes were gone, however no offer of looking into situation further. I realize my fault for leaving shoes and reported within 12 hours so I thought upscale hotel would have  high standards on hotel staff. No difference then standard hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 94jenim,  Thank you for your review. We have tried contacting you several times. We believe we have located your lost items but need to speak with you. Please call our Security Department at 714.845.8000. at your earliest convenience.  Thank you!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The Waterfront was an excellent choice to stay for Veterans Day weekend. There were plenty of sites, eateries and enough outdoor activities for the outdoor enthusiasts. Plenty of amenities were in very close proximity to the Waterfront.
Manager Response: Dear palacios_jose,  Thank you for your kind words. We're glad you chose to stay with us for Veteran's Day...always special a widely celebrated here in Huntington Beach. And as for amenities, wait until we open our new expansion side of the hotel in a few weeks... you ain't seen nuthin' yet!   Cheers,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We pulled in fairly late at night with two dogs and two kids.  The hotel staff was friendly and helpful.  Our dogs were greeted warmly and we weren't even asked whether or not they were staying or if we needed a dog friendly room.  The dogs were just checked in like the rest of the family.  A bowl for water and some treats were brought to our room and we were asked if they would need extra blankets.    We were assigned a partial ocean view which was a pretty decent partial ocean view... not like a sliver of ocean.  The room was clean and while there were a couple of spots on the carpet, the room was clean enough for me not to dwell on a couple of spots by the balcony door.    The location was good.  An outdoor mall is within walking distance and there are several restaurants
Manager Response: Dear firelight3,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your recent stay with us. I am happy to read that everyone, including your furry family members, received a warm Waterfront welcome! The view from our guest rooms in our tower are the best Huntington Beach has to offer. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We took our daughter here for her 20th birthday!  They were so sweet....they had Martinellis in our room upon arrival and a cake!  We had an ocean view and pool view room.  They had to close the pool for 2 hours for a wedding (which we could see from our room....pretty!!!) and they offered complimentary snacks and drinks to all guests for the inconvenience.  Of course we were allowed to use the pool of the neighboring property during this time.  The restaurant was delicious and offered happy hour...crazy!  We ordered delicious food and ate for much cheaper than I had expected.  They had a show performance around the pool which was quite entertaining with a fire eater and hula dancers.  It was lots of fun and very memorable.  We are glad that we have chosen to stay on with Hilton
Manager Response: Dear erinvic,  Thank you for your kind words. There is a reason we go out of our way for our guests...and it is a review like yours that is the payoff. On behalf of Hilton Worldwide, we thank you for your continued loyalty and business. Without customers like you, we'd never achieve our goal of being the best in hospitality. Our Hilton Honors loyalty program is our way of recognizing you as one of our most important assets...the returning guest. We like knowing what you like, how you like it, and love making all of that happen.  Keep coming back! It was a pleasure to serve you and we all hope that you return again soon.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: No complaints but a tad exy
Summary: As good as any other Hilton I've stayed at but the most expensive to date, and unlike other stays no breakfast or drink vouchers offered. I guess location can sometimes dictate how much you are going to pay.
Manager Response: Dear aok47,  Thank you for your review. If you are a gold (or higher) Hilton Honors member and we somehow missed your breakfast certificate requests, our apologies. Please contact us with your rewards number and we'll make that correction for you.   We look forward to having you return as our guest and enjoy all that The Waterfront and Huntington Beach has to offer... indeed, location is everything!   Cheers,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Everyone at the resort was over the top pleasant and helpful. Prompt service with our bags at arrival, front  desk friendly. Rooms clean and the view from the balcony we couldn’t get enough of.  Wait staff at the restaurant attentive and the manager so personal and welcoming. Pool was warm. Cute sand play area for younger kids.  They had a special event at the pool and compensated with a wonderful beach bonfire with s’mores for interested guests. That was amazing!  Great location and the shuttle to downtown made it so we never needed a car.  What struck us most was the friendly and professional staff.  We kept hearing “my pleasure” and it truly seemed like that was the truth.
