Manager Response: Dear JillK-MN,  It is such a pleasure to come into the office and read a review like this... it is the reason many of us are in the hospitality business! It truly is "our pleasure" to assist and delight you at every turn. It keeps us on our toes and reminds us all how wonderful it is to come to a place like The Waterfront and call it "work". We look forward to your speedy return and to serving you again in the very near future.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Love the staff!! good restaurant and views as well
Summary: I work in hospitality and travel a decent amount so have a pretty good grasp on how things work, and how things should work. I wish I had written down more names, people deserve to be recognized. The hotel was under construction, and it was colder than expected so not an ideal situation, but the staff truly made it a great stay nevertheless!  Our first night there (10/30) we were checked in by a younger gentleman who works part time for an airline as well. Super nice and helpful, as was the girl next to him at the front desk.  Both were very friendly, got us a room with a great view (1208) and gave us some great recommendations as it was our first time to the area and we were celebrating my 30th birthday. We stayed for 5 nights, and each day stopped by the front desk just to
Manager Response: Dear welovefoodandtravel,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review! It sounds like you had a wonderful birthday celebration with us. Based on your descriptions, I know the names of each of the associates you interacted with! Thank you for mentioning in detail how they made your stay more enjoyable. I am thrilled you experienced our warm hospitality and service first hand. I hope you are able to make this an annual tradition. Thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: From the moment that we arrived the staff helpful and friendly.  The room was nice.  The bed was comfortable.  We enjoyed sitting around the pool.  There was a wedding scheduled so they had to clear the pool area but made other arrangements for us.  Breakfast buffet was good too.  Our waiter, Rene was friendly and good.  We hope to make our visit there an annual one.
Manager Response: Dear rmt213,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to enjoy our activities. I am so happy to hear you had a wonderful breakfast with Rene. He is one of our super stars. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to him and his manager. We know you have many options when staying in Huntington Beach, thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a weekend getaway
Summary: My teen daughter and I were in town for a weekend getaway and chose The Waterfront Beach Resort because of it's location - right across the road from the beach. We were on a high floor and had great partial-ocean views from the balcony. The property was in immaculate condition and although our room was on the side of the property currently undergoing construction, we never heard any noise. If you go, try to take advantage of the beach bonfire with s'mores. Although it was only the two of us we had a great evening on the beach. I can't wait to return with the rest of my family.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay here at The Waterfront. I'm so glad you were able to enjoy our Beach Bonfire and S'mores. Its truly a must do when in Huntington Beach! Waterfront memories to last a life time. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Wonderful holiday celebrating my birthday! The staff were so attentive and made the event very special with cake sent to our room. Had an awesome dinner at Shades restaurant on site. Staff were amazing and the food was fabulous!
Manager Response: Dear Kona3445,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased you and your family enjoyed your birthday celebration. I hope you are able to come for another visit for your birthday next year. You can enjoy our new pool, water slides and restaurants. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Have a wonderful holiday season!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: When we booked this room a few months ago they said nothing of the construction at the hotel.  When I went to look back at my reservation through the Hilton site a few weeks before we left there was a notice at the top apologizing for the construction noise.  The entire lobby stairs/upper hall were blocked off and one of the days we spent at the pool the entire waterfall was pulled apart and cleaned.  We felt we paid a good amount for the room and there was no discount to take into account the construction going on.  The pool and spa area was nice.  We are Hilton honors members and we were offered vouchers toward breakfast but there was not an executive lounge I believe because this is a "by Hilton" property and not a straight Hilton.  Rooms seemed nice and clean but the suite
Manager Response: Dear Abigail C,  Thank you for your review. We do our best to inform our guests of the ever changing "work environment" of our enhancement and expansion project. We are nearing the end of the construction phase and this means, with little or no notice, the construction teams move back into an area for the final finish work (like the hanging of our new chandelier and rail glass of our grand staircase, which was what you saw during your stay). We do apologize, but we sometimes do not know what they are doing until an hour before they do it. We hope you come back to see the final result!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Dissapointing staff - Nice room - Pool area was a building site.
Summary: For clarity this review is mostly about the service recieved by the staff during a VERY short stay in October.   Due to a United Airlines staffing issue, I arrived at the Waterfront 6 hours later than expected which meant arriving at 2am with a planned departure of 5am.    I explained this to the valet parking attendant and asked if I could just leave my car by the entrance to the hotel as I'd only be 3 hours max. He agreed but said I would still have to pay a parking charge of $36. Now, I get they have fixed charged for overnight parking but when a guest is litterally just staying in the hotel for three hours??   So.. I explained this to the reception staff who immediately dialled up the smarm to 11. The attitude of the member of staff that I asked for a reduction in price from
Manager Response: Dear terrytTerry,  Thank you for writing your review. We sincerely apologize for missing the mark entirely with you from arrival thru departure. Rest assured this matter has been escalated to all managers and directors and we will make immediate corrections wherever they are needed. This is not who we are and you hit the nail on the head..."Reviews like this are so easy to avoid by applying a little initiative and common sense.". Add to that additional training and coaching where needed.  Please know that we value your business and hope that you will give us another chance. The Waterfront Beach Resort prides itself on our commitment to service and the care and comfort of each and every guest. We are very sorry to have disappointed in this instance.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The staff was helpful and friendly from the arrival to the departure. The room had a great view of the pier and the ocean. The room was clean and comfortable. And it was super close to get to the beach, restaurants and the shops. We'll definitely stay here in our next trip to Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear 625jacquelinef,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at here The Waterfront. I am so glad to read you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. thank you for choosing to stay with us! We hope to see you again in the near future for your next HB trip.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We visit Huntington Beach every year and will never stay anywhere but the Waterfront Hilton.  This is our fourth time at this hotel. Great location, service and amenities.  The staff are amazing, especially the valet and the pool staff.  We can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear Kevin S,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay. Thank you for the kind words, especially for our valet and pool staff. They are such a hard working team. We hope you are able to return for another visit in the future after our expansion is completed. You will love the new amenities!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My sisters and I stayed here on our yearly reunion, and boy were we impressed.  I had stayed here a few years ago and liked it, but boy have they really improved since then.  Every single staff member we encountered was absolutely top notch.  All of them were so friendly and helpful that they really made you feel at home.  The room was beautifully appointed and very comfortable.  We had a queen oceanfront room, and the views were fabulous.  They are almost finished constructing the new tower next door, which looks amazing, but the noise never really bothered us during our stay.  The resort is in a prime location and is very convenient to many attractions.  Valet guys were all so nice and friendly too.  I would definitely stay here again and can't wait to see the finished product
Manager Response: Dear Phantom8,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so please to read that you and your sisters had a fabulous time. I hope you're able to make this and annual trip. We are very fortunate to have such a like minded, hospitality driven team. Thank you for your kind words about them. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, we appreciate you staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Good hotel and location. Parking is a problem. There was a traffic jam both this and the last time I stayed there. The check-in experience was also time consuming plus they were behind schedule on getting rooms ready for guests. Not sure I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear I934YBericc,  Thank you for your review and most recent stay. We're very sorry for any delay of service you experienced while checking in (or otherwise). We are diligently working to correct and smooth out our new check-in process as we integrate our new systems and prepare for the opening of our expansion. Some of the technical enhancements have resulted in system slow-downs and our IT department has been working around the clock to correct these issues. We hope you'll return after our opening and, if all goes well, take advantage of our new check-in process designed to enhance the process (including speed!).  Best wishes,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Huntington Beach is a great place to get away from the hustle and bustle. Awesome beach, easy driving to Laguna Beach, Newport Beach, Santa Monica, and Long Beach. Hilton is a nice laid back resort, with a huge pool area, and excellent outdoor dining space. Rooms seemed a little dated but the overall experience was delightful. We walked the Huntington Beach area - nice stroll to the pier, and then to the downtown area one evening for drinks and dinner. It's nice to be able to walk to places.  The lack of self-parking is disappointing, as is the $36/daily fee for the valet. You would think Hilton might offer free parking to Diamond levels as a perk?!  The valets were very friendly and quick to bring the car up and to open your door. Overall, the service was excellent and

Let me premise this review by saying we were originally set to spend our honeymoon in Las Vegas but because of the tragedy that happened we decided to change plans the week before we were set to be leaving.  We are so glad we did and the hotel made our stay more than special.  We spent 6 days and 5 nights at The Waterfront Beach Resort and from the first moment we walked up to the counter the customer service was unparalleled from any other hotel we have stayed at (and there have been a lot)!  Kealoha at the front desk was the beginning and end of our special stay.  On both our first night and our last night she sent up a bottle of champagne and berries to our room, with a card and shells (we delicately packed them to keepsake forever).   The Waterfront is located right on

We were a party of 4 who stayed in this hotel for the last night of our holiday and wished we'd stayed longer. We loved it - the room was fab, great view of the wonderful beach and sea, everything we wanted. Easy walk into Main Street and the Pier. There is work going on but it didn't cause us any problems. We all hope to return for longer next time.

Great location for the race with start/finish lines and expo right across the street on the beach. Please note only valet service ..but everything is in walking distance. Great staff all very friendly to make your stay a great one.

From the view of our room to the staff it was amazing everytime we come and visit! The food from the shades restaurant on all 3 times of the day are awesome and the drinks from the shades to poolside! All staff treat you as family while you are there and are willing to make sure you are happy!
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for leaving such a glowing review! I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Our views of the ocean and pristine beaches just can't be beat! We are so glad you feel like you're at home when you are with us. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: We went to visit our daughter and stayed at the Waterfront
Summary: The resort is lovely. The concierge Tammy is amazing! Victoria is amazing! Ramid is amazing! We ate in the Shades restaurant food and staff are great! The pool has a view of the palm trees that is very nice. Our room had a view of the ocean and the pier, very nice! We enjoyed a bonfire on the beach and we rode beach bikes every day of our stay. We went to nearby Pacific City for shopping and ate at Lemonades. We rode our bikes there. Everyone was kind and helpful. We would definitely stay here again! Thank you to everyone who made our stay enjoyable!
Manager Response: Dear Ella E,   What a wonderful review! I am so happy you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for mentioning Tammy, Vic and Ramil by name. They are three of our shinning stars! It sounds like you did many activities and enjoyed all our amenities. We know you have many options when visiting Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We had a room on the 8th floor overlooking the new pool area that's under construction.  There's a great view of the beach as well looking out across Pacific Coast Highway.  The staff was very pleasant with the exception of the late night valet guy.  It was 3:30 am so who isn't cranky at that time.  Wonderful visit.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel K W,  Thank you for your very kind review. We are so glad you chose us enjoyed yourself while here. Thank you. Trust me when I say that, regardless of the hour, all of our staff strives to go above and beyond and exceed your every expectation. We'll be swinging by the valet managers office today with a Snicker's bar in hand. At no time is "being cranky" acceptable, and thus we apologize. Now, let's see if this Snicker's trick really works!  Cheers,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We stayed here for 4 days for a work event and it was amazing. The service was outstanding, food was delicious and the location is perfect, you can walk anywhere!!  Room was very nice and the bed was comfortable, we loved the bar area, you can sit and look out at the pool which was very nice!
Manager Response: Dear lauriew600,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us here at The Waterfront. I am so glad to read that you experienced our warm hospitality and beautiful amenities. There really is no better place to have a meeting or event on the coast in California than The Waterfront! We hope you are able to visit us again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Stayed 4 nights at the Hilton. Every single staff member that we were in contact with was super friendly and was always looking to help out in any way possible. The bed was very comfortable and the pool area was nice to relax in after a day of siteseeing. Each night there was good music down at Shades.

This hotel has everything you will ever want in a holiday hotel Friendly staff including management great rooms, fantastic views of the Pacific Ocean and the surf and great food. All sights including a great selection of restaurants  are within walking distance will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Alison,   Hello! I am so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. It was a pleasure to meet you and your associates during your tour. Please let me know when you are headed back to Huntington Beach. Our team looks forward to assisting you in any way to make your stay a great one. I trust you arrived home safely with enough California memories and mementos to last a lifetime. Have a wonderful holiday season!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel at the end of a touring holiday of California and the West. It was well located for the beach and other amenities and our room faced onto the beach which gave extensive views of the sea and sand.  Actually wished we could have extended our holiday by a couple of days at least so as to unwind a little after our tour. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of staying in this general area

Summary Heading: Dog attack In the corridors of the hotel outside my room
Summary: I was staying at the hotel last month and on 9/3/17 I was leaving my room on the 10th floor walking along the corridor at around 12pm when a group of young children with a dog going back to their room walked past me and the dog attacked and bit me on the left foot piercing my skin and sock drawing blood. They then proceeded into their room further down the corridor with no acknowledgment. I was a little shocked when this happened and went back to my room and called security and they came and give me first aid. They stated however, if I needed any further medical treatment, I needed to do this myself!   I consulted a doctor over the phone and I was advised to get some antibiotics, a tetanus vaccination and get the vaccination status of the dog. I tried to get this information
Manager Response: Dear drtc1234,   Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We apologize for the incident and, as we have communicated with you privately on numerous occasions, we are working to resolve this issue. Unfortunately, we will not be able to discuss this matter further on a public forum. California law is such that once a claim is filed and in process, we are not permitted to comment further pending investigation and closure of the case.  Please accept our sincere apologies.   Regards,  Scott O’Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Fall breakGetting to the beach for just a couple of days was a pleasure at this hotel where there was construction going on but you didn’t even know it!   The food was delicious the pool was beautiful the beach was within walking distance and they had everything that you could imagine to bring with you to the beach if you want it Andhotel staff was extremely helpful

this is a very nice hotel with a great view of the ocean and a friendly staff. I stayed here for a work conference at the hotel next door. the pool area is nice. they are renovating the hotel so I did not get to use the gym facilities but you cannot beat this location across the street from the beach.

Beautiful place! We will definitely stay here again!! Gorgeous view and just a walk away from fabulous shopping and restaurants! Our room was amazing and the view of the beach was hands down the best!!!!!

Great resort with welcoming, helpful staff.  Pool was nice and warm, though the hot tub could have been hotter.  Easy access to the beach and boardwalk (across the street), and the resort provided beach chairs, umbrella, toys, etc.  Easy, safe storage for bikes at resort entrance (bring your own chain/lock).  Had a lot of fun riding bikes up and down the boardwalk.  The bond fire and smores option (additional cost) made for a fun, relaxing evening.  The pier, great restaurants, and a variety of stores were only a short walk away.  Really enjoyed watching the surfers.  Convenient resort shuttles if you need the transportation.  Only complaint was the required valet parking and corresponding expense.

Totally convenient location! Amazing staff! We were celebrating our anniversary and opted to stay at the Waterfront Beach Resort. They totally made us feel special. Anticipating all of our needs.  Tammy @ concierge was super helpful and I really enjoyed talking with her and figuring out what we wanted to do. She allowed us to utilize the Beach cruisers during the week at our leisure, which I truly appreciated. EVERY recommendation was spot on.... from restaurants to activities.  The room was comfortable and pretty well laid out.  Shades restaurant on site was pretty good too. We had breakfast, brunch, and dinner there. I just wished they stayed open a little later than 10pm...perhaps b/c I'm a New Yorker and everything is open to the crack of dawn, I had to always plan ahead for

I stayed here a couple months ago in the middle of their renovation, they were building the second tower. We stayed for 2 nights on our Hilton Honors points.   The positives: Amazing location Everyone was nice The shuttle is awesome Valet, although very expensive, was good  The negatives: Rooms were dated Their restaurant menu is pretty boring, I was not a fan.   Overall this is a solid place with a great location. However let me say, even know I am giving it 5 starts, the Hyatt in the same area is much better. The buffet breakfast at the Hyatt was amazing.  I can't wait until the renovations at this hotel are ton, when they are done we look forward to checking it out in the future !
Manager Response: Dear Alex O,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. I am sorry to hear you did not find our rooms and restaurant menu to your liking. I would love more feedback in regards to what you would like to see added to our menu to fit your tastes. We do hope you are able to return for a visit in the near future. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.   At your service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Clean oceanfront room. All rooms have either sunset or sunrise views and ocean views.  Balcony was perfect for relaxing in the morning or evening. Daily charge for valet included unlimited drop off and pickups. Comfortable beds and quiet halls. Dining was good but not superb but you have several options for dining within easy walking distance. Service was very good. Construction should be finished before end of 2017.  I bet watching the HB AIrshow from the room would have been fabulous.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria,   I am so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay with us. There's is something so wonderful about walking out on to your balcony and seeing the beautiful Pacific Ocean! We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. Hopefully you can return for a visit next year for the airshow, Oct. 19-21, 2018!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Stunning property on Pacific Coast Highway. Every room has a balcony with a sunrise or sunset view of Huntington beach. Great pool area. The rooms are all spacious, with a beachy feel (hardwood floors instead of carpeting). Beautiful pale blues, greens, beiges and corals in the decor. Ocean and beach decor touches everywhere throughout the hotel. Nice property but the staff is uber friendly and unpretentious. Valet parking right up front. Short walk to Main Street, the HB famous pier, the Surfing Walk of Fame, local shops and restaurants. The Shades restaurant in the hotel has excellent food. Nice breakfasts. You can dine indoors with a nice view, or outside, around the patio/pool area. Views of the ocean from the dining area. We have stayed here many times and always return
Manager Response: Dear robinmL3688EZ,  I am so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us! We truly appreciate our return guests. Thank you for trusting your vacations with us year after year. I hope you will be able to visit again once our new tower is completed. Thank you for taking the time to write a review!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Good modern hotel overlloking the beach
Summary: A modern well kept hotel, although there is some construction wok going on but it did not disturb us. Nice room wit partial beach/sea view. Beach is just across the road and pier with shops and many eating places pleasant 10 minute walk along the sea front. All amenities  but could not get WI Fi but as seemed you had to be a Hilton Honours member but asked reception and obtained a code. Very nice buffet breakfast by the pool, a little expensive but worth it. Very friendly and pleasant staff.
Manager Response: Dear 73GP,  Thank you for your recent review. We are very pleased to have had you as our guest and look forward to your return.  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: 1 night stay while on a coach tour
Summary: This hotel is very pleasant. We had a room with a balcony which looked over the currently being built new swimming pool area and looked out to the sea.  The room was of a high standard 2 double twin beds, clean bathroom with shower over the bath. The location of the hotel is good for the beach. It takes about 10 minutes to walk to the pier and the main street with shops and restaurants.  We didn't eat in the restaurant but did get a quick bite to eat for breakfast from the 'starbucks' in the hotel, which was fine.  We used the hotel computers to print off our boarding pass, with no trouble or cost.  The only downside for us was the pool and restaurant renovations which were noisy at times during the day.
Manager Response: Dear Tracey T,  Thank you for your kind words. We're very glad you enjoyed yourself while you were our guest in Huntington Beach. When you comeback to see us again we'll be ready with our expansion opened and ready for business! We're very excited!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This hotel was in a great location for our weekend getaway to go to the Costal Country Jam on Huntington State Beach Park. The service is wonderful. Even though we signed a no smoking contract ( which I totally loved). we had smokers next door to us that prevented us from sitting on our balcony and enjoyed our beachfront view but the hotel did respond quickly when we called about it.  It is a beautiful hotel with everything that you need close by.

This is a beautiful hotel in an excellent beach location.  The service and rooms were top notch. They are in active construction of a new tower and facilities,  but it didn't impact our stay.  A little bummed about the lack of self parking option and $36 daily valet charge.  The hotel is within walking distance of everything HB (Pacific City, Main Street, the beach). The pool area has a beach view and daytime music. The rooms also have small balconies with nice beach views. We hope to stay again!

I have stayed here for our all class reunion for the last 4 years.  The location is perfect and the resort staff is great.  Looking forward to next year and seeing the addition of the new tower and pool.

I recently stayed here for five nights at this property. Check in was a breeze and front desk staff were great. Room wasn't ready until 4pm and we managed to get something to eat at the Surf hero market and got a call when room was ready. We got a two Queen ocean view room. It had great views of the pool and you could see the pier at the beach. Room looked clean and was comfortable. We got a great surprise bottle of sparkling wine as an anniversary gift. Shower pressure was great... couldn't find the bathroom fan so it got steamy during showers. Our safe needed attention as it wasn't working and staff were very quick in fixing the issue... turns out it was batteries that needed changing. There was nightly turn down service which included chocolates and bottles of water.  Pool:
Manager Response: Dear Sun_beachlover_1985,  Thank you for your very thoughtful and through overview of your stay! We appreciate your feedback and take it to heart. I am so pleased you enjoyed your anniversary stay with us. We hope you can come for another visit once our expansion is completed. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Hotel was clean and good value for the view. Loved the in-room dining and pool services. Right across the street from the beach and they offer beach cabana and butler service that was great. Wish they could service alcohol on the beach.
Manager Response: Dear P9950QSstephenm,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. We hope it was a memorable anniversary celebration and stay. We know you have many options when selecting a hotel in Huntington Beach; thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Due to a remodel an add on to the hotel we could not use gym facilities. Additionally due to moving of the wedding to the pool area, we were restricted from for use on a Saturday 5:00-7:00 Kind of a bummer.
Manager Response: Dear E5703MVkarls,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for any inconvenience during your stay. We are about to open a brand new 3000 sq. ft. fitness facilities. In the meantime, we have arranged for complimentary access to our adjacent hotel's gym facilities. We will be announcing on all of our social media channels (including Tripadvisor) the phased opening of the Twin Dolphin Tower and event space... be on the lookout!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, across from the beach
Summary: Service is outstanding. The pool guys and bartender and are incredibly attentive, offer restaurant and things to do suggestions and were spot on each time. Room wasn't ready at 2p which was a little frustrating, but we went across the street to the beach and it was ready by 4:30.  There's no good place to change into swimming suits etc, just something to keep in mind.   The hotel is across the street from the beach, and it's a busy street.  If you have kids, you aren't going to want them running from the beach to the pool by themselves.  The property is beautiful and well maintained.
Manager Response: Dear jenadove,  Thank you for the lovely review. We are very close to opening our expansion and new pool and waterslides which will feature a separate men's and women's changing area with showers and lockers. This can be used prior to or after either the pool or the beach!  We apologize for the delay getting into your room earlier than our published check-in time of 4pm. We often can meet this request with ease, but in this instance we could not due to an inordinate number of late departures. We'll certainly try to do better for you next time. Just let us know prior to your arrival you'd like an "early check-in" and we'll do all we can to expedite that service.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Stayed for one night on the 8th Sept. Had to do pre check in at 3.30pm as our room was not ready. Allocated 416 facing the pool. However at 4.45pm on the room being ready, there was an awful stench of dogs as soon as you entered. We went straight back to reception and was allocated room 1219 and informed it had an ocean view. The receptionist omitted to tell us it was facing a construction site and we were woken at 6.40am by noise. The gentleman was very helpful who brought our bags up that evening and it was only on asking him for restaurant suggestions we found out about the shuttle bus. I would have thought the receptionist would have told us. The blue cushions outside on the chairs were badly stained, whilst we were waiting for the shuttle bus, so you really didn't want to
Manager Response: Dear susieKnutsford,  Thank you for your recent review, we appreciate sincerely your feedback. We apologize that you came all this way only to be disappointed with both your room and service from our front desk. Rest assured that no one wants our expansion work to be finished more than we do. We do hope that you consider us again for a future stay. We will knock your socks off when all is said and done.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I travel a ton for work. As a 9 year diamond member it takes a lot to impress me. The Waterfront Beach Resort Hilton did it!  Upgraded to a beautiful oceanfront room. Sunsets were stunning. Breakfast overlooking the pool and ocean was delicious. The hotel concierge offers pre-booking activities. I highly recommend it. Venessa was unbelievably helpful. The beach front bonfire is a must!  Fun and they take care of everything.  Cabana rentals. I prefer the pool over the beach. Poolside has cocktail service, lunch and restrooms. The beach doesn't allow liquor (city ordinance).  The hotel is nearing completion of a new wing. The lobby looks amazing.  The common areas and rooms are beautiful.  While you do occasionally hear the construction, it by no means was intrusive. Every single
Manager Response: Dear Steve A,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent experience here at The Waterfront. I am so happy you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Thank you also for mentioning Vanessa our Chef Concierge by name. She is one of our all stars! We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Ideal location for accessing the beach, great shopping street in main street Huntington Beach with many sports bars. Very new neighboring retail shopping complex and restaurants are plenty all within walking distance. On the beachside is Dukes and Sandy's. Pool area is very nicely laid out with plenary of sunning spots, good little coffee shop and the indoor outdoor restaurant has full bar service and great menu selection. They also offer a full Sunday brunch. Rooms all have a balcony and beach view, they are standard Hilton expectation a little in the tired side but bedding is comfortable as one would expect from a Hilton. Be prepared for expensive car valet as your only parking but while there you won't need to take it out. All amenities are a brief walk.
Manager Response: Dear trishsoto,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay. I am so happy you enjoyed your stay! We love the community we are located in and appreciate how walk-able it is. I hope you are able to come for another visit once our expansion is completed. We know you have many choices when staying in Huntington Beach, thank you for staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Best resort experience in Huntington Beach!!!!
Summary: This is an absolutely amazing resort with the best staff, rooms and views! I did not want to leave. They are so accommodating to every need. They provide chairs, towels, umbrellas and beach toys to take to the beach for free! The pool is amazing with great drink and food service. They have everything right here! I cannot say more about how every single staff member treats you so well. I cannot wait to come back!!!!

Great service, great location, the staff were very friendly and hospitable ! The Boardwalk restaurant has a steak that everyone must try!! Delicious!!  I would definitely stay here in the future! Thank you!

Enjoyed a great time at the hotel and beach right outside the property.  Had a great time watching the fireworks and spending time at the beach.  Property offered many activities at the pool and great restaurant specials.

I am a Hilton team member and I must say, it was a really nice stay!!! Check in was awesome and my boyfriend and I had a pleasant stay thanks to Terry at the front desk!!! ( YOU ROCK!)  Parking: Valet only was 36 a night and the valet/ bellmen were on point as well!   Restaurant: The only negative was the food there :( we spent 60 bucks on what we thought would be tasty fish tacos and prime rib... not good at all. the fish tacos are big, but the piece fish was so tiny. The live music made my night, and the vibe at the restaurant was lovely even though the waiters took a long time to serve us.   Pool area: Nice pool area. Not a pool area for couples to relax, its more of a family pool area with kids everywhere.  Beach Access: The beach is right across the street. It was nice to

I was here for a business trip, at the recommendation of colleagues.  The hotel was lovely and the services were exceptional.  The hotel is right across from the beach, with a number of restaurants within walking distance.   The continental breakfast buffet was exceptional.

You are paying for location for this hotel. Everything is overpriced. It is just a normal Hilton, nothing special. Valet parking is mandatory, there is a boardwalk fee, in room dining fees, and I was not able to enjoy the patio because the furniture took up all the room, the chairs were too big.
Manager Response: Dear Naomi03,   Thank you for your review. We're sorry you did not enjoy your stay while with us at The Waterfront. We are a valet-only hotel (as are all the beach hotels in Orange County) due to space & liability considerations. We're not certain we understand your Boardwalk and in-room dining fees as Boardwalk is our restaurant and in-room dining is "room service", both separate from room charges. We're sorry for any misunderstanding with your final bill and would be happy to discuss it with you in person, just give us a call. 714.845.8000.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We had five nights here in mid August. The staff were all friendly and helpful, especially Vanessa on the concierge desk who helped us sort out a laundry collection/delivery service from a local laundrette when we discovered that the hotel laundry is out of action due to the renovations. The gym was also temporarily out of commission but we were given guest passes to use the next door hotel's gym instead which was very good. I do think that the hotel website should have information about the laundry and gym not being in use, as this would have been helpful to know in advance. Fortunately our room was on the side of the building away from the construction work so we weren't affected by this in our room.

Beautiful hotel with awesome pool. Perfect location, walking distance to Pacific City and the famous Pier. $36 a day for valet plus tips...ripoff. S10 for house gin and tonic at the hotel bar another rip off. Other than that very awesome hotel

3rd time staying at this hotel & always enjoy it.  Great ocean front room & best pet friendly policy in Huntington Beach!   Being remodeled  & I like what I see so far. Great Staff,  Friendly, cordial, & very informative/ helpful!   Restaurant needs some help/ updating, but the Patio is AWESOME

I love the location of the Hilton but the rooms seemed a little below average compared to other places close by. They could use and updating and refreshing.  The staff was generally helpful but the service in the shades restaurant was a bit slow. They seem to understand it and did not execute very well. The bartenders were different – very helpful giving local recommendations.
Manager Response: Dear christ0phercb,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We apologize for failing your expectations on the service side (although this is where we score consistently high marks). We'll be sure to share this review with our Shades/Boardwalk restaurant staff and let them know that even on a busy weekend like Labor Day, service must be executed perfectly. We are very sorry to have disappointed you.  On a lighter note, you may have noticed all the new build that is around us... and thus your desire for updating and refreshing is about to be revealed to the world soon! Once our Twin Dolphin tower and pool are fully operational we'll begin and in short order completely refurbish every space you just experienced... stay tuned!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Week of Fun at the Waterfront (Again!)
Summary: The hotel location is great, the daily shuttle to Main st is awesome, the beach is the best and I can say that the staff really does make you feel welcome and they do their best to take care of the guests.

Great hotel with great service. Only issue we had was being forced to use valet at $36.00 a night because there is no self parking on site or anywhere near the hotel. Received a free upgrade on arrival and had a great view of the water right across the street .

Summary Heading: I wish I lived at this hotel
Summary: a truly wonderful hotel -- the service provided by the staff was excellent and it is apparent that they truly enjoy their work and thus a guest is treated both well and joyfully  no problem was left unsolved

Summary Heading: Five stars for the staff but pushed down by delayed refurb
Summary: We love Huntington Beach and we have great affection for the Hilton Waterfront, mainly because the staff are so brilliant, helpful and very customer and service focussed, this was our third stay. It's a shame they are running behind schedule with their new facilities as it's had an impact on existing services, for example the pool had to close for a wedding, that said the staff went to great lengths to provide alternatives in compensation.  We were initially put in an old one bedroom suite which had a number of serious issues which impacted our first night. However the front desk staff (Shannon) responded quickly and efficiently and moved us to alternative and superior accommodation. This was on the south side of the tower, over looking the renovations but as it was the weekend
Manager Response: Dear Well_travelled_Dad,  Thank you for your kind review and rest assured, we are as equally frustrated with the delays foisted upon us by our builders. While we understand there are things that happen that are beyond our control, we are so glad you recognize that when we can we do ALL we can to make sure you are satisfied and feeling cared for. We at The Waterfront welcome the day (soon, very soon) we can walk you about and show you all that we have done. Until then, our many thanks to you for choosing us and we look forward to your speedy return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: When our home was red tagged by the city, after being hit by a drunk driver...  this hotel opened their doors and made us feel right at home.  I jave rarely seen this kind of service and kindness.  In addition they welcomed my neighbor.  Open arms and super caring to her too.  Through their care during this time we became life long friends.    Stay here and see how great the staff and facility really are!

Stayed here after getting married on 8/27. The reception desk, concierge, in room dining, housekeeping were all wonderful. Can't thank them more. The view, the area the pool was all great. Would stay again in a moments notice.

Summary Heading: Amazing location and outstanding customer service!!!
Summary: Outstanding customer service!  Every single person in housekeeping, front desk, bellmen/valet and restaurant......extremely professional and friendly.  Great location with great decor in the clean rooms.  The ONLY complaint I have is the bed and pillows are SO uncomfortable.  Bed is too stiff and pillows are all feather pillows.

this "resort" has construction going on on the south side of the building.  I highly recommend that you avoid being booked in the first 3 or 4 floors until it is concluded.  Also, room 209 has problems with the bathroom, television, and noisy fridge.
Manager Response: Dear Mrmugooo,  Thank you for your review and for giving us a specific room number to investigate. We have dispatched both engineering and housekeeping to give the room a full inspection from top to bottom. Our apologies for any disappointment you may have experienced as we come to the end of our expansion and the opening of the all new Twin Dolphin Tower and pool. It has been a challenging process, but one that will elevate our resort to the next level and beyond.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We had a great stay in the Hilton Waterfront in Huntington Beach this year, it is the second time we have stayed here and the location is amazing and the local town/beach/restaurants and bars are fantastic. The hotel is very nice, friendly staff and only a short walk to town and the beach is directly in front of the hotel, the other side of PCH. The hotel is a little expensive for what you get tbh, but overall very nice.
Manager Response: Dear elliotg97,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed yourself and the surrounding amenities. We know you have many options to choose from when staying in Orange County; thank you for staying with us. Hope you are able to visit again once our expansion is completed.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This Hotel offers an excellent service for both Business & Leisure guests. I had the chance to experience both during my stay and they were equally good. Very friendly staff, clean all over and very customer focused.
Manager Response: Dear carloseQ9984GP,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so glad you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Amazing hotel, outstanding service.  Wonderful family hotel, where you feel like family by the time you leave.  Don't miss The Mankota fire dance, it's a tradition you must see.  It's the most beautiful location in the area.
Manager Response: Dear 766kelleyk,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay! So glad to hear you enjoy our Mankota Show. It is a Waterfront Tradition that so many of our guests have watched and participated in over the years. The last show for the year is Labor Day Weekend on Friday and Saturday. I am happy you caught it! Thank you for loving our little slice of paradise. Hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: A hotel to stay at over and over again
Summary: Me and my friends stayed 4 nights and had a great vacation while staying at the Waterfront. Everybody at the hotel was so nice to us. Everyone of the staff we came across was so genuinely nice to us. You can tell they care and want you to have a great stay and were always there when we needed something no matter the time. The hotel was very clean and the rooms were in great shape. Its one of those hotels you don't want to leave and we will for sure be back. A must stay while in HB.
Manager Response: Dear Q3701CYjakeb,  Thank you for let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to read that you and your friends enjoyed your stay. Our staff truly embodies the spirit of hospitality and is the heart of our property. We hope you are able to come for another visit once our expansion is completed. You will love all the new amenities, especially Offshore9 our rooftop bar and lounge.  Have a great rest of your summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I would recommend this hotel to others as it was close to restaurants and shops but be prepared to pay a higher amount for the parking...of which there is no other option than the valet.  It is also close to other points of interest in the Socal area.....even down to San Diego or up to the LA / Hollywood area.
Manager Response: Dear bernardmR6321CB,  Thank you for your recent review. We are so glad you enjoyed your time while with us here in Huntington Beach. Our new neighbor (Pacific City) certainly has become the hub of dining and shopping mere steps from The Waterfront's front door. We are so pleased to have such good partners right here at the beach! And on your next stay, forgo the car and take and alternative form of transportation to the hotel (if that works for you). From there you can utilize our on property shuttle to Pacific City and downtown HB and/or rent a car when you need it from the Enterprise desk right here on property. We make it easy and this gives you more options to customize your next stay with us.  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Not only were the guest service staff very friendly and professional but I observed the management would also greet guests and quickly jump in if they noticed their guest service staff were tied up with another guest.

Love this location Great beach Great Pool and everything is provided...just bring your swimsuit and sunscreen...Hilton will give you everything you need to enjoy the beach including a beach bag and toys/footballs for the beach...you will be spoiled and hate to go home

From the moment we existed our vehicle the staff was very helpful in getting our luggage and assisting with valet. The front desk staff was very warm and welcoming, and super helpful.  Our room was on the 5th floor which does not have a ocean front view but it is still excellent and you can see the beach from them. The palms trees did cover the beach view a bit from our room, but I personally think it just adds to the ambiance. We had two rooms one king and one double, both very spacious and comfortable. We did not try the other amenities offered at the property but we enjoyed our stay and will definitely be going back. Overall I did not encounter one staff member that was not friendly our courteous, always greeted with a smile. You must valet your car as they have no self park

Visited the last week of July into the beginning of August.  We were a family of 4 joining 2 other families of friends also staying at the hotel.  We all had children ages 7-10.    Hotel and Staff (Above Average) - From the moment the valet greets you, to check in, and throughout our entire stay, the staff was very polite and accommodating!  Always friendly, going out of their way to talk and see if there is anything they can do for you.    Rooms (Average) We booked a partial ocean view room (which are south facing) but at check in were upgraded to an ocean view room across the hall.  Really the same room type, just a view north over the pool and was able to see the HB pier and sunset.  So actually quite a better view.  Room prices were somewhat spendy and really just average

This hotel was absolutely amazing.  Gorgeous property and they're adding on so it will be even better come September.  Amazing amenities like...they have beach toys, chairs, umbrellas, towels etc.  That you can take across the street to the beach. We had such a great time and CANNOT wait to come back!! Thank you to all the wonderful staff!!

Summary Heading: Very nice beach hotel with great veiws.
Summary: Fantastic location and views. We were in Huntington Beach and decided to stay the night and was lucky to get a great room with a ocean view. Very friendly and helpful staff. Walk to beach across the street, Pacific City shopping & restaurants and Main street.

this hilton takes the extra step to make sure your stay is above thew best, and that you will come back again, which i have and will do it again, i don't even look any other place, because i know the quality i receive, is worth every penny, thank beach front hilton huntington beach ca. michael & kimberle ferris

Everything was beautiful. Careful being placed next to a room with a dog. Potential to be kept awake at night due to barking. They have to sign a contract when bringing a dog, but nothing seemed to be done about the barking because it happened the second night as well.
Manager Response: Dear lisahO7395PT,  Thank you for your review and bringing this to our attention. Our apologies for any disturbance due to an unattended pet. You are correct, this is not permitted and should be reported to Security or the Front Desk so that we may contact the owners of the pet. We will forward your comments to the appropriate departments for immediate review.  Thank you,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Wedding was superb and the staff did everything possible to help us but the staff was very overwhelmed with the check in process and in servicing of roooms.  The folks who service the pool area are wonderful as are the young guys who park the cars - really first rate.  The location is superb.  The resatuarant is good and the service, no health club at the present time or salon of any kind.

Superior staff who are extremely helpful and friendly.   Accommodations were clean and as described when making our reservations; close to the beach, hotel had everything we needed and the pool is great too!

We vacation to the OC once a year with the dogs (They love the beach as much as we do) and we haven't stayed at this hotel before but thanks to an American Express offer, we decided to check the place out.  After reading some of the reviews that negatively referenced construction next door there was some hesitation but I'm super glad we didn't let those reviews persuade us away.  The hotel is a fantastic property that is just the right size for a peaceful getaway.  The staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly to guests.  Rooms are clean, spacious, and have been updated.  We felt that our pets were actually welcome there and not just tolerated like other properties where we have stayed in the past.  The hotel is right across from PCH and a short walk to the pier and/or dog
Manager Response: Dear Todd,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay, including your furry family members! We hope you are able to visit once the expansion is completed. Have a wonderful rest of your summer. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Construction and technical issues ruined my stay.
Summary: I had a nice room until I looked outside to discover construction of a new pool area and new wing. My concerns were put to ease when I assumed construction was done for the day since no work was being performed but later that evening construction started back up. Put on top of that the room phone LCD screen lighting up every 20 minutes due to it disconnecting and reconnecting as well as a toilet running randomly throughout the night. Needless to say it was not a pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Dear imfairless,  Thank you for your review and we sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered during your stay. There is not supposed to be any construction in the evening and very limited work on weekends. We will notify the contractors immediately.   Also, we're very sorry for the phone resets. We have been upgrading all of our phone systems as part of our technical improvements to accompany our expansion. As you experienced, things did not go smoothly. We are very close to opening our expansion wing and thus all of the projects to make that a reality have begun to impact some of our day to day operations as new computers, phones, fire/safety, elevators and ballrooms undergo extensive testing and certification. We hope you will grant us another opportunity to "Make It Right" and welcome you back when all is done.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Perfect location!  Friendly staff (specifically the pool wait staff)!  Clean!  Perfect for children with the pool, ocean front and close proximity to restaurants and shopping.  Even offered alternatives to the pool when they had to close it for a wedding.
Manager Response: Dear Tina,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay here at The Waterfront Beach Resort. I am happy you enjoyed your stay and all Huntington Beach has to offer. We can't wait for you to return for a visit once our expansion is competed. We will have water slides, a kids club and suites adjacent to the pool deck! Perfect for your family. We know you have many choices, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Our family has travelled around the world.  The beaches in Maui and Australia are nice but do not compare to the beach at Huntington Beach.  We will take our next Dolan Annual Family Vacation once again at the Waterfront Hilton in Huntington Beach.

I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. The staff are fantastic and cannot do enough for you. It's a beautiful hotel (you are not impacted by the construction work at all but this will be a fantastic resort when completed) and it's perfectly located for the beach (2 mins max) and Main Street / restaurants / shopping etc. We had a fantastic time here and my daughter cried when we left! We will be returning. Thank you to all the staff for such a wonderful experience.

The Waterfront was a fantastic experience from beginning to end. The location is central to all major shops, restaurants and attractions. The entire staff including valets, reception, housekeeping, restaurant & poolside staff were some of the nicest and most helpful we have ever encountered. Although the neighboring Hyatt is larger with more amenities, we preferred the quaint and more intimate Waterfront. You will not be disappointed!

Overall location was great!  Located next to shops, food and water.  What else could you ask for?  Well...the service was less than satisfactory, the pool attendants were not properly dresses, were understaffed and were not trained correctly.  The main bar was not staffed for breakfast, the servers were more interested in providing lack luster service and more interested in TIPs.  I literally waiting 15 minutes to be waited on, as I watched them walk past the table/bar.  Also, your Hilton status doesn't matter at this site.  They are looking for pure volume and occupancy.  Lastly, the front deck was understaffed in the AM, undertrained and did not have an understanding of the resort, amenities.  Good luck staying here!  The Hyatt and Pasea have better service, are newer and
Manager Response: Dear  J2489TRjamesk,  Thank you for your review. Our apologies for your experiences during your stay. We're not sure when things flew off the rails for you while here (it would seem at every turn), but please know that we welcome any concern or complaint on the spot. We learn quickly from our mistakes and love the opportunity to "Make It Right" on the spot! We certainly will share this review with our department leaders and managers. We pride ourselves on our outstanding service and, even in the face of an enormous expansion project (nearly complete) and again, apologize for disappointing you.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel.

Summary: Hotel is across the street from Beach.    Nice hotel awesome staff.   Stayed here with Family.   Location is nice and restaurants are within walking distance.   Would definitely recommend to others.     Huntington Beach has a lot of surfers to watch and there was a tournament and skateboarding competition that we watched.

First, I want to make clear that I am not a nit-picker, and wont bother writing a review unless I am either super impressed, or super disappointed. This review is unfortunately for the latter.  We stayed at this property from June 28 - July 1, 2017. King Oceanview Corner Suite (Not the Jr.)  Parking: Starting with no non-valet parking. You basically have no choice but to valet park. If you are like me who does not like strangers getting behind the wheel of your car, then this isnt for you. For me, it was the very first time in my life I had to give in, as no other choice available, unless you want to walk a few blocks (2-3 I think). I was there with small children so it was not easy to do so.  Room:  We reserved a corner Jr ocean view corner king suite, but ended up upgrading
Manager Response: Dear Moe K.,  Thank you for your insightful and detailed review. We apologize for disappointing you in any way during your stay. It should go without saying that, construction or not, your concerns should have been handled quickly and efficiently. If for any reason (as can happen during busy time of the day) you cannot reach the front desk to assists you, please do not hesitate to dial the operator and ask for immediate attention. If you happen to run into any of our staff, we too are trained to take immediate ownership of any situation and begin to find a solution. We don't want a single one of our guests to feel they can't approach us for any reason. We are always here for you!  Again, our apologies for the intrusion of the construction noise on your vacation. It has been a challenge but one who's end is near! We hope you return to enjoy the all new and vastly improved Waterfront Beach Resort.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We have stayed at the Hilton Waterfront at least 5 times.  It is always a great experience.  The staff is helpful and courteous.  It's a little tougher if you come with a family of 5 or more because they don't offer a room with multiple beds.  Other than that, it's great.
Manager Response: Dear 60allisonb,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to read you had a wonderful time. Please note that our new Twin Dolphin tower will feature larger adjoining rooms and suites. We hope you are able to return for another visit after the expansion is completed! Have a great summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The Waterfront Beach Resort is by far the best hotel that I have ever stayed.  The staff, from the front desk to the cleaning staff, the waiters and waitresses to the workers in the market place were ALL so happy and accommodating.  The offers that were available were so perfect for the location - beach chairs, beach toys, fire wood and smores kits, and so much more.  I was so happy during my stay and because of the location and the quality of the hotel my family had a fantastic weekend.
Manager Response: Dear V5611ILrichardc,  Thank you so much for the kind review of your stay! I am so happy to hear your enjoyed your time with us. We do have a happy and helpful bunch here at The Waterfront. I know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. I hope you are able to come for another visit once our expansion is completed.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Great hotel, great location and staff was more than accommodating. The pool was a little crowded but the new tower and pool will help that once it opens.  The restaurant was great and loved the entertainment provided by the poolside.  Lots of fun stuff to do and walking distance to town and beach.  Personally, I think the king beds should have king size pillows, but this seems to be the standard at Hiltons.
Manager Response: Dear ash24helen,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! I am so glad you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for the feedback in regards to our pillows. I will pass it on to our management to review. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for staying with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This hotel is wonderful .  We just stayed there for the weekend and really enjoyed the hotel. The rooms are great and the views really beautiful. The pool is good and the staff so friendly. A very good hotel to stay in Orange County and I strongly recommend to give it a try.
Manager Response: Dear Jaime,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The staff at The Waterfront went above and beyond in making our 1st anniversary memorable. All staff we encountered were extremely helpful and always smiling. We were greeted with respect and surprised with champagne in our room to celebrate. We will definitely be back to this hotel. By far, one of the best vacations we've experienced.
Manager Response: Dear Q6982DNdenisew,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. Happy Anniversary! I am so happy you enjoyed your time here. I hope you can make it a yearly tradition. Thank you for trusting us such a milestone event in your lives. Have a wonderful summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This is a tremendous hotel located across Pacific Coast Highway from the Pacific Ocean in Huntington Beach.  HB is known as Surf City and this hotel is a paradise for surfers and families looking to enjoy the ocean, the beach, the views and HB.  The hotel has great staff and is still well maintained.  If you want a true HB experience, this is the hotel to go to.

This hotel is first class. The staff goes out of their way to make sure that guests have what they need and are very friendly. The location is excellent with the Beach and pier right across the street.

Summary Heading: No self-parking and Valet charge is excessive!
Summary: $34 per day for valet parking is forced on you because no self parking.  This was not disclosed in reservation.  Service in restaurant (Shades) was also not great considering this is supposed to be a luxury hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Epn123,  Thank you for your review. We make every effort to inform our guests of parking policies for personal vehicles both on our website and via confirmation letter disclosures. As has been discussed many times previously here on TripAdvisor, parking is Valet Only at all the major hotels in the area. There is no overnight parking permitted at the beach and the remainder of parking is either metered (with four hour maximums before you have to resupply the meter) or residential (which is not nearby). We are very limited with capacity and therefore rely upon our valet professionals to park and stage all of our vehicles (including those who work here). We apologize for not having an option to self park, but for liability and safety reasons that is something that is not feasible working within our own limitations.  Please know that we now proudly offer rntal options via Enterprise and have a complimentary shuttle as well. A car would only be absolutely necessary if that is how you were arriving.  We will also pass on your comments regarding service in Shades/Boardwalk. We apologize for any disappointment and look forward to the opportunity to improve upon your next visit.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Very well situated, plenty of dining and shopping options nearby and of course the beach is across the street.  Super staff, really friendly and helpful.  The restaurant food was very good also.  You can borrow beach toys and other items from the pool cabana free which is great and the pool area is very nicely done.

love this place and the proximity it is located, we never take our car out once we get there, you can walk to everything! Beach, dining , street fair all within walking distance, and they provide a shuttle to main street if you don't feel like walking!
Manager Response: Dear 421rexk,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We have stayed twice now and it is our only Huntington choice. It has a small boutique feel for what is a large property. Staff are amazing and nothing is a problem.Even on night one when your son throws up in the bed! Location is brilliant close enough to the action but far enough away to have a gap. Very family friendly especially in the pool area. I don't know why you would chose anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Nathan,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to hear your and your family enjoyed your stay. I hope your son is feeling better. We hope you are able to return for another visit once our expansion is completed! Have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We had a great stay here.  Our room overlooked the beach and had a patio where we could relax and enjoy the view.  Our room was high enough that street noise did not bother us.  Staff was nice and in-house restaurants were fine.  We were within easy walking distance to the main area of Huntington Beach with the pier.  Hotel concierge was very helpful.  Best thing we did is have a bonfire on the beach, reserved and paid for thru the hotel, with hot dogs and s'mores to roast while we just relaxed and watched the sunset.  HIGHLY recommend this!!!

From the time I pulled into valet, until I pulled out of valet, the stay at this hotel is amazing! The staff is accommodating, friendly and treat everyone amazing. The hotel is beautiful and comfortable with breathtaking views of the beach. The food at the hotel is wonderful, and there are many other restaurants within walking distance too. I recommend this hotel for any type of visit - business or pleasure!

Summary Heading: Nice resort and VERY pet friendly
Summary: I go to Huntington Beach about 6 times a year to surf.  I normally stay inland where prices are about 2/3 less.  However, I brought the wife and dog this time on a splurge.  As others have said, there is ongoing construction, so the quieter rooms are on the side facing the pier so ask for them (which I had).  I've seen some complaints about the room size but it was more than adequate for us.  The room was very clean and inviting.  Best views are floors 6-12 and we had 12 so it was fabulous.  This is the oldest beach resort of the 3 that are side by side (Hyatt and Paseo) but does not show its age.  The Hilton was the best deal of the 3 by far.  If you need pet-friendly, it is also the best.  Dogs are allowed by the pool and on restaurant patios.  Also, the pet fee is only $50

A four star review with plenty of upside.  I have a hard time giving it 5 stars while it's under construction, but probably would otherwise   Upsides - everyone who works at this hotel work hard to make your visit great with extremely friendly service!  The service, food and drinks at the pool are great!  Downside - one could argue that the property is a little dated, but they are building/remodeling it.  When completed, I have no doubt this hotel will desire all 5 stars

Summary Heading: Horrible! Horrible! Don't waste your money
Summary: I made a reservation in this hotel for a 4 night stay for a room with two double beds with ocean front view. Before I chose this hotel I hesitated between this hotel and the Hyatt next door. Based on other reviews on trip advisor I chose the Hilton and also because I am (was) a Hilton rewards member. BIG MISTAKE!! The Hilton gave us a horrible smelly room next to the construction and on the first floor. The room was the last room in the hallway in a back corner.  It looked so old and outdated that I thought maybe I was in some motel. I had  view of the parking lot out in front.  When I asked if we could have another room they said they had nothing available and didn't care. The Hilton staff told me I could leave if I wanted and so we did !! I walked out and walked right into the
Manager Response: Dear Dominique B.,  We are very sorry that you were disappointed in any way with the service or accommodations you received while here at The Waterfront. We never want to see a guest leave our property dissatisfied with any aspect of our level of service and will do all we can to "Make It Right" before it may come to that. Unfortunately the solutions we offered did not meet that goal and we apologize.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: VIEW IS PRICELESS!! ABOVE AND BEYOND!
Summary: Excellent rooms, service and Staff goes above and beyond to assist your needs! The view is PRICELESS!! All you need is with in walking distance including the OCEAN!  Rooms are clean and comfortable, Governor's Suite or Presidential Suites are the Best!
Manager Response: Dear Laronda S,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed our amazing views of the ocean. I hope you are able to come for another visit once our new tower is completed. It will feature modern suites with the same amazing views. we know you have many choices when stay in Huntington Beach. Thank you for staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Our stay at the Waterfront Beach Resort was incredible! Wonderful staff, wonderful facilities and great location. Every moment of our stay was enjoyable from the time we checked in until the time we checked out.

Beautiful view of the ocean, great staff at the hotel.  Lots of shopping and restaurants close by.  The beach bonfire is worth the $140 or so it costs, they do everything for you, just show up and enjoy.

Great hotel, great staff but don't go during construction, very noisy and we were not informed in advance that the property was under construction. Location is excellent, very close to the Huntington Beach Pier, shops and many restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear  Vicki H.,  Thank you for your recent review. Our apologies for any disturbance during your recent stay with us. We encourage everyone reading this review to carefully read your confirmation letters we send once a reservation is made. If any work or construction is underway, we make full and complete disclosures there. If there are operational challenges as a result of construction or events (such as a pool closure for a specific event), those can be found as an alert at the top of our Hilton branded website page.  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Upon arriving at the resort I was greeted by friendly staff who ensured I had everything. After a long flight from Boston it was breathtaking seeing the beauty of the hotel and the view I had of the pacific. I was in SoCal for my birthday and was recommended to stay here. I want to especially thank and acknowledge the housekeeping staff for their kindness and sincere work in my room every morning. My belongings were never removed from my room which made me feel comfortable. I will return to this resort hotel soon!

The hotel is under construction, which means staying on the north side you have.a lot of noice - and a view on a construction side. The south side looks at the pool. This is nice during the week, however during the weekend there are (honeymoon) parties going on all the time. Besides this is noisy, also the pool is closed a lot of time.  The rooms are small and s bit outdated. Breakfast is expensive.
Manager Response: Dear tk63,  Thank you for your recent review. It is not uncommon for us to hear how crowded and busy things can be during the summer months. This is, after all, the busiest time of year for not only hotels but beaches, restaurants, amusement parks...the whole lot. We highly recommend (if at all possible) a return in mid-September and beyond. You will not only feel as if you own the place but our new and completely updated suite-centric tower will be opening! In addition, we'd love the opportunity to "Make It Right" and show you what we're all about... in an environment and pace that may suit your tastes perfectly. We apologize that this was not the case during your recent stay.  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is one of the nicest places you could stay. Staff is extremely friendly and very helpful. The property is clean and located across from the incredible Huntington Beach. Downtown area is a short distance and the hotel offers an hourly shuttle. I'm not sure you could find a better hotel on the beach in SoCal.

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel in an amazing location
Summary: About 5 years ago, the family and I were driving down PCH from Santa Monica to San Diego when we happened to stop at a light right in front of the Waterfront Beach Resort.  The kids looked over and said, "Dad, we need to stay here next time."  And of course, we've stayed here each of the last four years.  And yes, we will be staying here every time.  Unless of course, the hotel is packed which it has known to be.    Our last stay was for the kids' spring break.  Fortunately for us, the CA schools spring break was a week later which meant smaller crowds at the beach and vacancies at the hotel.  To our delight we were upgraded to the Governor's Suite.  Absolutely stunning view of Huntington Beach and the ocean.  Here's the review:  Location:  Fantastic.  Less than a mile to
