Summary Heading: I Never Realized I Missed Living Near HB
Summary: Born and raised in a nearby city, I swore I never missed living there. However, we brought our family for one night and so many feelings came flooding back.   The hotel is beautiful and right across the street from the beach. We had an ocean view room that was clean and cozy. It's a short walk to Main Street and tons of restaurants and shops.   The whole HB vibe is super chill. Big waves at the beach. Can't wait to go back!!
Manager Response: Dear GMoney74,  Thank you. This review is what we call a "Visitor's Bureau Moment". We can talk all day about how beautiful, fun, "chill", ect. that Huntington Beach and The Waterfront can be, but you just nailed it in seven sentences!  We look forward to your speedy return...and thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Sweet 16 Birthday Bonfire with Butler Service!
Summary: Our daughter wanted a bonfire for her Sweet 16 Birthday. I was lucky enough to find the Waterfront Adventures link through the hotel website. We had a party on a Saturday night for 30 people and the service was excellent. I would use this company again in a heartbeat. Thanks to Vanessa,her team and the Waterfront Adventures staff for making our event seamless and so much fun! The only drawback was that we didn't actually book rooms and stay at the resort! We will do that next time for sure!
Manager Response: Dear monique1310,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent party with Waterfront Adventures! I am so happy to hear a good time was had by all. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to Vanessa, Shawn and his team at WA. We hope you are able to come and stay with us after our expansion is completed! Your daughter and her friends will love the addition of the new Driftwood pool, waterslides and cabanas. Thank you for trusting us with her Sweet 16! Have a great summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Too pricy for a Hotel under construction. The pool was closed down while weddings were taking place. The construction was supposed to be completed by the time we arrived but the main pool and the other tower were not completed.
Manager Response: Dear johnA957FN,  Please accept our apologies for disappointing you during your stay. We understand (better than most) how guests of our hotel want the new tower and amenities to be open now. However, unforeseen delays due to weather earlier in the year forced our builders hand and delayed critical portions of construction until conditions improved. We are very excited and happy to report that, when we are finally handed the keys, everything will be spot-on perfect! We hope you come back and visit us when all is said and done... you will NOT be disappointed in the slightest.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Our 4th vacation at this amazing 5 star resort
Summary: Our family visited WBR for the 4th time in 4 years 6-30-17 through 7-9-17 and had another incredible experience. I discovered WBR 4 years ago when my husband had to travel to southern CA for business and I decided to tag along. After a lot of research I chose Huntington Beach and the WBR. We went in January and after our experience we immediately booked a vacation for the following July. Every stay at this resort has exceeded expectations and the service is second to none from the front desk to the servers and the valets. The level of service this stay was even better than previous stays and I didn't think that was possible. Also every time I emailed the hotel, and I emailed a lot, I got an answers within hours. We got exactly the accommodation we wanted per our request. As
Manager Response: Dear Tim S,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am thrilled you enjoyed your stay. We have the best valet staff and I am so pleased to hear you experienced their amazing customer service. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to the rest of our staff and management. We hope you are able to visit us again once our expansion is completed. We can't wait for you to see the new pool and tower featuring all suite rooms. Have a great summer and thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My sister in law got married here and I was a part of the entourage. From the moment we got in the staff was all courteous and polite, really helped us with our luggage and check in. The hotel was smaller than we expected but I guess it was good coz we did not have to walk a long way just to go to the beach. The rooms too were small but it was cozy and the view of the front view ocean from the suite is amazing! The staff from the reception at the ballroom were all great, chatty and helpful. We enjoyed the night before the wedding the fire pits, drinks and acoustic music live! Hula dancers were there to entertain is too! It was overall a great experience for family!
Manager Response: Dear Princess B,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay and your sister in law's wedding. We pride ourselves on warm, California hospitality and by your review it looks like our staff from the Bellmen to Banquets delivered our famous five diamond service to you! I will be sure to pass on your kind words to the rest of our team. We hope you are able to return for a visit once our expansion is complete,. We will be doubling in size! Have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Great location, great staff. What more can you ask for. Highly recommend this hotel. Ask for Jessica Giovinetti. She is an outstanding Concierge The bell staff was great and they drove us to the street fair and everything. Nothing bad to say about this group of staff. Outstanding JOB!!!

going thru a bit of a transition with renovations, but don't shy away from this hotel.  great pool, great restaurant SHADES for breakfast and a bloody mary.  the staff is amazing, friendly and helpful.  the tv show rosewood was filmed around the pool area a few times...love that.

While the location is a major positive for this property, the staff makes all the difference.  Smoothest, most friendly, hard-working staff we've ever seen.  Kudos to all for this.  Management is visible and interacting with guests and staff alike.  They are clearly a working part of the team and not just supervising others' work.

My family had a i were here for only 2 days, it was too short. We loved it here. The restaurant is fantastic and we really felt like staying longer. It was nice to have the beach right next door so we didn't have to pay a parking fee or deal with traffic, so it was quite  convenient. The rooms were nice and the balcony of our room gave us a beautiful view of the ocean and sunset.

Sunshine and excellent service @ Hilton, Huntington Beach. Smiles and greetings and offers of help from staff offered continuously. Clean, comfortable. Within walking distance of Duke's. Fantastic furnishings.

This was our second year in a row celebrating the 4th of July holiday.  We knew some new tips and tricks this year so our experience was even better.  We reserved a beach cabana one day, pool cabana another day, and beach bonfire on our last day, all through the concierge Tammy.  She was by far one of the friendliest of most professional employees I've ever encountered.  She is an absolute STAR!!!!  The poolside cabana was the biggest hit and most helpful with the family.  Thanks to everyone for such a wonderful time - we will see you again next year!!!

Early check in no problem.  Shuttle service no problem. Great room with view no problem.  Great stay.  No problem.   Great staff everyone super helpful obviously caring ...... feels like home but better.  Location in Huntington Beach was perfect

Summary Heading: Terrific Stay, Exactly What a Stay Should be Like
Summary: My family came here for a Father's Day, end of the school year celebration.  We stayed in a beautiful 1-bedroom suite, and it was amazing!  From the large living room with giant TV, the dining room with table for four, the full size guest bathroom, separate master bedroom with HUGE, luxurious bathroom with jetted tub and massive standalone shower, and three balconies to top it off...we were in heaven!  The staff here was great!  Very friendly, very accommodating, top-notch service experience.  This carried throughout the entire property, too.  Every one we came into contact with seemed like their number one job was to make sure we had the best possible stay that we could.  The pool is fantastic, very big!  Food and beverage service while you're enjoying the water is also

Our family has been coming here for the past 3 years and we are extremely satisfied with this Hotel.  It meets all of our needs from a 65 year old to a 1 year old.  We will continue to use this as our Staycation.
Manager Response: Dear sylviap267,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. We appreciate the feedback. I am so pleased you and your family had a wonderful time. We know you have many options to choose from in Orange County, thank you for staying with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay at the Hilton. Very modern and upgraded and staff were super friendly. Good was good in the restaurant. Our "partial view" room had a full on view of the beach. Phenomenal to wake up to and sit out on the balcony.
Manager Response: Dear Jay C,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Our views of the ocean just can not be beat! We hope to see you again in the near future. Have a wonderful day.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Excellent location with great service.  The pool and restaurant by the pool are very good.  Staff was extremely helpful and attentive. The hotel is right on the beach with amazing views from the room and access to the Pacific City restaurants and shops close by.
Manager Response: Dear K347TCdavidg,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your feedback. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel and staff! One of the best family vacations...we will definitely come back!
Summary: First off, I'm a platinum member with Marriott/SPG, but tried out the Waterfront hotel because of it's location. That said, this (by far) will be my first hotel of choice for future visits to the area. My family absolutely loved our stay at the Waterfront, and there's really no reason to stay anywhere else!  Everybody at this hotel makes you feel extremely welcome. The front desk, maid service, restaurant employees, poolside staff, etc. Absolutely everybody was fantastic.  I reserved two rooms (a suite and a king room). There was an issue with the availability of one room type, and the manager took care of the issue quickly. Overall, the rooms are very comfortable and clean, and the location can't be beat.  I've stayed at several hotels in several cities, and this was one of the

This is the best location if you can get it for the 4th of July fireworks shows from the pier and surrounding area. The pool was crowded with kids and the poolside chairs needed upgrading. Food and service is good but the breakfast was not so tasty.

Summary Heading: Our Best Hilton stay so far!
Summary: We have stayed in several Hilton hotels, including the Hilton in Venice, Italy, which we have highly recommended here in TripAdvisor...but this Hilton has by far, exceeded all of them! Location is right in front of the beach, the Surf Capital, and within a short walking distance to the pier and Main Street where all the action, shopping and restaurants are. The pool, lobby and rooms are  all decorated with the beach surf theme...oh, and we were given a nice view . Food at the pool restaurant is very good... but most importantly,   the service was excellent, across the board, from check-in to check-out! We will definitely stay here again next summer...

Summary Heading: Great Location with a Great View
Summary: We recently stayed here to celebrate my wife's 40th birthday. The staff went out of their way to assist us with accommodations, beach cabana rental and working with nearby restaurants to see if they could seat our large party (~40 people). The staff was very helpful throughout the hotel and definitely added to the experience.   The hotel is located across the street and if you get a suite (which we did), you have a wonderful, unobstructed ocean view. You have to walk across the street to the beach and depending on what you are taking with you, it could be a little bit of journey. I recommend bringing a cart with you to haul your beach equipment to/from the beach. The hotel will provide towels and chairs for quests to use at the beach...they will even provide sand toys for the

You can rent a Bonfire by the hour and they will bring it to the beach. Wish we had known in advance! Bonfires everywhere and it was so fun to see!! Location is great! Live music in the evening was fun!
Manager Response: Dear Sally H,   Thank you for your recent review of your stay here at The Waterfront....So wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay. Please note that all of our activities and amenities are fully listed on our website, www.waterfrontresort.com, as well as accessible through our concierge via our hotel switchboard. At the top most portion of our website, next to the current temperature, there is a link titled Bonfires, Cabanas & Bikes with information. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for staying with us!  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This room had a great view! Tiny balcony but awesome view. Comfy bed. Pool nice for the kids. Beach is just across the street with in walking distance. No extras like chairs or beach stuff. Asked for a crib for my infant and never received it. Nice staff. Room service was great.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda,  Thank you for your recent review in regards to your stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to read overall you enjoyed your stay. I wanted to personally apologize for the items you requested not being delivered to your room. I am sorry for any inconvenience this caused your family.  Please note for future stays, we do have complimentary beach chairs, beach mats, umbrellas and beach toys available at our Pool Cabana to take across the street to the beach; on a first come first serve basis. I would be happy to assist you with any future stays. Please do not hesitate to contact me directly through our hotel switchboard. Thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager 714-845-8000

Summary Heading: Top Notch Service With a View!
Summary: Staying at The Waterfront Beach Resort was INCREDIBLE!  I was there to attend a business meeting, but brought family with me.  Every part of our stay was amazing!  From check in to check out, they are a professional team there tom meet your needs.  First an foremost...you can't get a better view!  While the hotel sits on east side of PCH, you have a clear, beautiful view of the beach.  I was in room 810, which also had a great view of the pier and pool area.  (The pool area was much busier on the weekend than during the week days.)  All aspects of the facility were very neat and clean.  Each employee, no matter the department, was warm and friendly, and there to help you in any way.  We held our meeting in the Tides Ballroom.  It was an amazing facility!  We had many windows to
Manager Response: Dear So_Cal_Sporty_Family,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your stay with us. We greatly value your feedback and I am so glad to hear you enjoyed yourselves here at The Waterfront. We hope the next time you are in the Huntington Beach you are able to stay with us once again. We truly enjoyed having your company and family with us. We know you have many options when in the area and we are grateful for your patronage.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel right by the beach
Summary: I couldn't be more impressed with this hotel.  The staff was just so accommodating and wonderful.  Beautiful views, quiet rooms.   Property is beautiful and very well maintained.  Totally recommend you stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ellen A,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a kind and thoughtful review. I am so pleased to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. We are thankful you chose The Waterfront knowing just how many options there are in Orange County. We hope the next time you visit Southern California you will be able to stay with us once again.  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Amazing staff. All personnel demonstrate that they are committed to an excellent guest experience. Would highly recommend this hotel to both business groups and individuals. Right across from beach and many great restaurants and shopping is within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear russl476,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We truly appreciate your feedback and we are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope that you will stay with us again if your travels ever bring you back to Huntington Beach.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I wasn't sure what to expect with this hotel. I am pleasantly surprised. I am a Hilton honors member so I checked in through the app and picked my 6th (626) floor corner room. Digital key does not work until you stop by the front desk and show ID and credit card. I chose the one bedroom KG with wrap around balcony. It was a great size. Separate KG bedroom with TV and individual heating/cooling. Living room with wrap around views, pullout sofa, chair and TV. A large bar area with coffee pot and refrigerator. The wrap around balcony has just two chairs and a side table. Bathroom is huge!  One sink but separate tiled shower and a tub/shower combo. View from six floor was of both ocean and pool towards pier. You do see palm trees on a portion of balcony so if you want to avoid them
Manager Response: Dear swtont,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thorough review of your stay. We truly value your feedback and use it to better train our staff. I hope you are able to visit us again once our expansion is complete. The new tower will feature modern suites with the same amazing views you had in room 626. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront.   At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Fully enjoyed my stay at the Waterfront Hilton.  Although there is a lot of renovation going on it was of minimal disruption to my stay.  The food was great, service excellent and you can't beat the beautiful views of the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie A,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We take your feedback to heart and we are so pleased you enjoyed all aspects of your visit. We hope you can return for another visit once our expansion is completed.  Thank you again for staying with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel beach front location rooms all have sea veiws. Downside is a lot of road noise when patio doors open or down at the pool and bar prices are way too high advice you go to the local bars instead you will save loads and get more for your bucks.
Manager Response: Dear Michel,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for any disturbances you may have experience from traffic on PCH during your stay. During the summer the volume of traffic and visitors reaches its peak. Come see us in September when the weather is perfect and the crowds have gone!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: One of our most favorite hotels!
Summary: We stayed here last week. This was our second stay here. Absolutely love this place! We had an oceanfront suite that was  beautiful. The operations director, Ajit, went above and beyond to make our stay perfect!  We would highly recommend this resort and cannot wait to return soon!
Manager Response: Dear TheMoore4,  Thank you for your recent review of The Waterfront. We take your feedback to heart and we are so pleased to read your enjoyed your stay. Thank you for mentioning Ajit by name. I will be sure I pass on your kind words to him. We hope that when you visit Orange County in the future, you choose to stay with us again. Have a wonderful summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: A great location in Southern California
Summary: I visit this location often while in California both for business and family vacations. It is located withing walking distance of nightlife and restaurants, and close to airports or wherever you want to go in the greater LA area. It offers all you need on the property as well. Great staff, great service, highly recomend.
Manager Response: Dear bmangapora,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review! We are so pleased to read your enjoyed your stay and are recommending others do the same. We know you have many options when visiting Southern California; thank you for choosing to stay with us. Have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel but not Handicapped Friendly
Summary: The hotel was nice. My problem with the hotel is it is NOT handicapped friendly at all.  I am handicapped with artificial hips and have a problem with steps and stairs.  In order for me to go out front, I had to go up and down many stair steps or take elevator down to lobby level and use valet exit and walk all around the hotel to get to the front, which caused a great deal of issues for me.  Parking was limited to valet only and way too expensive.

We have stayed at this property many times and have always found it very relaxing. Not this time. The web page on the Hilton site advises that there is construction going on next door it is actually a major addition of a new tower, new pool area and restaurants for the Hilton. The web site clearly states that construction will start at 8:00am. IT DOESN'T. It starts at 6:00! Wake up to that at the crack of dawn. We had booked a beautiful serene suite to really unwind and this racket is enough to set your teeth on edge. I'm a Diamond Hhonors member and some advance warning would have altered our decision of where to stay.
Manager Response: Dear John O,  Thank you for your recent review. It is absolutely correct that work is scheduled to begin at 8am, no sooner. We will investigate the matter thoroughly as this is not just annoying and an inconvenience, but also against City ordinances.   Most of what is happening now is finish work and connecting the two towers. From time to time it can be a bit jarring, but we are at a point where they heavy lifting is done. We are WEEKS away from everything being done...and no one wants it completed more than every staff member here, I can assure you.  We are very sorry this was your experience during your last stay and we hope you return to see what all the fuss was about! We promise to not build any more hotels... well, here anyway. :-)  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Helpful, friendly staff and clean, comfortable rooms.  Great location across from the beach and down the street from excellent shopping.  Second time we've stayed here in the past two years. Just love it!
Manager Response: Dear Aokj1,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a kind review of your recent stay! We hope you are able to come again once our new expansion is completed. I'd love to treat you to two sunset cocktails at our new rooftop lounge Offshore9. Have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The hotel in their staff was first class they take care of everybody's needs and wants security was fantastic they watch out over everybody at the pool  room service was fantastic and inside the hotel couldn't be any happier
Manager Response: Dear barbaramA6057IW,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear your enjoyed your stay. We appreciate and value your feedback. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Beautiful rooms, view and staff. Friendly staff, clean hotel great atmosphere. There's no free breakfast,  but they did supply towles, sand toys, umbrellas, chairs, and boogie boards, so that the family can take to the beach. Great location across from the beach.
Manager Response: Dear mariaoG7515DH,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to read you enjoyed your stay with us. We know you have may options in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I completely forgot that there was construction that was going on at the hotel because everything was perfect otherwise. Friendly  and responsive staff, impeccably kept grounds and a room to match. I went to this hotel on business and will definitely return for my own leisure.
Manager Response: Dear rebeccakL8485DY,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. It was an absolute pleasure to have you, your co-workers and families with us. We hope you are all able to return again next year for both business and pleasure. We can't wait to show you our new expansion and amenities. Stay cool this summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Our stay could not have been better.
Summary: This stay at the Waterfront Beach Resort was for a family gathering to celebrate a mile stone birthday and no one was disappointed.  From the valet who greeted us at the beginning of our visit to the valet at the end of our stay, it could not have been a better experience. The front office staff  was most accommodating with our early check in, the bellman was full of information, and then the room was perfect.  Having stayed at this hotel many times over the years I appreciate the room and public area renovations.  This and the soon to be opened  new wing make this a world class beach front resort.  Eric and Sarah in Shades Restaurant were a pleasure to deal with during the meal planning stages with a smooth handoff to Matthew who closely and professionally oversaw our dinner.
Manager Response: Dear Tom S,   Thank you so much for the wonderful review of your recent stay and celebration with family! Sir, please know it was an absolute pleasure to have all of you here enjoying one another and the property. Your family is one to be treasured! Thank you for mentioning so many of us by name. This kind note has been sent out to all departments to commend them on providing you with outstanding 5-Diamond service. We know you have many options in the area to choose from; thank you for trusting your event and family with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Please tell your beautiful wife I said Aloha!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Great hotel. Awesome friendly staff, with smiles. Great location. Just very pricey! Not directly on the beach, across the road and a parking lot. Charged 14.00 for a pina colada at the pool, Unless you have your heart set on an ocean view, save yourself the money and just book on the other side. You can walk across the street and have all the ocean you want.
Manager Response: Dear L K,   Thank you for your review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We appreciate your feedback and use it to better train our staff. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This hotel has a premium location, an excellent staff and offers a wonderful experience.  It was wonderful to be right across from the beach and walking distance from Main Street.  I can not say enough about the staff!  They made us feel welcomed, appreciated and comfortable.  My family and I have already decided this is the place we will always stay when coming to Huntington Beach!

Summary Heading: THE place to stay in Huntington Beach!
Summary: OK, I am biased in that I am a loyal Hilton honors member. But I have to say that this is one of the finest Hilton properties I have visited. Everything about our stay was just about perfect. The service was outstanding across the board. The amenities are great and its location is perfect.

This hotel is one of our favorites! When in Huntington Beach, we stay here. This is one of Hilton's premier properties. All together lovely. Spectacular views and service. The rooms and suites are luxurious and offer exceptional OCEAN VIEWS! After our first stay, we decided to have our 30th wedding anniversary party here. Everything was excellent and we were beyond pleased.
Manager Response: Dear E. Stanley M,  Happy Anniversary!! Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay and event here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to hear you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us. What an amazing life milestone to celebrate here with us! We are honored. We know you have many options in Orange County, thank you for trusting us with your party and guests! Have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Nice hotel located right across the street from the beach.  Currently in the middle of renovation which had some things shut in like the fitness area but this happens from time to time.  Room was upgraded at check in to a nice king oceanfront balcony room.
Manager Response: Dear H1751WKchrisw,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We appreciate your feedback and use it to better train our staff to deliver amazing Five Diamond Service. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service. Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Pool closed for private function, accomdation was to bus family to another resort. Pool was restricted night before event with chairs taken away. No help from staff when brought to their attention. Fitness center was closed and again accomdation was to sent family to offste facility. Planned vacation for family months in advanced to be treated as second class.
Manager Response: Dear Mark F.,  We are so sorry you felt anything less than cared for or respected during your stay with us. Our team goes above and beyond in everyway, and if there is anything we can do to "Make It Right" on the spot, we will. Unfortunately, due to weather concerns, we needed to pre-position secure some banquet and event equipment prior to a group event happening the following afternoon. We did our utmost to do so with the least amount of impact to anyone on the pool deck or in the area of the actual event. We apologize profusely if this affected you in any way.  Our expansion team has finally begun the pour of our new pool and soon all of our space restrictions will be lifted thus revealing our whole new complex. If there is anything we can to do to welcome you back and experience who we truly are, please do not hesitate to reach out to me personally.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This hotel is great for a weekend getaway with little ones. The hotel pools and spa is open 7am-10pm. They have tons of things for kids from character arts, glitter tattoo, to balloon animals. They have a cute sand area for kids to play in. They provider chairs umbrellas coolers for a day at the beach. Perfectly situated close to the pier and Pacific City. The rooms were spacious and staff was friendly and attentive. The pool staff was great with the kids. The waffles at the Shades Hotel prob the best I have ever had.
Manager Response: Dear 829shinap,  Thank you for the rave review. We are grateful that you took the time to let us know about your recent stay with us. I agree, our waffles are amazing! So glad you all enjoyed yourselves. Please come back for another visit once our expansion is completed. Have a wonderful summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Really enjoyed the pool. It was very quiet during the week and we had a great time.  Meal food options for kids are limited on site but hotel is walking distance to Main Street.  Enjoyed the convenience of being so close to the beach and downtown Huntington Beach.  Room was facing the pool and I couldn't hear any of the construction going on.   Great overall experience.
Manager Response: Dear Julie M,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and use it to better train our staff. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This was probably the 10th time we have stayed at this beautiful resort. It has been approx. 6 years since we visited, and the stay was perfect once again. From the moment you arrive, through the check-in process, to a few room service orders, every single employee you come in contact with engages you. Everyone was smiling. Room was spectacular (ok, we were on the 12th floor, in a suite), but the attention to detail is so evident in all they do. Food quality is outstanding, and we are foodies. It starts at the top, and the GM is awesome. Great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your stay here at The Waterfront Beach Resort. One of the greatest compliments we can receive is to have our guests choose to stay with us year after year. Thank you for your loyalty. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to the rest of our staff; especially or GM Paulette Fischer. I wholeheartedly agree with you and your statement the she is awesome! Have a wonderful summer and we hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Spending time after our road trip. Had to ask for a room change as there's major building works ongoing. They are building a new tower block so be warned. The hotel is very accessible and easy access to the beach or relax by the pool. Good amenities and a laundry service or a guest launderette. A nice hotel but shame about the works ongoing. We have found on our trip across America that the locals get better service this was the case by our pool yesterday, don't be afraid to say not good enough like we said no to our first room that was offered to us it was over looking a building site I know the Americans would not stand for it.
Manager Response: Dear Edward J,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We appreciate your feedback your for your feedback. We are very excited to be at the end of our new expansion build. It will feature a new all suite tower, pool and watersides and restaurants.  Have a wonderful summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Other than having a problem with check in, the room was good.  We had to wait to long to get into our rooms.  I think they could have done a better job putting us in a room quicker than they did.  The room was good.  The food was good. But the check in service was poor.
Manager Response: Dear Marilyn,  Thank you for your recent post. We always like to hear from our guests, good or bad, and see every review as an opportunity to improve our quality of service. I am very sorry you were disappointed with your check in experience. We strive to go above and beyond our guests expectations at every turn and go out of our way to delight our guests or "Make It Right". I will share your review with our entire management team and would hope that, in the future, you would be so kind as to give us another chance. We would love the opportunity to welcome you back.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Attending a wedding held at the resort-- awesome location. The wedding was held poolside with the reception indoors. Food was great and the service exceptional. The room was clean, quiet and the view of the ocen was marvelous
Manager Response: Dear 90evelyne,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. I hope you are able to come for another visit once our expansion is completed. Have a wonderful summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Just as you would expect.  All employee contacts were good, and each showed a grateful attitude that I was there.  They immediately recognized me as a Hilton Honors member, and showed me what to expect and where to go.  Thank you, Waterfront.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Worst operators I have ever spoken to. I have stayed in so many properties and this resort definitely tops the worst operators I have spoken to. They don't know anything or what's going on in the resort. Before I could say anything I'm already getting connected to somewhere else I got connected to one of the restaurants and I was simply asking about a possible future stay next week. Nancy-Ann and whoever is working today have no customer service skills what so ever. please get them retrained and try to be a better operator. Simply the worst customer service ever.

Summary Heading: Brunches are excellent,especially over Easter and Mothers Day
Summary: We want to acknowledge and give thanks to Mitchell Queen for having such a friendly personality, being very professional and very accommodating. We see him working hard going from one table to another during brunch making sure that everybody is being taken care of. The burnch is always of high quality with a great presentation, especially during Easter and Mother's Day.  With sincere thanks, Elsa and Rod Kossack.

I just checked into this Hilton property and paid extra for an upper floor room that was suppose to be an ocean front view.  In fact I paid more than 40 extra for an upper ocean front room and what I got barely qualifies as an ocean view room.  If you strain around the angled balcony you get a glimpse of the ocean.  Nothing like the room that was advertised on their web site or pictured in their advertising.  When I called down to complain I was told be the front desk staff that this was considered ocean front and basically I should be happy that I was away from the construction.  I have stayed in numerous beach front properties in California and Hawaii and never have I seen such an unapologetic attempt at bait and switch.  The best advice I can give is don't stay here if you

Summary: Noise was unbearable . Was told we were on a quiet side, noise was above . Constant banging and hammering . Baby was not able to sleep . We complained and they did offer to move us but it was too late after naptime . Not a good experience

We visited the Waterfront Beach Resort in Huntington Beach and really enjoyed our stay.  The hotel was under some construction outside as they look like they are adding another tower next door but everything was well organized and efficient.  The location is perfect - right across from the beach and great views from our room of the ocean, pool, and pier.  You can walk to Pacific City which is a relatively new shopping and restaurant plaza right next door.  The food was very good - we tried breakfast and dinner while here and they also have a market/Starbucks if you are more hurried.  The service was very good across the board and we will return again.  It had been 20 or so years since I had been to this area and a lot has changed, all for the better.  I would recommend this

First time staying at this property, they are undergoing a renovation it didn't bother.   Pros: We had an ocean view room with balcony. We loved the poolside snacks and the cafe where we ordered good quality food. The pool offers free beach toys, free beach chairs, and other toys for kids.  We also had a free caricature artist the day we were there.    We paid for the Beach Butler smores service, where they set up a beach bonfire and offered drinks , smores and hot dogs, We paid around $250 for this and we loved it! Great experience! Thank you!  Very impressed that the General Manager was greeting guests in the morning at breakfast, nice touch! Classy!  Nearby is a new shopping center where there are awewsome restaurants and shops! Go there! Enjoyable!

We arrived at the hotel late morning, we were checked in within 5 minutes and were in our room within 10 minutes of arriving. The room was spacious and very comfortable. After exploring the hotel facilities we had a snack lunch in the hotel and booked a table for dinner for four my wife's brother and wife joined us. We had a very good meal reasonably priced. Our room was very quiet and the bed very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent bags of choice. Because of the overcast weather we could not use the pool but it looks great. If we return to Huntington Beach we will use this hotel again.

Summary Heading: Awesome even while under construction.  Great service, food and atmosphere; we'll be back with our entire family.
Summary: Beautiful atmosphere, even while under construction.  The entire staff were awesome!  Better than any hotel experience in California.  We stayed to attend a wedding; we will be back with our family next summer!  New mall and restaurants were within walking distance.  Great trip!
Manager Response: Dear D6831XLanthonys,  Thank you for the wonderful review of our recent stay here at The Waterfront! You are going to love our expansion once it is completed. It will be equipped with new restaurants, pool with water slides and sleeping room tower featuring suites! Thank you again for staying with us. Have a wonderful summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: From the moment we arrived we were made to feel welcome .....a very nice feeling especially since we had our 70 lb family dog with us .....he was made to feel just as welcomed as a human . The room was newly remodeled and the cleanliness was perfection . Our every need was not only fulfilled but met with enthusiasm from the staff. Even though the resort is undergoing a massive remodel we were not affected . The views from anywhere in the resort are spectacular and the location is perfect. Everything you need is on property or within walking distance . The restaurant is superb . We've stayed at a lot of resorts and rarely say we HAVE to come back ......we are already going to re book here in October.....we would not rather be anywhere else on the California coast .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I love the picture of all of you enjoying a beach bonfire with Waterfront Adventures! Memories to last a lifetime, so precious. I am so glad to hear your furry family member enjoyed their stay as well! We know you have many options when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. I hope you are able to return for a visit once our new expansion is completed! Your daughter will love the new watersides.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The shuttle service from the hotel to town was incredible. Jon was very pleasant and friendly. The shuttle was full but Jon was willing to come back for us after dropping the others off. Great service!
Manager Response: Dear Springsfamily5,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed our stay; especially our free hourly shuttle to Downtown Huntington Beach and Pacific City. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to our valet team and Jon. Thank you for mentioning him by name. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Nice location, hotel getting a bit dated, great staff
Summary: Great location, staff was amazing, and rooms were kept very clean. They do their best to make you happy. Hotel getting a bit dated for the price compared to hotels near by, could use new beds as they were lumpy spring mattresses.   Parking fees were pretty steep for nothing, and right now there is construction going on, so be aware. Pool and amenities were nice, gym was closed during our stay.  I would stay again for a better price, felt like the nightly rate was more for a resort experience than a simple hotel stay.
Manager Response: Dear William M,  Thank you for your recent review. We are closer than ever to our mid-to-late summer opening of our new Twin Dolphin Tower and expansion spaces (including a brand new pool and waterslides). We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced as a result of these last days of enhancements. We will also follow-up with our housekeeping department with regards to bedding in the room that you stayed. We have recently changed all of our mattresses and want to be certain there is not a problem. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Our valet department offers 24 hour secure parking in our underground garage. It is our mission that you always have quick, efficient, and friendly service and access to your vehicles at all times. Unfortunately there is no nearby free or 24 hour self parking permitted in the city and for liability and space reasons, all hotels in the area require valet services.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: From the bell hoppers, to the front desk, to the cleaning staff, to room services and all the other Waterfront resort employees including Shades restaurant are a class act and go beyond what they need to just to make sure you and your family have or need anything while you are there! This was our 3rd trip to this resort and we go back ever year since the first one and we will continue to do so as well as some of our family meets us there as well! The Manager at the shades restaurant Eric Austin is amazing person, he makes sure you feel like family or need anything while you are there! Make sure you stop and say hi! We have a  special needs son and the whole staff goes beyond to make sure our whole stay is great and if we need anything while we are there. This hotel is close to
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. What a gracious and kind review! I am so pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. I will be sure to pass on your review to our staff and management and of course to Eric. We hope you will be able to come for another visit once our expansion is completed. Have a wonderful summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This Hotel makes you feel at home away from home. The staff goes way beyond the needs and they don't hesitate to do so. The cleanliness from the room you stay in to the the whole building to the public bathrooms are A+++, The in room service regarding the food is A++ to the restaurant the Shades is fantastic!!! We come back every year to this resort and will do for some time to come!!
Manager Response: Dear Robert,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. There is no greater compliment we can receive than to have guests return year after year. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. I think you will be thrilled when you see the new expansion when you visit us next year. Have a wonderful summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Another great trip to the Waterfront!  When the new tower is finished, you'll barely need to leave this hotel!  Great location next to pacific city too...so plenty of restaurants and shopping 1 block away.  And this Hilton is THE best dog friendly hotel my Jesse & I have ever stayed in.
Manager Response: Dear 1970skeeter,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you and your furbaby enjoyed our hotel! We are proud to be a pet friendly property. We do hope you are able to come for another visit once our expansion is completed later this summer! Have a great week.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Before we ever arrived, we asked the concierge for her help in recommending and handling dinner reservations for 10 people for both nights.   Tammi was fabulous. Her phone manner, her suggestions, her smile. She was thorough and perfect.    Check in went smoothly, even though the hotel was completely booked.  Rooms were quiet and spacious with all the usual amenities and good drawer space.  Valet parking was mandatory, which is not my preference, but the service was prompt.   Two breakfast options. 1. A sit down restaurant with a choice of $22pp all-you-can-eat or a la carte  and a snack shop which served breakfast sandwiches.  Pool staff was very attentive. Towels and Sand chairs could be borrowed for free to be used at the beach which was a walk across Pacific Coast Highway at
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We truly appreciate your kind words. Thank you for mentioning Tammy by name. She is one of our brightest stars here on property as well as in all of Huntington Beach! I will be sure to let her know how pleased you were with her and her recommendations. We know you have many choices when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay at The Waterfront!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We were given a bowl, bottle of water, and some milk bones for our service dog.  He was welcomed as well as many other dogs we saw.  It so great how easy it was to bring him in and out of the hotel. They even have an area to walk them that has bags and a collection bin.
Manager Response: Dear dwaynesy0ung,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! We appreciate your feedback. I am so pleased to here you and your furry family member enjoyed our property. We pride ourselves in being one of the first resorts in Orange County to be pet friendly! Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Nice clean hotel at a great location. Has a decent size pool. Staff is friendly and helpful. Only downside is that you can't self park. Valet option only. It's $34/night. If you wanna save a few bucks you can park off of Atlanta avenue. It's a quick 5 minute walk from hotel.
Manager Response: Dear dwaynesy0ung,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We truly appreciate your feedback. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing us!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I have been staying at the HWF annually for the past few years, and booked another 10 night stay in June of 2016. This review will be perhaps a bit out of date as I am sure the construction is close to complete by now.  Some things do not change - the hotel is still very well kept up, and the staff wants to spoil you. It's one of my favorite places to stay, and I guess it's my number one choice for a lower 48 vacation. They really watch out for their guests.  But some things do change. For years, the HWF and its sister property the Hyatt have been a bit out by themselves, with only residential areas around. That is changing as there is a new hotel (The Pasea) nearby, and a new development. The new development is bringing new restaurant and shopping options that will be very
Manager Response: Dear davidfhale,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for your loyalty to our property. It is truly one of the best compliments we can receive from our guests. I will make sure to pass on your kind words to the rest of our staff and management, Austin and Daniel.  We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to have you stay with us again once our expansion is completed.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Excellent Hotel everyone should stay soon. Great staff and right by beach. Excellent food and rooms. The upgrades under construction will be a wow factor and can't wait to return. Stay soon and return! Area is safe and fun lots of activities and things to do for adults and kids.

We were in an ocean view room on the eleventh floor.  So nice to have a balcony. Clean comfortable hotel with a great pool and hot tub. The hotel is only a couple of blocks away from the pier and Main Street.

I just want to start off by saying my favorite thing about this place is the staff!! From checking in with Austin,Shannon and of course Jessie! Who always greeted me and my family with a smile! To Cody the bell captain who is so personable and Tammy was one of the best concierge I've ever met, recommended excellent restaurants and had champagne waiting for my husband's birthday!!!Btw Tammy we loved blk for dinner! Now for the hotel itself, The suite was not what I expected kind of chopped up and there was no full length Mirror in the room which was very surprising,the pool lounge chairs were fair no cushions? However the best location and the excellent service made for a very pleasant stay,everyone goes out of there way to please!! The mattresses were also very hard, i'm looking

Summary Heading: Wish We Could Have Stayed Longer!
Summary: This hotel is amazing and has the best views!  The hotel staff is friendly no matter what  position they hold. My daughter's 17th birthday celebration was amazing.  We can't wait to return for a mini vacation in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel right off the beach.
Summary: I have stayed here 2X.  Excellent location!  Across from beach.  Pool is great!  Hotel restaurant is good.  Grounds are kept well.  Excellent customer service.  Highly recommend.  Will stay here again.  They are in the process of expanding.

Nice place close to shopping, downtown, beach etc. very laid back and relaxing. Staff was all very attentive. We ate breakfast at the restaurant every morning and enjoyed the experience. I travel to this area about every 90 days and generally stay at the Hilton next to the airport since it's usually business only. This trip I brought my girlfriend along and stayed a few extra days. When she comes along we will definitely stay at the Beach Resort.

lower balcony noise levels on rooms facing the PCH are so loud we could not sit outside. Construction made check in a little bit of a pain but the staff made up for the inconvenience.I would stay there again maybe after construction and on a much higher floor facing the PCH.
Manager Response: Dear Michael H.,   Thank you for your recent review. We appreciate your kind words and would welcome you back to see us when all is said and done with our expansion. It is true that from time to time Pacific Coast Highway can be a bit busy (and thus the sound of cars and motorcycles occasionally intrusive). As one of the most popular and well-known byways in all of California, PCH has an irresistible pull for visitors and locals alike. We apologize if this was in anyway disturbing and you have hit upon the recommendation we often make for our guests (choosing a higher floor, further back in either of our two towers).  You'll still have those awesome views of the Pacific and our beach, but with a lot less noise. Let us know the next time you book and we'll do our best to make those accommodations.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great hotel with a great location
Summary: Friendly great staff. Clean hotel. Right by the beach. Decent pool area to relax and grab some drinks. Kid friendly. Only downside is that you have to valet your car. No self parking. $35/night is a bit steep. We found parking off of Atlanta avenue which was free. It's a quick five minute walk.

Make sure that renovations are done otherwise no fitness or spa and lots of noise. You better call and ask because their site does not say they are under renovations. Lots of noise, drliing and hammering
Manager Response: Dear peterdD3670GM,  Thank you for your recent review. As we near the completion of our expansion and hotel transformations, work can be a bit overwhelming for all of us. While we try to adhere to an 8am-5pm (M-F during the week only, and not on holidays) work schedule, sometimes the various trades will go later in order to wrap up progress quickly. We do our best to both post all relevant information online and in your confirmation letters and our sincere apologies if that was not evident and readily located.   Our expected opening of the expansion and Twin Dolphin suite-centric tower, new pool and waterslides, and our amazing new rooftop lounge, The Offshore 9, is mid-to-late summer.   Please feel free to contact us directly anytime for complete and dialy information. At this point, things are moving so fast we can no longer accurately post updates on our social media channels, but we are more than happy to answer any questions or concerns you may have about the all new Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: In town for business.  Stayed on the 10th floor.  The room was excellent.  Very clean and well maintained. Nice balcony with good view of the beach.  Hotel appears to be expanding with construction on the south side during the day.  Valet parking only which is costly but you have no alternative since there is no local parking.  Hotel is within walking distance of numerous restaurants and shops. Highly recommended.

My friends and I were celebrating my 75th birthday and loved our ocean-view room and the gift tray delivered in my honor.  Treated like royalty throughout.  When we could not open the wine bottle they provided (hey, we're old!), they sent up someone to do so for us.

Overall we had a great experience at this hotel which is perfectly located. Right in front of the ocean most rooms have an oceanview and a small balcony.  It is one block away from all the shops, bars, restaurants  A very nice pool area, it feels like in an all inclusive resort.  Restaurant was good as well  They has some renovations going on, at first it was surprising and annoying, but i have to say that it was overall well managed and once in your room, at the pool or the beach, we kinda forgot about it. They could give a small compensation upon arrival such as a free drink on Hilton for the inconvenience.   I recommend this hotel in Huntington Beach
Manager Response: Dear AnikF,  Thank you for you review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We truly appreciate your feedback and utilize it to further train our staff. We will definitely take your suggestion into consideration. We know you have many choices when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing The Waterfront. Have a great week!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: From start to finish we were smiling
Summary: I came to the hotel for a business conference. Was pleasantly  surprised with how friendly people were and it just kept getting better.  EVERY person went over and above to make sure we were doing well.  I travel a lot and have not seen the moral so high at a hotel  We were not another number.  Thank yo and I will be back with my family. It doesn't hurt that you re across the street from a beautiful beach with fire pits:-).  I love your pillows.
Manager Response: Dear 118reneev,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear that you encountered our warm and friendly hospitality. I will be sure to pass on your note to the rest of our staff. We hope you are able to come back for another visit in the near future. We will have a pillow ready and waiting with your name on it!!  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Waterfront Beach Resort for one night as a "stay-cation". We had a wonderful time at this Hilton! Upon check-in, as a HHonors Gold Member we were upgraded to an ocean view (on the side of the hotel with the best view). It looks like this room was recently renovated - everything seemed brand new! Wood flooring, furniture room accents, etc. The staff was extremely polite and courteous at all times, and for breakfast (since we are Gold) we enjoyed the complimentary buffet outside on the patio. It was a beautiful California day, the sun was shining and the staff was beyond wonderful. Would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Glen,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to the rest of our staff. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your trip and that you were able to experience some beautiful Southern California sunshine. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing getaway spot for a weekend!
Summary: My husband and i stayed there for our anniversary/mother's day weekend.    The hotel was very clean,  the pool side was great and the location spectacular, right across from the beach.   The staff was very friendly and it was easy to get around.
Manager Response: Dear Andree,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your anniversary and Mother's Day with us. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay here! We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Spent 6 days at this hotel. Every aspect of the stay was excellent. Would highly recommend staying here if in the area. One of it's biggest assets is the quality of the staff who all made us feel very welcome. Special mention for Kevin in Shades bar who mixes a great cocktail.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. We truly appreciate your wonderful feedback. I will make sure to pass on your kind words to Kevin; its very nice of you to mention him by name. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay here at The Waterfront.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Hotel was missing the common needed things in life like electrical outlets for laptops and cell phones. One should not have to put cell phones in the bathroom at night so they can charge. Our room had a weird musty type smell. Staff was over the top, excellent marks for them, they made the stay not the room.
Manager Response: Dear T2368QXstevenk,  Thank you so much for your review. Rest assured that we are very nearly finished with our expansion and room renovations. It sounds as if you may have been in an older room on the first floor (as that is all that is remaining). Unfortunately we are waiting for the connection to the new Twin Dolphin Tower complex to be completed so that we may move all the new furniture and fixtures into this last remaining floor. Our sincere apologies for not having enough outlets to meet your needs...we hear you loud and clear and will be correcting that with the upgrades.   Also, we have taken your comments regarding a noticeable "musty" smell directly to our housekeeping department for a full inspection of these remaining non-renovated rooms. A smell of anything less than clean and fresh is entirely unacceptable and we are on the case now. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and again, our deepest apologies.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: My wife and I used some of our Hilton points to go to a Fundraising dinner.  The Room we got was an Ocean View, 7th floor.  Spectacular view of the Huntington Beach Pier and Ocean.  Catalina , looked so close you could touch it.  Staff vey accommodating and polite.  Valet service top notch. Front desk staff made check in and check out very easy. Would definitely stay there again.  Its nice to have such a beautiful property just 20 miles from home.
Manager Response: Dear pmcgarvey,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so happy to hear you had such a wonderful time. The view from our tower is the best Orange County has to offer! I am glad you were able to experience it first hand. We appreciate you using your hard earned points towards a night here at The Waterfront. We hope to see you again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Nice quick stay ... parking situation sucks
Summary: Very nice, clean and beautiful resort. Great location along PCH. Entrance is around the back with no self parking option. You have to drop your vehicle with Valet and then pay a premium if you want your vehicle back, which I'm sure you do...  During our visit, there was some construction going on. Valet made me park my own vehicle and then someone assisted with our luggage. Upon check out we were told it would be about 15 minutes before my vehicle could be brought to me. What? And they were down several valets. Very slow service!  Room was very elegant. We had a huge patio with a pool view and a slight view of the ocean. Comfortable bed with uncomfortable pillows...
Manager Response: Dear Kevin F,   Thank you for your review. We apologize for any inconvenience encountered on our valet drive. As we race to complete our expansion project (adding the new tower, new pool and MORE parking!), we are unfortunately having to be very creative with our traffic patterns on our main drive. Delays are more a result in this congestion on the drive than a staffing issue, but we'll certainly try to do better!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: the hotel is very nice and well run. The bar atmosphere is excellent. parking is under construction until July 2017. It is a bit slow to get your car. All else was very classy and the service was courteous.
Manager Response: Dear GT1_sea,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you had a wonderful stay. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This is a very nice hotel, but what makes me give if 5 stars is the wonderful Staff. It's rare to find a hotel where everyone is the utmost professional and courteous (and not because you're staying in the Presidential Suite). No matter who I had interacted with (cleaning staff, front desk, Valet, Bell-staff, restaurant staff), everyone was cheerful, courteous and friendly, and it didn't seem forced or strained. Perhaps working right across the Pacific Ocean brings out the best in people.  The location is ideal. The way the hotel is designed, every room is an ocean view room (being that your are just across the street from it and there's not buildings obstructing the view).  The food at the hotel restaurant was very good. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. Nice balconies
Manager Response: Dear MichaelMC23,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I wanted to personally thank you for the rave review! I can tell you with out a doubt that working across the street from the beach does make for a fantastic work environment. We have a team that prides itself on warm hospitality and works so well together to provide amazing customer service. I am pleased to know you experienced that service first hand. I hope you are able to visit again if your travels ever bring you back to Huntington Beach! Have a wonderful day.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We choose this hotel on a whim; it wound up being an excellent choice!  Everyone from the valet, front desk, room service, pool side service and housekeeping were friendly and outgoing.  We did online check-in and picked room 511, which offered a great view of the ocean and a stretch of Huntington Beach, which is right across the street.  The room looked like it had been recently renovated, with new carpet, bedding, and TV.  Housekeeping provided us with lots of towels and toiletries (Lourdes was our housekeeper and was the best!).  The hotel offers toys/towels/chairs for you to rent while you lounge at the beach.  Their swimming pool is heated, with lots of chairs, as well as an unhindered view of the ocean.  We had room service, which is pricey, but was tasty and quickly

Hotel room very clean,  fantastic beds, two doubles, coffee machine good toiletries, short walk to shopping area, with some good eateries,much cheaper than hotel.we stayed in room 712 overlooks pool and sea view,when you sit on balcony it's a bit noisy from the main road but gets lovely sun especially in the afternoon.walk the pier and eat at Ruby's. Be aware happy hour in bar you have to specify the drink that is on it otherwise the barman enjoys stinging you,as we found out ,but hotel just note you lost our custom for the rest of our time with you.and resulted your lower rating. On trip advisor.
Manager Response: Dear jonesbarry402,  Thank you for your review. We are very glad you chose to stay with us. We take your comments about your service in our bar seriously and will be bringing this to the attention of our Director of Food & Beverage. We would have loved Five Stars as well, so we'll do all we can to earn it from you next time!  Cheers,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The Hilton Waterfront Resort and the staff are amazing. We visit every summer, going on 7 years now, and continue to be amazed by the hotel team. We cannot wait to see the new transformation completed this summer!
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey D,  Thank you for talking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. One of the biggest compliments we can receive in the hospitality industry is it have guests stay with us year after year. Thank you for your loyalty to us! I hope you are able to come for another visit once our expansion is completed this Summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I have never been around a friendlier staff and Joseph Boyer went way out of his way to accommodate a pre arrival request and also had a nice gift sent to our room after arrival. Just outstanding!  My one and only complaint would be the cost of parking.
Manager Response: Dear steventT2959KQ,  Thank you for your recent review of your stay here at The Waterfront. Joseph smiled ear to ear when I read your review to him! Thank you for mentioning him by name; he truly does goes above and beyond! We know you have many choices when staying in Orange County, thank you for staying with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Located right by Main Street in Huntington Beach and undergoing extensive expansion, this is a great location to stay.  Close proximity to ocean, shops, restaurants.  Hotel newly remodeled.  Staff very friendly.

Had a mother daughter trip and we enjoyed our time at the Hilton immensely! We had an ocean front room so the view was amazing.   The staff was kind and friendly.   Planning to return again!  Would definitely recommend this Hilton location.

The overall stay was exceptional. The staff was the friendliest of anywhere we have ever stayed. Everything about the hotel is first class. Even though there was construction going on the staff worked around it very well.

Summary Heading: Beach Bonfire Birthday with Butler Service!
Summary: My collection of reviews will show that I don't travel very far out of my zip code - I don't need to! I'm fortunate to have grown up in Huntington Beach, which means that I am guilty of being somewhat desensitized to the beauty and offerings of coastal Orange County. Admittedly, I was also among the locals who was very bitter about the development of big hotel resorts along our once quaint coastline but being able to hire a butler to handle a beach bonfire for my daughters birthday really helps the process of letting go of the town I grew up in.  In short, the beach bonfire service offered exclusively by the Waterfront Hilton is awesome. A veteran of beach bon-firing, I can tell you that it only gets slightly easier once you've done it 200+ times. The chairs, the wood, the

Good Place for R&R, Bring food (your own)or Drinks because theirs is all over priced. Good places are down the street and its worth the walk because of the views you take in. My sister came into town with the grandchild and it was nice for my family to meet up with their family and friends at one location. Overall Great time! Miss them already.

I was here in April 2017 for a conference and this place just made me welcomed from the moment i walked in. Okay it's under renovations and you can see that, perhaps this explains the service, but it did not dampen my visit. In all the places I've stayed at this bed and pillow combination was the closest to absolute heaven I have slept on..... The rooms were great, service was great, food was great, okay wifi could have been better but a great stay none the less. Supermarket was a 12 minute walk and washing clothes was onsite and coin operated. For a 5 day work visit it was a really fantastic stay.

Price $309 was bit steep despite partial beach view. Construction ruined a planned relaxing vacay. I suffer fm PTSD (Air Force Vet) & noise reminded me of rapid fire M-16! Pool was riddled w/ construction jack hammer noise.
Manager Response: Dear T5800GSdianam,  Thank you for your recent review and we apologize for any disturbance you experienced during your stay.  it has been a tough few weeks getting the last of our construction completed as we connect our two towers and new pool. We sincerely appreciate your service to country, and encourage you to never hesitate to come to us immediately if you have any issue or concern while staying here at The Waterfront. We will do all we can to "Make It Right" and set our guest satisfaction team into overdrive until our guests (you) are happy.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: If there was no construction, this would be 110%. The gym wasn't available. The jack hammer noise was unbearable.   Staff were excellent! The resort and room were excellent as well.   Our group had catered meals so no comments on the restaurant
Manager Response: Dear A2348MUgaryh,   Thank you kindly for the favorable review your wrote in regards to your stay here at The Waterfront. I want to apologize for the noise you encountered during the renovation of our front valet drive. I am happy to report that the paver removal process has been competed! I do hope you are able to visit again once our expansion is completed this summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice

Summary Heading: California and the Golden West Titan Holidays
Summary: we stayed at this hotel for one night on our 16 day trip around California, this hotel is fabulous, staff very friendly, rooms very modern, clean, comfortable with a balcony overlooking great views of the sea,lovely pool and bar area, great location we had a short walk to the pier and everything else going on, watched the surfers in the sea, enjoyed a great meal in one of the restaurants, plenty of choice, wished we could of stayed longer.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy J,  It was a pleasure to have you and your group stay with us here at The Waterfront. Thank you for such a kind and thoughtful review. If your travels ever bring you back to Southern California, I hope you would consider staying with us again. I trust you had a safe trip home after the flight cancellation. Have a wonderful day!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Waterfront Beach Resort is the best!
Summary: This was our 3rd stay at this resort. We keep coming back because of the extraordinary service here. Everyone is welcoming, helpful and smiling. It feels like staying with family.   The location here can't be beat. Right across the Pacific Coast Hwy is the beach,  as well as a very short walk to Pacific City mall with amazing restaurants, shopping and views of the ocean.   The pool is fabulous. They have an attendant on site with plenty of towels, complimentary pool toys for the kids, sunscreen in case you forgot yours and refreshing citrus water to keep you hydrated.   We booked a fire on the beach package through the hotel concierge for our last day there. Jose was awesome & had it all set up for us with beach chairs, all the fixings for Smores and drinks as well. All we had
Manager Response: Dear wowmeCalgary,  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your recent trip here to The Waterfront. I am thrilled to hear that you are repeat visitors. Thank you for choosing to stay with us time and time again. It is the biggest compliment a guest can pay us! We hope you can come visit one our expansion is completed this summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Service Experience
