Summary Heading: Great smaller property but beware of parking fee
Summary: The hotel is good with a great location, is pet friendly, and the staff really is excellent but I had to knock off one star because of the $34/night valet parking fee (No self parking available) which is excessive at best.
Manager Response: Dear TMJones801,  Thank you for your kind words and recent review. Unfortunately, valet parking is the only option here at The Waterfront. In order to maintain 24 hour service, the safety and security of your vehicle and possessions, and the safety of other guests and associates in our parking structure this is our only option. In fact, it is the only option for much the same reason at every resort and beach hotel here in Huntington Beach. For that reason, we try to always be a few bucks below any of our nearest neighbors (and we are!).  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Stayed here the 2nd week of April and received the worst customer service ever experience at the Hilton and I'm a honors member too. I booked 5 rooms for myself and family attending a wedding. We showed up at 5 to check in and 2 or our rooms were not ready.. even though we did the online check in (pointless). In addition to that - the customer service person lost our id and claimed they didn't have it. We searched everywhere for it and they ended up having it. We didn't get into our rooms until about 6pm (when rooms should be ready by 4 and I did online check in). They said they gave us an upgrade which I didn't see anything different about the room.. very disappointed - my family and i were late to the wedding because of this debacle. When I came back before midnight to request
Manager Response: Dear Mimi P,   Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are quite concerned by your review and cannot apologize enough for the experience. This could not be further from who we are and the care and concern we give our guests. This matter has been escalated to the highest levels and we are asking our operations team to immediately address your review with our front office staff.  Again, our sincere apologies. This is not who we are or how we operate and we appreciate your honesty in bringing this to us.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Beautiful View and Hotel - But Visit Later
Summary: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel before and it is a beautiful location, which is what brought us back. However, they are going through noisy renovations which greatly distract from a "resort" experience. We tend to spend time at the beach as well as the pool, but our pool day was not relaxing at all with the noise from the front drive as they are replacing concrete blocks with pavers. It will look beautiful when they are finished, which is supposed to be June 2017. The entire staff is very kind, and our room (9th floor, king, ocean-front, wrap-around) was gorgeous, with two exceptions....the bathroom is definitely showing age and with our room being on the south side, the wrap-around feature was worthless because it overlooks a huge construction project that is not
Manager Response: Dear divehappy2017,  Thank you so much for your feedback in regards to your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you can come for a return visit once our expansion is completed this July. Thank you again!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The updates to the facility are so clean, warm and edgy. The staff could not have been more welcoming and accommodating. I hosted a corporate event here and the attendees of my event even comments on the venue, design, and helpful and more-so caring staff so many times it was blowing me away!
Manager Response: Dear 986mckenziea,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We are so glad you had such a successful program. We loved having you and your team here. We look forward to hopefully hosting your meetings again in the near future. Thank you for trusting us with your event!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Fantastic location, people , and experience . Would go back. They also were very helpful in arranging tours game tickets and offering things to do. It is a well run clean , updated and reasonable priced for the area hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Loudel65,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! I am so pleased that you had such a wonderful stay. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Return Visit that did not disappoint
Summary: Despite the fact that the hotel is currently going through some major refurbishment it still delivered to our expectations from a previous stay. Disruption was kept to a minimum and  the quality of the hotel, pool and restaurant were all as we remembered from several years ago.   The staff could not be more helpful and the good every bit as good as we remembered and fairly priced. The evenings of our stay were not warm, but the staff were only too happy to light up the heaters on the terrace to enable you to enjoy outside dining still.   This is a really nice hotel for quiet chill and just a short walk from the pier and the main restaurants on Main Street.
Manager Response: Dear David W,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us here at the Waterfront. I am so pleased to read of the wonderful experience you encountered!! I will pass on your kind and thoughtful words to the rest of our staff. I am so happy you return visit lived up to the standard of your previous stay. I hope you are able to come back again once our expansion is completed this summer.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: We always enjoy the waterfront HILTON. THE LOCATION IS GREAT, staff is wonderful and the amenities are welcoming. So much nicer than any stay in Newport Beach. Huntington Beach is developing nice dining selections in walking distance with less crowds.
Manager Response: Dear RobertBudd,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so please to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us. We are so glad to have such a wonderful new neighbor in Pacific City. It really elevates the dining and shopping options to a whole new level! We know you have many choices when staying in Orange County; thank you for choosing to stay with us.    At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The hotel is located just across from the beach and in walking distance to a small mall, pier and shops. I booked an oceanfront room and requested a high floor and also requested to pay for a high floor. I was given a room on the 3rd floor. The view from this room was nice once you looked past the busy road and huge carpark. The noise from the road was really loud even with the door closed. The room and bathroom looked a bit dated. The valet and bell staff were great even if they were really busy. The breakfast buffet was great. The pool area looked nice. The small shop didn't have many useful items in it. Free Wi-fi was good. Overall I was a bit disappointed with this property. I think you are paying for the location rather than the quality of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear rvo,  Thank you for your kind words and recent review. Any disappoinment in our property expirience is a concern for us and we apologize for any inconvenience, no matter how small. we take every review quite seriously and use them as a learning tool for our staff and managers. We will be expanding our market and services very soon! And with the completion of the new suite-centric Twin Dolphin tower, your options for rooms will nearly double (and give us many more "high floor options" as well).   We hope you come back and enjoy the all new Waterfront soon!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Great hotel, great view and very close to pier.......... Restaurant has good food and pool was awesome....... Bus transportation to nearby towns was a plus, had a great day in Laguna...................... Construction was a little annoying but nothing you can overlook for the view
Manager Response: Dear mistyhop,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at the Waterfront. I am so glad you enjoyed yourself. Huntington Beach is a beautiful place to visit. I hope you can return to visit us again once our expansion is finished this summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My girlfriend and I had a nice visit to Huntington Beach.  I'm a diamond member and I've been to more Hilton properties than I can remember.  We booked an oceanfront suite and the room was very spacious.  The bathroom was very dated and the room was a bit musty, nothing terrible, but I expected a little better.  There is a lot of road noise for the oceanfront rooms because PCH is situated between the hotel and the beach.  Also, the construction is  very distracting during the day but get out of the room and enjoy the area!  It appears that the hotel is going to be amazing with a new pool once the construction is done.  One cool thing...  the hotel will build you an evening bonfire on the beach for a fee.  On thing that really stinks...  if you're in an oceanfront room, the smoky
Manager Response: Dear SuperZeeeeeeee,  Thank you for your recent review. We are almost complete with both our construction and rooms refresh and no one is more excited for the final product than us! We thank you for your kind words and hope you do come back soon to see all that we have done.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location
Summary: I used some Hilton Honors points to come here with my family. I didn't have to use a lot of points so I was a little concerned about the "resort" aspect of the hotel.  While it does not fall into the category of a "resort" like some of the other places I have been, this hotel turned put to be a wonderful experience.  Here are a couple things I really liked:  1. The pool is nice and heated. Given the fact that we were there in April, that worked out well for us. 2. The location is PHENOMENAL. Right across the street (PCH) is Huntington Beach. Literally. We walked out the hotel doors, crossed the street and were at the beach. 3. We were right next door to an outdoor mall called Pacific City (I think). One block further and you are in Huntington. Beach Main Street area. Tons of

Dirty room, balcony was too dirty to use. Baby food left in mini fridge. If your not cleaning the easy things.....the service was good. The people that worked there were nice. The place is going through a MAJOR construction project. I would advise against staying here until it is complete.
Manager Response: Dear  Coachsimpson,  Thank you for your recent review. We sincerely apologize for the housekeeping issues you experienced during your stay. We have notified the appropriate Directors and Managers of your review and will further press the matter with our housekeeping department. As they just won one of the highest scores for cleanliness during our recent inspection, we are very concerned as to how any of this may have happened. We hope you will return and allow us to "Make It Right". Again, we are very sorry.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This was our 3rd visit to the Waterfront.  Each visit was as consistent as the others.  I am a Hilton Diamond Member and have stayed at many Hilton properties over the years.  Without a doubt, hands down, this is the best Hilton property we have ever encountered!  The staff is the friendliest, service is terrific, housekeeping does a great job and the location across the street from the Pacific Ocean can't be beat.  You are only a 10-15 minute drive to Newport Beach and 20-30 minute drive to Laguna Beach.  The hotel is adding a new tower, so there is a bit of construction going on. We were not inconvenienced by the construction which should be completed in the next couple of months.  There was no early morning noise to interrupt a good nights sleep. Once again we encountered
Manager Response: Kim-Erin J, Guest Relations Manager at The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel, responded to this review Dear Gary B,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront! I am so happy to read of all your wonderful interactions with our staff. We have such an incredible team and they take such good care of our guest. Thank you for mentioning Tammy, Ramil, Adam and Ajit by name. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to them. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County. Thank you for being our guest and entrusting your vacation with us. We look forward to having you back again next year. I can't wait to show you around our new expansion! Have a wonderful weekend.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: I would wait until the remodel is complete
Summary: I genuinely dislike leaving anything lower than a 4 star review for hotels, but we were completely underwhelmed by this hotel and I wish I had more info before booking.    The biggest downfall was the construction.  We could barely hear anything when we walked into the lobby, a huge portion was taped up and we were dodging workers and painters walking to the elevator.  We also paid extra for an ocean view floor 6 and up.  Once we got to the room and looked out, the main focal point was more construction (we were on floor 6).  Part of the reason of paying extra to stay at an ocean front hotel is enjoying the view.  But looking out to a half way constructed pool with graffiti and loud construction with a glimpse at the beach beyond that, is hardly relaxing.  We were visiting for
Manager Response: Dear mparis4386,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for an inconvenience experienced during your stay. We are in the final stages of the expansion build and finish work, which has created a very challenging environment for our staff. We are doing all we can to mitigate noise, dust an distraction of any kind and we apologize profusely for failing you on this front. Our staff is doing all they can to control the construction teams and yet complete the job at hand...quickly!  Please give us another chance and come and see the "all new" Waterfront later this summer and beyond. I assure you we will do everything we can to make your stay beyond exceptional.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Definitely get a ocean view worth it!
Summary: Stayed for a week NOT ON THE BEACH!!! But across the street.. they will give you all you need for a nice day on the beach. The view of the ocean was AMAZING the staff was kind. They are doubling in size the new addition will be done soon they said .
Manager Response: Dear weloveJESUS,  Thank you for your review... we are very glad you had a good time while you were here. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED! You are also correct in stating that we are very near to the completion of our new tower (The Twin Dolphin) and event spaces. A hard date for opening is still in flux, but we should know the exact day very soon!  Also, you may have noticed that there are no hotels on the beach in Huntington Beach. We pride ourselves on over ten miles of uninterrupted pristine coastline with access for all. It's in our DNA here in Surf City, USA!  Cheers,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I enjoyed a beach facing deluxe room that was perfect.  The 2 balconies facing the water with sunsets to die for.  We ate at the restaurant or room service which was very tasty and used the valet parking.  Hilton takes care of all the details but you have to take care of the bill.
Manager Response: Dear Mike N,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience. I am so glad to read you were able to enjoy our stunning Huntington Beach sunsets. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Spent the weekend at the beach and chose this hotel for its central location to the beach, pier, and Pacific City.   Everything was wonderful except for the construction, which included the gym. However, passes were available to the gym next door at Pasea.  Room size was standard and the bed was comfortable, but I found the pillows to be a bit hard and lumpy.  Bathroom amenities included products from Peter Thomas Roth. Our ocean and pier view was spectacular.   We ate breakfast at Shades ($15 pp per day credit for HH Gold members) which included both continental buffet ($15) and full buffet ($22) options.   We lunched by the pool.  Although the menu was limited, prices were reasonable: turkey club with a bag of chips ($10) and Mai Tais ($12).  Room service was fast and
Manager Response: Dear SoVerySoCal,  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear that had an amazing stay overall. We are very excited about our expansion, which you saw the effects of while you were on property. We will be opening the new tower, banquet space, restaurants, pool with water slides and fitness center this summer. We hope you can return for a visit to see it all!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Second visit to this hotel and liked very much Again service was perfect and liked new modern look is taking shape  Got the same junior suite as last year maybe next visit i can get one over the palm trees Anyway view is nice and love room configuration Next year visit will have no construction eventhough wasnt a problem at all  at this point of it is very little noise Location is great and had a great time
Manager Response: Dear welltraveledA,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to read you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options to choose from when visiting Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us yet again! We hope to see you again in the near future.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: All was very good as expected.  Room, food, pool, restaurants, and staff.  Shane the Bell/Valet guy went above and beyond to assist us with local eateries.  The personalized service he provide my family was more than I would have expected.
Manager Response: Dear Matt M,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! It was so nice of you to mention Shane by name. He is one of our best! I will pass on your kind words to him and our executive staff. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Location, location,location...stay here for the location.
Summary: I have to start by saying the Hilton is in the process is expanding. So yes there was construction going on during my stay. But honestly it never felt intrusive. The valet guys I think have bad because the construction has made the car entrance area on the small side. But I give them all credit...they always had a smile on there faces and handled it all beautifully. And in general the whole staff at the Hilton are very friendly and accommodating ....which is always a plus for me. The grounds are well cared for and quite pretty.  But really all that said the location is great. You are right there at the beach (across PCH of course this California after all). And you are a short walk from restaurants and shops on the main drag as well as next door to Pacific City a newer complex
Manager Response: Dear Dawn O,  Thank you for writing about your recent visit to The Waterfront! We pride ourselves on providing our guests with Five-Diamond customer service, I am happy to hear you encountered our capable staff at their best! We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location but Noisy and Busy
Summary: I have stayed here before and loved it. However, CONSTRUCTION Beware.  I stayed in room 621 and sadly that was DIRECTLY in front of the construction area.  I asked to be moved to no avail. as I arrived at the hotel at 5p and the otherside  (not facing construction) of the hotel was sold out. It was noisy, dusty and no ability to use my patio.  Those are the low lights, the highlights: the people are nice and helpful, the pool was great for kids and Location is wonderful.  I echo another review that said will be a great hotel in 2018 wait..... Suggestion: Book the beach side trolley they pack chairs, towels, firewood and smore ingredients into a wagon to take for the nightime excursion. It was fun for the kids.
Manager Response: Dear pkeller714,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for not being able to accommodate a room move for you during your last visit. The combination of spring break and Easter have led to some very busy days, even while we are finishing up our expansion and property enhancements. We greatly appreciate your loyalty and your kind words, thank you.  We hope you can return to see the completed Twin Dolphin tower and all that comes with it (including waterslides for the kids)... you will not be disappointed!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We had a great time at the hotel and the beach. The hotel is in a great location. It is easy walking distance to the Huntington Beach pier. Main street HB is a cool place to visit.  Excellent hotel... Excellent service!
Manager Response: Dear U7339OCmikep,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. I will pass on your kind words to the rest of our staff. We look forward to having you return as our guest hopefully sometime in the near future!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Last part of the So-Cal Spring Trip
Summary: The Hotel is nice and the hotel will be beautiful in late 2017 however; right now it is a "work in progress".  PROS- Next to the Beach, next to the new shopping center Pacific City, walking distance to Main Street, friendly Front Desk, and rooms are updated. CONS- I would say half of the property is under construction, work begins at 7:00 AM, hard to enjoy a balcony when you hear heavy work equipment.  Valet parking only with half of the driveway blocked (gets very crowded).
Manager Response: Dear John D,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your recent stay with us. We are doing all we can to both mitigate disturbances and rush the project to completion in late June. We hope to see you return soon and allow us to "Make It Right" and show you around. Your satisfaction is our primary goal!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We love this place, especailly the location. We knew about the ongoing construction next door and that was a complete non-issue for us.. However, we weren't aware of the remodeling going on directly above our room.  Non-stop jackhammer noise for an entire day.  Called to ask what was going on and received an apology. Would have expected a little more - maybe a breakfast voucher or some small token for inconveniencing repeat visitors, but whatever. Still love the loaction and may return when the project is complete.
Manager Response: Dear khoff2017,  Thank you for your recent review of The Waterfront. Our sincere apologies for the sound and inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay with us. We have passed your comments on to the appropriate managers to make sure that our front line staff are more proactive with the tools available to them to make any situation right by you, our guest.  Our construction, noise, room refreshes, and property enhancements are all coming to close very soon, and we look forward to your return when we can show off everything too! (And give me a ring before you come back... breakfast will be ON ME!)  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Excellent location, beautiful hotel, nice people.  Everything you could want for a quick get-away.   I would recommend this hotel to any couple or family that likes a resort atmosphere, but wants to be close to big city entertainment.
Manager Response: Dear traceyr2017,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to read that you enjoyed your time with us. We know you have many options when staying in Orange County. Thank you for choosing The Waterfront.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Property is under construction/renovation, NOT made clear at time of online booking in January.   Fitness Center is unavailable. Bedding is VERY uncomfortable. Location is terrific, staff is wonderful, restaurant is quite good. A mixed bag, but two HUGE negatives here.
Manager Response: Dear Rick B,  Thank you for your recent review. Our sincere apologies for your disappointment during your stay. From websites to social media, over the phone in person or communicated via confirmation letters, we really have tried to every way possible to let our guests know of any disruptions during our expansion project. Our policy is to be transparent and accommodating in any way we can before, during and after your stay. If you have not already done so, please give our Director of Operations a call (Mr. Ajit Acharya) and allow us to "Make It Right".   We'll need your Hilton Honors number or reservation details at the time of the call. Again, while we are very near to being finished with the biggest project of our lives, we understand how this may have impacted your stay and value your loyalty. we look forward to speaking with you.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We had a wonderful time at the hotel and spent Sunday through Thursday on 10th floor. Great views of the beach, ocean and Pacific Cost Highway. I loved that the hotel provided beach amenities, (boogie boards, sand toys, chairs, umbrellas, etc.) at no cost and they were good quality. The Hotel is across Pacific Coast Highway from the beach, and very close to the pier and Main Street.   The pool was warm and clean, the staff was very friendly and accommodating. The food was very good and we ate at the hotel pool everyday for lunch. Very nice.   A couple things I struggled with, were the rooms were fairly small. We had a rollaway bed and we could barely fit it in the room, but we made it work. They charged me $20 a night for the rollaway, which I thought was excessive. The parking

This hotel has an incredible location. It is right on the beach. It is currently being remodeled and based on what I've seen, it's going to be amazing for both family and couples.  It's about a 45 minute drive from LAX and about a 1 minute walk to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear legges502,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I appreciate your feed back. I glad you had a wonderful time here in Huntington Beach. We hope that you are able to come and visit us again once our expansion is completed! Have a great day...  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Location is great.  Asked to leave because we were talking with NO music.  Spent almost 700 when I should've stayed at Pasea where they are very polite, Tanners roof, private pool over looking the beach.
Manager Response: Dear brendae389,  Thank you for your recent comments. We take safety and security (including the privacy and peace) of all of our Waterfront guests very seriously. No eviction from the hotel happens without at least both contact and warnings being issued by our security staff. In extreme circumstances, we summon the police if there is a danger to life or property.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Had nice amenities we really enjoyed.  We are certain when the renovations are complete it will really be impressive.  Nice to have a pool with hot tub so close to the beach, but the breakfast buffet was very well done.

Just spent the weekend at this facility. Small room. Crappy amenities.Construction going on next door. Bed comfortable Food at restaurant was good. Service good. Price was high for value received. Would think twice next time.
Manager Response: Dear TXJeffro,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for disappointing you in any way during your stay with us. Please do not hesitate to tell us how we can do better and what you would like to see at the resort. You are our most valuable asset when it comes to learning how we might improve our amenities or services... our mission is your complete satisfaction!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: If you are facing pool side you can watch the sun set from your room on floors 8,9,10,11,12. I love the pool side staff that will bring you food and drinks and bill your room. I was bery happy with my anniversary trip to this Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear TJMfoundation,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent visit to The Waterfront. Happy Anniversary! It sound like you had a wonderful time. Huntington Beach sunsets are something so special. Have a great week and we hope you can visit again once our expansion is completed.   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Property is under construction despite full hotel rates.  Loud jackhammering of floors to fix higher level rooms.  Gym was closed.  My room had almost no available outlets to plug in.  Would not suggest staying until renovations are complete.
Manager Response: Dear lynnallen97,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay. We have done all we can to mitigate as much of the noise and visuals presented by the final weeks of our expansion project. In most cases, we have been quite successful, but sometimes the sights and sounds of our progress can intrude upon the normal peace and quiet of our operations. We are very sorry.  We have done a few things to make sure this is all kept to minimum including: making alternate arrangements for every guest to use our neighboring hotel's fitness facilities; keeping all work involving noise limited to the hours of 8am-5pm, Monday thru Friday; working with you, our valued guests, to change your accommodations whenever it is possible for us to do so.  Hang in there! We'll be all done with the expansion phase by the end of June.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The best seat in HB is by the fire pit overlooking the Pacific with a great cup of coffee in the morning!  Mitch Queen went above and beyond by making our stay great and accommodating our requests.   Feel like a local and get pampered like royalty!
Manager Response: Dear drjbwhite,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so glad to hear of the wonderful time you had. Thank you for the kind words you wrote about our Director of Banquets, Mitch. He is one of our best and is our current manager of the year! He truly goes above and beyond. I hope you are able to come visit us once again after our expansion is completed.  At your Service,  Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I stayed here last week just as a little stay-cation. The hotel is currently under renovation. The lobby was beautifully done and I imagine the rest of the property will look just as great when it's done. The room was spacious and clean, and they all have balconies. The bed was super comfortable, like sleeping on a cloud. Kyle at the bar was really friendly. Definitely stay here if you're in the area and need a room!
Manager Response: Dear honeysunrise,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to read your enjoyed your visit. Thank you for mentioning Kyle by name, I will make sure to pass this note on to him. We are very excited for our expansion and hope you can visit again once its completed this summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Best Beach Hotel in Southern California
Summary: The Waterfront Beach Resort is one of my favorite Beach Hotels on the planet. Anytime I'm in Southern California, either for work or play, I choose to stay here. Perfect beach location, beautiful property, awesome friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Wayne B,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We consider having return guests, such as yourself, that stay with us time and time again to be one of the greatest compliments one can bestow. You like us, you really, really like us!! I do hope you can come back for a visit once our new expansion is completed. Have a wonderful weekend.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice  Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My daughter and my girlfriend spent the week here. Great location, right on the historic Highway 1 in Southern California. Can get to multiple locations in Southern California from here. Right across highway is the beach. Great service, pool was heated, has a ot tub. Excellent breakfast buffet. Great dinner at the Hotel restaurant named Shades. Definitely will stay again!!
Manager Response: Dear Scoonie74,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I will pass on your kind words to our staff; especially our managers at Shades. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our wonderful breakfast buffet and dinner. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County, I want to thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This was a beautiful Hotel!  The staff went out of there way to see if you needed anything,  the were kind, friendly and really seemed to enjoy what they were doing.  Our room was clean, great lighting and well worth the price.  I would absolutely stay at this Hitel again!
Manager Response: Dear A4925YSjulief,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you thoroughly enjoyed yourself. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. I do hope you'll be able to return once our expansion is completed. Have a wonderful week!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Make sure you know there is construction here and that most of the amenities are not available.  Our room faced the construction and therefore every morning we heard the noise.  Also if you are and honors member; they don't care...
Manager Response: Dear matthewh0918,  Thank you for your review. Our sincere apologies that we were unable to accommodate a Hilton Honors upgrade for you during your stay. Your loyalty and Diamond status is very much appreciated by all of us here at Hilton. Unfortunately, you checked in with us when we were completely sold out and we had no other rooms available. We are very sorry to have disappointed you in any way.  We are close to being done with all of our upgrades and opening our all new suite-centric Twin Dolphin tower which will open in late June. We hope you return to see what all the fuss was about!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Shout out to Sean and Tammy! Thank you for amazing customer service. We only stay at your place and are regulars. The room we had was incredible and every detail perfect! We had our meals at Shades and invited friends. Thank you for an incredible time! Also, thanks to Vanessa and Linsdsay at the front counter for all your care. We will be back soon! Paul and Jihan
Manager Response: Dear Jihan B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a wonderful review about your recent stay with us at The Waterfront. I will pass on your kind words to our staff, especially Sean, Tammy, Vanessa and Lindsey. Thank you for mentioning them by name. We look forward to having you return once our expansion is completed. Bring your friends back for cocktails at our rooftop lounge Offshore 9. The view will be AMAZING!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Great Hotel and great staff. Location is perfect and amenities are wonderful. We spent 5 days and 4 nights at this beautiful hotel in Huntington Beach. Right across from the beach and 2 blocks from the pier. This is our go to spot in The Los Angeles.
Manager Response: Dear Duane W,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay here at The Waterfront. Thank you for choosing to stay with us again. We truly value your loyalty. We hope you are able to return for a visit once our new expansion is completed this summer! Have a great week...  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for five days. It's located in a great area. The beach is directly across the street and there's shopping within walking distance. The hotel is under construction which is why I've given it 4 stars instead of 5. It's going to be even nicer when the construction is complete. I hope to return at a later date when everything is done. The staff at this hotel was great. Very accommodating. I'd recommend this for families as well as couples.
Manager Response: Dear Angie E,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your visit. We are so excited about our expansion featuring our new Suite-centric tower, pool deck with water slides, and new meeting space and ballrooms. We know you have many choices when visiting Orange County. Thank you for being our guest. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Beautiful property right across street from beach. Walk to downtown Huntington Beach and restaurants.  Love it. Planning on a few days this summer with Grandkids. Wonderful. Location makes this a perfect Hilton. I live here and visit.
Manager Response: Dear 911jackie,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent visit! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us for your stay-cation. I hope you are able to bring the grandkids back after we open our new tower and pool with water slides in Late June / Early July. They will love it! Have a great week...  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The location of the hotel is excellent with great views of the ocean. However, the are some definite downsides right now. The place is under construction as they build a new tower so the hotel is blocked off in a number of areas. The gym was closed, parts of the lobby were blocked off, and there is a lot of construction noise that starts early.   Rooms: My room appeared to be recently renovated. However, some corners were cut in silly ways. Why would you renovate a bathroom, re-carpet, and have new furniture only to leave 70's louvered closet doors that have been painted a dozen times? Not super smart.   Food: No. Catering at meetings was horrible. As was most of the restaurant food.   Service: Again, not up to speed for the price charged.   Perhaps when renovations are done
Manager Response: Dear TheVancouverites,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for any inconveniences you encountered as result of our expansion and new tower project. We are doing all we can to mitigate any and all challenges our guests encounter along the way (such as offering alternative work out facilities at our neighboring hotel).  We take very seriously your comments about our food and service as this is a source of not only pride but many awards and accolades bestowed upon our team. We will be sure to share your review with both our banquets and restaurant teams as well as our service staff members. We are very sorry to have disappointed you in any way...and please do not hesitate to tell us these things "on the spot". We welcome the opportunity to "Make It Right" in any way we can and make certain you are happy with any solution offered.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Nice location overall. very friendly and helpful staff. good restaurants. great convenience store with star-bucks on site. expensive but efficient valet parking Nice location overall. Very friendly and helpful staff. Good restaurants.  Only real negative were the "Ocean side/view" rooms. When we got there we were disappointed. Our view was facing the ocean but it was obstructed by the palm trees, pool, people near the pool and the Highway (PCH).  But overall it was a nice hotel and amazing staff.
Manager Response: Dear hassan s,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am so glad to hear you were pleased overall with your visit. I apologize that you were disappointed in the view from your room. Please call me directly in the future when returning to the property. It would be my pleasure to assist you in acquiring a palm tree free view for your stay! Have a great week.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager 714-845-8000

Summary: Right across the street from the beach!  Clean rooms and great staff.  Awesome full service hotel. Great for a family vacation. Safe location to walk to various local stores and restaurants.  Definitely plan on returning
Manager Response: Dear kathypK906VK,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you as a return guest in the near future. Have a wonderful week.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My husband and I were lucky enough to be upgraded upon checking in!! We travel extensively using Hilton and it was also our anniversary!!! Our 12th floor room had fabulous views across the Hilton resort pool to the beautiful white sands and pier. We were able to enjoy sitting on the balcony and watch some of the most stunning sunsets ever seen. The room was great .... only disappointed in the bathroom which is definately something Hilton has to look at redoing as it lets itself down here. Two adults cannot possibly be in there at the same time.  A small Starbucks at the hotel was perfect for the morning coffee.  Main Street and large shopping mall are only a short stroll away.  Valet staff were excellent and very polite.  There is some building work going on at the moment but it
Manager Response: Dear Tina16flight,  Thank you for your kind words. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. Our renovations are continuing and we look forward to showing off our new Twin Dolphin tower to you for your next visit. There is no doubt that we'll earn five stars from you the next time you see us...be prepared to be "WOW'd!" (And yes, the bathrooms are MUCH bigger).  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel for many years and incarnations, beginning in the late 90's. I love staying here, but my last visit was not so great. I stay here at least once a month to visit family and am sympathetic regarding the  construction happening.  This last reorganization, however , has made it very hard for the valets to see customers and retrieve cars and line them up for exiting. The valets hustle and are great and so much friendlier than the new front desk staff, and i feel that management could work with them better to figure something out.   The front desk staff this time was very different then the time before. i did not recognize anyone, and the staff was more robotic then before, less personable. Does Steve still work there? Whenever he was working, he was
Manager Response: Dear  lattejr,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced as related to our current expansion project. We are rushing to accomplish our goal of connection our new Twin Dolphin Tower and event spaces to our current Huntington Tower by the end of June. Our valet drive and front desk operations will be much smoother well before that date of opening. Let me also apologize for the feeling of not being welcomed and thanked for being a Hilton Honors Gold member. We recognize this represents and incredible loyalty to our brand and thank you so much for choosing us. I will be certain to pass your service issues on to the appropriate managers for immediate action.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel  Again, we apologize. We are very excited to have everything back in place and hope that you will return to allow us the opportunity to "wow" and serve you once again. You will not be disappointed.

Summary: We stayed here one night during a recent trip to So. Cal.. and we used points to extend our vacay. We wanted to surf, but the waves did not cooperate. The construction was directly outside our balcony and the noise was terrible. And we felt intimidated to just go outside because of the looks from all of the workers. I doubt we would spend the points again, and certainly not real money for the experience. The construction will be done by the end of summer and it may be worthwhile by then. The room was a bit bigger than the average Marriot, but was showing its age. Clean but worn. And the parking is $34.00 a night. (!)
Manager Response: Dear treesmiths3,  Thank you for your review. We understand your hesitancy and frustration with your view during your recent stay and we apologize for disappointing you in any way. As we prepare to formally open our new Twin Dolphin Tower and Event Complex, it is necessary to connect our existing property to the expansion. This means that the dozens of builders and workers who are normally tucked out of the way are now very near us to completely the task. We have a strict work schedule during the week (ONLY) and they are to do all they can to avoid disturbing our in-house guests. Our sincere apologies... we're almost done! (June, 2017)  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This place is actually nice. The people are very helpful. The one part that made us, wellllll maybe me than my wife was...all was great until the WEDDING. Basically, Hilton was Hilton until the BIG money came in and then they could have cared less about us. We were only allowed...ALLOWED to walk in and out the garage. We were forbidden to go in and out the front entrance. How can you possibly give any hotel a good review
Manager Response: Dear Thomas G.,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for any inconvenience experienced during the recent wedding routing to valet during your stay. We did not anticipate the arrival process of the traditional Indian barrat on the valet drive to take more than thirty minutes when in fact it was closer to an hour. We were also limited to just two entrance and exit points in the lobby (normally we have up to four) due to the valet drive renovation underway. For both the safety and convenience of anyone needing access to the valet drive during this time, we decided that escorting guests around the event was the best option for all involved. We sincerely apologize for any delay or the perception that we favored any one guest or event over any other. We appreciate you letting us know that, intended or not, that was your perception and we will strive to find a better option should the situation arise again in the near future.   To that end, we will soon be complete with all of our physical lobby changes whereby we will always have separate entrances and exits for group events. No one is more excited for these changes than our entire staff and management. Our hope is that you will return and allow us to "wow" you at every turn with the brand new Waterfront. We look forward to serving you.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We spent four days at the Waterfront Beach Resort and we had a wonderful time.  The hotel property is amazing and has the perfect location on the beach and near Main Street. We had a great walk on the beach and we walked to dinner most nights.  The only negative during our stay was that we had a hard time getting a cab.  Finally one night, a pizza delivery driver too pitty on us and gave us a ride.  The hotel is under construction with a beautiful new addition.  We look forward to returning to this amazing place.
Manager Response: Dear MontanaSplash,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your recent visit to The Waterfront! I will be sure to pass on your note to the rest of our staff and managers. We know you have many options when visiting Orange County and we are grateful you chose to stay with us. We look forward to having you as our guest once again when our new expansion is completed this summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: There was smoke and fog for most of the time that we were there.  The standard of the food was well below par. I ordered an eggs Benedict that came in less than 30 seconds! The potatoes were almost cold and the eggs must have been cooked quite some time before. The cheese was melted and stuck to the plate. This was the worst eggs Benedict that I have ever had anywhere. The manager of the restaurant did remove the payment for the eggs Benedict, but this still did not leave a nice feeling.  The hotel was under renovation, and the gym was closed for the whole time we were there. There was construction noise most of the time, and marks still on the tiles were panels had been put up period these had been removed but the tape glue was still on the tiles. The place was not clean!  We
Manager Response: Dear Dr. Woolford,  Thank you for your recent review. We have passed your comments on to our restaurant and front office teams and want you to know that we take this very seriously. Food quality and service is something we pride ourselves.    We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced as a result of our hotel enhancements and expansion project (which is coming to a rapid and beautiful end). We go to great pains to keep our construction noise to a minimum and only work Monday-Friday, 8am-5pm, but sometimes the work does get a bit noisy and we're very sorry for that.  We hope that you come back and see us once we are done (in late June) and experience the all new Waterfront!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The staff at this resort are all 5 star. It's so refreshing to have people ask how they can help you at every interaction.  Stayed 5 nights for conference, had daughter join the last night, hotel is wonderful for business or pleasure. Location is fantastic just block from Pacific City with shopping and great dining and a couple blocks from downtown and the pier.  Everything was easily within walking distance.  The beds were super comfortable, not too soft or firm, just right. They are constructing a second tower and it was right outside my balcony but the noise never bothered me and I'm a light sleeper. The room was pretty soundproof. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear TravelingMomOFour,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay with us! I am so pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed your time in Huntington Beach. Here at The Waterfront we pride ourselves on personal service to our guests. I am thrilled to know you were able to experienced it first hand. We hope to have you as a return guest sometime in the near future. Safe travels!   At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Began every day with a swim in the pool and ended each day with a soak in the hot tub. There was construction project going on but they minimized the inconvenience.  desk staff and valet were helpful with directions.
Manager Response: Dear janey h,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us here at The Waterfront Beach Resort. Pool in the morning and hot tub in the evening...sounds like the ingredients for a perfect vacation to me! I hope the next time your travels bring you to Orange County, you will stay with us once again.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Mananger

Summary: First the front desk staff is awesome. I had a long day of travel and they got me checked in and on my way in no time. They gave me a partial beach view which was awesome. They also took the time to inform me i was on the construction side which was no big deal. The construction did not start until after i left in the morning and was done when i returned. The hotel was beautiful. I loved the bar which is where i ate and had a cocktail each day. Bar staff top notch.The pool area is amazing.I will be staying there again when i return in the summer. Thank you to all.
Manager Response: Dear Chris G,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay! I am so happy to read that you enjoyed your time with us. I will pass on your kind words to the rest of our staff. We look forward to having you as our return guest this summer.  Safe travels to you and yours.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I would have rated this hotel higher but they currently have a lot of construction taking place.  They happened to be jackhammering the floor near the elevators when I visited on business.  It was very, very noisy between 9 AM and 5 PM when I was in HB.    The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The locations is great and you are within a short walk of Main St and the HB Pier.    I would stay here again but check to see if they have any construction taking place first!

Kyle pulled up our car twice since we've been here and each time he's been so welcoming and friendly!! He's made our stay very easy and pleasant. 15/10 for service! Thanks so much Kyle! We appreciate it :)
Manager Response: Dear Kayla L,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! I spoke with Kyle yesterday and he was thrilled to hear you were happy with the service he provided. Thank you for mentioning him by name. We know you have many choices when visiting Huntington Beach. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: A beautiful hotel in a beautiful city
Summary: what a way to end the best holiday (vacation) of my life. The hotel is so close to the beach as you only have to walk across the road and you are there the main entrance to the hotel was very grand, posh and very clean...infact this hotel is probably the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in. the rooms are very big and the view we has was a stunning sea view. we left the window open when we went to sleep and we could here the sea crashing agents the shore we where that close to the sea..i hope this review was helpful and please ask any questions that you have.
Manager Response: Dear ewisjpainter,   It is such a pleasure to read your glowing review of our property! Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay. I will pass on you kind words to our outstanding housekeeping team that does such an wonderful job keeping us in tip top shape. We hope you can visit us again in the near future! We would love to have you back.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My stay was during a recent business trip.  The hotel was under construction, but the staff were respectful and kept noises to a minimum.  The location is fantastic, within walking distance to the beach, shops & restaurants.  If you go with children, you might want to bring some snacks, the gift shop doesn't offer healthy options and is a bit on the high side. There is a farmers market on Tuesdays.  It's fun for a walk and they offer fresh fruit, fun touristy stuff and only a 8 - 10 min walk from hotel.  My room had a beach view, the sunrise and sunset were beautiful.

Three words, four syllables:  Paper. Thin. Walls.  Seriously, a 70-year-old man peeing next door woke me up.  Excellent room- and maid-service, very nice and relaxing pool area. Shades Restaurant is good, bar severely lacks in variety. The Surf Shop convenience store jacks up prices that could easily be more attractive to folks like me who'll pay that price if it's in a minibar located in my room.
Manager Response: Dear Scott E.,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for any disturbances you experienced during your stay. You may have noticed the many hotel enhancements that we're underway while you were here, including our new Twin Dolphin tower, which will have some of the most modern sound proofing available to hotels. We look forward to the June opening!  In addition to the new tower will be several new dining options and all of our menus will be brand new and, we hope, a bit more varietal in nature. We very much look forward to your return.   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon  Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Disappointing Aging Hotel with Construction and Traffic Noise
Summary: We selected this hotel due to location (doctor and surgery center in Newport Beach) and thought having an ocean view would make the trip nicer since it was for medical reasons. We were upgraded (at a cost) to a corner oceanfront suite but this proved to be a mistake. Hotel was aware we were there for a surgical procedure but didn't accommodate with upgrade. We were placed right next to the major construction, next door to the hotel, which had the typical construction noise and jackhammers going on – and not very scenic. Looks like that will be going on for a while.  We wanted to change rooms but timing of everything and travel exhaustion made that unworkable and we had our cat with us adding to the difficulty - so we just stayed in that room. Wish we had made the change or never
Manager Response: Dear RedWombatRoadie,  Thank you for your detailed review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Never hesitate to contact us at anytime during your stay so we can do our best to address and correct any concerns you may have. We welcome the opportunity to serve you and "Make It Right".  A quick update on our construction: We should have the keys to our brand new tower and pool complex by the end of June! So instead of six months, you really only need to wait three or four. Watch our websites for the official announcements.  Lastly, we hope all went well with the surgery and recovery for your husband. Our wishes for a speedy recovery!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The Waterfront Hilton is our absolute favorite getaway.  The location is perfect for going to the beach, walking to the pier and even to go downtown to explore.  The staff is amazing and probably the friendliest of any hotel property we have stayed.   My husband has celiac disease and they were so accommodating with his allergy issues.   Can't say enough positive about this property and their staff
Manager Response: Dear Terry,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a glowing review in regards to your recent stay here at The Waterfront! I will be sure to pass on your note to our Executive Chef as well as the rest of our staff. We are grateful for the opportunity to have you as repeat guests and we hope you will be able to visit us after the expansion is completed.  Have a wonderful weekend!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Great hotel with a good location in Huntington Beach. Good service and very clean. Stay in rooms on the upper level poolside for the best views. A little pricey for the value.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear douglassT5426OJ,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We know you have many options when staying in Huntington Beach and we are grateful that you chose to stay with us. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future. Have a wonderful weekend!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: I'll start with my initial caveat - the hotel was under construction during our stay.  That said, it was not overly intrusive, but you can certainly tell this was a fantastic resort in the early 2000's, but has since diminished to an average resort property.  They are certainly in need of the overhaul taking place that appropriately reflects the 4AAA rating they showcase.  All that aside, it was a nice property and the staff really shined through with their service - the concierge, front desk and bell staff members in particular did an excellent job of ensuring a quality stay for us.  With the price and prestige outlined, I would probably recommend staying next door at the Hyatt given the price point is similar and it's a much more updated resort, but look forward to seeing the
Manager Response: Dear Scott J.,  Thank you for your recent review. We are very excited to be in the final phase of our expansion and enhancement to both the existing property and the new Twin Dolphin Tower and pool complex (expected opening, late June 2017). From rooms to restaurants to entertainment (and an unrivaled rooftop lounge called the Offshore 9), we look forward to your return inspection!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Under construction even if they tell you it won't effect your stay.... It will!
Summary: Hotel run down for this quality and price. Hotel under construction. Called before booking and was told construction was inside the new tower and we wouldn't be bothered. Got a complimentary upgrade however the construction was everywhere so didn't matter. Room upgrade was a room with spots on the carpet, a loose toilet seat, and a broken table!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa W.,   Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for an inconvenience or disturbances due to the construction during your stay. We do our best to meet each morning and evening with the construction teams to get the latest information to pass on to our guests and make every effort to communicate that as effectively as possible. In reviewing your dates of stay we can certainly understand how you feel and we're very sorry. It was not a good week for us and there is no good way to say that.  Our Director of Guest Experience will personally reach to you shortly and "Make It Right". Your loyalty and satisfaction is supremely important to us and again, we apologize for everything.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel...wish we could've stayed longer!
Summary: What a beautiful hotel!  Everything during our stay was perfect. The parking attendants were friendly and efficient, the front desk employees couldn't have been nicer or more helpful, the room was updated and lovely, the pool area is beautiful, the restaurant was terrific (enjoyed eating on the patio) and the shuttle to town was a nice surprise (the drivers were the best!). My only regret is that I didn't get to stay longer. We didn't get to take advantage of the beach activities because it was chilly and rainy, but I can only imagine it would be a great experience with all the hotel has to offer. I'm pretty fussy when it comes to hotels, and this hotel has made my short list of favorite hotels. I will definitely plan another, longer stay next time I come to California!

Stayed four days at Waterfront Beach Resort,Room was clean with a nice view of the beach across the street,Within walking distance of downtown . Came with free breakfast ,We Also had a nice dinner with a large group of family .Hotel has small market and snack bar could have offered more food Items.They have Valet for overnight parking for additional fee.Would stay here again if I'm in the area again.

Summary Heading: Great Staff - Bad Internet and follow through
Summary: The internet is spotty at best.  My 5th request for a roll away bed was finally honored ... slept 3 to a bed when we arrived after a long flight - passed out waiting for the roll away .. which did not come until 3 more requests the next day.  Staff was very nice and apologized with Milk and Cookies .. very nice thought.
Manager Response: Dear James M.,  Thank you for your recent review. Our apologies in the delay in fulfilling your request in a timely manner. We have alerted our guest services managers to follow-up with our team and increase the response time and/or communication with our guests if there is a delay for any reason.  We're glad you enjoyed the milk and cookies! And again, our apologies.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The hotel was under renovation/expansion and we received a call prior to our stay to let us know and assure us we should not be concerned.  This was very reassuring and everyone was extremely helpful.  They just need to change the wallpaper behind the registration desk as it make a person dizzy if you look at it too long.
Manager Response: Dear 779loisw,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront! It is feedback such as your review that helps us to better serve our guests. Thank you for letting is know about the tile installation behind the front desk. Our new lobby is still undergoing its final touches and addition of accent pieces. We hope you are able to stay with us once again when everything is completed this summer!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Form pulling up to the valet I knew it was going to be a great stay. Samuel, who handled the valet service for my car was a professional and first class. If every valet was like this it'd be perfect. Samuel helped grab an item from my car I forgot and was very helpful. Every member of the valet/parking team were great. Great job Samuel. Also, Luis, the Assistant Front Office Manager was extremely helpful and a great help. Luis knows hospitality and treated me and every guest I saw with great service. This property has an amazing view and is as close to perfect you can get. I'll be back and see you soon! Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Laurence A,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We truly appreciate your feedback. I will pass on your kind words to Sam and Luis as well as the rest of our staff. Thank you for mentioning them by name, they are two of our best! We know you have many options when staying in Orange County, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to having you as a guest once again in the near future.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location
Summary: I highly recommend this hotel...especially for families.  Service exceeded our expectations.  Location was great!  Kids said they felt so special and "important" while they were there.  We recommend the smores cart which the concierge puts together for you and you wheel across the street to the fire pits on the beach.  It was one of the most memorable things we did and was the perfect ending to our family vacation.  Shuttle service is great and takes you to the huntington shops, although they're only about an 8 min walk away.  Valet was super ON IT and we never had to wait for our car.  Restaurant was good but a little pricey.  The hotel had plenty of towels, beach toys, beach chairs, etc to use at the beach, which my kids LOVED.  Hotel and grounds are clean and welcoming to

New Pacific City shopping center just a block or two away which offers great local restaurants (not chains) & several nice stores for guys & gals.   The hotel is dog friendly & has grassy areas to walk your pets & offers bags to pick up their messes outside.   We didn't use the pool or exercise facilities, but they seem very nice. There is outdoor patio seating, with heaters for chilly days & nights. We didn't eat at the restaurants or order room service because we visited several of the
Manager Response: Dear AZFam-Travel,   Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent visit to The Waterfront. We are so pleased to hear of your wonderful experience. We hope the next time you visit Orange County, you will choose to stay with us once again, furbabies in tow. Have a wonderful day!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: This was our second trip to Huntington Beach and stay at the Hilton Waterfront Beach Resort.  The location is great, just across the street from the beach and close walking distance to restaurants and a new outdoor shopping area.  The service is always outstanding!  Shout out to Ramil, one of the bellmen.  He goes out of his way to make the guests feel welcome.  If you stay, get a floor higher than the 6th.  Also, they are building another tower (to be completed this summer) on the south side, so get a room on the north side to avoid construction views and noise.  I recommend getting the s'mores wagon for evenings on the beach with a fire!  We plan on making this trip a tradition.
Manager Response: Dear Tina R,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to Ramil and the rest of our staff. We love having loyal, return guests stay at our property. We hope that after our new tower is completed in June 2017, you will be able to come and enjoy all of our new added features! Have a great day.  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel and the people are the very best
Summary: The family had a pre-Christmas get away and the trip was terrific.  The hotel upgraded our room without our request so we had a beautiful panorama beach scene.  Steps to the sand/surf and easy walking distance to many restaurants, bars and shopping.  Loved the mood/feel of HB.
Manager Response: Dear Nthnlites,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at the Waterfront. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and Huntington Beach. We hope the next time you are in Orange County, you will once again choose to stay at our property. Have a wonderful day!  At your service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel with fine rooms, food and service
Summary: Stayed here 4 nights in mid Nov, precruise.  Reception very good. We got a very nice corner suite, good size, well furnished and great views.  Had breakfast and 2 dinners in Shades.  Excellent service and food. Done separate review.  Throughout the hotel all staff from Room staff, shops, restaurants, concierge to Management were fantastic.  Great facilities there. Construction did not bother us at all.   The food and overall service make this place.  Has to be about the best hotel I have stayed in worldwide, a credit to Hilton organisation.  Only downer, a little noisy at times with PCH outside.    Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear LesMary,  Thank you for your kind words in regards to your recent stay here at The Waterfront. We are thrilled you experienced the warm hospitality and service we strive to provide our guests with. We hope that if you visit Orange County in the near future, you'll choose to stay with us once more. The construction of our new tower will be completed in June 2017. Have a wonderful day!  At your Service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: The location is great ! Across from the beach! The staff was so helpful & nice! Every person took great care of us even if it wasn't their job! They all went above and beyond! We needed extra glasses, done. We even needed a screwdriver , done!
Manager Response: Dear janewS7555AA,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am thrilled to hear of the wonderful service and hospitality you received. I will be sure to pass your kind words on to our staff and managers. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  At your service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Mananger

Summary: A really great hotel with tremendous views and service.   You can't beat the location and the pool area is fabulous. Yes, the hotel is under renovation but they are doing a great job camouflaging the job. The restaurant and lounge have great service. Our family of four can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Dear Sean C,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am thrilled to hear of the wonderful service and hospitality you received. I will be sure to pass your kind words on to our staff and managers. Our new tower will be completed in June 2017. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.   At your service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Was there for a wedding the staff was extremely friendly the construction was a little much the suite was a little outdated for the price was nice having a view of the beach was nice that we were so close
Manager Response: Dear I7207MGkimberlyc,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am thrilled to hear of the wonderful service and hospitality you received. It is so incredible to have the beach so close. Our new tower will be completed in June 2017. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future. Have a wonderful day!  At your service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: Hotel staff were very friendly. Checking process was flawless.    Enjoyed sitting at the bar. Our breakfast was outstanding.  Perfect location to walk on the beach. Would like to back for the new year eve party.
Manager Response: Dear Samuel E,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at The Waterfront. I am thrilled to hear of the wonderful service and hospitality you received. It is so incredible to have the beach so close. Our new tower will be completed in June 2017 and we are planning a big New Year's Eve Celebration that we hope you can join us for. Have a wonderful day!  At your service, Kim-Erin Justice Guest Experience Manager

Summary: My spouse and I are consultants living on the road in opposite states. I planned a special Christmas Holiday for just the two of us.   Instead, the Front Desk Staff was rude, my delivery of extra room items which they said were already up in the room were not present, and my Surprise to my spouse of Napa Valley Red Wine, Specialty Beer, and specialty snacks were replaced with cheap Corona, white wine and dollar snacks.   The room was freezing and the heat was off. Nothing in the room was ready. The construction going on inside the hotel's main floor has the restaurant all dusty and construction noise was heard at our late dinner after 9pm!  The phone in the sitting room is dead and the number on the phone has a different room number from another floor and it basically doesn't
Manager Response: Dear ArtistMasha,  We are sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At The Waterfront beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. Guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Our Director of Operations and our Front Desk managers have all been provided with a copy of your comments for immediate attention and staff coaching.  Our apologies for any dust or inconvenience as a result of our expansion project (slated for completion in just a few short months). We have been extremely diligent in attempting to do all we can to mitigate anything related to this enhancement. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Hotel was so very nice. Especially room service. Our server, Ari was just wonderful. Set our breakfast on the table. I never get service like that. This hotel has everything you need. Has a few restaurants to choose from and a markett buy what you need. Especially the ocean view was wonderful I recommend highly this hotel!

Good location to relax especially if you like the ocean. Well prepared and trained staff including the restaurant. Views from the rooms all appear great and balconies are large enough to relax on with another person

The staff was very helpful and friendly. Great location. Partial ocean view was great with a balcony. The construction is mildly irritating. But we were up prior to the 8am start so did not really affect us.

Just a beautiful place to stay ... wonderful view. Nice to be back to the pacific ocean. Will stay again sometime in the near future. very comfortable room, great sunset.  It was fun seeing the locals come in early in the morning to surf... brought good old memories.

Beautiful hotel, clean rooms, friendly staff, across the street from the beach. Short walk to a new outdoor mall. Great place to stay for a beach vacation, kind of pricey though, but you get your money's worth.

I've stayed here a few times while on business and have aways enjoyed their friendly service and beautiful grounds.  The hotel has a clear view of the ocean across the Pacific Coast Highway from the wide sandy Huntington Beach.  It is about a 15 minute walk from there to the shops and restaurants by the pier.  There is a large courtyard with a pool and lounge area, and it a short walk across the street to the beach.    The rooms are spacious and many have at least a partial view of the ocean.  My King bedroom had a comfortable bed, a couch, coffee table, desk, drawers and flat screen TV.  A small bar area had a counter and small refrigerator.
