The bathroom counter is very large with a single sink in the middle.  The bathroom includes a tub / shower combination.  The hotel lobby

Yet another great place to spend with my family and friends. From the staff at the front to the front desk everyone was great. This was lur second time at this Hilton. I would recomend to all of my friends and family. Thanks for a great visit to HB.

This was a quick birthday weekend trip for my wife Saturday through Monday. Everyone on the staff was Amazing!!! From first pulling up to the valet, to the front desk staff, to employees in restaurant, to housekeeping. Everyone was amazing and on point with their customer service skills. Even though the place was under renovation we can not wait to come back and see the finished resort.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at the Waterfront
Summary: Great place to stay for both business and vacation travel. I have done both and have always had a great experience. The wife and adult kids are always asking when we can go back to the Waterfront. I am fortunate enough to be able to pick where I am going to stay on business travel and if my travels take me anywhere in a 1.5 hour driving distance to the HB Hilton, that is where I stay. I have  also managed to convince many of my associates to also stay at this property when they are in the area, and all of them have had nothing but great things to say about their stay, including the staff, rooms, and also the great service and quality of the food and the bar at Shades. Keep doing what you are doing and keep taking care of your outstanding staff, they are the folks who make your

Great hotel in a Great location.  Decent Business facilities that we had access to.  Hotel is going through some construction and updates, but  outside of that its a good spot.  on a personal note, they Are DOG FRIENDLY with a very reasonable Pet Fee, which will always  make this our go to hotel when we want to stay with our dogs

Love Staying at the Hilton Huntington Beach Resort. Beautiful hotel, wonderful staff and perfect location with access to the beach and shopping and plenty of restaurants nearby. I look forward to my stay here.

My wife and I decided to do an "us only" Thanksgiving trip to Huntington Beach to get away from the San Francisco Bay Area and enjoy some beach time in Southern California. My wife had never been in the LA area so she was really looking forward to the trip and I was equally excited as I really like the area as well. The hotel was everything you expect a Hilton to be - clean, comfortable, inviting. We were informed ahead of time that the lobby was having renovations but we wouldn't have noticed if they hadn't told us because of the well thought out system and signage in place. The Shades restaurant & bar we found to be quite good and had a couple meals there despite the wide selection of restaurants in the area. The pool must be heated because it wan an extremely comfortable

Summary Heading: Construction can be lame but this team is anything but!
Summary: What a FANTASTIC group of accommodating people. No matter if I am in town for business or visiting family, this hotel is EXCELLENT when it comes to serving their clients. They have a system that allows every person to know what is going on so you don't feel like you have a disconnect in needs or service. Lots of annoying construction...but it didn't bother me a bit. The service was so excellent It far out weighed the minimal construction issues.

Summary Heading: Amazing customer service, knows how to make a customer feel special!
Summary: Thank you Hailey Nelson, Front Desk, for the special birthday wish and gift! My husband and I had just travelled 5 hours in the rain and I was greeted by Hailey who was welcoming with a big smile.  We arrived way before check in time but she found a room that was ready and got us all checked in. We stepped out for lunch and came back to a bottle of champagne and chocolate dipped strawberries and a hand written birthday card! Thank you Hilton for always making me feel like family. While this was a pleasure stay I have stayed over 125 nights with Hilton this year and consistently have a good experience.

Debated where to go over the holiday week.  Considered Hawaii but have to say so glad we chose to go to CA.  Loved this hotel- the service - location and our room.  Dogs were welcome- they were able to go almost everywhere we went. Great food options all in walking distance. Human and dog beach were perfect!

The valet was super welcoming and Danica at the front desk was the sweetest to our puppies as were housekeeping and in room dining. This hotel really likes the pets! And the rooms are extra clean and do not smell like hundreds of pets have been hanging out! Room service was timely,tasty and hot AND delivered with a smile.  We asked for a room to see the pier side of the hotel and it was very pretty. It was at an angle so we couldn't see the water unless we were out on the balcony, but that was clear to us at the time of reservation "partial view." THE other side of hotel is undergoing construction so the view is of the crane and construction mostly.  I grew up in HB and this hotel totally works with the city vibe. It is chill without being slacker!  My 16 year old son thought

Just spent 3 nights at this hotel!  It is centrally located along Pacific Coast Highway and just walking blocks from Pacific City, a shopping area and Main Street with restaurants and shopping opportunities.  The ocean views and  sunsets were stunning from our balcony on the 12th floor!  The service was outstanding from the wonderful concierge, Tammy, to the valet parking team to the manager of the Shades Restaurant to the front desk to the sales team member, Kim who gave us a tour of the hotel.  Every single person was friendly and extremely helpful!  Even with this hotel undergoing a lobby renovation, the hotel areas were beautiful!  The ONLY concern I had was the LACK of CHOICE between self-parking and valet parking.  There is only valet parking at $35 a night.  Otherwise, I

This trip was a honeymoon gift. We cant say enough about the hotel grounds, and location.  We would recommend this hotel to all. They staff was awesome. We would like to thank everyone who made this trip memorable for us

Summary Heading: We Screwed Up, They Made it Right
Summary: Even during renovations these guys are doing a fantastic job, 5 start hotel for certain. My husband and I stayed here while away on business and my husband screwed up and only booked two nights instead of the 3 we needed. On top of that he'd booked an oceanfront room through Priceline but what the website did after confirmation was change it to an "ocean view" room (which we hated and looked out over the pool). We went back down to the front desk and the manager and staff went above and beyond to fix everything for us. Our new room was big, beautiful and clean. Only wish I had was that the bathroom be brighter, the lighting in the sink/mirror area was very low and with no window or available outside light it was hard to get ready in that space. Fabulous hotel though, highly

Summary Heading: Great hotel just don't park there
Summary: This hotel was located with great access to the beach and the room and facilities were first class.  To my surprise when I arrived, I had to pay $34 per night for valet parking.  There are no options to park anywhere else and it certainly wasn't advertised.
Manager Response: Dear Paul D.,  Thank you for your kind words and recent review. We're so glad you had a good time with us here at the beach! Our apologies for any misunderstanding regarding our "valet only" services. This information is located on all our websites, booking engines, and confirmation letters. We do our best to make certain that every guest is aware that at the beach, for any hotel (not just ours), there are no self parking options nearby. We are extremely limited on space for visitors vehicles and unfortunately the only solution to manage parking (and thus making sure you always have a spot) is to be "valet only". This is often the case in popular tourism destinations as well as any major city hotel who must balance the needs of residents and visitors alike. Again, we're very sorry that information seemed obscured in any way. That would never be our intention. We look forward to your return! Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We had a great stay here! The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. The balcony and ocean view were bonuses. The check in by phone was easy and we loved that we could pick a room even though we were still traveling through California to get there. The staff was amazingly friendly and welcoming. I will be staying here again!

Summary Heading: Only place I stay in HB
Summary: I have stayed at the Hilton a number of times on business and am always very happy with the property, the staff and the meals. Very friendly service, great location. Currently renovating the lobby but check in area is reorganized and very workable. Will be back for another business trip in 2 months and looking forward to seeing the new lobby.

Despite hotel being refurbed, didn't detract from pool and restaurant area. Fire-pits great to sit around and food at tables served well and enjoyable. Hotel recognised my wife's 'significant' birthday which was great surprise and made her day!  We had a beach view. but be aware there is highway between the hotel and the beach. Would return.

Once we checked in it was like we decompressed.  They are under construction so it's a bit awkward bit not much of a hassle.   The room was perfect, nice size with a small couch, nice desk, small balcony that over looked the pool and beach, and an ok sized bathroom.  It was great for the two of us.  We hit the pool first thing.  Great pool, nice design.  We ordered lunch pool side, a couple of sandwiches that were great and a couple beers and cocktails.  The service was very good. We stopped by the lounge late night and had drinks by the fire pit and that was perfect and we had breakfast there the next day.  They did a great job with breakfast, lots of choices and a buffet.  We also had drinks that night outside and the service was very good. The location is spot on, right next

The Waterfront has an excellent location right across from the beach. The valet and front desk were attentive and courteous. The room was spacious, clean and with a nice view. The restaurant served a good breakfast but service was strange...after serving me, no one ever returned, not even to give me a bill! Currently there is construction inside the Hilton which impeded the check-in process and there's also a new hotel being built next door. The early morning construction noise interrupted my sleep.  Overall a good hotel with great location albeit with opportunity to improve service in the restaurant. The construction is intrusive but temporary.
Manager Response: Dear Q3506EEjoes,  Thank you for your review. We will notify our restaurant management team of your comments and remind them all of service standards. Our apologies for the construction noise in our main lobby. That, for us, was the most painful phase of our expansion project to date. We are very sensitive to our guests needs and therefore bar any work indoors or out before 8:00am or after 5:00pm, and never on weekends. We are very close to going completely silent as the new tower has now been topped-out and will be readied for its summer debut. We can't wait to show you!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Arrived here after long 2700 mile road trip The hotel was in a stunning location just across from a fabulous beach. The rooms were lovely ours on a high floor with a balcony overlooking the pool/garden area and the beach and sea. Some of the rooms looked over a building site so beware! We did not eat in the hotel as there were lots of restaurants within easy walking distance. The reception and concierge were extremely helpful to ensure you got the best out of your stay. Poll was lovely but only afternoon as it was in the shade in the morning, hot pool was glorious, only complaint had to go hunt the pool towels as no staff around. Would definately stay here again.

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay, with a nice view, amenities and good proximity to local attractions.
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 2 nights over the Veteran's Day long weekend.  There are renovations going on in the lobby which made the hotel feel a touch smaller than it is at first.  However once you walk around or view the premises from your balcony you can see that it still has plenty to offer.  At roughly $300 per night I thought this was about fair for what you get.  Maybe a little more than I'd like to spend but the room was nice and the service was great.  Overall, I'd likely stay here again if I am in the area.

I stayed for my friends 50th and we had an amazing room and view. The management and staff were amazing. We received champagne and yummy treats. And we had brunch the next morning,which is my favorite brunch ever. Thank You Waterfront Hilton for always making it so special when I stay there. :-)

Summary Heading: Don't use digital key at this hotel
Summary: Their system "often" can not handle both digital key (use your mobile app to open door) and traditional key access.  I was out jogging at the beautiful Huntington Beach across the street from the hotel when my wife got locked out of her room only having traditional keys.  Front office reaction was "this happens often when you use digital keys so just have her come down (again) and we will reissue her key".  This also broke my keys so had to make another trip downstairs later. My reaction was if this technology does not work, you need to warn us NOT to use digital keys OR fix it, and not blame it on the customer.   Also, this hotel is a mess around the lobby with the construction.  You have no option but to use the $35/night valet parking that takes forever to retrieve your car.
Manager Response: Dear Takao I,  Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Our sincere apologies for any inconvenience and also the poor choice of explanation by our Front Desk staff with regards to the new digital key system. We shall have our engineering and IT crews investigate the problem and look for an immediate solution. Simply stated, this should not be happening and we'll get on this right away.  We apologize for the construction now happening in our lobby area and we have done all we can to mitigate the disruption. We have built special "guest protected" alternative routes and dust/sound walls around the work which, when completed in just a few short months, will connect our current property to our all new tower and event space. Notices of all current and upcoming construction impacts are posted on our websites in our ongoing effort to be as up-to-date and transparent as possible.  Thank you for being our guest during this time and we look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: If sunsets over the ocean are your thing, this is the place for you ... but you must book a room with an ocean view.  Even though the hotel is being renovated and expanded the staff and amenities are still quite good.  Although the restaurant wait staff seems somewhat indifferent, the setting is lovely.  Corner suites are the best.

location was good, many things to enjoy. Hotel amenities were pricey versus outside the hotel. Definitely bettter value food and drink in establishments near by. Hilton Honors program is not near as good as it was just 2 years back. Sort of getting to be like the frequent flier programs, very hard to get an upgrade.

Great room with balcony facing the beach, great sunsets, great service, the valet service was excellent. The only thing that could be better was the food but there are many choices in restaurants nearby.

Summary Heading: Amazing views for my birthday trip
Summary: The staff is great, Ramil especially is so nice. He offered helpful information about things we might be interested in. The views are unbeatable. The hotel offers many amenities. Hotel is in clean and good condition.

The hotel was under construction but other than when we were walking around the main level in the hall you wouldn’t know it.  The new wing won’t be open until June 2017 but the current rooms are nice with good views for the most part.  If you can get a room on one of the upper floors 7-12 any of those have a great view.  If you get a room level 1-5 get a room farthest away from the street due to noise and the hotel has tall palm trees that block your view in the first 5 rooms closest to the street.  We were on the 12th floor and had a great view of the surfers.  The restaurant is limited on choices but is really good and has average prices.   You are only 2 blocks to downtown restaurants, shopping and the beach is right across the street.  No hotels are on the beach in

the Huntington Beach Hilton is ideally located across from the beach and just a short walk to the pier and downtown. The views from the hotel are great. Very relaxing place to return to after a day of work or play. The valets are the best on the Huntington Beach Strand!

This hotel is right across the street from the beach.  Very easy walk to town and the pier. They are currently remodeling the lobby but really wasn't a issue.  All the staff was very friendly.  They have a little store that has starbucks. They have a free shuttle to town if you don't want to walk.

Summary Heading: Come for the view, stay for the service and convenience!
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a couple days prior to a wedding in La Jolla.  Huntington Beach is a beautiful place to stay, but close enough to drive into LA, Santa Cruz, etc. for day trips.  It was nice, after a long day of sightseeing and driving (or sitting in traffic), to come back to the view and convenience of this hotel.  I travel a lot for business, but this hotels management has top notch service figured out!  Restaurant food was excellent and this hotel is within walking distance of shopping and other restaurants if you are here for several nights.  Can't beat the view of the sunset either.

Summary Heading: Very good value and fantastic views
Summary: One of the best locations. Even with renovation underway, was great place with access to everything. Front desk was outstanding and extremely friendly, meeting space was very good and banquet staff was super.

I took my mom here on a mother-daughter trip back in September and we stayed here a week. We were looking for a place to stay that was close to Disneyland, but on the coast. This was the perfect selection. Two days out of our week we went to Disneyland and then the rest of the week we visited Dana Point, Laguna Beach, Los Angeles, and more! The hotel was in the perfect location to do so many things just a short Lyft away. We chose to fly in and then use Lyft or Uber everywhere and that was such a good choice. The locals knew all the cool spots!   Room:  We stayed in a 2 Double Beds Ocean View Room on the top floor facing the Huntington Beach Pier. We had an incredible view of the sunset over the ocean every evening and a view of the hills inland, when the fog cleared away.

The pool and facilities are beautiful and the staff was wonderful. We had a great view from our room and enjoyed morning walks on the beach. Unfortunately the property is under construction (which we were warned about when booking) so getting around wasn't always easy. It was also extremely loud during the day so there was really no way to enjoy the room from 8-5. Our biggest disappointment was how well we could hear our next door neighbors, especially when they kept the party going until the early morning hours.
Manager Response: Dear Faith M.,   I appreciate your review of your recent experience at our hotel. I'm very sorry you had a disappointing experience with us, and I addressed these issues with our construction teams in order to mitigate sound in-so-much as they can at every turn. Unfortunately, we are unable to remain completely silent during the lobby demo and "new" building connection phase of the project, however we are nearing completion of this portion of this work. Exceptional guest service and your satisfaction is the foundation of our brand promise. Your feedback helps us improve. Thank you once again for your comments and we apologize.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Everything you need with nice beds & good TVs in room. Feels a bit dated in places, and not sure the renovations happening will actually address this at an individual room level . Right overlooking the beach with some great views but a little walk to get to HB centre and pier. Hire bikes direct from the hotel which was useful & fun!

I honestly can't speak highly enough about the staff. Upon arrival after hours of driving we were greeted by valet. They were amazing the entire trip. Sam, Rodney and the rest of valet shuttled us around. They were incredibly friendly and accommodating. They went above and beyond for us and I am very grateful. Brunch was phenomenal. The poolside was gourgoues and our server Milia was outstanding. Beautiful room and gourgoues hotel. This was a birthday trip and the staff made it amazing. Best birthday ever. We look forward to coming back.

This is one of my favorite hotels. Good  food, prices, night drinks at the fire pit watching the waves, on-sight starbucks for a nice walk on the beach.  The employees are vary helpful. They have a shuttle to Main Street. It's a all around good experience, with great rooms! My relatives and friends love to come hang out with me when I stay here

You will really love the hotel and the staff.   You are only a rock throw from getting to the beach.  The food was worth staying and eating there.  The pool and hot tub were exceptionally clean.  Great valet service as well.

Summary Heading: pleasant but pricey conference property across PCH from beach
Summary: Rooms are fine - only 1 outlet at desk meaning plugging in phone and computer at the same time can't happen. Bathrooms were clean - but dated. Closet can't hold 2 roller bags plus shoes on the floor.  Staff is pleasant.  On site parking ($36) is Valet only - or park blocks away.

Summary Heading: Lovely stay on the ocean in southern California
Summary: Waterfront Resort was a lovely hotel in a very nice location. I would recommend this hotel for a very satisfying stay in beautiful California. The Air Show that happened to be taking place at the time of our visit was also an added attraction for our family with half of us in the airline industry - pilot, flight attendant and airport manager. The nearby restaurants and shops were also very nice.

We stayed here for 2 nights prior to a Carnival Cruise out of Long Beach! We absolutely loved it! We had a beautiful room over looking the pool area and we also had a great view of the beach and could see the pier in the distance. Our room was very clean and the hotel had great customer service. The hotel is under renovation, but it didn't bother us at all! We had a wonderful stay and will definitely be returning when in the Huntington Beach area again!

I love this hotel.  It's situated with fantastic views of the Pacific in Huntington Beach and walking distance to Main St.  We were here for the Breitling Air Show along with a few 100 thousand other people.  The hotel was sold out yet at check in there was only one attendant at the front desk.  And poolside service for about 100 guests waited for ONE waitress to serve food & drinks.  Plus there was a wedding scheduled at the hotel poolside.  I think someone miscalculated occupancy!

The restaurant manager,  Ryan [--] did not understand customer service.  We had a group of 12 but he had more concern for 2 people at the bar versus us.  Most of us are platinum or gold members.  He probably needs to better understand how business works.  Our server Tony was not helpful either.  He was more concerned with other smaller tables.  Francisco was great
Manager Response: Dear ScottyMo510,  Thank you for expressing your concerns. We're very sorry that you were displeased with service provided by our staff. We will address this at our daily management briefing. Our apologies.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We decided to book a one night staycation while I was visiting family in the OC. Looked online and wanted an ocean front hotel. Decided on The Waterfront Beach hotel by Hilton. Booked a room the same day as check in with the hotel directly. Expedia said it was sold out. The room was nice, clean and comfortable. We got a partial ocean view for well over $300 for the night. Valet parking is extra in addition to the room rate. Hotel employees very nice and friendly - quick service and professional. Pool was nice but we did not use it. The hotel shuttle was the best part for us. It operates every hour on the hour which we used and liked a lot. The new shopping area is amazing, great atmosphere which is a major convenience and also waking across the street to get to the beach was

I was misled when I booked my room.  I booked a room with the resort pool area view. Instead I got a room facing the construction site of which was not even noted on the Hilton website where I booked the room.  I often booked with Expedia but because I want to get a better service and better room when I arrive, I booked directly with the Hilton.  That was a mistake.  Expedia booking would've cost less in fact.  There were different room options when I booked and they are different rates based on the view.  There was a notice that the lobby will be undergoing construction starting October 24.  That did not bother me since I would be gone by then, there was not notice of the huge construction which again was directly in front of the balcony.  When I asked about why I did not get
Manager Response: Dear FunTravls,  Thank you for your recent review. Upon seeing this we tried our best to establish your identity and reach out to your personally (which can be hard via a screen name on TripAdvisor). I can assure you that with our lowest price guarantee via our Hilton website, you will not get a better price anywhere else on the web. In fact, it will also protect any upgrade potential and additional benefits afforded to our Hilton Hhonors guests (including FREE WiFi). Our sincere apologies for any miscommunication or inability to honor your request of a room upgrade while we were sold out. We will soon be done wit our construction and welcome the opportunity to have you back for an outstanding stay very soon.  Sincerely,   Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: this is the 6th time my dog Jesse & I have visited here this year.  The staff is always so friendly/professional and tend to every need.  And they always treat Jesse like Royalty!  We love going to dog beach everyday (which is a short mile or so up PCH) Special thanks to Austin, Anthony, Brad & Samuel who were there for us this trip.  We feel like they're our friends!

Summary Heading: Although with minus points a good stay overall
Summary: This hotel is a really nice one, if it was not for the construction. You don´t feel the construction at all if you are staying at the right side of the building, the north side.  I had booked an ocean view room, and I´m a diamond member of Hilton Honors. We were put at the construction side, very noisy in the morning and one could not possibly sit at the balcony. They told me there are so many diamonds staying at this hotel that no upgrade is possible. I pointed out, that this was not a case of an upgrade, the rooms are of same price north and south side! The next morning I was promised a room at the 9th floor on the non-construction side. Our stay would be for seven nights!. We were asked to check out and check in again at 4 pm. Since we already were there, I insisted of

Originally booked into room overlooking the building site though we asked for another as we were there for 3 days which they did without a problem to a lovely room overlooking the pool  ~  food was lovely and service very attentive without being intrusive  ~ utterly exhausted following 16 days touring around California but sorry to leave would certainly like to return

Room was not available at check in 12:00 noon. Our upgrade to a suite was not noted and a suite was not available.  We were promised a high level floor with ocean view, received lower floor with construction view.  Noisy doors and hallway kept us from sleeping all night. prepaid valet charges by the wedding party were not refunded.  The hotel have no self parking facility, leaves you no other options.
Manager Response: Dear ruthsR9382SM,  Thank you for your recent review. Our apologies for the challenges you encountered during your stay. We understand you have been in direct contact with the hotel and this matter has been brought to the attention of senior management for resolution. While our stated check-in time is 4:00pm, we make every effort to expedite our guests to their rooms as soon as they are ready. Our apologies we were not able to accommodate and earlier check-in for the room you requested. Our mission is your complete satisfaction while here at The Waterfront and we shall do all we can to resolve this matter promptly.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Our dog loved the Waterfront Hilton.
Summary: Since we had to leave our house in Huntington Beach while it was being fumigated, we chose to stay at the Waterfront Hilton, because it is a dog- friendly hotel. The hotel staff made the stay with our dog perfect.

We are staying in an ocean view room and love everything about it with one exception. Although smoking is prohibited there is someone smoking on the balcony near us. I did not report it as it impossible to say if it is above or below us. Other than that, the view is amazing and the staff very helpful. One suggestion would be to please put in a handicapped ramp! It is difficult to get to street level.

Wonderful customer service and convenient t everything! We were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go in HB. There is a new shopping center less than a quarter mile away that offers places to eat and watch the sunset. We stayed on the 5th floor and had a nice view of the pool area and beach. The staff was very friendly and always willing to answer any questions and offer suggestions. They are about to start renovations that will be completed in 2017, and we hope to be back soon afterwards!

Our four night stay was very pleasant, especially due to the wonderful service. My daughter was crying in the lobby (just from being tired and hungry) and an employee brought out a bag of waters, chocolate bars and hot chocolate which is her favorite. It was so thoughtful. There is construction to the south of the hotel which is only during weekday hours which I knew about in advance. They were very open and clear about it throughout the booking process.  Fun location and beds were comfortable

Superb all round hotel where the service and the team that work there are excellent. A special mention for Tammy who made us both feel very welcome & special so thank you Tammy.  A hotel I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a beach resort holiday.

Classy, clean,centrally located and many features. The staff always does its best to accommodate each and every need. I have never been disappointed by any situation at this location. From top to bottom Mgmt to Room service everyone has the same goal. their goal is to make the experience special.

Rooms were great, had a balcony and could see the beach.  Conference rooms were nice too; was able to see the waves crashing on the beach as I sat in my conference!  I would recommend this hotel for business or pleasure!

We booked the Hilton in Huntington Beach for the location between Newport and not too far from LA.  We loved the new Pacific City mall right next door what a great spot for shopping and food.  This is a great hotel for families that want to explore the coast and have a great home base.

We loved the Beachfront Resort. The staff was amazing and took excellent care of all of our needs. They were even able to provide adjoining rooms for our family with hypoallergenic bedding. Thank you for a fantastic stay!

Great location. Rooms somewhat dated but nice. Workout area small but adequate. Rooms are clean. Ocean view rooms directly face ocean- but can't see ocean at night from the balcony. Close to Main Street . Walking distance not bad

Summary Heading: Fantastic Service made all the difference
Summary: There are many great hotel and convention venues out there.  This property was very nice and of course the Pacific Ocean view doesn't hurt.    The staff and service makes all the difference here.  Throughout our convention, in the evening venues like Shades or veranda pool side, and trough out, the people made good great. It was a flawless, friendly and stress free visit.

We stayed here 3 nights to chill out following a coach tour of California, Arizona and Nevada. The hotel facilities are First class and the Restaurant serves good food although slightly expensive. The hotel is located at the end of the developed area with a good choice of other restaurants and plenty of shops nearby. There is a large building extension in progress necxt to the hotel and our First night was disturbed by late evening and early morning building noise. We requested a move which was provided efficiently and quickly by the front desk staff with no further noise problems.
Manager Response: Dear BrianMellor,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how we are doing and where we might improve. Our apologies for any disturbances you experienced during your stay. We are relieved you were satisfied with our solution and were able to enjoy the rest of your stay with us. We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Location, location, location!  You can walk to restaurants, shopping, and you're right across the PCH from the beach.   Pool was heated very nicely. Lovely views from our kind suite corner room.   Suite was large, we used a pull out and rollaway - we actually set the rollaway up in the hallway to the suite as there was no other place it would fit.   Only negative: the mattresses overall.  Sofa bed mattress was atrocious, my young daughters were on it and managed but I think and adult would be feeling it in the morning.  King bed mattress was so-so, not melt into and drift away Hilton standards by any stretch.  Breakfast was excellent! Service impeccable from every staff member we encountered.  California is a big trip for our family (from PA)...but after falling in love with
Manager Response: Dear W9282HPmarkd,  Thank you very much for your review. As a result, we have dispatched our housekeeping inspectors to the room you stayed in to inspect and/or replace the mattresses in question. We rely on reports like your to assist us in perfecting our rooms and your experience, so thank you!  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: My wife and I stayed 4 days at this property in Huntington Beach and were very pleased. The location is wonderful, at the beach with many restaurants and shops within easy distance. The staff (front desk, valet parking, restaurant, etc) were friendly and helpful professionals. The hotel is beautiful, clean and well maintained. Our King OceanFront room was good. It was neat, modern, clean and had two balconies that faced the ocean and beach across the street. The only real complaint is that our room 628 has large palm tree tops outside our balcony which limited the view unfortunately. I asked for a higher floor but was told none were available. I definitely recommend the OceanFront room BUT above the 6th floor. The hotel restaurant, Shades, was top notch, with an excellent
Manager Response: Dear Ronald K,  Thank you so much for your kind words, we'll be sure to share them with our staff. Your last sentence jumped out at out at us, "All in all it is a wonderful property, and while it is not inexpensive, it is worth it in our opinion". It reminded each and every one of us why we do what we do and we just wanted to be certain you know how much we value you too... to us, YOU make what we do "worth it".  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: A beautiful spot and a great hotel!
Summary: We spent one night here in September before heading to Disneyland.  We are from the east coast and it was our children's first time at the Pacific ocean.  We loved that we could walk across the street to the beach and the sunset was amazing.  The kids loved the pool and the view from our room was wonderful.  We had breakfast in the hotel in the am and it was good too!  A great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Jessica W,  Thank you so much for your kind words... we really appreciate it! We look forward to having you and the kids back next year and really giving them the thrill of a lifetime with our new pool and waterslides. You might just wanna skip Disney for your next visit! ;-)  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: As an anniversary present for couples who wed at this hotel, you get to enjoy an anniversary suite for $100. MY husband and I took advantage of that offer this weekend and it brought back so many happy memories. Its a very nice touch for the newlyweds and the hotel is still as gorgeous as it was the day we got married!
Manager Response: Dear Derek B,  First up... HAPPY ANNIVERSARY!!! We are so glad you took advantage of your special gift and came back to stay with us. We always love seeing our couples again (and spoiling them all over again). Congratulations (again!) and we'll see you soon.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Stayed here recently for three nights with my husband at the end of  a west coast tour with Titan travel and loved every minute. Only wished we could have stayed longer. Lovely spacious room containing every you need for your stay. The hotel is in an excellent position not far from the pier and in easy reach of the many bars and restaurants Huntington Beach has to offer. Fantastic beach just across the highway. This was our first time visiting  California and  we couldn't have chosen a better place to stay for our last few days. I can not fault anything about the hotel. Even though there was construction work going on this did not bother us,  after all it has to be done at some time. Thank you for a lovely stay and hope to return in the future.

My biggest peeve with some of the Hilton properties is the bathroom. little or no room to move around and a shower in a tub. honestly, who uses a tub in a hotel room? get rid of them and have a walk in.   The location is awesome, but the room was only average. I have been in many better Hilton rooms, not such a big deal but the room does not line up with the $300 per day (on Hhonors discount) price tag.  The staff was exceptional, especially the youngsters manning the valet service.
Manager Response: Dear Lenn M,  Our gratitude for taking the time to write this review. We appreciate and understand some of the limitations a standard room has to offer, which is exactly why we are building the all new "suites-centric" tower to the south of us (opening June of 2017). More options, more rooms, more space...and yes, even bigger bathrooms...enjoy!   We look forward to your return...prepare to be impressed!   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay close to Huntington Pier
Summary: Very nice property. Rooms are nicely decorated and they all have a balcony with at least a partial view of the ocean. We ate breakfast by the pool. The area is very nice, but the breakfast buffet needs improvement. Not much to chose from and most of it lacked flavor. Definitely not worth the price.
Manager Response: Dear adrianausa,  Thank you for your comments, we really appreciate that. We will share your observations with our culinary team and discuss how we might improve upon the breakfast buffet experience. Your opinion matters here at The Waterfront!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The location is amazing. Lots to do nearby. Very clean room and bathroom. Excellent food and service while there. Friendly and helpful in the pool area. This includes needing beach supplies for heading to the beach, which is only right across the street. Beautiful hotel and breathtaking views!
Manager Response: Dear gregf101,  O behalf of our staff, thank you so much for choosing The Waterfront. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your rapid return.  Cheers,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Stayed here for the Williams wedding. This is a beautiful hotel right across the street from the beach. Right from the moment you get here till we left, the customer service was excellent! Everyone was friendly and courteous. Our room was great with a view of the ocean. The beds were comfortable.  The catering staff was right on! Always willing to help. I was the officiant for the wedding and my wife was the event coordinator. The set up of the wedding ceremony was perfect and the room for the reception was awesome!  The pool area was very nice and it overlooked the ocean. The bar and bartenders were quick and kind.  It is also close to Main Street. Approx 2 blocks where there are shops and places to eat! I would defiantly recommend this hotel to future brides and grooms. Or to
Manager Response: Dear SteveLalaE,  Thank you for your very kind words... we will relay them to the Waterfront's catering and banquets teams. You made our day!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Stay was amazing. Staff was awesome and the beach is right there. Best place to stay done there. We were here for my best friends wedding and it was beautiful. The ceremony was by the pool with the beach in the back ground. Food was amazing and drinks were reasonable
Manager Response: Dear C6750VFstephaniem,  We are so pleased you had a wonderful time... thank you for your review!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Not friendly staff and the room was dated and was muggy and smelled of mildue. Paint was peeling on ceiling and bellman are standing around yet took forever to help with bags so we carried them ourselves!
Manager Response: Dear Vijay R,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We also received your response and information routed through the Hilton website. We have identified and repaired your room (which, unknown to us, was caused by a guest above you. We thank you for alerting us!  We're not sure what happened with your luggage issue and will address this with both our valets and bellmen. Unless refused, they never miss an opportunity to assist a guest and perhaps earn a tip, so this is somewhat perplexing.  Again, our sincere apologies.  Regards,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We were lucky enough to stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort for 3 nights on our recent holiday. Our room offered views from our balcony over the pool and out to the beach and pier and was comfortable, spacious and modern. Every member of staff seemed genuinely happy to help, especially the guys at Valet and staff by the pool. During our stay we went to the baseball and Garth Brooks concert and the hotel is within easy reach of Anaheim where these events were held, as well as being within easy walking distance of the pier and shops. We highly recommend The Waterfront Hilton.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. I will make sure to pass your kind words on to the entire team, especially the valet and pool attendants. We look forward to seeing you again soon!   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Good rooms, some good views, not much bother from the construction, good access to beach for AM run.  One meal on arrival, satisfying.  Catering at meeting, superb. Good stay.  Would recommend for follow up meetings.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We look forward to hosting your meetings in the future. Take care and hope to see you soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Don't waste your money unless you like dirty overpriced rooms
Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel on 9/15/2016. We had initially planned to stay for a couple of days but could only handle 1 night. We stayed in room 326 an Ocean Front King 1 Bedroom Suite at a cost of $428.40 a night.  The room was well worn and had clearly not been maintained. The floors/grout was very dirty - Corners of the room were very dirty and you could tell had not been cleaned for a long. The light colored grout was now black in most places. There are rust marks on the ceiling, the air handler to the room was covered dust and dirt, same with the light switches. The fire sprinklers are rusted in place, good thing a fire didn't break out. The bed appeared to be clean but on a king bed only 4 standard pillows were supplied not a huge deal but seems odd for a 4-star
Manager Response: Dear Mark487237,  First, thank you for complete and detailed review. While this is not what we like to see, sometimes the unvarnished truth needs to be told and for that, we thank you. Our sincere apologies for your experience with us during your stay.   We have taken the room out of service for a complete inspection by our Director of Housekeeping and General Manager. Further, we will continue to reach out to you for a response so that we may resolve this issue in person. Your opinion and satisfaction is our driving goal and we intend to "Make It Right" in every way we can.  Again, we are truly sorry and will continue to reach out to you until this is resolved.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Personnel very helpful. Tried to convince me that a first floor room overlooking the new construction was a great deal at $340.00 per night and the queen double was much better than the King I had reserved.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I am happy to hear the front desk was so candid and helpful with our room locations. We look forward to seeing you again!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is the best location in Huntington Beach.  It is modern, clean, and fun, with a super friendly, helpful staff. We did a small group meeting here, and everyone loved it.  In addition to the hotel itself, there are lots of great shops and restaurants in the surrounding area, and watching the sunset from your hotel balcony is the best.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! We are so thrilled to see the meeting went well and it sounds like you had time to explore the area.   We look forward to seeing you again soon, hopefully for fun this time!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at Waterfront Beach Resort
Summary: Wonderful 3 day stay. Thanks to Kim McCallum at Guest Services for wonderful suite upgrade. The room was spotless, and the views were fabulous. Service was fantastic from start with Ramil at bell service to food and beverage service throughout the stay. Hayley at pool services was fantastic. Best service we have ever experienced at a hotel (and we travel a lot). Thanks go out to all at the Hilton Waterfront Beach Hotel
Manager Response: Dear goblue1055,  Thank you for your recent review. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and I will be sure to share your kind words with Ramil, Kim, Hayley and the rest of our entire Waterfront staff. It will mean a lot to all who live to make your stay the best it can be at all times.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This place is under construction and they don't tell you when booking! (At least not back in late July when booked) Also, we got the added pleasure of a house keeping no show during our stay. I would recommend the Hyatt (still close to construction but not next to your room) and the brand new Pasea.  They should be done with construction in Fall of 17'
Manager Response: Dear Brad S,  Thank you for your recent review. We're very sorry for any missed communication about our expansion and enhancement project prior to your arrival. Our goal and mission has been to fully disclose and be transparent about anything related to our expansion next door. We have been diligently putting this information (including progress reports) in the hands of all of our in-house reservation agents, on our booking website, in confirmation letters once booked and on social media (including a very popular contest featuring our new build). We also have been as accommodating as possible to any guest concerns should they be brought to our attention. Our sincere apologies that even through all of these measures we did not reach you. And, just to confirm that you are correct, our stunning transformation will be complete on our south side in June 2017.  Additionally, we apologize for your housekeeping delay. Our house reports indicate a "Do Not Disturb" tag for your room at the time of service. While our housekeeping department is extremely sensitive to a "DND" tag, never hesitate to call us should you ever need your room serviced (anytime of the day or night. Our mission is your complete satisfaction and obviously we missed the mark here for you. Again, please accept our sincere apologies.   Our Director of Guest Experience will be reaching out to you personally to discuss this matter further and we hope that we will be able to resolve this issue to your satisfaction. Please be on the lookout for that call or email.  Very sincerely yours,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: We had six nights here and found everything very comfortable, clean and well run.  We had an 'ocean view' room on the tenth floor on the southern side of the building which meant we had a good view of all the construction going on to expand the scope and size of the hotel.  We could certainly see the ocean, but as the construction goes on, be aware that the scope of the view will be restricted.  A north-facing room will give you a clear view of the ocean and the pier.  With this caveat, recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Next time you stay here, let me know. I will do my best to keep you in a room away from the construction area.   Have a great weekend!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Thank you Waterfront for an awesome trip! Staff was very courteous and friendly. The view was the room was wonderful and location next to the big clean beach was great. Perfect proximity to restaurants within walking distance. Loved it! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Amanda B,  Thank you for staying with us and your very kind words! We look forward to your return.  All the best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: IT was nice to get away.. Our room faced the construction sight which we knew nothing about.. It was suppose to be facing the beach or have a beach view.. But it was a all Construction and a small corner view of the beachi
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the details of your experience with us. I apologize for the construction view outside your room. We are getting ready to expand into a bigger and better full service resort. But before we get there we are going through some mess and disturbance. Next time you stay with us, reach out to me directly. I can help make sure you are assigned to a room facing away from the new tower.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My new hubby and I stayed here our wedding night and had a really bad experience (see my previous review) but the Director reached out to me personally and offered a free night to "make up" for our previous stay.  My husband and I decided to take her up on her offer and we stayed one night this past weekend.  When checking in, we were given 2 breakfast vouchers which was a very nice surprise....we were really just expecting the free night.  We had a great room on the 12th floor with a beautiful view of the ocean/HB.  There was also a bottle of champagne waiting for us on ice along with some fruit & crackers - a very nice touch as we were celebrating our anniversary!!  The room was very clean and modern.  The bed was comfortable and the shower was great.  I honestly feel like
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. I am glad we were able to make up for your honeymoon and hope you and your new husband enjoyed your visit. I will also make sure to pass this along to Megan.   Congratulations again on your marriage and let me know next time you want to get away for a weekend.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: The hotel is very nice. However, be aware that there is a major construction project going on at the south side of the hotel It is very noisy and can easily be heard in the room and it is too loud to go out on the balcony. I was disappointed to find out the room is the same rate as the rooms on the "quiet" side. If you have to stay here insist on a room on the north side.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and Happy Anniversary! I apologize for our noisy construction. We are going through some growing pains, but once this tower is done, we will have a brand new, beautiful resort. Reach out to me directly, I will make sure you are placed in a quiet room away from the construction.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: My favorite place in Orange County
Summary: Been staying here for 8+ years, sometimes up to 100 nights a year.  THE BEST. Friendly, caring, helpful AWESOME staff goes the extra mile every single time.  Wont stay anywhere else as long as there is a room for me there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words. It means a lot to us to be your favorite in Orange County, especially knowing how much competition we have lately.   There will always be a room for you!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Superb hotel with three minor niggles hence 4 stars, not 5
Summary: We booked a 6 night stay in a king deluxe room with sea view. Our expectations were high and we were a bit nervous based on some reviews but pleasingly we were totally delighted. Stunning room, superb sea view and a great location, staff were all extremely friendly and the food in the restaurant was sublime.  On the minus side and why we haven't given 5 stars, they are building a huge extension next door. This was an unwelcome surprise. In fairness there was no obvious noise but it is unsightly.  Second, the valet parking charge of 34.95 per day is absurd. The valet manager told us the hotel was "the cheapest on the strip" but that didn't help us feel better. Come on guys this is a rip off on top of premium hotel prices. In fairness the valet staff were without exception
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! I apologize for the issues you encountered. We are going through some growing pains with our construction. You will have to come back and visit once everything is complete. Thanks again and have a great weekend!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: The location is one of the best things about the Hotel and Joseph Bower our contact was really helpful. The hotel is a tired old Hilton you can find worldwide but not good enough in 2016. The same old ridculous phone systems, very poorly enabled technology wise and expensive charges. Facilities are poor. Nice staff but much better hotels nearby with the Pasea and Hyatt. The Hilton is 3rd rate but the staff are great and try hard although they have a difficult product to sell. Its just worn and due for an update which hopefully will sort things out.
Manager Response: Dear Ian C H,  Thank you for your recent review. As you no doubt noticed, we are well underway with our expansion and updates that will knock your socks off! The hard part is the getting there, but the best part... that staff you mentioned (with such kind and glowing words) will be kept in place and can't wait to share all that's going to be new upon your return. Please come back soon... and be watching our websites from the grand unveiling of our new and very modern hotel!  Best wishes,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Really Mixed Experience, Avoid Until Construction Completed
Summary: Terrific location, right across from the beach and near the Huntington Beach pier.  But... new tower is under construction which has had a significant impact on noise and views. Only the even numbered rooms look away from the construction zone, the rest (especially lower floors) have a "great" view of the all-day activity.   The biggest issue is that service is very mixed. Problems at check-in, problems at check-out, can't find stored luggage, long waits for valet parking, and on and on. Why should the supervisor have a debate with a front desk employee about when to take a required lunch break, while the customer waits for service?  Stayed here several times recently because my employer chose the hotel, but I wouldn't pick it on my own. Hopefully things will improve when the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. I am embarrassed to hear of the services you received. As we go through this major expansion project, we need to fine tune and focus on every detail. I sincerely apologize we were slow to help in a number of areas. Please know I will forward your feedback on to the entire hotel to help us train and learn.   Thank you again for this invaluable feedback, it will most certainly be put to good use. Next time you are in town, let me know if you need anything at all.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: During my teen years, we spent at least 1 day a week at Huntington Beach.  I live within an hour of Huntington, but with the traffic we now have vs. back in the 70's an overnight stay is in order.  Back then we didn't have any hotels lining the opposite side of PCH - just oil rigs and cottages.    We often lament the loss of simplicity to our beach areas, but I think the addition of the new hotels on the opposite side of PCH are an improvement.  We enjoyed our 2 day stay and loved the hotel.  We easily walked across the road to the beach.  The pier and main street are an easy walk of maybe 1/2 mile.  The hotel is beautiful and the pool area looks out over the beach.  We had a garden room, but the courtyard faces the beach so we thought it was great.  The best part of our stay
Manager Response: Next time you want to reminisce in your old neighborhood, we would be honored to have you as a guest again. Thank you for the great review, we are happy to see everything went well. We look forward to these annual staycations, take care!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Rooms were ok in quality. Could use a refreshment of rooms soon. Pool was nice and all staff was friendly. Great location in regards to Main Street and the beach. Overall I would come back to this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are so happy to see you could get away and relax for a couple days. We are in the process of building a new tower with 150 new rooms and renovating our current tower. The new tower will be done next Summer, so you will have to come back to check out the new rooms.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Fantastic location and the staff is wonderful.
Summary: We had a very nice stay ,they are building next door and the noise was a bit loud however the hours they worked were accomadating. The location of this hotel is wonderful and the beach view is amazing. The bartender and the valet young men offered some of the best service I have ever seen.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the details of your stay with us. I am happy to see the construction was not too disruptive during your visit. You will have to come back and check out the new rooms next summer.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: The hotel is in a great location, directly across the street from Huntington Beach. Easy access to the beach and Boardwalk  The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Nice clean rooms. The valet parking was a little expensive, but convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. Happy to see you enjoyed your stay and the area. We hope to see you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We have stayed here many times and our daughter got married here last year! Excellent staff!  You won't be treated better anywhere! The location is amazing too! Right next to the new pacific city area!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! I am happy to see everything went well.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We stayed two nights at this fantastic hotel! Our stay included beautiful Ocean view rooms, comfy beds, walks to the pier  followed by a glass of wine around one of the fire pits watching the sunset after work ...priceless! The weather and the deals are great this time of year.....the staff here...starting with the friendly/energetic valet guys... heading in to the welcoming check in staff & not excluding the helpful housekeeping professionals that saved my day solving my missing tooth brush debacle are first class. FYI one side of the hotel views the expansion construction of the new wing of the Hilton. If you plan on sleeping in be specific regarding booking a room on the side without Construction. Also, a quick walk to Pacific City will WOW you! Amazing restaurants and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. I am happy to see everyone welcomed you with open arms and that we were able to solve the tooth brush debacle. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Had 3 rooms for a wedding & location was perfect - easy access to beach & restaurants in town! very kid friendly- they are doing some contruction but it was not an issue! the breakfast buffet was reasonable & yummy
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! Happy to see your wedding weekend went well and you enjoyed the area. Hopefully we will see you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is a nice hotel! I enjoyed my visit (3 nights). I was there for business. Housekeeping was good, nice rooms, great location! Nice pool too!  My suggestions for improvement would be that they would use metal/plastic hangers and luggage holders, as I had a few bites on my after my visit. I am worried that they are bed bug bites.  Also, the valet (which you are forced to use) took a while a couple of times. I had to wait 10 minutes for my car, even though I had called down beforehand.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. We take pest control very seriously here and will look inspect the room you stayed in immediately. I will also pass this along to our valet team to investigate the long wait for your vehicle. I sincerely apologize for the issues, but happy to see overall your stay went well.    We look forward to seeing you again soon, take care!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Whilst the hotel is very nice, we were VERY dissatified with the pool area always being closed for private function. There is no thought given to the individual guest. EVERY day of our stay it wad closed for conference, two weddings, birthday, one of the days we were told to leave by guest experience staff, and told to go and get a free cocktail. When we went into the room it was dark and dingy, and we were told we could only have a small plastic beaker of wine or a beer, no cocktails. This hotel only thinks about money and not guest experience!! Not impressed.
Manager Response: Dear warfarin,  Thank you for your recent review and we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. As you no doubt noticed, our major expansion is well underway next door (including an all new pool with waterslides, a guest tower of suites, ballrooms and outdoor function areas) and we are well ahead of our scheduled opening in June of 2017. In the meantime, we have had to be very creative with our current and unaffected public areas that, from time to time, have occasionally necessitated limited closures of our pool deck (rarely exceeding a few hours). We, however, understand your frustration and sincerely apologize.  I will pass this on to our operations directors and see if there are any options we may not have yet deployed to make situations like these right by you, our most valued guests. I can assure you that we care deeply about your satisfaction and happiness while you are here and will do all we can to "Make It Right".  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Would certainly return...wonderful location. Everyone was very helpful and accommodating. Only had to ask and everything was taken care of beyond our expectations. Ate several meals in the hotel restaurant and was pleasantly surprised by both the presentation and quality of the food.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! We are so happy to hear everything went well during your visit. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We stayed for a couple days at this hotel and got a lot of positive emotions! Pluses: + good location + amazing ocean view from almost every room + helpful staff + nice pool and pool area + clean + charming fireplace at the restaurant and one more fireplace near the cafe Minuses: - paid Wi-Fi - not a very multifarious menu at the restaurant   Me and my family definitely recommend this hotel for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We are so happy to hear your family enjoyed the visit. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: A block from main street.  it is still in great shape.  The hotel has the friendliest staff.  Smaller than the Hyatt, but more personable. Great views from the rooms.  Always a nice weekend getaway.  You can wait for the Main Stree shuttle service - we prefer the two block leisure walk
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. I will make sure to share this with the team.   Take care!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! This was probably one of the best stays I have ever encountered! I randomly went inside the hotel to check it out and was amazed at how beautiful the scenery was. It was right next to the beach, beautiful dinning room, windows open for a nice breezy air. Absolutely stunning! I was greeted and welcomed by Michael Harris at the front desk. His professionalism was impeccable! He made me feel welcomed and answered all my questions I had. His attitude and friendliness convinced me to book a stay that night. I was impressed by EVERYONE I encountered after that. The bell man who took all my luggage to my room was super friendly and accommodating. The room was the best part of the stay! It was clean, big, had the perfect view of the ocean, and amazing bed. Breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. You are welcome to visit anytime, my friend.    Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel in a great location! Easy to get to Newport, Laguna, Dana Point. An additional tower is being added!! We have stayed here 5 years in a row and are never disappointed. The staff is excellent-friendly and helpful. The grounds are beautiful and the room is nice--lots of room, nice furnishings! We get the Sleep, Surf, Eat and Park package...it is great and makes this very nice hotel a great value!! Love the surf city feel to being here!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I am happy to see everything went well during your stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We love Hilton properties and this is our favorite one to stay at.  It is the perfect location and on the beach.  The rooms are spacious and immaculate. The beds are soooo comfortable you don't want to get out. The sound proofing is great as you don't hear any noise from adjoining rooms. The view from the balcony is breathtaking.   To get to the beach all you have to do is cross the street. If the sand isn't your thing they have a nice pool area that looks out to the ocean. Plenty of comfortable lounge chairs either in the sun or shade.   They have a restaurant that serves all meals that has seating in and outdoors. It has a nice fire pit to sit around and chat with people. They also have a market that serves Starbucks and some food items. The husband has Celiac and it's great
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! I will make sure to forward this on to the entire team. We loved having you and your husband as guests and hope to see you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Everything was perfect! The service is excellent! The rooms are so comfortable! We had a great time! There is so much to do here. We enjoyed the pool,beach and went bike riding. Everyone is so nice and helpful!
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear your reunion and stay went well. Thank you for the great response!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: oacian front hilton hotel huntington beach ca
Summary: bathrooms are substandard. This the first hotel I stayed in the past 47 years in US,where there is no exhaust fan in the bath room. At the end of shower all the surfaces are wet, you cannot put any clothes or toilet stuff on the counters. The drain is so slow ,by the time you finish the shower the feet and ankles are in the dirty water for a long long time.
Manager Response: Dear tallurid,  Thank you for your recent review. Our apologies for your dissatisfaction with your bathroom/shower facilities. Please know that we are underway with our tower upgrades and enhancements and as we must move room by room (when unoccupied) we have been slowed by the higher-than-normal number of guests this summer season. I will nonetheless relay this promptly to our engineering and operations departments. Again, we are truly sorry.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Dated rooms, expansive property but a fantastic location, with some Ocean Front and some most Ocean View rooms
Summary: The property I feel is dated, at least the rooms.  They are building another tower or replacement hotel not sure which.  The location is Ocean Front with the Pacific Coast Highway (PCH) between the hotel and the beach but a great location, great pool and a wedding favorite with 3 weddings on one day we were here.    The restaurant service was very good, the food very good, But the property and rooms need a facelift and very expensive as is.  The service level is decent and rooms clean.  I just I just expected more for the high nightly rate, but stay here, the location makes it the place to be.
Manager Response: Dear Glenn M,  Thank you for taking the time to write about us today. We value both your opinion and experience here at The Waterfront. You are correct, we are building an all new suite-centric luxury tower while simultaneously upgrading our existing property and THEN connecting the two. Our facelift is on time and on schedule as of this writing. The project will be complete in June 2017 and we look forward to your return so you may experience the all new Waterfront!   Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: If you wish for Ocean view then stay at the room titled Ocean view studio to get the entire view otherwise the room labeled Ocean view is really partial view . Be ready to have ear plugs because you will hear the street noise . Its an amazing view .   This hotel does not have Sauna though it's labeled a resort .
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback. As we expand as an even bigger resort, we are getting a full service spa, an additional pool, more dining options and meeting space. The spa will most likely include a steam room.   You will have to check it out next summer!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Great beach front hotel it has a pool looking at the ocean the pool staff was attentive the food was good clean rooms and the valet was great with giving suggestions and directions would definitely visit again it is also very close to Main Street and the pier
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I am happy you enjoyed your stay and the city. Hopefully we will see you soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: I was totally blown away by how every staff person at the hotel made me feel welcomed and cared how my experience was. It's clear Hilton is very particular who joins their company. Every Hilton experience has been over the top. At this property, from the doorman, front desk, bellmen, valet parking attendants, and housekeeping. Everyone went beyond what would be "normal" to make my stay that much more enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and kind words about the team here. I will make sure to pass this along to everyone!   Thanks again and take care.  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great Location, right across from the beach and near the Pier
Summary: This hotel was a gem right on Pacific Coast Highway, where we could walk across the highway at the cross walk with light to the beautiful wide beaches of Huntington Beach.  The room was lovely and spacious with a patio overlooking the coast across the street.  The restaurant had a great breakfast and a nice lounge area.  The hotel can arrange for bon-fires at the beach which we will definitely take advantage of our next visit.  We plan to return with our family next summer.  Shopping is nearby within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. We look forward to seeing you again next summer!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 9 nights at the end of August. From start to finish we had an amazing time! My Husband had emailed the hotel just before we arrived, to request a high floor Room, hopefully facing the sea. We had a response from a lady called Kim, she said she would do her best to accomadate. We were pleasantly surprised when we arrived to find that we had been upgraded to the 11th floor, overlooking the pool and we also had a good view of the ocean,we couldn't have been happier. As it was our Wedding Anniversary the hotel sent us up a bottle of champagne as well as chocolate strwaberries, what a thoughtful gesture:) Our room was very spacious and beautifully cleaned every day. Every single member of staff were always very happy to help us if we needed them, they were
Manager Response: Happy anniversary again! I am so glad you enjoyed your visit. Thank you so much for the great feedback and kind words. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: AWESOME Service! Wonderful Staff - especially helpful Valets!
Summary: The Hotel itself was great - right across the street from the beach (easy access), walking distance to the Pacific City Mall and The Strand. Great place for our daily walks and bike rides.  Restaurants everywhere!    The Hotel Staff were awesome.  The hotel was packed with people for the holiday weekend and the staff were always pleasant, happy and willing to do anything you asked.  The BEST part was the help we received from the Valets - especially Shane & Luis - when we had a problem with our rental car.
