These two young men (as well as the rest of their team) were very patient, willing to do anything they could, and so very pleasant the entire time! We also had a beautiful ocean view from our room. We HIGHLY recommend this Hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! I am happy to see the team here made a lasting impression on you especially Shane and Luis. We all look forward to seeing you again soon.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Second visit in 6 months, great staff, food and views!   Construction for addition a bit of a drag if you want to sleep in but motivates you to get up and go for a walk on the beach!  ;)  Wonderful getaway, walk to shops and restaurants down the street. The Waterfront Beach Resort is a new favorite!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! I like the positive spin on the early morning construction. Next time, though, we can try to make it easier to sleep in. Reach out to me directly, I can work with the room assignments to get you a room facing away from construction.   Take care!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: They are currently adding on to the hotel, as our room overlooked the construction site next door.  Although it was ocean view room, it was not direct.  You could see is partially out the sliding glass doors, but really had to walk out onto the balcony and look right to get a full ocean view.  The rooms really need updating and the lobby as well.  The service was great.  They have a shuttle into town or it is a mile or so to walk.  The shuttle only seats 7, so plan ahead whether leaving from the hotel or town.  The shuttle driver was very nice and helpful for restaurant suggestions.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I am happy to hear our staff made an impression on you. We are in the process of a massive renovation and new build. Once the new tower is up, the current tower will get a refresh. You will have to come back once everything has finished.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: I've cancelled my trip to San Diego in Dec to come back
Summary: great family atmosphere, love how pet friendly they are.  Very surprised to see how many people come back numerous times.  Food was very good wish thou they had more seafood selections.  Lots great activities for kids and pets.  Staff awesome !
Manager Response: We look forward to seeing you in December! Thank you for the great review and suggestion for more seafood. I have passed this on to our culinary team. As we get ready to revamp the dining options here, we will need all the feedback we can get.   Thanks again, have a great weekend!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We were disappointed with the hotel.   It is in a great location in Huntington, although it is across a main road from the beach which you can't tell very easily from the photos.  In some of the shots it looks like it is on the beach. The check in staff were extremely unhelpful and bordering on obnoxious.  This was a shame as all other hotel staff, from the concierge to the poolside, were great.  The front desk sta, partifularly Daniel and Anthony, couldn't be bothered to check our booking saying we only had two out of three rooms we had booked reserved.  They weren’t interested in checking our confirmation slip or listening/ inputting the reservations codes, and just said that the room was probably cancelled - "it always happens with third party bookings."  If they don't like
Manager Response: Dear Jayne H.,   Our apologies for the sensed lack of compassion or appropriate response you received from our front desk staff. This is simply not who we are... and Our Director of Guest Experience is looking into this now. We appreciate your detailed feedback. She may be reaching out to you personally for additional information. Regardless of how a reservation is booked with us (although direct is always best for rates), know that once you have arrived at the hotel you are our guest and the single most important reason we are here. We are very sorry for any difficulty and take comments such as these very seriously. We will follow up with you via private channels shortly.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great place, greater service. Fabulous view and the ocean!
Summary: I paid for an ocean view, and it was so worth it.  If you go all the way to the ocean, why not go all the way?  The facilities were great, and the location was terrific.  But my favorite part of the trip was Trevor and his crew at the Valet parking service.  They are right on the beach, so everyone wants to park there and the traffic/activity is HIGH.  Trevor and I hit it off, because he has a great personality.  And when I was racing to make my flight AND forgot something, he helped watch my car while I recovered my forgotten item. He refused a tip for this, by the way, because I had been generous over the weekend, and because he was just a good guy.  Even thought I had ties to the Hyatt (right next door), I'll be back to the Hilton.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We are spoiled here with Trevor and his team. I will make sure to pass your kind words on to him and the valet guys.   We will see you next time!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Such a beautiful hotel. We had an ocean view and a balcony and could watch the sunset. The front desk staff are the best. Valet parking is fast and they are so professional. The Shade restaurant for breakfast is perfect you can sit outside and enjoy the view. The rooms are spacious and have hardwood floors. I definitely will go back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! I am so pleased to see your visit went well. Hope to see you soon, have a great weekend!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: I love this hotel. I've been staying here since 1997. I won't stay anywhere else. The staff are amazing, anticipating my every need. The meals at Shade are excellent and the view from my room....simply the best.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us again! It was a pleasure to see you, we look forward to your next visit.  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Despite the construction going on to expand the hotel, we had an overall great stay.  The staff was excellent to cover our needs and the location cannot be better.  They don't have a ramp for strollers or high chair so this made it difficult for us with a toddler to go down the stairs with a stroller. Suggestion is to add a ramp in the front of the hotel towards the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback! As we renovate the resort, there is a plan to add a ramp to the beach side for easier access in and out of the hotel. In the meantime, we have a couple options to get you to the beach in wheels. Next time you are here let the front desk know we can offer transportation or other directions that do not require going up and down stairs. Thank you for the suggestion, we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My husband and I have now stayed here 3 times for mini "staycations". This year we were celebrating our wedding anniversary and Kim McCallum sent us champagne and chocolate covered strawberries! Vanessa made us a great dinner recommendation (Rusty Pelican) and even mentioned when she made the reservation that it was our anniversary. We love the convenience of being able to walk to restaurants and shops, enjoy Shades for breakfast and love renting bicycles from the hotel.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary! I'm glad we were able to make this special staycation even more special. Thank you so much for the kind words. Hope to see you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Loved the fact that there were so many restaurants to pick from, because the food at the hotel was too expensive. Hotel staff were very polite and friendly. Great location for walking to the beach and site seeing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I will pass your comments on to the culinary team to look at our dining pricing. There are a lot of new restaurants in the area, we certainly have some competition. Thanks again for the feedback, take care!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Huntington Beach!
Summary: Yet another lovely stay at the Hilton Waterfront Hotel! The staff is friendly, willing and readily available to accommodate almost any and all requests. The guest rooms are clean and spacious! The view off a balcony of an ocean front room is everything!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We look forward to seeing you again.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: The employees of the hotel know the meaning of service. They truly do a great job making you feel welcome. The location of the hotel is perfect for the beach and shopping. It is also waling distance to the pier.
Manager Response: Thanks for the positive review! Our team here is one of a kind. We take what we do very seriously. I will make sure they all know the hard work pays off. Have a great weekend!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We were there for a wedding. We stayed 3 days. The surrounding area is very nice   The hotel is OK. Nothing really special. I did like the adjacent Hyatt rooms much more. We stayed there in 2011.   The rooms are good size . Most of them have nice balconies. The pool area is small and very basic   The Shades restaurant on the pool has a nice setting, but the food quality is below average. Also the service is very very slow. The bar is nice though with good selection of drinks and reasonably priced   The hotel charge $34 daily for valet parking, but there are no other options. They have excellent quick service.  The hotel is expanding and doubling its size. If you end up on the construction side , you may feel the noise
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We truly appreciate all feedback as it helps us learn and continuously improve. Especially as we get ready to expand and increase the level of service. I will make sure to pass your comments on to the entire team. Thanks again, have a great weekend!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: very clean lot of fun beautiful view will recomend resturant good bar  nice view very helpful maids very friendly will diffently recomed to friends and family close to balboa beach and newport beach huntington pier very clean Rubys diner is on the pier great food and brab cooker is close very good food
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the great review! Hope to see you soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My daughter, daughter and I stayed at The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton hotel  in August  2016. After going thru good number hotels in both Newport and Huntington Beach we made our decision immediately after opening its side and looking at the pictures.  And we didn’t regret a moment. Hotel’s  location is perfect  - just across the road from the beach. Its swimming pool is gorgeous , and in case you want to go and swim in the ocean they provide you with portable chairs , towels, umbrellas and even surfing boards for kids. They also have a cozy restaurant where you can enjoy beautiful landscape and listen to life music. On the weekends you can watch a Hawaiian show.  There is a little shop where you can get food, coffee, souvenirs etc. Rooms are comfortable and ocean view
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. Glad to hear your family had a nice visit. We are spoiled with our concierge team. Happy birthday to your granddaughter, we look forward to seeing you back here!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My sister and I were extremely pleased with the friendliness and helpfulness of all the staff.  I would like to particularly point out the exceptional and courteous service we received from Ramil - he is a definite asset to your establishment.    Our stay was quite pleasant and we will return on our next visit to Huntington Beach.  When I made the reservations, I specifically asked for a room away from the construction noise (area) and wanted a room with a view of the ocean, a higher floor, plus an early check-in - all my requests were accommodated and our room was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great response! I am happy to see you and your sister had a great stay. Let us know whenever you are ready for another slice of heaven!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is a great place.  Not only are the amenities great, the locality to the beach, dining, and shopping is what makes this the place to stay.  We actually would not have had to leave the hotel to have a great vacation.  It is going to even get better when the construction is complete and the resort doubles in size.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We look forward to seeing you back in the future to check out the new rooms.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We enjoyed our 4 night stay at The Waterfront Beach Resort.  The location was fantastic. The staff could not have been nicer or more helpful. When we checked in late afternoon, we were very pleasantly surprised to find ourselves upgraded from an oceanfront double to a one-bedroom suite with a wraparound balcony.  For the most part, the newly-remodeled suite was not only spacious but comfortable.  A few caveats that kept the experience from being perfect:  the wi-fi service was spotty at best--it was free because we're Hilton Honors members, but I would have been really upset if I had to pay the $14.95 daily rate and tried to stream anything on my iPad; the shower's water pressure was extremely weak; and the cable reception wasn't great.  But other than that, it was great, and
Manager Response: Thank you for the great response! I am pleased to see everything went well during your stay. I apologize for the issues you encountered with the internet and cable services as well as the water pressure. I have passed your comments on to our engineering team to investigate and address.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location, but watch your credit card statement after you leave.
Summary: We only stayed at this hotel for one night and it seemed to meet every expectation. Upon arrival, we were greeted promptly and politely. As hilton honors silver we were given 2 complementary water bottles. Our room was not ready upon arrival so they gave us a text when it was. There is valet parking only at this hotel for $34. Our stay was very pleasant.   The only concern I have, was after we checked out and came to find $3.95 charge for a bottle of water which we did not drink. As hilton members we were given 2 bottles plus we brought our own icebox full of water since we had just arrive from Palm Desert. The staff was helpful in try to refund the money. They stated it would be posted to visa within 2-3 business day. Few day laters, check visa and no return was made, so we
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the details of your last stay with us. I am happy to see everything went well during your stay. I am surprised to hear about your card being overcharged. Please give me a call when you get a chance, so we can look at your folio and adjust the water off your bill. I sincerely apologize for the hassle but I am committed to making this right with you.   I look forward to hearing back from you!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel 714-845-8421

Summary: This is my wife's and I 15th year staying at the Hilton Waterfront in Huntington Beach. We started staying while the kids were in surfing school.  They have since grown and doing their own thing but my wife and continue to return to the Waterfront to relax from our busy lives.  The service, staff, grounds, and location cannot be beat if you want to be near the ocean and spoiled with great service. We look forward to next year !!!
Manager Response: Congratulations on 15 years together! We look forward to spoiling you for the next 15 years and more!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: You discover more value when you stay in it.
Summary: Location may say it all. However, let's be frank: it's between two competing hotels that have more modern appeal, seen from the outside. ANd yet, I would come back to the Hilton Waterfront. Service was impeccable, kind, cheerful. I have rarely seen a work environment where people are so calm but helpful and seem to enjoy what they do, with pride. The management is to be praised. The tower looks somehow dated, but our room was very fresh. Fine breakfast buffet, definitely great evening restaurant with palms and ocean view. I liked a lot my time at this Hilton -the value is discovered while you stay in it.  Value for money may be questioned -but that's the West Coast market price.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great response. I am happy to see you enjoyed your stay and ended pleasantly surprised. I will absolutely pass this along to the entire team, thank you for the praise for the leadership team.   We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: I had a one night stay at this Hilton in Huntington Beach, CA. Just across the street from the Pacific Ocean. We had room 728, which is ocean front. Fabulous view of the beach and ocean. Excellent bedding, and this room had a pull out couch that could sleep one or two more. The best part of this hotel is its location. It is in within easy walking distance of the new, outdoor mall called Pacific City. Food, clothing, and a variety of other stores are there for you to explore.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! I am happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and time at Pacific City.   Have a great week!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: its an ok hotel.the staff is friendly but there is nothing to do at the hotel at any time, no entertainment, no live music, nothing to do after 10pm , just go to sleep and watch tv.Food is ok, the only good thing about this hotel is the location and friendly staff but not to pay $400 to $500 per night, never again.
Manager Response: Dear Rogert B,  Thank you for your recent review and we are sorry that you found our on property offerings a bit too relaxed for your tastes. However, that is what we are all about... a family friendly environment in a relaxed beachside setting. People come to us from all over (even Vegas) to enjoy a rarity not often found here in Southern California, peace and calm. However, mere steps away at Pacific City (literally one block) are bars, clubs, restaurants...even a hidden Speakeasy! Our concierge can always point you to exactly the kind of experience you're looking for and, when its all said and done, you'll thank us for that nice quiet room the next morning.   Trust me, you will. :-)  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great location for a business conference
Summary: This is a great hotel for a business conference, set just across from the beach.  Pros: - modern hotel with good facilities both inside and around the pool area - Rooms are spacious, with balcony. I had a sea view - All the usual facilities within the room - Nice pool area - Breakfast was nice both for the buffet and off the menu, plenty of choice - good service  Cons: - The food during the day was average - Reception service was a little slow with only a handful of staff on duty
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed feedback. I will make sure to pass this along to the entire team so we can celebrate our pros and focus on the cons of your stay. We truly look at this feedback to help train and assess improvement options.   We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Have a great week!   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Couples beach relaxation and surf trip
Summary: Everything was so awesome about this place. The staff was amazingly friendly and super courteous.  We have a couple are on the beach and surfing more so than in any hotel we stayed in but because of the amenities at the pool deck we were there more so than any other hotel we stayed at.
Manager Response: Happy to see you enjoyed your couples surfing trip. Come back anytime you want to catch some waves and hang out on the beach. Thank you so much for the positive review!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My sister and I stayed here last week. The resort is beautiful, lush, right across the street from the beach.  The valet guys were awesome and attentive, the pool people polite and accommodating. The only negative was the front desk person. The gentleman that checked me in was very nice and efficient.  I was paying for an ocean view, so we were put on the 7th floor.  When I opened the door to the room, unfortunately all I could see was the building expansion next door.  The ocean view was there but you really needed to be on the balcony to see it.  Needless to say I was very disappointed.  I went downstairs to ask if I could move to the other side of the hotel.  The man (I think his name was Mike), was very put out with my request.  He was very rude but he would see what he
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing the details of your experience here. I apologize for the interactions with our front desk agent on the day of your arrival. This will be appropriately addressed with him. Thank you again for the feedback, I will make sure this does not happen again.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Please let me know if I can help with future reservations, I would be happy to ensure you are assigned to a nice ocean view room.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My family and I stayed here for a long weekend visit and had a great time.  Views of the beach are amazing from both sides, but the south side has construction going on.  Fortunately there is no construction work going on during the weekend so it was not disruptive to us.  Rooms are clean and spacious, staff is friendly and helpful.  Within easy walking distance to Main Street but their shuttle service was very helpful when we didn't feel like walking.  Kids loved the pool and our daughter loved the Starbucks coffee served in the poolside store area!  We borrowed two beach umbrellas, towels and boogie boards for the kids on our "beach day," free of charge.  Would recommend. For sure and we plan to be back.  Loved OC and Hilton Waterfront!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. I am happy to see everything went well. Also happy to see construction was not too much of an interruption. You will have to come back next summer when everything is complete.   We hope to see you soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: The hotel is very beautiful. All of the staff are very friendly and professional. I feel the staff go above and beyond in regards to customer service for their guests. The views of Huntington Beach and the Pacific were outstanding from our balcony. I can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words about the team here. I will make sure to pass this along to everyone. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Let me know if I can help with any upcoming reservations.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: In the middle of the up-and-coming Huntington Beach  shopping mall with amazing restaurants  in walking distance .  Directly across from the beach, great pool service, yummy food.  They are building a brand-new tower and amenities including spa services – can't wait!'
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! I am happy to see you loved your stay here. You will have to come back next summer once the new tower, spa and pool are all finished and open. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a central location overlooking the ocean
Summary: Our family of 5 stayed in 2 interconnecting rooms on the 10th floor with an ocean view.  Pros - Central location to the beach, the pier,  Main Street, Pacific City shopping and restaurants - all within easy walking distance.  Pacific City is a quiet and chilled area, with a good range of shops and restaurants. It was particularly nice to walk around it in the warm evenings.  The hotel pool was not large but it was still a good area with ample sun loungers and parasols, waitress service and free use of beach towels. The hotel complex is well laid out, modern, clean, spacious and welcoming.  The rooms were a fairly good size and comfortable. Tea and coffee provided in the room. A balcony was a good place to sit in the evening overlooking the ocean.  Very friendly and helpful staff
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Happy to see you enjoyed the city and hotel. You will have to come back next summer and see the new rooms!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: This was a family mini vacation with my wife and three young kids.  We are locals and this is our first time staying here.  We called this our Mini Maui trip :)  Traveling with young children is often difficult.  Getting in and out of the mini van is a production, which is why I usually want to self-park.  In this case, the only parking is valet.  As I drove up, the valet staff offered to help unload the van but I declined because we had a bunch that was coming out but another bunch that stays in the van and it's all mixed up.  If you have kids, you know what I mean.  The valet staff was very nice and encouraged us to take as much time as we would like.  We had multiple interactions with the staff daily and they were always very respectful to the adults and children.  One thing
Manager Response: Glad to hear your Mini Maui trip went well. Thank you so much for recognizing our valet team, I will make sure to share this with them. We look forward to seeing you again soon for your family staycation.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Five star experience.  The staff is customer focused.  Location is perfect for walking to beach or Pacific City.  The car stayed in the garage the entire stay.  If walking isn't an option, there is a Mercedes shuttle for free available every hour on the hour.  Looking forward to spending my birthday there again next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay and the area. We look forward to celebrating your birthday with you next year!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Our family of four stayed here for two nights during a visit to L.A. and loved it!  It is a beautiful hotel, our suite was very pretty (corner suite, newly updated) with lots of space for our two teens (17 and 15) - one on a the pull out couch and one on a cot.  Spectacular view of the beach right below.  We were right next to the construction site but honestly did not hear a thing.  We were on a high floor so maybe that helped.  The pool area was beautiful - great place to lay by the pool while the kids ran back and forth to the beach for some surf.  I did not know this, but the hotel is actually across the street from the beach, not right on it.  At first I was a bit disappointed with this, but it was truly so easy to get to the beach - and the hotel gives you towels, beach
Manager Response: We are so excited to see your family enjoyed their summer vacation! Thank you so much for the great review! Also happy to hear the construction was not a hassle for you. You will have to return when everything has completed to check out the new tower.  Have a great week!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: This was my first time at this hotel, I was using points as a Hilton honors member. This hotel made my trip memorable after a very poor experience at my previous Hilton hotel.  I asked for upgrade options at check in and was upgraded to a superb ocean front room, WOW is all I can say.  The view was spectacular.  Pool area was full so I wasn't able to experience the pool, but had a great feel, no hot tub which was surprising.  Lovely bar restaurant which also had an outside eating option. Bar menu had good options.  Service was exceptional all around! This hotel is great for beach access.  I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Jason, thank you so much for the great review! I am happy to see we were able to change your perception of the Hilton family. We do actually have a hot tub, it is tucked behind a row of palm trees and is not easy to find, especially if the pool area is packed. Next time you stay with us, let me know, I would be happy to show you.   We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: For a resort hotel the service was awful. You are paying big money to stay at this hotel.  We were treated like we were staying at Motel 6. Staff unfriendly especially at the front desk. Leaving, no one assisted us with our luggage into our car. Lots of noise with construction right next door. Don't expect to sleep in.
Manager Response: Dear Alan L.,  Thank you for your recent review. We are truly sorry to have not met your expectations during your stay. An internal review of your record has indicated that you are now in contact with one of our Front Office managers who will make every effort to make this right by you. We apologize and (as attested to by many other reviews) this a far from the norm for us. Our sincere apologies...and once things are settled to your satisfaction we look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Staff very pleasant . Upgraded to a suite oceanfront. In room dining reasonably priced.  The pool area was nice and relaxing. Comfortable relaxing stay. Construction going on but was not a problem at all. Completely satisfied great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! Happy to see you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you back here soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Waterfront in Huntington Beach for business and was very impressed with the comfort of the rooms, beauty of the views and convenience to the water, shopping and restaurants. Would definitely come back with my family!
Manager Response: We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon! Hopefully for fun this time instead of work.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Everything was wonderful. It was relaxing which is exactly what I needed. The staff is sweet and any requests were promptly filled. The pool was clean and fun. Breakfast was yummy and filling. The view is amazing and it's so close to everything including  the beach
Manager Response: I am thrilled to see you enjoyed your beach trip and were able to relax and enjoy the hotel resort. If you need anything please let me know. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We reserved an ocean front king that was attached to an ocean front one bedroom suite.  The two rooms together gave us a huge wrap around balcony overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  The view was incredible.  We also had the hotel put a bonfire together for our group.  It was very nice and made it an easy outing for our group.
Manager Response: So happy to see you enjoyed your room and especially the view. We are so thankful to have this in our backyard and look forward to your return visit!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Attended a conference next door at the Hyatt. The walk was easy and beautiful weather and scenery made it wonderful. With Hilton honors, you get a free continental breakfast or you can upgrade to full for a nominal amount.  Another option is their sandwhich/coffee shop where you can spend up to $15 for any breakfast items. I tried both and the food was great. You also receive a discount coupon for dinner. We went out for dinner but looked nice.  We knew about ongoing construction and we asked for an even room number as those face the north away from construction. The room was fine and had everything we needed except maybe some additional recharging outlets. Small refrigerator, ample closet and bathroom. Turn down service and nightly towel refresh is great for convention and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! I am thrilled to see your stay delivered an experience above what you expected. Hopefully, even being here for work you were able to have some fun and enjoy our beautiful city. I will pass your kind words on to Tammy and team so she is recognized throughout the hotel.   Congratulations to your daughter and take care!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: I took my 3 youngest boys 15, 9 and 3 my husband had to work. We love all of it! We checked in on a Monday relaxed at the pool had burgers at Shades that were delicious and watched the sunset. We had their buffet breakfast that was ok, but they do include cooked to order eggs and omelettes that were pretty good.  We walked over to the beach and the hotel let us use chairs, towels and body boards? It's directly across the street which was perfect.  Tuesday evenings at 5 there's a farmers market by the pier and we walked over to find a ton of shops restaurants, vendors, different bands and some street entertainers.  My only complaint is the $34 parking fee and the amount they charge to book a fire pit at the beach. They charge $125 but said it included everything to make s'mores
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to see you enjoyed your getaway trip with the family! Our Waterfront Adventures team offers the bonfires starting at $125. This includes the s'mores, the fire equipment, and a butler service from our attentive staff. Huntington Beach has a couple fire pits you can use to bring your own supplies. But these pits are first come first serve and often are occupied by 10am, especially on the weekends. Our team ensures you have a fire ready to go by 6pm without having to stake out a spot all day.   I hope that helps, next time you stay with us, you will have to check them out.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: I know that hotel staff are supposed to be nice and pleasant. And being a Hilton Gold member, they mostly are. But the staff here went way above and beyond for us! I'd say that I was mostly impressed with the valet guys! Luis and Samuel stood out the most. Very helpful with my vehicle and moving it a few times for me for the EV plug in. They also acted as part concierge and were very helpful telling us good places to check out. Besides that, hotel was beautiful! Pool was nice and warm! Would return!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! Our team, especially the valet team is truly one of a kind. I will make sure to reward Luis and Samuel for making a lasting impression on you and your stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We arrived at 11:00 on a Friday and they had a room for us to check in to, which was awesome.  This gave us the opportunity to start our "girls" weekend early.  Rodney, the valet gentleman was super nice, professional and friendly. The lobby and grounds are beautiful. The front desk was very pleasant and welcoming.  Our room was super clean and comfortable.  When we arrived back at the hotel, late into the evening the bar was still open and the server was extremely polite & accomodating.  We will definitely return for another "girls" weekend.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us for your girls weekend! Looks like you ladies had a blast! I will make sure to thank Rodney and recognize him in front of the entire team. Thank you again! Next time you need a girls weekend, let us know.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We stayed here for two nights during the Vans US pro surfing competition. The hotel was very busy but all the staff were very efficient. The hotel is very clean and our room was nice and quiet which was surprising due to how busy it was. There are lots of families at this hotel, so if you want a more grown up resort its probably not for you. Valet parking was good Edwin gave us spot on directions to our next resort.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. I am happy to see everything went well and appreciate your flexibility on the construction. I will pass your kind words about Edwin on to the entire team so he is recognized for taking such great care of you.   Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you back here soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Shocking service. Definitely NOT worth the money.
Summary: We visited the The Waterfront, Huntington Beach for a Sat night and booked (what we were told was) their biggest suite. The cost of which was upwards of $600 for the night. The first thing I should say about this hotel is, except for the bellman who were awesome in every interaction, the service in this hotel pretty much sucks, and there are a few reasons why I say that. Let's start with arrival first. We arrived about 1PM, valetted, and went to check in - now let me interject here to say two things: 1) this hotel is valet ONLY, and costs $30, so if you have any friends planning to join you, well, that's something cool to mention to them 2) check in at this hotel is 4PM, so if you are planning on arriving at a rational time of day to go to the beach, you're pretty much out of
Manager Response: Dear v1per,  Thank you for your detailed review of our property. We take very seriously our guest's experiences and the care and concern we impart on any and all issues brought to our attention. Your comments have been shared with our entire staff and management team. We will be in touch shortly to speak with you personally. I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken and we will do all we can to "Make It Right" by you. Again, our sincere apologies.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Very nice hotel with super friendly staff as soon as you pull up. The valet experience sets a great tone to the stay. The view of the ocean from our room was great! Would stay here again. Walking distance to beach, shopping, food and more. Can not say a bad thing about his stay.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to see you enjoyed your summer staycation! Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel meant times over the last ten years. Perfect staff, perfect amenities, perfect location. Would not change a thing!!! Never knew construction was going on!!! And can't wait to go back next summer to see all the new things!!!

I am a frequent business visitor and the staff makes it feel like home. The valet team (especially Nile) is friendly and attentive.  My car is always waiting for me whenever I need it. Another great part of the service at the Hilton Waterfront Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the valet team. They are one of the hardest working, most accommodating teams we have here. I will share your feedback to everyone so they can be recognized, especially Nile! Thanks again!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Beautiful, classic beach hotel...very friendly staff and scenic location.  Restaurant staff was great.  Rooms were comfortable and spacious.  The construction made things a bit noisy at times, but interesting to watch.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! I am happy to see, despite our construction, you were WOWed! Once the work is done, you will have to come back and see the new rooms.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We will never go to Hawaii again.  Huntington Beach has the best beaches in the country and now the most incredible hotels in the area.  Pacific City has great restaurants and great shopping.  The best part is there is no air travel.  Just pack the car and two hours later you are in paradise.  Could not have asked for a better vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! We could not agree more, why fly when you can enjoy your backyard? We look forward to seeing you in paradise again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Returned to Waterfront Beach Hilton To Enjoy It Again
Summary: It's been at least a few years since I first stayed at the Waterfront Beach Hilton at Huntington Beach CA. Upon my return I found it more enjoyable. It seems more upscale, cleaner, quieter and friendlier. The new Pacific Center a block away makes the Waterfront Beach Hilton less isolated than before. Now it is only a block to walk to a collection of interesting restaurants and shops. The manicured grounds are landscaped beautifully.  There's construction going on next door but there was no problem with that because the builders do not work on weekends. I still had a great view of the beach and ocean which are just across the street. I really enjoyed the sliding glass door and balcony as it gave me fresh air and a small table and chairs to enjoy the ocean view.  The staff at the
Manager Response: Happy to see you enjoyed your return trip here! You will have to come back next summer when our construction has finished and the new tower is open.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: like this hotel good valet parking walking distance to restaurants and mall nice pool  good breakfast on vouchers  got an oceanfront studio suite that can highly recomend beautifull room i enjoy everyminute and every sunset go by bike to newport worth the effort...little effort is very near
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! Anytime you want to join us for a relaxing stay, let me know. Have a great week!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: We love spending time at this wonderful property. Beautiful rooms, warm service and fair prices for quality food and beverage. Rent beach cruisers, s'more package on the beach with fire pits. Great pool deck with lively entertainment. The kids love it and so will couples. We will be back every summer trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I am happy to see your family enjoyed your beach getaway. We look forward to seeing you next summer! If you join us after July, you will be able to see the new tower and pool!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Not What I Expected for the Price
Summary: I will lead with the positives:  The Valet staff was amazing.  They were the coolest bunch of guys I've ever dealt with in car service.  The front desk was very helpful as well.  I spent some time at the Shades bar, where Kevin was also great.  Frankly, I thought my Oceanview 2-Queen room was overpriced for the size of it. The view was impressive, though.  Also, my room wasn't ready on time, so I was given a voucher for the trouble.  I then completely forgot to use the voucher (my fault), but I would have rather just had the amount of the voucher taken off my bill.  Housekeeping personnel was VERY polite, but all of my items weren't refilled.  It was fine, but again, for the price, replacing the paper coffee cups, and a couple of the toiletries doesn't seem like too much to ask.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience! I am happy to see our staff made a lasting impression on you. I truly appreciate your detailed feedback and will report back to the leadership team for ideas and training tools. We are getting ready to expand and will need to focus on a few things before we open. Thank you again for proving this priceless information.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Next time you are making travel arrangements, please reach out to me directly. I would love to help you make a reservation and ensure you are in a great room!  Kim McCallum	 Director of Guest Experience		        The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Two years ago we enjoyed our stay enough to return again this summer. Its rally a family hotel but our teenagers love it too. The staff are very friendly and charming and we didn't have any service issues this year. The concierge is a star! The HHonors upgrades weren't available, which was a shame but we had an ok room.  The rooms are very tired and grubby but will be refurbished when the new tower opens summer 2017.  The Huntington beach area has really upped its game with a new hotel (for millennials) and a great restaurant and shopping centre, Pacific City, which is right next to the Hilton. This has greatly increased the number of good eateries and bars in walking distance of the hotel.  There are not quite enough sunbeds at the pool and the pool staff allow reserving which
Manager Response: Dear Well_travelled_Dad,  Thank you for your recent review and high praise for our concierge and staff. They really are the backbone of our hotel and we are so pleased they hit their marks perfectly for you! We, like you, are also very pleased to have the addition of Pacific City just a short walk to our south. Everyday seems to bring a new and fabulous eatery or shopping possibility and they have nicely raised the bar here in Huntington Beach.  You are also correct in noting that we are not only well underway with our expansion, new tower, pool complex, meeting facilities and a complete refresh of all of our rooms and public spaces. Unfortunately when we are at our busiest in the summer, this can place a premium on pool lounges and the potential for upgrades for our Hilton Hhonors members. We do apologize and are certain your next visit WILL warrant those five stars. In the meantime, we thank you sincerely for being a loyal Waterfront guest and look forward to your next visit.    Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: Friendly staff and beautiful views !!!!!! Fantastic Huntington Beach resort. We look forward to our next stay which will hopefully happen soon . We love our stayvacations in this awesome town. Thank you Hilton family!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I am so happy to see your time here went well and you enjoyed our staff and the resort. We look forward to seeing you again during your next staycation!  Kim McCallum	 Director of Guest Experience		        The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Excellent staff! But don't pay for OCEANVIEW because that's a pure scam
Summary: To be honest I'm strugling to award the 5 stars as it definately deserves 5 stars. The service is excellent, the staff is well trained and at it's best. The facility is great, the location superb. We ate in the restaurant, used the bar and the poolservices and eat breakfest every morning. We had 2 rooms and stayed for 5 days. Our total bill in this hotel was just over 3.500 $.  So why I'm I only awarding 3 stars? Because we booked our room with a premium package for seaview. And what we got was a great view over .... a construction site with a slight distance view of the see in the back (see my picture which I uploaded). To be honest, this is not Hilton worthy and just gave us a feeling being ripped off. I've stayed before in Huntington beach and when I payed extra for sea view,
Manager Response: Dear Tom L,  Thank you for your recent review. We apologize that you were not satisfied with your view and can assure you we are rounding the bend when our new tower construction (and a true ROOFTOP LOUNGE) will be all open. Unfortunately there are only two sides of the hotel and during a busy time (like the US Open of Surfing) every room is a commodity. We understand that the view may not have been the best at this time, but instead of staying anywhere else (where the service is no where near what we have here), we invite you back to experience the all new Waterfront next June. you will not be disappointed in the least, I assure you!  Best wishes,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: In the hundreds of hotel visits over the years I have never seen such a thoughtful, considerate and generally kind and pleasant staff.  They went far beyond the normal in making our stay one of the best ever.  This was a family vacation with 12 adult children/grandchildren.  A lifetime memory for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words. It was truly a pleasure taking care of you and your family. We look forward to seeing you all again soon!  Take care!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel located on California's Pacific Coast Highway. If you are planning a trip to Orange County California and would like to be very close to the beach, I would recommend this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. Happy to see you enjoyed the area. Have a great weekend, we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Definitely one of my new favorite hotels! This resort was amazing from the beautiful pool to our large ocean front balcony. The room was amazing and the view was perfect. Danny checked us in and was very friendly and full of lots of great info on what to do on property and in the area. We also ate the Unlimited Champagne Brunch at the Shade restaurant which was delicious! We were lost on property and McKenna in the market place was super nice and helped us figure out what we wanted to do for the afternoon. She went out of her way to talk to us which was really neat to see. The only down side to the whole trip was it took 3 calls down to valet (2 hours) to get them to being up some items we left in the car. At check out Luis out in valet was very friendly when getting our keys
Manager Response: Well we cannot wait for you to return! I am so happy your short getaway was a memorable experience. Thank you for recognizing Danny, McKenna and Luis. Clearly they made an impression on you. Let me know if you need anything, have a great weekend!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Overall, the hotel was clean, well staffed and friendly.  Pros: Good location in Huntington Beach Close to Pacific City which had great bars and restaurants Room with sea view and balcony was as described by the hotel large room with two king size beds Breakfast service was fast and food quality was very good Valet parking was very efficient  Cons: Air conditioning in the room smelt slightly of cigarette smoke (non smoking room) Not enough milk pods in the room (2 pods for 2 large cups of coffee)  Overall, a friendly place to spend 5 days during a business visit.

Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay in Orange County
Summary: The most awesome staff you will ever find, always  going the extra mile for you.  Nice hot tub and pool and rooms are great!  Location offers many pubs and restaurants in walking distance, the beautiful Pacific ocean and many things to do.
Manager Response: We have the most awesome staff because we have the most awesome guests! Thank you for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Location, Location, location! Close to airport and loved the shopping area! Beach beautiful with chairs and umbrellas provided by hotel. Breakfast a bit overpriced so go to grocery store close by and get your own
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! Glad to see you enjoyed Huntington Beach. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My husband and I spent a few days in Huntington Beach from the east coast. I would definitely recommend this hotel. It is a fabulous hotel with a resort atmosphere across the street from the beach and walking distance to many shops, restaurants and the pier. Not exactly cheap but in my opinion worth the money if you are looking for an upscale hotel with many amenities
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us for your beach getaway! Next time you need a trip to the west coast, let us know.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: The location is very good with excellent view of the beach and a short walk to Main Street and a lot of restaurant .bonefire at sunset was something to remember very nice . The swimming pool was vey good as well as the hot spa .the staff is very good and professional .high floor with beach view was amazing ,the only complain is the very expensive valet parking which is headache if you need to go out or you forget something in your car .i will be back for sure .....I miss my lovely room ..........
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing the details of your past stay with us. I am so happy to see everything went well. I apologize for the extra steps needed to get to your car. Our parking in Huntington Beach is limited. The garage adds a level of security and peace of mind.   Your lovely room misses you too, come see us again anytime!   Kim McCallum Director of Guest Experience The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Waterfront Adventures Beach BONFIRE Review:  What a great way to escape the heat in the "city" on a summer night!  My friends and I thoroughly had a great time at Huntington Beach - beautiful and relaxing!  (BTW you do not have to be a hotel guest to take advantage of Waterfront Adventures services.) waterfrontresort.com/wa  TAMMY, the hotel concierge, was professional and friendly while helping me set up the reservation on the phone and answering my questions.  JOSE took great care of us from setting up the chairs, lighting and tending to the fire all night, and bringing us our drinks and s'mores.  He was helpful, friendly and hardworking.    Waterfront Adventures is located near lifeguard station 13 in a bright yellow building. The bonfires are set up directly in front of it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback! I am so happy to hear Tammy and Jose took great care of you. I will make sure they are recognized for a job well done. Any time you want to get away from the city heat, you and your friends are more than welcome!   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: I stayed one night after meeting some staff members about an upcoming conference this fall. The hotel is beautiful, the staff was so friendly and cooperative. I had lunch and the food was excellent. Great views!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. I am pleased to see everything went well during your stay. We look forward to seeing you this fall for your conference! Let me know if you need anything before then.   Kim McCallum    Director of Guest Experience                              The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: Beautiful hotel with an outstanding location is ruined by the staff and management's lack of attention and poor attitude.  It must be a great place to party because there were loud room parties lasting until morning several nights and the staff did nothing to mitigate the situation.  The valet damaged our vehicle and denied responsibility and more.  I would stay away until they improve the situation.
Manager Response: Dear Eric G,  Thank you for your recent review, we appreciate your candor. We were very sorry sorry to hear about the noise and disturbance you experienced while with us. We know that when choosing a hotel, a restful night is one of the most important factors and we failed you here. Please accept our sincere accept apologies. We do have a strict no noise/no party policy that is enforced by our Security Team.   Regarding your vehicle, our parking management team attempted to make contact with you while you were with us to complete an investigation, but it sounds like we had some trouble connecting. Our Senior Parking Manager has started an investigation into this matter and will personally reach out to you for resolution if he has not connected with you already.   Thank you again for sharing your feedback with us. We rely on your candid comments to improve and also strive to "Make It Right" anytime a guest is not satisfied here at The Waterfront. We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary Heading: Great location, very nice hotel, getting a little "old"
Summary: Great location, friendly staff, nice swimming pool area ;  excellent for a relaxing pool & beach vacation.  The rooms are nice, with enough space, but the hotel building is getting old. The bathrooms are very small  (especially since we went there, after staying in Vegas for a couple of days where our rooms had gigantic bathrooms :-) ).  Nice outdoors restaurant, for breakfast or dinner by the pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I am happy to see everything went well. I agree that the hotel is looking a bit its age these days. We are actually in the middle of a massive expansion and renovation project. This will include an additional tower with more rooms, an additional pool, a full spa and more meeting space. In our existing building, everything is underway for a major refresh including the pool space, lobby and dining areas.   We look forward to seeing you next summer when everything has been completed.  Kim McCallum Director of Guest Experience The Waterfront Beach Resort, A Hilton Hotel

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights in early July.  We were upgraded to the presidential suite and all I can say is wow!  I think they were fully booked so that is why we got that suite.  The room was on the 12th floor with large ocean front  balconies.   Beautiful views!  The room was very clean and I would say the  entire property was very well maintained.  We ate dinner and breakfast at the restaurant and were pleased with menu and quality of the food.  There is a fire pit on the patio of the restaurant which is very nice to have a drink around.  The pool was good with lots of chairs available.  This property is a short walk to the Huntington Beach pier and the main street of Huntington beach.  There are several restaurants near this hotel so there are lots of choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the details of your experience. I am very pleased to see everything went well from the room upgrade to the cleanliness as well as your dining and pool adventures. Also happy to hear we found your charger and were able to get it back to you so quickly. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We spent most of our honeymoon here and loved every second of it.  If you can splurge for an ocean front room, you will not be disappointed.  Staff and valet were all very pleasant.  Room service was excellent and not overpriced.  Portions are huge, so consider splitting to save money.  Have nothing bad to say about this place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing the details of your past stay with us! I am happy to see everything went well and you enjoyed our ocean front room. Have a great week, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Went down to Huntington Beach for our honeymoon & decided to stay here....and we are so glad that we did! It's an older hotel, but Hilton is in the process of building a new tower next door (btw: they are doing construction, but I didn't hear any of the work). Staff told us once the new tower is done, the current hotel will be undergo a full remodel. They knew we were there for our honeymoon and surprised us with a bottle of champagne and an assortment of chocolate covered treats. The room we had was an Ocean View on the 8th floor and it was nice. King size bed, incredible views of the ocean and PCH. Room comes with a fridge and a coffee maker. There is a restaurant on site and the food was great. Highly recommend this location!! We will be back!!
Manager Response: Congratulations on your wedding! I am so happy to see we were able to make this special stay even better. Thank you so much for the great feedback on the room, restaurant and undergoing construction. Maybe for your one year anniversary you can joins us to celebrate a year together in the new tower? Let me know if I can help with anything and have a great week!

Summary: I can't even begin to describe how wonderful our stay was at the Waterfront Beach Resort! The hotel is located in a beautiful area, right across from the ocean. Also a short walking distance away from all shopping/restaurants in Huntington Beach. Beautiful pool, gift shop and restaurant at the resort and most of all the BEST customer service you could ever experience. Tammie, the concierge, was so helpful!! We rented an Enterprise car for a day, where she called and ordered it for us, as well as took care of everything when we were done with it. I was double charged by Enterprise, which was not the hotels fault at all.. and still till this day have not gotten a refund. Tammie has been following up with me on a weekly basis, as well as calling Enterprise for me to ask about this
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great feedback from your past stay. It looks like Tammy made a lasting impression on you and your trip. I apologize for the double charge from Enterprise, I will follow up with Tammy to see where we are with this. We look forward to seeing you and your family in September. Let me know if I can assist with anything to prepare for your next stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Hotel was a short walk to Main St. Checked  into a higher floor for a great view of the beach and surrounding areas. Hotel looks to be under expansion, so there was also a view of the construction site. Nonetheless, the view of the beach and vicinity to bars and restaurants made it a none issue. Did not get chance to use the pool or eat at the hotel restaurant, but hopefully the next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing the details of your past stay with us. I am pleased to see everything went well and our expansion project did not interfere with your stay. We are so excited for this project to be finished. Hope to see you again soon, once everything is done!

Summary: Loved this hotel! Already want to go back (and to stay longer next time)! Perfect location. Walking distance to shops, dining, and the beach. Beautiful hotel and spacious guest room with a balcony facing the ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! I am so happy to see you had an amazing weekend getaway here. We look forward to seeing you again soon, hopefully for a longer trip. Let us know if you need anything or if we can help book your next stay. Have a great week!

Summary: Very professional and nice service, especially in pool area. Rooms are a little small for the price but great ocean views   Great location and great food. The elevators take awhile and don't hold enough guest.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback! I am pleased to see just about everything went well. We are currently looking into the elevator speed and will have a solution before your next stay. Also this time next year we will have another tower with more spacious rooms than the current tower. Hope to see you back here again soon!

Summary Heading: Walk to the Beach, Relax by the Pool
Summary: Loved our two-day stay. Staff was helpful and welcoming. Was upgraded to a room with a pool view. Comfortable beds and nicely spacious rooms with balconies.  Hotel has a nice pool area overlooking the ocean. You can check out free beach items at the pool desk (towels, beach chairs, umbrellas, bodyboards). Walking distance to the main section of Huntington and the pier.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay here. Thank you for the kind words, we hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: Our room was not the room we thought we had booked as far as location and size.  Management resolved our problem by relocating us.  Loved the patio and pool.  The staff was excellent and made us feel welcome.  Bed was super comfy, even the pillows.  Our dog was welcome and the food was excellent as well as the location.  We will be coming back.
Manager Response: Happy to see you loved your time here, despite a few reservation hiccups. Thank you for staying with us. You and your family (including the puppy) are always welcome. We look forward to seeing you all again soon!

Summary: Made a last minute reservation for July 4th weekend and was able to get 12th floor pier view. Fireworks show was incredible, the brand new Pacific City is a block away with excellent restaurants and shopping. Hilton offers free hourly shuttle to downtown so parking is not a problem. Waterfront resort had one of the best buffets, pool area and the most excellent and respectful staff ready to assist with anything we needed.  Beautiful, clean room and in room service was astounding.  Would definitely recommend and go back.

We spent 3 nights here over 4th of July weekend and it was wonderful! Neither of us had stayed here before and found it extremely pleasant, great location and wonderful view form our 12th floor ocean and pier view. Made it great for the firework display and we could walk everywhere.  The pool was nice, but crowded considering the time of year. Room service food was not so great. $22 for a burger that was no good. The desserts are good though. The market by the pool makes great sandwiches though.   Staff were friendly and the rooms were clean. Bed very comfortable.  The newly built Pacific City had a lot of great restaurants and shops. There are still a lot more to come. Main Street offered great shopping and some excellent little restaurants. Sugar Shack was great for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I am happy to see overall everything went well. I apologize for the lack of quality with our room service. Please know I will pass your comments on to the culinary team to review and look for improvements. We truly appreciate all the feedback. We look forward to seeing you for the Fourth of July next year!

Summary: I was surprised during a visit to Huntington Beach with a two day stay the the waterfront beach resort.  The room was absolutely perfect with French doors that opened onto a deck facing the pool and ocean.  The room was spacious, quiet and so comfortable.  We had dinner at the hotel and enjoyed the pool and took a lovely walk around the grounds.  It was an incredibly relaxing and enjoyable experience.   This is a great hotel for couples or families and is in a wonderful location.  You could walk to the beach, local restaurants or shopping.

Steps from the beach, well appointed rooms, 5 star service at it's best.  Pets are welcome all over the property.  The staff goes out of their way to ensure a 5 star experience.  Highly recommend this particular Hilton.

Summary Heading: I EXPECT MORE FROM THE HILTON BRAND
Summary: LOCATION IS GREAT But slacking in the ROOMS BED a little OLD and LUMPY CIGARETTE BURNS in extra BLANKET in the closet MADE RESERVATIONS for the SUNDAY BRUNCH only to be put on WAITING LIST when we arrived on time NOT enough TOWELS in our room ONLY 1 coffee creamer for our coffee in the room POOL over  crowded, We  were unable to find a CHAIR and ENJOY the POOL.
Manager Response: Dear Jadams2014,  Thank you for your recent review. Our sincere apologies for any delay you experienced with our extremely popular Sunday brunch. Occasionally (and especially during these busy holiday/summer months) we are held captive to those seated before you not wanting to make way for others. We try to anticipate this at all times by setting extra space on our pool deck, but as you doubt experienced there too...the pool deck was jammed as well. Again, we're very sorry for the delays.  For any issues with your room, please do not hesitate to call us for immediate remedy . We will do all we can (including a room move, if possible) to "Make It Right".  Our rooms (and in fact the entire resort) is now underway with complete enhancements and refreshments including our new tower and pool complex just to the south. You asked, we listened! Join us in the summer of 2017 for an all NEW Waterfront experience!  Sincerely,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This is a great place, in a great location! On the beach! Very close to shopping complex and local resturants. Just down the road from shops like target and other resturants! Nice pool area with a hot tub and the pancakes for breakfast are great!! Couldn't ask for more.

Summary Heading: Great stay at The Waterfront Huntington Beach
Summary: Two hundred characters aren't enough to describe this wonderful hotel.  I attended a work leadership meeting at The Waterfront 6/27-6/30/16.  What an excellent choice!  The grounds were impeccable, staff professional and courteous. Did I mention the view of the massive Pacific Ocean! I can't wait to return with my family.

Spent the 4 day 4th of July weekend here.  From what I paid I expected much more.  Room was still dated in terms of size even though it was recently updated in decor.  Bathroom was small and shower/tub was the same that I'd get in a much lower category hotel.  The size of the pool, gym and jacuzzi was more fitting to a 100 room hotel.  Would not return unless the price was half of what I paid.  On the positive side, location was great for access to the heart of Surf City as well as Newport Beach.  Staff was also friendly although the front desk forgot to give me "towel cards" to be used for beach towels, but that was easily rectified.
Manager Response: Dear Dave H,  Thank you for your recent review. We're very glad you chose us as the location to spend your 4th of July...easily our biggest and busiest day of the year. We do everything we can to accommodate all of our guests (and the guests they bring with them) which can be a big challenge on a day like that...we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced along the way. We were very glad to see that our staff was "on point" and resolved things quickly for you.  Come back next year and stay in our new luxury "Twin Dolphin Tower", a hotel within the hotel! Most of the rooms are suites, all with upgraded amenities and leave you impressed with all we've done! Additionally, we'll have another pool, more restaurants, a rooftop lounge... it'll be the place to be for years to come! Open for booking soon, we look forward to your return.  Best,  Scott O'Hanlon Director of Marketing  The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel

Summary: This hotel is in an excellent beachfront location for hosting a beach party. Early in the day we arrived at the beach to reserve our fire pit and set up our grill and pop-up canopy. Later, two of us walked across the street and checked in. When the party was over, we went back to the hotel to shower and use the pool.   My husband and daughter were both celebrating birthdays and when we got to our room, we were greeted with champagne. The next morning, some of our party had breakfast by the pool, but we walked to the pier to have breakfast at Ruby's and watch the surfing qualifiers.  All of the rooms we booked during this stay had excellent views. The view of the beach and the pool from Room 426 was great.   The hotel staff made us feel completely welcome. They were friendly and

We have stayed at this hotel the last 6 years for family vacation trips where we just want to relax. This location includes beach items like boggie boards, shovels and toys, chairs etc. It makes going to the beach easy. Definitely a good spot if you want to just relax and unwind for a bit.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and staff are all very friendly
Summary: I highly recommend this hotel most especially for families. The beach is just across the street, very easy access and close to a lot of restaurant. They also have some live entertainment by the pool and we enjoyed watching them from the balcony of our room.

This is a beautiful resort with many amenities -- but of course it comes with a price. Although not necessarily "cheap", the hotel has a nice pool, restaurant, and across from the beach. It also has many private service and free use of the umbrella and beach chairs for Hilton Honors members. The place is currently under renovation for an addition for the resort. Under that circumstance, it is still a decent hotel. We had a wonderful view of the beach and balcony. When we arrived, our room was not ready yet so they gave us a $20 credit for drinks at the restaurant. Classy... Hilton Honors Members get many benefits and discounts at hotel restaurant.

The perfect staff and perfect location. Had a great experience and an amazing view of Huntington Beach. The pool is excellent and the drinks were cold. The staff upon arrival to the gentlemen that brought up my vehicle were always helpful and smiling. Good for friends and families

From the moment we checked in, I knew this was the place for me!  I was met with a friendly smile by Austin who helped check me in.  The room was modern, clean, and provided a nice view.  The hotel is clean overall, and people are very friendly.  Water pressure was nice, bathroom was well lit, and the bed comfortable.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.  With many options in the area, choosing this hotel will ensure you have a nice vacation!

Summary Heading: OK, but a stay incurs many extra costs
Summary: We stayed at The Waterfront Beach Resort to relax for a couple of days. And it WAS relaxing. Except that the pool was full of very lively kids and a poolside chair did not offer any relaxing option and the hotel had no newspapers. The excuse for the lack och newpaper was that "they arrive early and are usually taken by people by 7 AM". So a paper has to purchased. The same as everything else. And to top it off, the hotel parking cost is outrageous, making the "Great Rate" price offered by the hotel for a stay deceiving. And the rooms facing South, towards the building site should have had a considerable mark down because the balcony was useless during the day.
Manager Response: Dear Tord E,  Thank you for your recent review. Our outstanding staff and superior accommodations are only getting better with addition of our new tower (made up mostly of SUITES!), an additional pool and waterslide, new restaurants...new, new new! We are very excited to have you back to experience it all for yourself.  We are very sorry you encountered a few issues during your stay. You happened to be here at the busiest time of the year and we do try our best to assist you in anyway we can.
